Tshanda Sangwa (a mụrụ na 26 Julaị 1996) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eti egwu na Switzerland-Congo
A mụrụ Sangwa na Geneva n'afọ 1996
Nne na nna ya bụ ndị na-agụ egwú nna ya Maray bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-agba egwú na Papa Wemba's orchestra, nne ya Sonia, bụ onye nkuzi egwu na Switzerland
O kwuru na o nweghị nrụgide ezinụlọ ọ bụla iji chụsoo ọrụ egwu
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2001, ọ pụtara na azụmahịa 'Bébé Rico' na-akpọsa ngwaahịa ntecha ụmụaka
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọha na eze maara ya n'okpuru aha 'Baby Tshanda'
Maka egwu mbụ ya n'ọnwa June afọ 2002, mgbe ọ dị afọ isii, Sangwa rụrụ ọrụ na Halle de la Gombe na Kinshasa n'ihu ndị nkiri 50,000
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2002, European Foundation for the Rights of the Child họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya maka ikike nke nwatakịrị
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2003, Sangwa rụrụ ọrụ na 4th Pan-African Music Festival (FESPAM) na Brazzaville, ya na Youssou N'Dour, Manu Dibango, Magic System, na Koffi Olomide na-ekere òkè n'ọkwa
Sangwa natara ihe nrite 'Revelation Fespam 2003'
Maka ọrụ ihe nkiri mbụ ya, n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2004, ọ rụrụ Little Prince na ihe nkiri Mwezé Ngangura Les Habits Neufs du Gouverneur
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2006, Sangwa jere ozi dịka onye nduzi maka 'obere zebras' na Kinshasa mmemme nke Swiss Romande Radio
E mere ihe ndekọ ahụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche ma nwee ikike nke nwatakịrị dịka isiokwu ha
Ihe omume ahụ meriri ihe nrite na Switzerland, 'obere zebras' nwekwara ike isonye na nnukwu asọmpi redio mba ụwa maka ikike nwata na Egypt
Mgbe nne na nna ya kewara n'afọ 2008, Sangwa na nne ya kwagara Switzerland
N'afọ 2011, o sonyere na mmemme Die grössten Schweizer Talente na SF1
Sangwa mechara lekwasị anya na ọmụmụ ihe ya ma kwụsị ọrụ egwu ya
O weputara abọm, Yele, n'ọnwa June afọ 2019
Tshediso John Matona bụ onye ọrụ obodo South Africa na onye bụbu onye isi oche nke Eskom
Matona gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Cape Town na nzere na Economics na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na Mahadum nke East Anglia na Masters na Development Economics
Ọ bụbu Director General nke Ngalaba nke Ụlọ Ọrụ Ọha, na Director General nke Ngalaba Azụmahịa na Ụlọ Ọrụ

Tshediso Patjie (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke anọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1990) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ South Africa nke na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agbara Sekhukhune United nke South Africa Premier Division bọọlụ
Tshegofatso Ketshabile, nke a maara dịka Tshego bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu na South Africa
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama na 2016, mgbe ọ wepụtara egwu ya 'Hennessy' ma wepụta abọm izizi ya PinkPanther (2019)
A mụrụ Tshego n'aka ndị ụkọchukwu abụọ e chiri echi na 21 Mee 1990 na Atlanta, Georgia United States ebe ndị mụrụ ya na-agụ akwụkwọ
Ọ na-eme njem nleta gaa South Africa ugboro ugboro site na mgbe ọ dị afọ anọ ruo mgbe ọ mechara kwaga Mafikeng iji lekwasị anya n'ọrụ egwu ya
Na Mee 2020, Tshego bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Def Jam Africa, flagship nke Def Jam Recordings
Tshego kwetara na ọ bụ onye ọgwụ ọjọọ riri ahụ na 2016
Tshego nwere nwa nwanyị amụrụ na 12 Julaị 2019 na Lola Kyle
Tshepo bụ African unisex nyere aha pụtara olile anya wee nweta site na ngwaa Sesotho 'tshepa', nke pụtara olileanya
Ndị nwere aha a gụnyere
Tshepo Motsepe (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 17 n'ọnwa Juun n'afọ 1953) bụ dibịa na nwanyị ọchụnta ego nke South Africa
Ọ bụ First Lady nke South Africa, dị ka nwunye Cyril Ramaphosa, onye isi ala South Africa
Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị tọrọ Bridgette Radebe na nwanne ya nwoke bụ Patrice Motsepe
Tshepo Motsepe gụrụ akwụkwọ dị ka dọkịta na Mahadum KwaZulu-Natal ma gụchaa nna ya ukwu na ahụike ọha na eze na Harvard School of Public Health
N'afọ 2012, ọ gụsịrị Social Entrepreneurship Certificate Program (SECP) na Gordon Institute of Business Science
Ọ bụ onye isi oche ugbu a nke African Self Help Trust (ASHA Trust), na-elekwasị anya na mmepe na agụmakwụkwọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ihu ọha na nke onwe ya na Mmakau, Mahikeng, Johannesburg, Pretoria, na Zimbabwe
Ọ bụbu osote onye isi nke The Reproductive Health Research Institute
Motsepe lụrụ Cyril Ramaphosa, President of the Republic of South Africa, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ anọ
Motsepe bụ nwunye nke atọ nke Ramaphosa

Nna ya bụ Chief Augustine Butana Chaane Motsepe nwụrụ anwụ, nwanne ya nwoke bụ Patrice Motsepe, na nwanne ya nwanyị Bridgette Radebe, nwunye onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị African National Congress (ANC) na onye bụbu Mịnịsta nke Ike, Jeff Radebe
Tshibumba Kanda-Matulu (1947 na Élisabethville, Belgian Congo - c1981 na Zaire), nke a na-akpọkarị TKM, bụ onye ama ama na-ese sitere na Zaire (nke a na-akpọ Democratic Republic of the Congo ugbu a)

TKM rụrụ ọrụ n'ime ụdị a na-akpọ 'African popular art' ma ọ bụ 'genre painting' ma mara ya maka ọtụtụ eserese ya na-egosi oge dị mkpa nke akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Congo dịka ha pụtara na ncheta ndị mmadụ
TKM furu efu na 1981 ma kwenyere na e gburu ya na ọgba aghara
A mụrụ TKM na Élisabethville (Lubumbashi nke oge a), na ndịda nke Belgium Congo, na 1947
TKM rụrụ ọrụ n'ime oge nke ọdịbendị ziri ezi na 1970s
TKM bụ otu n'ime ndị isi nke 'African genre painting' nke pụtara na Belgium Congo na ngwụsị afọ 1950s na nke jikọtara ụdị na usoro Europe na Congo
Ihe osise TKM a maara nke ọma bụ akụkụ nke usoro ọrụ 101 nke onye German anthropologist Johannes Fabian nyere iji gosipụta akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Congo dịka ọ pụtara na ncheta mba
Emepụtara usoro a n'etiti 1974 na 1976 ma mepụta ọrụ TKM ma jiri ya mee ihe dị ka ntọala maka mmekorita agụmakwụkwọ n'etiti ha abụọ
Ihe si na ya pụta, Remembering the Present Paintings and popular history in Zaire, e bipụtara na 1996
TKM lere ebumnuche nke akwụkwọ ahụ anya dị ka igosi akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mba ya nye nwa amụrụ na mba ahụ
N'ụzọ dị iche, Fabian na-egosi ya dị ka ọrụ anthropological maka ọmụmụ ọdịda anyanwụ

Otu n'ime ihe nkiri ndị TKM gosipụtara bụ Elisabethville Massacre nke 1941, okwu nnwere onwe nke Patrice Lumumba nke 30 June 1960, mmeghe nke omenala obligatoire farming, na ikpe nke onye ndú okpukpe Simon Kimbangu site n'aka ndị ọchịchị Belgium na 1921
E mere eserese niile ahụ n'oge mwakpo Shaba n'oge nke mpaghara obodo TKM nke Shaba hụrụ ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọrụ ahụ dị ịrịba ama n'akụkọ ihe mere eme n'ihi ajụjụ ọnụ dị n'etiti Fabian na TKM bụ nke a gụnyere na ọrụ ahụ
N'ajụjụ ọnụ ndị ahụ, TKM katọrọ gọọmentị Mobutu Sese Seko, na-ekwu okwu dịka 'Ihe Mobutu bu n'uche bụ eziokwu - ma ọ bụ ụgha
Ma nke ahụ bụ ihe m na-edebe n'onwe m
Ihe bụ eziokwu bụ na ọ malitere site na echiche ziri ezi
Ya mere, o kwuru okwu ma anyị niile kwekọrịtara; ọ dịghị otu ihe a na-arụrịta ụka
Ọrụ ahụ na-ekwusi ike na TKM nwere mmasị na Patrice Lumumba, ọkachasị n'ikpachara anya jiri ihe osise Kraịst na eserese nke Lumumba, na-egosipụta ọnyá Jizọs mgbe a kpọgidere ya n'obe
Ihe yiri ya doro anya nke na Fabian kpọrọ ngalaba ahụ 'The Passion of Patrice Lumumba', na-ezo aka na 'The Passion of the Christ'
Tropenmuseum, ihe ngosi nka nke agbụrụ na Amsterdam, zụtara 102 nke ihe osise TKM n'afọ 2000
Tshoganetso Mpho Adolphina Tongwane (nwụrụ na 19 Mee 2021) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Onye otu African National Congress, a họpụtara ya na National Assembly na 2008
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu zuru oke na ntuli aka 2009
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ruo na ntuli aka 2014 mgbe ọ tụfuru oche ya
Tongwane laghachiri na nzuko omeiwu izu ole na ole ka e mesịrị, na-ejupụta oche nke onye bụbu onye isi okwu Max Sisulu
Ọ tụfuru oche ya ọzọ na ntuli aka 2019, naanị ka a họpụta ya ka ọ laghachi na nzuko omeiwu izu ole na ole ka e mesịrị
Tongwane nwụrụ na 19 Mee 2021
Tongwane tolitere n'ezinụlọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya malitere na 1980s mgbe ọ sonyeere United Democratic Front na mgbe e mesịrị African National Congress
Tongwane sonyeere National Assembly na 2008 tupu ntuli aka nke afọ 2009
A họpụtara ya maka oge zuru ezu na ntuli aka ahụ, n'agbanyeghị na ANC enweghị nkwado
A họpụtara ya ka ọ rụọ ọrụ na kọmitii na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ụlọ na ụlọ ọrụ mmadụ
Tongwane bụ onye na-ahụ maka ndị otu ANC maka ụlọ ọrụ ndị otu Kathu maka Nzukọ nke anọ (2009 ruo 2014)
Ọ guzoro maka nhọpụta ọzọ na ntuli aka nke May 7, 2014 dị ka onye nke 124 na ndepụta mba nke ANC nke ndị omeiwu maka National Assembly
A họpụtaghi ya ọzọ na National Assembly n'ihi ọdịda ntuli aka nke ANC
Na 29 Mee 2014, onye bụbu onye isi okwu Max Sisulu gbara arụkwaghịm n'oche ya na mgbakọ ahụ
ANC họọrọ Tongwane ka ọ mejupụta oche ya dịka ọ nọ na-esote na ndepụta ahụ ma ṅụọ iyi na 30 Mee
E kenyere Tongwane na kọmitii ọrụ ugbo, ọhịa na ịkụ azụ na ọrụ
Tongwane guzoro maka oge ọzọ na nzuko omeiwu na ntuli aka nke Mee 8, 2019, ebe etinyela ya n'ọnọdụ nke 116 na ndepụta mba ANC
Ọzọkwa, a họpụtaghi ya ọzọ na National Assembly n'ihi nkwado ANC na-ebelata ọbụna karịa na ntuli aka
Onye bụbu minista na-ahụ maka mmepe ọha na eze Susan Shabangu gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye otu National Assembly mgbe a họpụtaghachighị ya na kansụl
ANC họọrọ Tongwane ka ọ nọrọ n'oche ya ma ṅụọ iyi na 10 June 2019
N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Juun, a kpọrọ Tongwane aha na Kọmitii Portfolio na gburugburu ebe obibi, ọhịa na azụ
Tongwane bụ Backbencher n'oge oge atọ ọ nọrọ na omeiwu
Tongwane nwụrụ site na COVID-19 na 19 Mee 2021, mgbe ọ dị afọ 65
A mụrụ Dangarembga na 4 February 1959 na Mutoko, Southern Rhodesia (ugbu a Zimbabwe), obere obodo ebe nne na nna ya kuziri ihe n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ozi dị nso
Nne ya, Susan Dangarembga, bụ nwanyị ojii mbụ na Southern Rhodesia nwetara nzere bachelọ, na nna ya, Amon, ga-emesịa bụrụ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ
Dangarembga biri na England site na afọ abụọ ruo isii ebe nne na nna ya gụchara akwụkwọ sekọndrị

N'ebe ahụ, ọ chetara na ya na nwanne ya nwoke malitere ịsụ Bekee 'dị ka ihe atụ ma chefuo ọtụtụ n'ime Shona anyị mụtara' Ya na ezinụlọ ya laghachiri na Rhodesia na 1965, bụ afọ nke nkwupụta nnwere onwe Unilateral nke colony
Na Rhodesia, ọ nwetara Shona, ma were Bekee, asụsụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ya, asụsụ mbụ ya

Tsitsi Veronica Muzenda (amụrụ n'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1950) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zimbabwe, onye omeiwu nke Midlands Province na nwa nwanyị nke onye bụbu osote onye isi ala Zimbabwe, Simon Muzenda

Tsitsi Veronica Muzenda (amụrụ n'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1950) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zimbabwe, onye omeiwu nke Midlands Province na nwa nwanyị nke onye bụbu osote onye isi ala Zimbabwe, Simon Muzenda

A mụrụ Tsitsi na Bulawayo, Zimbabwe na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Simon Muzenda na Maud MuzendaYa na ụmụnne ya abụọ, Vitalis Muzenda na Virginia Muzenda, Tsitsi sonyeere nna ya na Rhodesian Bush War, agha nke dugara na njedebe nke ọchịchị na Zimbabwe
Dị ka onye omeiwu nke Midlands Province, ndị omeiwu nke Zimbabwe họpụtara Tsitsi na Standing Rules and Orders Committee (SROC) n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2018
N'ikwu okwu na Nzukọ nke 144 nke Inter-Parliamentary Union na Bali, Tsitsi nọgidere na-anọpụ iche na mwakpo Russia nke Ukraine na 2022
Ọ kpọrọ oku maka mkparịta ụka siri ike na nke na-ewuli elu dị ka ihe ngwọta kachasị mma iji kwụsị agha na Ukraine
Ọ kpọrọ oku ka United Nations na United Nations Security Council ka ha na ndị otu abụọ ahụ rụkọọ ọrụ iji kpebie ịkwụsị agha ahụ
Echiche ya kwekọrọ na nke gọọmentị Zimbabwe, nke na-ezere ịtụ vootu UN iji katọọ mwakpo Russia na Ukraine

N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2021, mgbe kọmitii isiokwu nke Sustainable Development Goals nke Tsitsi Muzenda duziri nyochara mmetụta nke ọrịa COVID-19 na mmepe agụmakwụkwọ na Zimbabwe, ọ tụrụ aro imeziwanye nha nhata n'etiti ụlọ akwụkwọ ime obodo na obodo
Ọ kpọrọ ndị omeiwu ka ha gaa n'okwu na-arịwanye elu nke ime ime nwa na ịhapụ ụlọ akwụkwọ n'etiti ụmụ akwụkwọ na Zimbabwe
Onye isi ala Robert Mugabe họpụtara Tsitsi ka ọ bụrụ osote minista na-ahụ maka ike na mmepe ike na Disemba 2014
N'oge ọ bụ osote minista, Tsitsi butere ụzọ na Sustainable Energy for All Initiative nke chọrọ ịkwalite ohere ọkụ eletrik nye ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na Zimbabwe n'okpuru mmemme ọkụ eletrik ime obodo

A họpụtara Tsitsi dị ka onye otu Politburo nke ZANUPF na 1999, ihe ndị na-akọwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị hụrụ dị ka mgbalị Robert Mugabe iji mee ka iguzosi ike n'ihe nye ya n'ime pati ahụ site n'ịhọpụta nwa ya nwanyị onye ọ tụkwasịrị obi, Simon Muzenda

N'afọ 2020, mgbe a kwụsịrị ma chụpụ ndị isi ndị ntorobịa nke ZANUPF, Pupurai Togarepi na Lewis Matutu mgbe ha kpughere nrụrụ aka nke onye mmekọ onye isi ala Emmerson Mnangagwa bụ Kuda Tagwirei, Tsitsi Muzenda katọrọ mkpebi ahụ
O boro mkpebi ahụ ebubo na ọ na-egbochi arụmụka n'ime pati ahụ ma na-egosi ZANUīPF dị ka megide ọgụ mgbochi nrụrụ aka

Tsitsi anọwo na ndepụta mmachibido iwu nke European Union na Gọọmentị US nke etinyere n'okpuru Zimbabwe Democracy and Economic Recovery Act nke 2001 na-elekwasị anya na ndị na-emebi ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na ụlọ ọrụ Zimbabwe
EU depụtara Tsitsi na ndepụta mmachibido iwu na July 2002 tinyere ndị isi ndị ọzọ na ndị minista ZANUPF
N'ime iwu gọọmentị US nke George W
Bush nyere na 10 Machị 2003, e tinyere Tsitsi na ndepụta mmachibido iwu dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-emebi usoro ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ na Zimbabwe
A kwadoro ya na ikike ya dị ka onye isi kọmitii nke Politburo nke ZANUPF
Ọ nọgidere na ndepụta mmachibido iwu nke European Union na Gọọmentị US kemgbe ahụ
Tsonam Cleanse Akpeloo bụ onye Ghana na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na teknụzụ
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke SUKU Technologies na onye isi oche maka mpaghara Greater Accra maka Association of Ghana Industries (AGI)
Akpeloo nwere nzere bachelọ nke nka na akụ na ụba na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na nzere masta na njikwa iwu akụ na ụba site na Mahadum Ghana
O nwere akara ugo mmụta na Management Information Systems site na Mahadum Nkà na Ụzụ Ghana, ma mụọkwa Jungian Psychology site na Institute of Humanities and Social Sciences, Mahadum Gavel, Sweden
Ọ bụ ngwaahịa nke Clark Atlanta Business School (United States) na Stanford SEED Programme nke Stanford Graduate School of Business
Akpeloo bụ nwata akwụkwọ nke African Liberty Academy na Diplo Foundation, ma jide diploma na njikwa ego site na Chartered Institute of Marketing
Tsonam bụ ọkachamara IT ma bụrụkwa onye isi oche nke SUKU Technologies na onye isi oche na-anọchite anya Association of Ghana Industries
Ọ bụkwa onye nchoputa na onye isi nchịkwa nke Techcom Visions, ụlọ ọrụ IT na Ghana

Tsonam bụ onye isi oche mba nke ngalaba ICT nke Ghana National Chamber of Commerce and Industry (GNCCI) Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere na Accra Technical University, NVTI CMMTI na Methodist University College of Ghana

Ọ bụ onye ndu Kadodo Africa, ọnụ ụzọ dị elu nke na-enyocha profaịlụ, na-enyocha, na-enyocha ma na-akwalite òtù dị iche iche na Ghana na Africa iji mee ka ha dị maka uru nke Mpaghara Azụmahịa Azụmahịa Africa Continental (AfCFTA)

Tsonga (/ ˈtsɒŋɡə/) ma ọ bụ Xitsonga (Tsonga Xitsonga) dị ka endonym, bụ asụsụ Bantu nke ndị Tsonga nke ndịda Africa na-asụ Ya na Tswa na Ronga na-aghọta nke ọma na aha 'Tsonga' na-ejikarị dị ka okwu mkpuchi maka atọ ahụ, a na-akpọkwa ya Tswa-Ronga mgbe ụfọdụ Ahaziri asụsụ Xitsonga maka ma agụmakwụkwọ yana ojiji ụlọ Tsonga bụ asụsụ gọọmentị South Africa, ma n'okpuru aha 'Shangani' a ghọtara ya dị ka asụsụ gọọmentị na Iwu Zimbabwe A na-amata asụsụ Tswa-Ronga niile na Mozambique Ọ bụghị ọrụ gọọmentị na Eswatini (nke bụbu Swaziland)
Tsonka Vaysilova (amụrụ na 20 Febụwarị 1967) bụ onye egwuregwu basketball nke Bulgaria
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị na 1988 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Tsotsitaal bụ asụsụ asụsụ sitere n'asụsụ dị iche iche agwakọtara nke a na-asụkarị n'obodo ndị dị na mpaghara Gauteng (dị ka Soweto), kamakwa n'agglomerations ndị ọzọ na South Africa niile

Tsotsi bụ okwu nbibi nke Sesotho, Pedi ma ọ bụ Tswana maka 'onye ohi' ma ọ bụ 'onye na-apụnara mmadụ ihe' ma ọ bụ 'onye omekome', ikekwe site na ngwaa 'ho lotsa' 'ịkọ nkọ', nke agbanweela ihe ọ pụtara n'oge a ịgụnye 'ịkọ con '; ma ọ bụ site na ijiji tsetse, dị ka a na-akpọ asụsụ ahụ na mbụ dị ka Flytaal, ọ bụ ezie na flaai pụtakwara 'ọ dị jụụ' ma ọ bụ 'ụzọ smart'
Okwu taal na Afrikaans pụtara 'asụsụ'
Galebekwe Virginia Tsotso Tlhapi (amụrụ n'afọ 1979 ma ọ bụ n'afọ 1980) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa na-eje ozi ugbu a dị ka MEC maka nka, ọdịbendị, egwuregwu na ntụrụndụ na North West
Ọ bụ onye otu North West Provincial Legislature maka African National Congress
Tlhapi bụ onye otu African National Congress na onye bụbu onye otu African Nacional Congress Youth League

Ọ bụ onye bụbu onye isi oche nke ANC Youth League na North West, onye bụbu otu kọmitii nchịkwa mpaghara nke ANC Youth Association na mpaghara Bojanala, na onye bụbu onyeisi kọmitii onye isi obodo maka mmepe akụ na ụba mpaghara na Bojanala District Municipality
A ṅụrụ Tlhapi iyi dị ka onye otu North West Provincial Legislature na 2 August 2016

Mgbe ntuli aka mba na nke mpaghara nke afọ 2019 gasịrị, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu Executive Council for Arts, Culture, Sports and Recreation na North West Provincial Government site n'aka onye isi ala Job Mokgoro
Tsuvan (nke a makwaara dị ka Matsuvan, Motsuvan, Terki, Telaki, Teleki, Tchede) bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ na Cameroon na Far North Province
Tsuvan is spoken in the village (in fact, the massif) of Téléki by a group known as the Tchédé, who are often classified with the Gude
It is spoken east of the canton of Tchévi, commune of Bourrha, department of Mayo-Tsanaga, Far North Region
Like Sharwa, it is also spoken the Northern Region, in the department of Mayo-Louti (commune of Mayo-Oulo)
There are 2,300 speakers
Tsvetelina Zarkova ( Bulgarian ) (amụrụ (1986-12-18 ) na Pernik ) bụ nwaanyi Bulgarian onye ọkpụkpọ volleyball
Ọ bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba ụmụ nwanyị Bulgaria ma na-egwu CS Știința Bacău
Ọ bụ akụkụ nke otu mba Bulgaria na asọmpi Volleyball ụmụ nwanyị 2014 FIVB na Italy

Asụsụ Tswa–Ronga (ma ọ bụ naanị Tsonga) bụ otu asụsụ South Bantu nwere njikọ chiri anya nke a na-asụ na ndịda Africa ọkachasị na ndịda Mozambique, ugwu ọwụwa anyanwụ South Africa na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Zimbabwe [Ihe ndekọ achọrọ]

Tswana, nke a makwaara n'aha obodo ya Setswana, ma bụrụbu Sechuana na bekee, bụ asụsụ Bantu nke ihe dị ka nde mmadụ 82 na-asụ na South Africa Ọ bụ nke ezinụlọ asụsụ Bantu n'ime ngalaba Sotho-Tswana nke Zone S (S30), yana njikọ chiri anya na asụsụ Northern Sotho na Southern Sotho, yana asụsụ Kgalagadi na asụsụ Lozi
Tu Youyou ( Chinese ; amụrụ Disemba 30,1930) bụ onye na -ahụ maka ọgwụ na ọrịa ịba na China

Ọ chọpụtara artemisinin (nke a makwaara dị ka qīnghāosù青蒿素) na dihydroartemisinin, nke a na-eji agwọ ịba , ọganihu dị na ọgwụ ebe okpomọkụ nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ, na-azọpụta ọtụtụ nde mmadụ na ndida China, Ndịda Ọwụwa A bunyanwụ Eshia, Afrika, na South Amerika
Maka ọrụ ya, Tu nwetara nturu ugo Lasker 2011 na orụ ogige ọgwụ na 2015 Nobel Prize na Physiology ma ọ bụ Medicine ya na William C
Campbell na Satoshi Ōmura
Tu bụ onye mbụ nwetara ihe nrite Nobel na China na physiology ma ọ bụ medicin ma bụrụ nwa nwanyị mbụ nke ndị peoples Republic of China nwetara Nrite Nobel na ụdị ọ bụla
Ọ bụkwa onye China mbụ nwetara ihe nrite Lasker
A mụrụ Tu, ọ gụọ akwụkwọ ma mee nyocha ya naanị na China
A mụrụ Tu na Ningbo, Zhejiang, China, na Disemba 30,1930
My[first] name Youyou was given by my father,who adapted it from the sentence
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Xiaoshi maka akwụkwọ juniọ sekọndrị na afọ mbụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, tupu ọ gafere na Ningbo Middle School na 1948
Ọrịa ụkwara nta gbochiri agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, mana kpaliri ya ka ọ banye nyocha ahụike
Site na 1951 ruo 1955, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum Peking University / Beijing Medical College
[note 1] Na 1955, Youyou Tu gụsịrị akwụkwọ Mahadum gbasara Ahụike na Beijing ngalaba ọgwụ wee gaa n'ihu nyocha ya na ọgwụ ahịhịa China na China Academy of Chinese Medical Sciences
Tu gụrụ akwụkwọ na ngalaba sayensị ọgwụ, wee gụchaa na 1955
Ka oge na -aga, a zụlitere Tu maka afọ abụọ na ọkara n'ọgwụ ọdịnala ndị China
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Tu rụrụ ọrụ na Academy of Traditional Chinese Medicine (ugbu a bụ China Academy of Traditional Chinese Medical Sciences [note 2] ) na Beijing

Tu carried on her work in the 1960s and 70s during China's Cultural Revolution, when scientists were denigrated as one of the nine black categories in society according to Maoist theory (or possibly that of the Gang of Four)

N'ime afọ ndị mbụ ya na nyocha, Tu mụrụ Lobelia chinensis, ọgwụ ọdịnala China maka ịgwọ schistosomiasis, kpatara site na trematodes nke na -efe efe na eriri afọ ma ọ bụ eriri afọ, nke juru ebe niile na ọkara mbụ nke narị afọ nke 20 na South China

N'afọ 1967, n'oge agha Vietnam, Ho Chi Minh, onye ndu North Vietnam (nke na -ebuso South Vietnam na United States agha), riọrọ onye isi ala China Zhou Enlai maka enyemaka n'ikwalite ọgwụgwọ ịba maka ndị agha ya na -agbadata Ho
Chi Minh trail, ebe ọtụtụ gbadatara buru ịba nke na -anaghị anata ọgwụ chloroquine

N'ihi na ịba bụkwa nnukwu ihe na -akpata ọnwụ na mpaghara ndịda China, ọkachasị Guangdong, na Guangxi, Zhou Enlai mere ka Mao Zedong guzobe ọrụ nchọpụta ọgwụ nzuzo nke akpọrọ Project 523 mgbe ụbọchị mmalite ya malitere na abalị iri abụọ na atọ nke Ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1967
Ná mmalite afọ 1969, a họpụtara Tu ịbụ onye isi otu nyocha Project 523 na ụlọ akwụkwọ ya
Ebu ụzọ ziga Tu na Hainan ebe ọ sị na ndị butere ọrịa na amụ gbasara nje ọrịa a
Ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị n'ụwa niile enyochala ihe karịrị ogige ebe obibi puku abụọ na iri ano (240,000)ma nke bu nke jiụkwụ kpọrọ n'ihi enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma
N'afọ 1969, Tu, mgbe ahụ dị afọ iri atọ na itoolu, nwere echiche nke inyocha ahịhịa mgbọrọgwụ China
O buru ụzọ nyocha ndị ọkachamara ahụike China na akụkọ ntolite, na -iga eleta ndị na -ahụ maka ọgwụ ọdịnala China na mba ha niile n'onwe ya
Ọ chịkọtara ihe ọ chọpụtara n'ime akwụkwọ akpọrọ A Collection of Single Practical Prescriptions for Anti-Malaria
Akwụkwọ ndetu ya a chịkọtara ndenye ma ọ bụ ka e si enye ọgwụ nke ọnụ ọgụgụ narị isii na iri anọ

Ka ruo n'afọ 1971, ndị òtù ya emela nyocha nke ruru puku abụọ gbasara ụmụ irighiri eji agwakọ ọgwụ omenala ndị China ma site na ntụziaka ha mepụtara habal estrat, site na ụfọdụ hab puku abụọ , nke a nwalere na ụmụ oke
Otu ogige dị irè, womwudd na -atọ ụtọ ( Artemisia annua ), nke ejiri mee ihe maka ahụ ọkụ na -adịte aka, bụ usoro ngosi ịba

Dị ka Tu gosipụtara na nzukọ ọmụmụ ihe a, a kọwara nkwadebe ya na ederede gbarala afọ otu puku na narị iri isii(1,600), na uzommeputa akpọrọ, 'Ntuziaka mberede ka edobere aka otu onye'(Emergency Prescription Kept Up One's Sleeve)
Na mbụ, ọ bụghị ọrụ n'ihi na ha jiri mmiri esiri esi wepụta ya

Tu Youyou chọpụtara na enwere ike iji usoro nke dị ala wee kewapụ ihe na-agwọ ọrịa ịba nke ọma na osisi; Tu na -ekwu na isi mmalite ọgwụ ahịhịa mgbọrọgwụ China , bụ site n'akwụkwọ ntuziaka nke Prescription for Emergency Treatments , nke Ge Hong dere na narị atọ na iri anọ, nke na -ekwu na ahịhịa mgbọrọgwụ a kwesịrị itinye n'ime mmiri oyi
Akwụkwọ a nwere ntụzịaka nke imikpu njuaka nke qinghao na nha nke lita mmiri 04 ,ma sachapụta mmiri ahịhịa ahụ ma ñụcha ya niile
Mgbe ọ gụzigharịrị uzo esi emebe ogwu ahụ, Tu chọpụtara na mmiri ọkụ emebiwori ihe na -arụ ọrụ n'ime osisi; ya mere, ọ tụpụtara ụzọ iji mmiri nke nwere obere okpomọkụ wepụta arụmọrụ dị mma kama okwu
Nnwale anụmanụ gosiri na ọ na -arụ ọrụ nke ọma na oke na enwe
N'afọ 1972, ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya nwetara ihe pụtara ihe wee kpọọ ya qinghaosu (青蒿素), ma ọ bụ artemisinin dị ka amaara ya na Bekee, nke zọpụtara ọtụtụ nde ndụ, ọkachasị na mmepe
ụwa
Tu mụkwara usoro kemịkalụ na ọgwụ nke artemisinin
Ndị otu Tu buru ụzọ chọpụta usoro kemịkalụ nke artemisinin
N'afọ 1973, Tu chọrọ igosipụta otu carbonyl dị na molekul artemisinin, ya mere ọ jiri mezie dihydroartemisinin na mberede
Ọzọkwa, Tu wepụtara onwe ya ịbụ isiokwu mmadụ mbụ
Ọ sịrị, 'Dịka onye isi otu nyocha a, enwere m ọrụ' Ọ nweghị nsogbu, yabụ ọ dụzịrị nwalee ọgwụ a na ahụ mmadụ nwere ọrịa nke ọ wetara ihe ịga nke ọma
E bipụtara ọrụ ya na enweghị aha n'afọ 1977
Na 1981, o mere nchoputa gbasara artemisinin na nzuko ya na World Health Organisation
Maka ọrụ ya gbasara ịba, e nyere ya Nrite Nobel gbasara Ọgwụ ka ọnwa Ọktoba gbara mkpụrụ ụbọchị ise 2015

A kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nyocha (研究员, Ndị kasị elu na-eme nchọpụta n'usoro na China tinyekwara agụmakwụkwọ n'usoro nke prọfesọ zuru okè ) n'afo 1980 ka oteghi aka emechara mgbanwe akụ China (Chinese economic reforms)malitere na 1978
Na 2001 a kwalitere ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ agụmakwụkwmaka ndị chọrọ nturugo dọktọral
Ugbu a ọ bụ onye isi ndị sayensị na akademi
Ka ọ na -erule 2007, ọfịs ya dị n'ụlọ ochie nke dị na Dongcheng District, Beijing
Tupu afọ 2011, Tu Youyou bụ onye amaghị ama ruo ọtụtụ iri afọ, a kọwara ya dị ka 'onye ndị mmadụ chefuru kpamkpam'

A na-ele Tu anya dị ka 'onye ọkà mmụta sayensị atọ na-enweghị' -enweghị nzere postgraduate (enweghị agụmakwụkwọ postgraduate mgbe ahụ na China), enweghị ọmụmụ ma ọ bụ ahụmịhe nyocha na mba ofesi, ọ bụghịkwa onye otu n'ime ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ mba China, ndị China
Ụlọ akwụkwọ sayensị na Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Injinia nke China
A na -ahụta Tu ugbu a dị ka onye nnọchi anya ọgbọ mbụ nke ndị ọrụ ahụike China kemgbe e hiwere Republic of China na 1949
TúTu na di ya, Li Tingzhao (李廷钊), onye injinia na -ahụ maka igwe, na bi na Beijing
Li bụ nwa klas Tu na Xiaoshi na ụlọ akwụkwọ nta
Ha mụrụ ụmụ nwanyị abụọ
Nna nna nne Tu,bụ Yao Yongbai (姚 咏 白), bụ onye isi nchịkwa ego mba(National Treasury Administration) mgbe emezigharịchara ya
Nwanne nna ya, Yao Qingsan (姚庆 三), bụ onye ma maka akụ na ụba na onye ọrụ akụ

Tuedon 'Tee' Omatsola-Morgan, amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 3 n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1973 bụ onye Naijirịa na-agba ọsọ ultramaraton
O mechaala ihe karịrị 73 marathons ma sọọ mpi na 2 ultramarathons
A mụrụ ya na Warri, Naijirịa, a mụrụ ya n'ebo Itsekiri
Morgan kwagara UK mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii iji gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya
Otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị Naijirịa na-agba ọsọ marathon nke oge ya, ọ ritere ọtụtụ ihe nrite dịka 2 Guinness world records nke e mere ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 2
O mechaala Marathons na Half Marathons n'Antarctica na Marathon na North pole
Ọ bụ nwanyị Naijirịa mbụ mechara marathon na North Pole

Morgan bụ onye nwere ihe ndekọ ụwa nke ihe ndekọ ụwa abụọ dị iche iche oge kachasị ọsọ maka nwanyị ịgba ọsọ ọkara marathon na kọntinent ọ bụla (10 ụbọchị, awa 23 na nkeji 37) na oge kachasị ọsọ nye nwanyị ịgba ọsọ na ọkara maraton na kọntaktị ọ bụla na ogidi ugwu (62 ụbọchị, awa 12, nkeji 58 na sekọnd 49)

E mere nke mbụ n'ime ihe ndekọ abụọ ahụ dị ka akụkụ nke ihe ịma aka Triple 7 nke Morgan ebe ọ nwara ịgba ọsọ 7 ọkara marathons na kọntinent 7 n'ime ụbọchị 7 mana n'ihi ọnọdụ ihu igwe ọjọọ mgbe ọ na-anwa ịdakwasị na Antarctica maka marathons ikpeazụ ọ nweghị ike mezue ya n'ime ọnwa 7 mana ụbọchị 10 e nyere ya na ndekọ ụwa
Tufa bụ nkume nzu dị iche iche nke a na-emepụta mgbe mineral carbonate na-asọpụta site na mmiri okpomọkụ
Mmiri na-ekpo ọkụ na-ekpo ọkụ na-ekpo ọkụ na-ekpo ọkụ mgbe ụfọdụ na-emepụta ihe nkwụnye carbonate yiri (ma ọ dị obere), nke a maara dị ka travertine
A na-akpọ Tufa mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka (meteogene) travertine
O kwesịghị inwe mgbagwoju anya na mmiri ọkụ (thermogene) travertine
Tufa, nke bụ calcareous, ekwesịghịkwa inwe mgbagwoju anya na tuff, nkume mgbawa na-agbawa agbawa nke nwere usoro okwu yiri nke ahụ nke a na-akpọkwa 'tufa' mgbe ụfọdụ
Nkwụnye ego tufa nke oge a na nke fossil jupụtara na ahịhịa mmiri; dị ka ndị dị otú ahụ, ọtụtụ ihe nkwụnye ego tufa na-eji nnukwu akụkụ macrobiological ha mara, ma na-agbapụta nke ukwuu
Tufa na-etolite ma ọ bụ na ọwa fluvial ma ọ bụ na gburugburu lacustrine
Ford and Pedley (1996) na-enye ntụlegharị nke sistemu tufa gburugburu ụwa
Enwere ike ịkewapụta ihe ndị a na-etinye site na gburugburu ebe obibi ha (ma ọ bụ n'ụzọ ọzọ site na ahịhịa ma ọ bụ petrographically)
Pedley (1990) na-enye usoro nkewa sara mbara, nke gụnyere klas ndị a nke tufa mmiri
Tuft & agịga bụ matarasị na ihe ndina America nke onye na-emepụta ihe ndina Serta Simmons Bedding nwere ugbu a
T&N so n'ime ndị na-ere ahịa n'ịntanetị, bed-in-a-box nke malitere na mbido afọ 2010

Na Septemba 28, 2018, Serta Simmons Bedding nwetara onye na-ere ahịa n'ịntanetị ndị na eme na Ihe ọ bụla n'ime anyị pụta ụwa dị nnọọ mkpa onye isi dị otú na Tuft & Agịga ugbu a dị n'ala na nnukwu ụlọ ahịa matarasị na ụlọ ahịa T&N, yana n'ịntanị
Tuft & agịga malitere dị ka ụlọ ọrụ e-azụmahịa nke Daehee Park na John-Thomas Marino guzobere na July 19, 2012
Ha abụọ zutere site na iji bịa ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị mere n'oge gara maka nsogbụ na mmemme ndị ọchụnta ego na Mahadum Steeti Pennsylvania
Park na Marino guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na July 19, 2012 na $ 3,000 nke ọ bụla n'ime ego ha

ogige na Marino mere ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ruo ihe karịrị $ 100 nde na ego a na-enweta kwa afọ na-enweghị ego ọ bụla n'ime ha na kpo ámá nke ụwa na ụdị nke ụwa a ịghọ nke ụwa họrọ site n'ime ụmụ gị aka inwe ọganihu
N'ime afọ mbụ ya zuru ezu na azụmaahịa, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mepụtara $ 1 nde na ahịa na ngwụcha afọ 2013
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2014, Park kwuru banyere ịmepụta mmalite na inweta ihe ịga nke ọma na IST Izu mmalite, nke Mahadum Pennsylvania State kwadoro
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ mechara mepee ụlọ ngosi brik na mortar mbụ ya na isi ụlọ ọrụ Phoenix na Disemba 2014, nke e mere dị ka 'nnwale' ma dị naanị site na nhọpụta
Tuft & Agịga nwetara TNcom na Septemba 2015
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ guzobere isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ OS
Stapley Hardware nke akụkọ ihe mere eme na Grand Avenue na Phoenix na Disemba 2015, mgbe e jiri onyinye obodo nke $ 300,000 mee ihe iji melite ma rụzie ụlọ ahụ site n'aka onye na-emepe ụlọ
N'afọ 2015, Tuft & Needle toro ruo ihe karịrị ndị ọrụ 100 ma nweta ihe karịrị $ 100 nde na ego
Mgbe ha jụrụ onyinye itinye ego site n'aka ndị na-etinye ego, Park na Marino nwetara ego mgbazinye $ 500,000 site na Bond Street na 2016
N'afọ 2016, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere mkpọsa mgbasa ozi mba nke akpọrọ 'Mattress Stores Are Greedy'
N'afọ 2017, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere $ 170 nde na ahịa
Tuft & Needle mefuru ihe karịrị $ 14 nde na mgbasa ozi n'otu afọ ahụ
Na Septemba 28, 2018, Tuft na agịga mechiri njikọta ya na onye na-emepụta matarasị Serta Simmons Bedding
N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2018, ha kwupụtakwara mmekọrịta ha na Amazon iji wepụta matarasị Amazon nke a na-akpọ 'The Nod' nke Tuft & Needle
Ka ọ na-erule Jenụwarị 2019, Tuft & agịga na-arụ ọrụ ụlọ ahịa asaa na Scottsdale, Gilbert, Seattle, Kansas City, Raleigh, Portland, na Dallas
A na-echekwa ngwaahịa ha na Lowe's, Crate & Barrel na Walmart ebe dị iche iche na United States
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ enwetala akwụkwọ akụkọ site na Business Insider, Marketing Land, The Arizona Republic,akụkọ ndị ahịa , Forbes, Phoenix Business Journal, Bloomberg, na Wired
Tumak, nkè á makwaara dị kà Toumak, Tumag, Tummok, Sara Toumak, Tumac, ná Dije, bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic á na-asụ ná mpaghara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Chad nkè Moyen-Chari ná Koumra
Asụsụ Motun (Mod) ná Tumak nwere ọdịdị ókwú nkè naanị 70%; Blench (2006) depụtara Tumak, Motun, ná Mawer dị ka asụsụ dị iche iche
Ọtụtụ ndị na-asụ Motun na-eji ụfọdụ Sara
'Gulei' edepụtara ná Greenberg nwere ike ịbụ olumba nkè Tumak
Tumusiime Rushedge (1941 ruo afọ 2008) bụ onye dọkịta na-awa ahụ na Uganda, onye na-anya ụgbọelu, onye na'akwụkwọ akụkọ, onye na na-ese ihe nkiri na onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ
A maara ya dị ka 'Tom rush'
O dere kọlụm kwa izu na 'Sunday Vision', nke a na-akpọ 'Old Fox'
Ọ bụ ụbụrụ dị n'azụ ihe nkiri Ekanya, nke a na-ebipụta kwa ụbọchị na 'New Vision'
Ihe osise ndị ahụ na-elekwasị anya na onye aṅụrụma Ekanya na nwunye ya na-alụ ọgụ Rosie, ma nọgide na-ewu ewu kemgbe mmalite afọ 1970
Ọ bụ onye dere akwụkwọ akụkọ, 'The corrupt, the quick and the dead'
A mụrụ Tumusiime n'ọnwa Machị 1, 1941 na mpaghara Buhweju, Bushenyi District
Ọ bụ nwa mbụ n'ime ụmụ asaa, nke Rev
Andereya Rushedge na Eseza Bantu
Ọ tolitere n'ụlọ Ndị Kraịst ma n'oge ọ bụ nwata, ọ na-etinye aka nke ukwuu na Emmanuel Church Kabwohe dị ka onye na-akụ ọkpọ na-akpọ ndị na-efe ofufe na ozi Sunday
Ọ gara Kibubura Boys Primary School na Ibanda, maka agụmakwụkwọ praịmarị ya
Maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị, ọ gara Mbarara High School (1954-1957) na Ntare School (1958-1960)
O mepụtara baajị ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Ntare mgbe ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ n'ebe ahụ
Ọ gụrụ ọgwụ na Mahadum Makerere n'afọ 1961
N'ebe ahụ, ọ rụpụtara ihe ọzọ ma na 1966 ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nsọpụrụ, na-aga n'ihu na-ahụ maka ntị, imi na akpịrị (ENT)
O nwetara diplọma post-graduate na Medical School
Ọ gara maka agụmakwụkwọ ọzọ na US wee nweta nzere masta na ịwa ahụ na Chicago
Maka ihe ọ rụzuru na ngalaba ahụike nke ENT na neurology, e nyere ya prọfesọ
Tunde bụ aha unisex, nke bụ ụdị obere aha Yoruba maka nwa amaala nke obodo Naịjirịa nke pụtakwara 'nlaghachi'
Ya mere, mgbe a jikọtara Tunde na okwu Yoruba ndị ọzọ dịka Baba (nna) ma ọ bụ Yeye/Iya/Mama (nne) iji mepụta Babatunde na Yetunde n'otu n'otu, ihe ọ pụtara na-aghọ 'nna ma ọ bụ nne alọghachila'
N'otu aka ahụ, enwere ike ịgbakwunye Omo (nwa) ma ọ bụ Ola (akụ̀ na ụba) na Tunde
Ndị ama ama nwere aha Tunde gụnyere ndia
Tunde Aladese bu onye ode akwukwo nke ndi Naijiria
N’afọ 2018, ọ natara onyinye Africa Movie Academy Award for Best Actress in a Leading Role
N'afọ 2020, ọ dere ihe nkiri nke ga egosi ugboro 70 maka MTV Shuga nke ndị mere ya bukwa ndi nwe ya ha mere obodo gafere anọ nke na-akọwa coronavirus lockdown
Ọ chọrọ ide ma kọwaa ka esi ede ịhe nkiri nwe choputa na ịhe odere adịghị ya nma
Nke ahụ dị mkpa n'ihi na ọ mataziri ihe na-adịghị amasị ya
Ọ gara n'ihu ịmụ akwụkwọ na Met Film School nke dị na London na Berlin
O nwetara BA na Practical Filmmaking
Aladese edeela ederede maka Edge of Paradise na Tinsel
Ọ bụ onye ịsị edemede maka usoro Hotel Majestic
N’afọ 2018, YNaija depụtara ya dịka otu n’ime mmadụ iri kacha ike na Naịjirịa n’eluri afọ 40
Na 2018, ọrụ Aladese na Kenneth Gyang 's The Lost Café, mere ka a họpụta ya maka nwanyị kachasị na imeputa ịhe nkiri nke Africa Movie Academy Awards
Aladese malitere ide akụkọ maka MTV Shuga mgbe akpọrọ usoro ya Shuga Down South
Ọ dere akụkụ abụọ mana na 2019, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi edemede maka ọrụ ahụ
N'oge nsogbu COVID-19, a gwara ya ka ọ dee edemede ụbọchị kwa ụbọchị maka MTV Shuga Alone Together nke na-egosipụta nsogbu nke Coronavirus
Emere ihe ngosi a izizi na 20 Eprel
Ndị na-akwado ya gụnyere United Nations
E bere ịhe ngosị ahu bayere ka esị ebi na Nigeria, South Africa, Kenya na Cote D'Ivoire ma kọwaa ya site na mkparịta ụka ndị mere ya na ntanetị
Atumatu usor ịhe nkịrị ahu kwesịsị iru oge 65
Tijani Babatunde Folawiyo (nke a makwaara dị ka Tunde Folawiyo ) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye isi nchịkwa nke Yinka Folawiyo Group
Dị ka Forbes si kwuo, o nwere ihe ruru nde dọla iri isii na iri isii na ise
Tunde Folawiyo bụ onye isi oche nke Yinka Folawiyo Group, otu nzukọ nwere mmasị na ike, ọrụ ugbo, mbupu, na ala na ụlọ
Otu ọgbakọ nke nna ya, Wahab Folawiyo, Tunde guzobere, weghaara nzukọ ahụ n'afọ 2008 mgbe nna ya gafere
Ọ na-ejekwa ozi dị ka onye isi nke MTN Nigeria Ltd, onye isi oche nke Yinka Folawiyo Group of Companies
Tunde guzobekwara Folawiyo Energy Ltd, onye enyemaka nke Yinka Folawiyo Group of Companies
Tunde bụbu onye isi na-abụghị onye isi nke Access Bank plc (nke bụbu Access Bank Nigeria) site na 11 Ọktoba 2005 ruo 29 Jenụwarị 2014
A kpọrọ ya na Bar nke England na Wales na 1985, ebe ọ malitere ọrụ iwu ya na Nigeria na ụlọ ọrụ Ogunsanya, mana ọ gbara arụkwaghịm na iwu na 1989
Kemgbe afọ 1996, Tunde jere ozi dị ka osote onye isi oche nke Nigeria Association of Indigenous Petroleum Explorers & Productions (NAIPEC)
Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Enyo Retail, A Nigerian downstream Oil and Gas Company, na onye isi oche nke Coronation Merchant Bank; ụlọ ọrụ akụ na ụba na Nigeria
Tunde Folawiyo gụrụ akwụkwọ na London School of Economics, ebe ọ nwetara nzere BSc na Economics na 1980, na LLB na 1984
O nwetara LLM nzere na University College London na June 1985
N'afọ 2010, Tunde bụ onye natara African Leadership Award
E nyekwara ya nzere doctorate na nchịkwa azụmahịa na Mahadum Crescent dị na Abeokuta, Nigeria
Tunde na-eje ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya ọma, nwa amaala na-asọpụrụ nke obodo Houston na onye nnọchi anya nsọpụrụ nke Barbados
Tunde bụ onye otu ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ zuru ụwa ọnụ nke African Leadership Academy, ụlọ ọrụ pan-Africa raara onwe ya nye ịzụlite na inye ndụmọdụ ọgbọ ọhụrụ nke ndị isi Africa
Tunde bụ onye otu Duke of Edinburgh's World Fellowship
Ọ bụkwa onye otu Kansụl Na-achị Isi nke Mahadum Lagos Steeti na Gọọmentị Lagos Steeti
Ọ nọkwa na Board of Trustees nke Crescent University na Abeokuta
Tunde Kelani (amụrụ ya na 26 Febụwarị 1948), nke a maara dịka TK, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naijiria

N'ime ọrụ karịrị afọ iri anọ, TK bụ ọkachamara n'ịmepụta ihe nkiri na-akwalite ọdịbendị ọdịbendị bara ụba nke Naịjirịa ma nwee mgbọrọgwụ siri ike na akwụkwọ, nchekwa, agụmakwụkwọ, ntụrụndụ na nkwalite ọdịbendị

A makwaara ya maka ịhụnanya onwere maka mgbanwe nke ihe odide n'ime ihe nkiri dịka ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya gbasoro ụdị ihe nkiri ahụ gụnyere Ko se Gbe, Oleku, Thunder Bolt, The Narrow Path, White Handkerchief, Maami na Dazzling Mirage
Mgbe ọ dị obere, e zigara ya Abeokuta, ka ya na nne na nna ya ochie biri
Omenala na ọdịnala ndị Yoruba bara ụba ọ nwetara n'oge ọ bụ nwata, tinyere ahụmịhe ọ nwetara na London Film School ebe ọ gụrụ nka nke ịme ihe nkiri, kwadebere ya maka ihe ọ na-eme taa
A mụrụ Tunde Kelani, TK na Lagos mana mgbe ọ dị afọ ise, e zigara ya ka ya na nne na nna ya ochie biri na Abeokuta na Ogun
Ọ gara Oke-Ona Primary School na Ikija, Abeokuta ma gụọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Abeokuta grammar school

N'oge a, nna nna ya bụ onye isi (Balogun nke Ijaiye Kukudi) ma ọ bụ ihe ùgwù ịhụ ọtụtụ akụkụ nke ụzọ ndụ ndị Yoruba, okpukpe Yoruba, akwụkwọ Yoruba, nkà ihe ọmụma Yoruba, gburugburu Yoruba na echiche ụwa Yoruba na nka na nso
E webatara ya na akwụkwọ Yoruba site na mmalite nke ndụ ya ma ihe nkiri metụtakwara ya nke ukwuu dịka ndị Yoruba nwere ọdịnala ihe nkiri njem siri ike n'oge ahụ
Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, o nwere ihe ùgwù ịhụ ọtụtụ n'ime nnukwu ihe nkiri Yoruba gụnyere Palmwine Drinkard, Oba Koso, Kurunmi, Ogunde na ndị ọzọ
O nwere mmasị na foto site na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị
N'oge agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya, ọ na-etinye ego ma na-ewepụta oge iji mụta foto
Ya mere, n'ụzọ a na-apụghị izere ezere, ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese foto mgbe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Mgbe e mesịrị, ọ nwetara ọzụzụ na Western Nigeria Television (WNTV) wee gaa n'ihu ịga London Film School
Maka Reuters ọ gara Ethiopia iji kpuchie ọkọchị ahụ na Zimbabwe ugboro atọ iji kpuchie nnwere onwe n'ebe ahụ
Ozugbo ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na London Film School, ọ laghachiri Naịjirịa ma soro Adebayo Faleti mepụta ihe nkiri mbụ ya nke a na-akpọ Ihe esemokwu nke Rev
Nna Michael
(Idaamu Paadi Minkailu)
Ndị ọzọ na-emepụta ihe gụnyere Alhaji Lasisi Oriekun, Wale Fanubi - onye ọrụ ibe ya si Cinekraft, Yemi Farounbi na ihe nkiri nke Lola Fani-Kayode
Tunde Kelani arụwokwa ọrụ na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ndị e mepụtara na Naịjirịa dịka onye na-ese ihe nkiri
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nkiri 16mm ọ rụrụ gụnyere Anikura; Ogun Ajaye; Iya Ni Wura; Taxi Driver; Iwa na Fopomoyo
N'afọ 1990, Kelani bụ osote onye nduzi na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri nke afọ 1990 Mister Johnson, ihe nkiri mbụ nke America mere na Nigeria
TK mepụtara ebe dị nro maka ịgụ akwụkwọ mgbe ọ dị obere ma nke a mechara ghọọ ntụrụndụ kachasị amasị ya
Malite na ọrụ ise nke D

Fagunwa, nke gụnyere Igbo Olodumare, Ogboju Ode Ninu Igbo Irunmale, Aditu Olodumare, Irinkerindo Ninu Igbo Elegbeje na Ireke Onibudo, ọ mikpuru onwe ya n'ọrụ ọ bụla ọ nwere ike inweta aka ya n'asụsụ Yoruba na Bekee
Ozugbo ọ chọpụtara mmekọrịta dị n'etiti akwụkwọ na ihe nkiri, ọ nakweere mgbanwe edemede dị ka ihe nlereanya na-arụ ọrụ maka ịme ihe nkiri ya
Ọ bụghị naanị na ọ hụrụ akwụkwọ ndị ahụ n'anya, ọ hụkwara ndị edemede ahụ n'anya dịka a na-ahụ ya mgbe niile n'etiti ha
Ndị edemede kachasị amasị ya gụnyere Kola Akinlade, Pa Amos Tutuola, Cyprian Ekwensi, Akinwunmi Ishola, Adebayo Faleti, Wale Ogunyemi na Wole Soyinka

Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nkiri ya kachasị nwee ihe ịga nke ọma bụ mgbanwe edemede ma ha gụnyere Koseegbe, Oleku, Thunderbolt (Magun), The White Handkerchief, The Narrow Path, Maami na nso nso a Dazzling Mirage
O kpebiri ịnọgide na-enwe ihe nlereanya a maka ihe nkiri ya n'ọdịnihu
N'afọ 1991, Tunde Kelani malitere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke ya, Mainframe Films and Television Productions - Opomulero, ka o wee nwee ike imepụta ihe nkiri ma ọ bụghị naanị inye nkwado teknụzụ

N'ịbụ onye si n'ụwa nke ihe nkiri na akwụkwọ pụta, mgbanwe nke akwụkwọ na egwuregwu maka sinima bụ isi ihe nkiri Kelani na-eme ma site na ha, ọ na-eme ememe ndị edemede na ọrụ ha na ihe ọ na-ahụ dị ka ọha na eze nke na-agụ obere
Na Mainframe, o mepụtara ihe nkiri dịka Ti Oluwa Nile, Ayo Ni Mo Fe, Koseegbe, Oleku, Thunderbolt (Magun), Saworoide, Agogo Eewo, The Campus Queen, Abeni, Narrow Path, Arugba na Maami

Ọrụ ikpeazụ ya, Dazzling Mirage, mgbanwe sitere na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke Olayinka Egbokhare, bụ akụkọ ịhụnanya banyere otú onye na-arịa sickle-cell si merie ihere ọha na eze, ajọ mbunobi na ùgwù onwe onye ya dị ala, iji nweta ihe ịga nke ọma, alụmdi na nwunye na ịbụ nne
Site na ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ na-atụ anya ime ka a mara ma lebara anya na ọnọdụ sickle-cell ma nyere ndị mmadụ aka ime mkpebi ndị ka mma

Tunde Odunlade (Túndé Ọdúnladé na Yoruba), a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke ịrị abụọ na isii n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1954, bụ onye na-ese ihe, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, na onye na-eti egwu na Naijiria nke a maara maka ihe osise Batik ya
Ọ bụ ọkachamara na nka akwa, na floatography
Ọ bụ onye otu Visual Artists Network nke United States of America (VAN) na onye na-esonyekarị na National Conference of Artists, New York
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Nigeria Cultural Troupe n'oge Festac
Ọ bi na Ibadan, mpaghara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa
A mụrụ Babatunde Samuel Odunlade na 26 Nọvemba 1954 na Iremo, Ile-ife, ebe ọ nọrọ na mgbe ọ bụ nwata
Ọ zutere Yinka Adeyemi, onye otu ụlọ akwụkwọ nka nke Osogbo, wee malite ọrụ ya na mbido 1970 dị ka ọgbọ nke abụọ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ nka
Ọ gakwara Oguntimehin Art-workshop na Mahadum Ife n'afọ 1973
Tunde na-eji usoro ọdịnala site na usoro batik appliqué pụrụ iche na textiles
O mepụtakwara ụdị nke ọ na-akpọ floatograph, nka ya sitere na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke ndị Yoruba, ọdịbendị na ndụ na Naịjirịa na ọkachamara na batiks, linocut, na akwụkwọ osisi
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na 1986 na 1989 na Stillman College, Tuscaloosa, Alabama
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nka na Toki Memorial Arts Centre, Ibadan n'afọ 1989, O guzobekwara International Campaign for Better Arts and Cultural Awareness (ICBACA)
Na Disemba 2020, o guzobere Tunde Odunlade Arts and Culture Connexions na Ibadan, Oyo steeti
E gosipụtala ọrụ ya n'ime Naịjirịa na mba ụwa, gụnyere

Tunde na Wunmi Obe bụ ndị a maara n'ihu ọrụ dị ka TWO (Tunde, Wunmi Obe) bụ di na nwunye ndị eme Naijiria na - eme ihe ngosi na akpa ndị mmadụ ọchị, ndị na-eme ntụrụndụ na ihe onyonyo, na ndị ọchụnta ego
Ha zutere ma malite ọrụ ịkụ egwu ha dị ka ụmụ akwụkwọ na 90s
Tunde na Wunmi Obe bu ụzọ banye n'ime ihe ntụrụndụ na ihe egwuriegwu Naijiria na The Charlie Boy Show, mmemme ana egosi na ihe onyonyo na 90s
Mgbe ngosi nke The Charlie Boy Show gasịrị, ha wepụtara abọm egwu mbụ ha Sealed n'afọ1999, nke TWO sochiri anya n'afọ 2003, TW,O 4 real n'afọ 2007, TW, Legit n'afọ 2010 na TWO PLUS n'afọ 2015

Wunmi Aboderin zutere Tunde Obe mgbe ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Lagos (UNILAG) na 1988 ebe ọ na-achọ nzere na nkà ihe ọmụma ana-kpo FilọsọfiTunde, onye na agụ kwa akwụkwọ na Mahadum Lagos State (LASU) na-agbaso nzere na History Education
Wunmi zutere ya mgbe ọ sonyeere otu egwu UNILAG a na -kpọ Turning Point nke Tunde bụ onye ndu na-agụ egwú
Ha abụọ ghọrọ enyi
Otu egwu ahụ kewara mgbe ndị otu ya gụsịrị akwụkwọ mana Tunde na Wunmi nọkọtara ọnụ
Ha bu ụzọ kụọ egwu dịka mmadụ abụọ na Sealed
Ọ gara nke ọma ma ha kpebiri ịrụ ọrụ na abọm
TWO
Ha nwetara nkwekọrịta ndekọ mbụ ha site na Zmirage n'afọ 1997 ma wepụta Abọm Sealed mbụ ha n'afọ 1998
Ọ bụ Albert Kalu mepụtara abọm ahụ
Egwu ndị a dị na abọm ahụ 'Tomorrow', 'The Way', na 'Jafunmi', nke bụ egwu King Sunny Adé
Tupu e nwepụta Sealed, TWO gosipụtara na The Charlie Boy Show ihe dị ka afọ isii ebe Tunde gosipụtara na ihe nkiri Naijiria ole na ole
N'oge ahụ, ha na-anwa ịgbanwe onwe ha dị ka ndị na-agụ egwú kama ịbụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri
Mgbe ezumike afọ anọ gasịrị, TWO wepụtara abọm ha akpọrọ TW'O; abọm ahụ bụ ọkwa ha jiri gwa ọha na eze na ha agbanweela ka ha mere ka anụm di na nwunye ha pụta ìhè
Nke a bụ abọm mbụ ha dekọrọ dị ka di na nwunye
Ha wepụtara abọm ahụ n'afọ 2002
Omololu Ogunleye mepụtara abọm ahụ ma wepụta ya n'okpuru akara ha KopyKats Entertainment
Abọm ahụ nwere egwu ndi a 'Show Luv', 'Voice Mail', 'Ope Mi', na remix nke egwu Fela Kuti 'Palava'
Abọm ahụ nwere nsogbu ahịa ole na ole
E nwepụtara TWO n'oge enweghị akara ndekọ ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ a haziri ahazi na ihe gbasara ịkụ egwu Naịjirịa
Mgbe afọ anọ gasịrị, TWO wepụtara abọm ọhụrụ n'okpuru akara ndekọ egwu Alec
Nkọcha sochiri abọm ikpeazụ ha Nkea sitere na ndị mmadụ ndị na-enweghị mmasị n'echiche nke ikụgharị egwu nke ha kuburu na mbụ
Ebumnuche ha bụ ịsọpụrụ ndị nduzi ha na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ site n'ịmegharị egwu ha na nke ọ bụla n'ime abọm ha, mana ọha na eze amaghị mkpebi ha
Ndị nkatọ hụrụ TWO dị ka onye ndị na enweghị anya nka ide egwu nke ha

TWO 4 Real nwere ọtụtụ ndị na-emepụta egwu ha dị ka Rymzo bụ onye mepụtara egwu ha ana-kpo 'Adupe', 'Like a Fool', 'Let me be the one', 'Tribute 2 Jay' (nke a kụrụ nye ncheta ọnwụ nke nwanne nwoke Wunmi nke obere Jaiyejeje Aboderin), 'I Need Someone', na 'What You Give'
Pufffy T bụ onye mepụtara egwu 'Mo Gbo Mo Ya' na 'It's About Us'
Charles Duke bụ onye mepụtara 'Mo Gbo Mo Ya' remix; ebe Olaitan Adebowale mepụtara 'I Need Someone'

Abọm ahụ nwere njikọrịta aka ụfọdụ ndị ọzọ na akụ egwu bụ ndị gụnyere Rymzo, Segun Obe, Mode 9, Ruggedman na FreestyleTWO 4 Real bụ otu n'ime abọm ha kacha gaa ahịa, na ọnụ ọgụgụ ahịa na-enweta ọtụtụ ndekwuru nde
Abọm ahụ ka na - aga kwa ahịa rue ugbua
Tundun Abiola bụ onye ọkaiwu Naijiria na onye na-egosi ihe onyonyo na Arise News
A mụrụ Abiola n'aka onye ọchụnta ego na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Chief MKO Abiola

Tunisie Telecom bụ onye na-arụ ọrụ telecom na Tunisia
Tunisie Telecom nwere ihe karịrị nde 6 nde ndị debanyere aha na telefon na ekwentị mkpanaaka, na Tunisia na ná mba ọzọ
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ dị mkpa n'ịkwalite ọnụego ntinye ịntanetị na Tunisia, nke mere ka ọ nwee ndị debanyere aha 140,000 na njedebe nke Eprel 2008
Tunisie Telecom ghọrọ onye na-ahụ maka telecoms nke Europe na azụta 60% nke ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Maltese GO site na Emirati EIT maka nde euro 200 na June 2016

N'ọnwa Disemba 2021, otu Madagascar Axian, nke Hassanein Hiridjee duziri, mere ọnụahịa kachasị elu n'etiti ndị nwere ike ịzụta maka onye ọrụ telivishọn Mauritania Mattel, onye enyemaka nke Tunisie Telecom
Atụmatụ ya ga-abụ ihe dị ka 100 nde euro (DTH 326,106,51150)
Dinar (Arabic, French, ISO 4217 koodu ego TND) bụ ego nke Tunisia
A na-ekewa ya na 1000 milim ma ọ bụ milimes (ملّيم)

A na-ejikarị abbreviation DT eme ihe na Tunisia, ọ bụ ezie na ịde 'dinar' mgbe ego ahụ na-anabatakwa (TND bụ obere mkparịta ụka, na-achọsi ike iji ya mee ihe na mpaghara ego); A na-akpọkwa mbiri TD n'ebe ole na ole, mana a na-ejikarị ya eme ihe, n'ihi na a na-ejikarị asụsụ French eme ihe na Tunisia, na nsụgharị French nke DT (ya bụ, Dinar tunisien)
Aha 'dinar' sitere na Alaeze Ukwu Rom/Denarius Rome, nke a na-eji na mpaghara Africa, ókèala ochie nke Carthage, Tunisia nke oge a
E webatara dinar na 1960, ebe e guzobere ya dị ka otu ndekọ ego na 1958
Ọ nọchiri franc na ọnụego nke 1000 francs = 1 dinar
Dinar ahụ esoghị mbelata nke franc French na 1958, n'ihi ya, a gbahapụrụ ọnụego mgbanwe
Kama nke ahụ, e sere akara aka na dollar United States nke 1 dinar = 238 dollar nke e debere ruo 1964, mgbe dinar ahụ papara na 1 dinar= 190 dollar
E jidere nke abụọ a ruo mgbe a ndidi dollar na 1971
Tunisia nwere ọnụ ahịa dị ala n'akụkọ ihe mere eme
Dinarị ahụ adịchaghị agbanwe agbanwe na 2000-2010 karịa ego nke ndị agbata obi ya na-ebubata mmanụ, Egypt na Morocco
Ọnụ ego ọnụ ahịa bụ 49% n'afọ mmefu ego 2007-08 na 35% n'afọ mmefu ego 2008-09

Otú ọ dị, uru nke ego ahụ na-adaba kemgbe ahụ, na n'etiti 2008 na 2018, dinar na-ebelata ihe dịka 55% megide dollar US, site na 76 ¢ ruo 34 ¢, na banyere 46% megide euro, site na cents 55 ruo 30 cents
N'afọ 1960, e webatara mkpụrụ ego aluminium 1, 2 na 5 millime na ọla 10, 20, 50 na 100 millime
E wepụtara 1 na 2 millimes n'ikpeazụ na 1990 na 1983 n'otu n'otu, ọ bụghịzi ego iwu kwadoro
N'afọ 968, e webatara mkpụrụ ego nickel 1⁄2 dinar, jiri obere, cupro-nickel dochie ya n'afọ 1976, mgbe eweputara mkpụrụ ego cupro-nicel 1 dinar
E wepụtara mkpụrụ ego Bimetallic 5 dinar n'afọ 2002
mkpụrụ ego na-ekesa (njikọ gụnyere mkpụrụ ego ugbu a na nke akụkọ ihe mere eme na akwụkwọ ego)
Ọ bụ na 26 Disemba 2013 ka ewepụtara mkpụrụ ego tridecagon abụọ ọhụrụ ahụ, millimes 200 (ọla kọpa-zinc, dayameta 29 mm, ọkpụrụkpụ 180 mm, 94 gr
arọ) na dinar 2 (ọla kọpa-nickel, dayameta 294 mm, ọkpụrụkpụ 190 mm) , 112 gr
ibu)
N'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 958, Central Bank of Tunisia wepụtara akwụkwọ ego na 1⁄2, 1 na 5 dinar
A gbanwere atụmatụ nke okpukpe ndị a site na usoro ederede nke ụbọchị 1-6-1965, mana ewepụtara ya na 3 Machị 1966
E wepụtara akwụkwọ ego 10-dinar nke dị na 1-6-1969 na Jenụwarị 2, 1970
Ihe ndekọ 1⁄2-dinar ikpeazụ bụ nke 1973-10-15 ebe ihe ndekọ 1-dinar ikpeazụ dị na 1980-10-15
E wepụtara ihe ndekọ 20-dinar nke 1980-10-15 na 26 Disemba 1984
E wepụtara akwụkwọ ndekọ 30-dinar n'etiti 1997 na 2011
E wepụtara mkpụrụedemede 50-dinar nke 2008 na 25 Julaị 2009
N'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2005, e wepụtara mbipụta emelitere nke mkpụrụedemede 10-dinar a na-ejikarị eme ihe
Na 31 Disemba 2019, ndetu niile ewepụtara tupu afọ 2011 ka emechara nke ọma
Akwụsịla iji okwu ndị gara aga eme ihe ruo ọtụtụ afọ tupu oge eruo mana ka na-agbanwe agbanwe na Central Bank ruo ụbọchị ahụ
Mgbe ọdịda nke ọchịchị Ben Ali na Tunisia, e ji nwayọọ nwayọọ wepụta akwụkwọ ego ọhụrụ, ya na akwụkwọ ego 20 dinar e wepụtara na 2017 na akwụkwọ ego 10 dinar e mepụtara na 2020
Ka ọ na-erule 2020, a na-eji akwụkwọ 20 na 50 dinar e wepụtara n'afọ 2011 na akwụkwọ 5 na 10 dinar e nyere n'afọ 2013 nakwa usoro ọhụrụ ahụ
A na-ewepụ akwụkwọ 50 dinar mgbe e zigara ya na Central Bank n'oge mgbasa ha mgbe a na-ekwenyebeghị na atụmatụ ọhụrụ
Ndị Tunisia anaghị eji isi nkewa, dinar, mgbe ha na-ekwu maka ọnụahịa ngwaahịa
N'ihi ya, a na-akpọkarị otu dinar na ọkara khomstach en miya (nke pụtara narị iri na ise)
Nke a na-emetụta ọnụahịa niile dị n'okpuru 2 dinar
A na-akpọkarị 50 dinar dị ka khamsin alf (mmiri iri ise)
A na-eji mgbakọ a eme ihe ọbụna maka ọnụahịa dị elu, dịka ọmụmaatụ, a ga-akpọ dinar 70,000 sab'in maliun (nde iri asaa)
A ka na-anụkwa 'Francs' site n'oge ruo n'oge, 1000 n'ime ha na-anọchite anya otu dinar
Na mgbakwunye na nke ahụ, ndị Tunisia na-ejikarị okwu 'frank' mee ihe kama millime
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, a na-akpọ 100 millimes (01 Dinars) 'miyat frank' (N'ụzọ nkịtị 100 franks)
Okwu Frank sitere n'oge ọchịchị ndị France
Ọ bụ mpụ na Tunisia ịbata ma ọ bụ mbupụ dinar
Kwa afọ, nwa amaala ọ bụla nwere ike ịgbanwe ego mba ọzọ ruo 6,000 dinar Tunisian tupu ọ pụọ na mba ahụ
Ya mere, ọnụahịa dị na ụlọ ahịa na-enweghị ụtụ isi dị na ego a na-agbanwe agbanwe dị ka euro, US dollar na British pound
E nwere ọtụtụ ATM na-agbanwe agbanwe na mba ahụ maka ndị njem nleta
Àtụ Exchange Rate
Franc (French, Arabic) bụ ego nke ndi Tunisia n'etiti afọ 1891 ruo na 1958
E kewara ya na 100 centimes (صنتيم) ma hara ka franc French
Franki nọchiri Anya rial na afo 1891 na ọnụego nke 1 rial = 60 centimes
O nwere mkpụrụ ego na akwụkwọ ego ndị e mepụtara maka Tunisia, ọ bụ ezie na akwụkwọ ego mbụ bụ mbipụta Algeria nke e ji 'Tunisie' mee ihe
A gbanwere franc na afo 1960 site na dinar na ọnụego nke 1000 francs = 1 dinar, ebe e guzobere dinar dịka unit nke akaụntụ na 1958
E wepụtara mkpụrụ ego mbụ a na-akpọ franc na afo 1887, tupu franc aghọọ ego nke ndi Tunisia
Ndị a bụ mkpụrụ ego ọla edo 25 rial nke a na-edekwa akara '15 F' iji gosipụta uru ha na francs French
N'afọ 1891, e webatara ọla nchara 1, 2, 5 na 10 centimes, ọlaọcha 50 centimes, 1 na 2 francs, na ọla edo 10 na 20 francs, ha niile hà nhata na nha na ihe mejupụtara na mkpụrụ ego French kwekọrọ
E wepụtara 1 na 2 cents naanị n'afọ ahụ
N'afọ 1918, e webatara oghere, nickel-bronze 5, 10 na 25 centimes, na-esote, na afo 1921, aluminum-bronze 50 centimes, 1 na 2 francs na ọlaọcha 10 na 20 francs na afo 1930
Ọzọkwa, mkpụrụ ego ndị a kwekọrọ na mkpụrụ ego ndị France n'ogo na ihe mejupụtara ya
Otú ọ dị, na afo 1934, e webatara mkpụrụ ego ọlaọcha 5 francs, n'agbanyeghị na a na-eji nickel eme francs 5 nke ndi France
Dịka ọ dị na Obodo France, e webatara mkpụrụ ego zinc 10 na 20 centimes n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ na mkpụrụ ego ọlaọcha kwụsịrị
Rial (French) maọbụ piastre bụ ego nke ndi Tunisia ruo afo 1891
E kewara ya na 16 kharub (caroub), nke ọ bụla n'ime 13 fals (burbe)
E kewara ụgha ahụ n'ime qafsi isii (burben)
Nasri (asper) ruru fals abuo
A naghị enye aha ahụ na mkpụrụ ego maọbụ naanị nọmba na-egosi ya
Ụfọdụ mkpụrụ ego rial nwere nọmba n'elu mkpụrụedemede nke Arabic r, ر
Ọ bụ Beys nke ndi Tunis wepụtara rial ahụ
Ọ bụ ezie na ndị Europe maara ya dịka piastre, ọ bụghị otu na Turkish kuruş, nke a makwaara dịka piaster
Site na 1855, rial dị na ọkọlọtọ bimetallic nke 1 rial = 017716 gram ọlaedo dị ọcha maọbụ 27873 gram ọlaọcha dị ọcha
N'afọ 1887, e belatara ihe dị n'ime ọla edo nke mkpụrụ ego rial 25 iji mee ka ọ hara ka 15 francs French
N'afọ 1891, e ji ọnụego ntụgharị a (nke a na-ekwukarị dịka 1 rial = 60 centimes) mee ihe mgbe franc Tunisian nọchiri rial
Na mbido narị afọ nke iri na itoolu, e wepụtara mkpụrụ ego ọla kọpa 1, tinyere 1 nasri, 1, 2, 4 na 8 kharub, 1 na 2 rial, na sultan ọlaedo
E webatara mkpụrụ ego ọhụrụ na afo 1847, nke nwere ọla kọpa 1 fals, nasri, 1⁄ na 1 kharub na ọlaọcha 2 na 5 rial denominations
N'etiti afo 1856 na 1858, e wepụtara mkpụrụ ego ọla kọpa maka 3, 6 na 13 nasri tinyere ọlaọcha 2, 4 na 8 kharub, 1, 3 na 4 rial, na ọlaedo 10, 20, 25, 40, 50, 80 na 100 rial
A na-eji ọlaedo dị ọcha emepụta mkpụrụ ego ọlaedo ahụ na mbụ, e mesịa belata ya ka ọ bụrụ900 fineness, na 20, 40 na 80 rial denominations dị mkpụmkpụ

Mkpụrụ ego isii na iri na ato nke nasri mechara jiri nọmba Arabic '1' na '2' ('1' na '22') mee ka ọ pụta ìhè na ha ga-agbasa dịka mkpụrụ ego otu na abuo kharub, mmụba nke uru nke 1⁄2 nasri maka mkpụrụ ego 6 nke nasri
N'afọ 86, e webatara mkpụrụ ego ọla kọpa ọhụrụ na 1⁄4, 1⁄, 1, 2, 4, 8 kharub
E webatara ọlaọcha 8 kharub na ọla edo 5 rial
N'afọ 1887, e webatara mkpụrụ ego rial iri abuo na ise dị obere (lee n'elu), ya na ihe odide ọzọ '15 F' iji gosipụta nha nhata na franc French
Tunji Femi Awojobi (amuru n'ọnwa Julaị n'abalị 30, n'afọ 1973) bu onye ọkachamara onye ọkpụkpọ bọọlụ nkatanke Naijiria lara ezumike nka
Awojobi bụbu onye ọkpọ ọkpọ, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Boston n'afọ 1997
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ gbara bọọlu n'ọtụtụ mba Europe, karịsịa na Israel
Awojobi bụkwa onye otu Otu Mba Naijiria, wee sonye na Asompi Mba Uwa n'afọ 1998 na 2006 nke FIBA
Ihe kacha mma o nwetara na bọọlu nkata nke Europe bụ imeri iko ULEB dị ka ebe mmalite etiti maka Hapoel Jerusalem si Israel
N'asọmpi ikpeazụ, Jerusalem meriri Real Madrid 83 72
Awojobi gbara bọọlụ nkata kọleji na Mahadum Boston (BU) afọ anọ (1993–1997)
Ọ bụ onye ọkpụkpọ mbụ na kọleji New England dekọtara isi 2,000 na nloghachi 1,000
Awojobi rubiri ọrụ ya pụta kwa dị ka otu n'ime ndị ọkpụkpọ Nkewa Mbu di ise e debanyere aha ọrụ ha nwere isi 2,000, nloghachi 1,000, na ngbochi 300
O sonyeere otu ahọpụtara nke mejupụtara Alonzo Mourning ( Georgetown ), Pervis Ellison ( Louisville ), Derrick Coleman ( Syracuse ), na David Robinson ( Ndị agha mmiri )
Awojobi guzobere ndekọ BU iri na atọ, nke gụnyere isi (2,308), nlọghachi (1,237), ngbochi (302), na goolu fiiludi (871)
Ngụkọta nloghachi na isi ya sokwa n'usoro kachasị mma na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke America East
N'afọ 1996–97, Awojobi duuru BU gaa ndekọ ụlọ akwụkwọ ma nwee mmeri iri abụo na ise yana aha asọmpi oge niile nke America East, na asọmpi NCAA
N'ịkwado mbọ ya, Awojobi bụ MVP ugboro anọ na otu ya ma nọrọ kwa na nhọrọ nke mbu na ọgbakọ niile
N'ime afọ agadi ya, akpọrọ ya onye ọkpụkpọ nke afọ yana MVP nke asọmpi ọgbakọ, ma tinye kwa ọkpụkpọ nke afọ Nkewa Mbu nke New England na nsọpụrụ nke otu mbụ All-ECAC
A kpọbatara ya na Nnukwu Ọnụ Ụlọ Ndị Àmà Ama nke BU n'afọ 2002

Olatunji Bello (a mụrụ na 1 Julaị 1961) bụ onye ọka iwu, onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi, onye sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, onye nta akụkọ na onye na-anọ ọdụ maka gburugburu ebe ahụ na mmiri n'okpuru Babajide Sanwo-Olu Administration na Lagos State
Ọ bụ onye Lagosian
O nwere nzere BSc
na Mahadum Ibadan ebe ọ gụrụ sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1984
O nwetara nzere masta ya na International Law and Diplomacy MLD na (1987) site na Mahadum Lagos
O nwetara nzere Bachelor of Laws n'otu Mahadum Lagos, Naịjirịa, n'afọ 2000
Tunji Bello malitere ọrụ mgbasa ozi ya na Concord Press nke Naịjirịa ebe ọ tolitere ịghọ onye nchịkọta akụkọỌ malitere dị ka onye edemede ihe ngosi; ọ bụkwa onye enyemaka nchịkọta ihe ngosi
Ọrụ ya n'akwụkwọ akụkọ toro ngwa ngwa nke na ọ ghọrọ onye nchịkọta akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe ọ dị afọ 27
E mechara kwalite ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke aha Sunday ma mesịa bụrụ onye nchịkọta akwụkwọ akụkọ nke aha kwa ụbọchị nke Concord Newspapers Group
A họpụtakwara ya dịka onye isi oche nke Editorial Board nke THISDAY Newspaper
Ọ bụ onye edemede na St
Dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ibadan, Tunji Bello bụ osote onye isi oche nke Mahadum nke Ibadan Students Union
Ọ na-agbasi mbọ ike maka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya kemgbe afọ iri asatọ
Ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya malitere mgbe ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka pụrụ iche nke Bashorun MKO Abiola, onye mmeri nke ntuli aka onye isi ala nke June 12, 1993

Mgbe a kagburu ntuli aka nke oge ahụ, Tunji Bello ghọrọ onye otu Naijiria na-akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, NADECO nke lụrụ ọgụ maka mmelite nke ọchịchị onye kwuo okwu na Naijiria nke dị site n'afọ 1993 ruo n'afọ 1999
Mgbe e nyefere ọchịchị ndị agha n'aka ndị ọchịchị Democratic n'afọ 1999, Tunji Bello sonyeere onye bụbu Gọvanọ nke Lagos Steeti, Asiwaju Bola Ahmeed Tinubu na kọmitii ya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi nke Signage and Advertising Agency (LASSA) yana Kọmishọna maka gburugburu ebe obibi na nchịkwa Asiwaju
N'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2011, ọ sonyeere ọchịchị Gọvanọ Babatunde Fasholaʹs ma Gọvanor ṅụrụ iyi dị ka Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi ebe ọ jere ozi ruo Mee 29, 2015

N'afọ 2015, mgbe a ṅụrụ iyi nke onye bụbu Gọvanọ, Maazị Akinwunmi Ambode, a họpụtara Tunji Bello ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ nke Gọọmentị Steeti na 29th May 2015 na-eje ozi ruo ọgwụgwụ nke ọchịchị Maazị Makinwunmi Ambodes n'afọ 2019
N'afọ 2019, ọ sonyeere ọchịchị Sanwo-Olu ma Gọvanọ ṅụrụ iyi n'afọ 2019 dị ka Kọmishọna maka gburugburu ebe obibi na mmiri ma ọ ka na-arụ ọrụ
Ọ natara onyinye dị iche iche

Ọ natara Alfred Friendly Press Fellowship, USA, Ọ meriri onyinye Concord Press maka Ịdị Mma na Obi Ike na Journalism, Concord Publisherńs Best Editorial Manager Ọ bụ onye natara Mahadum nke Ibadan Distinguished Alumnus Award na Mahadum Lagos Distinguished alumni Achievers Award Of Excellence Ọ bụ Nigerian Society of Engineers, Ikeja, alaka Lagos, na UNDP sọpụrụ ya maka ịtọ ntọala maka nkwado gburugburu ebe obibi na steeti Lagos
O dere otu akwụkwọ ma nye aka na anọ ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ di nke Ibiyemi Olatunji-Bello, onye bụ osote onye isi nke Mahadum Lagos State kemgbe Septemba 2021
Tuotomb, ma ọ bụ Bonek, bụ asụsụ Southern Bantoid nke Cameroon

A họpụtara Emmanuel W Tupele-Ebi Diffa dìka sịnetọ maka mpaghara nke ọdịda anyanwụ Bayelsa nke Bayelsa Steeti, Naijiria na mbido Mba Naijiria nke anọ, mee ntuli aka na-okpuru Alliance for Democracy (AD)
Ọ batara ụlọ ọrụ n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na itoolu nke ọnwa Mee afọ 1999
Dịka o were oche n'ebe omebe iwu n'ọnwa Juun nke afọ 1999, a họpụtara ya na kọmitii nke na-ahụ maka Mmanụ ala, gburugburu ebe obibi, Niger Delta na mmepe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na egwuregwu
A họpụtara ya dịka onye osote ụtarị maka otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị AD na ebe omebe iwu
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2002 enwere asịrị na Diffa na-eme atụmatụ ịchọọ ntuli aka n'okpuru otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị People's Democratic Party (PDP), na-ebughị ụzọ hapụ AD
Tupuri (mà ọ bụ Toupouri) bụ asụsụ á na-asụkarị ná mpaghara Mayo-Kebbi Est nkè ndịda Chad ná obere akụkụ nkè ùgwù Cameroon
Ọ bụ asụsụ Mbum nkè ndị Tupuri na-asụ ná ìhè dịka ndị 300,000 na-asụrụ
Joseph Greenberg kewara Tupuri dị ka asụsụ Chadic n'ụzọ na-ezighi ezi, n'ihi ndepụta ókwú nke bụ n'ezie nkè Kera (cf
Ebert 1974)
Á na-asụkarị Tupuri n'akụkụ ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nkè àlà dị larịị nkè Moulvouday, na
Ndị Viri mà ọ bụ Wina bụ agbụrụ Tupuri, mànà taa há na-asụ asụsụ Massa
Á na-asụkwa Tupuri ná Chad
Ná Cameroon, ọ nwere ìhè dị kà ndị ọkà ókwú 125,000 (SIL 2000)
Hajiya Turai Umar Musa Yar'Adua (amụrụ ya na 26 Jụlai afọ 1957) bụ nwaanyị di ya nwụrụ nke bubu onye isiala nke Naijiria bubu Katsina Steeti gọvanọ Umaru Musa Yar'Adua
Ọ bụ Nwanyị mbụ nke Naijiria site na 2007 ruo ọnwụ nke di ya, onye isiala Yar'Adua, na Mee 5, 2010
A mụrụ Turai Yar'Adua na mpaghara obodo ukwu nke Katsina nke dị na mgbago ugwu Naịjirịa na Julaị 1957
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ gọvụmentị ụmụ nwanyị na Kankiya dịka nwatakịrị
Turai Yar'Adua gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Garama na Katsina na gọvụmentị Secondary School dị na Kankia, ha abụọ dị na steeti Katsina
O mechara debanye aha na Katsina College of Arts, Science and Technology na Zaria, Kaduna steeti, ebe a na-akọ na a kpọrọ ya 'nwa akwụkwọ kachasị mma' n'afọ 1980
N’afọ 1983, Yar’adua nwetara akara ugo mmụta okokporo na asụsụ ya na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello
Turai lụrụ Umaru Yar'Adua n'afọ 1975, ma ha nwere ụmụ nwanyị ise na ụmụ nwoke abụọ
Ụmụ nwoke abụọ bụ Shehu Umaru Musa Yar'adua na Musa Umar Musa Yar'adua, Shehu bụ aha nwanne ya nwoke nke onye isiala Umaru Musa Yar '
adua nke nwuru anwu
Ma onye bụbu osote onyeisiala Naịjirịa
Otu n’ime ụmụ ha nwaanyị aha ya bụ Zainab lụrụ Usman Saidu Nasamu Dakingari, Gọvanọ nke Steeti Kebbi
Na Septemba afọ 2007, Turai bụ ọbịa na inye ikike ịnwe ụlọ ọrụ Mobility Aid na Braille Center dị n’Akure, Ondo Steeti
Ọ bụ otu ụlọ ọrụ na-abụghị nke gọvụmentị ha were ụlọ ọrụ aka ọrụ bụ Handicapped Education Foundation (HANDEF) onye tọrọ ntọala bụ Olufunke Agagu, onye bụzị Nwanyị mbụ nke Ondo Steeti
Ndị ọzọ sonyere na mmemme ahụ bụ nwunye osote onye isi ala, Patience Jonathan, na ndị nwunye ọtụtụ ndị gọvanọ steeti ndị ọzọ
A nụrụ asịrị na Turai bụ otu n'ime ndị ndụmọdụ kacha di diya nso n'oge ọ bụ Onye isi ala nke Naijiria
Ọmụmaatụ, Yar'Adua kwenyere na ọ metụtara nhọrọ Prọfesọ Babatunde Osotimehin, onye bụbu Director General nke National Action Committee on AIDS, dịka Minista Ahụike Naịjirịa n'oge ọchịchị di ya
Chandler Durham (amụrụ n'August 9, 1994), nke a maara dị ka Turbo, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na ónyé na-ede egwu
A maara ya nke ọma màkà mmepụta ya na Young Thug, Travis Scott, Gunna, Nav, na Lil Baby
Ọ bụ ónyé isi mepụtara abọm studio mbụ nke Gunna Drip ma ọ bụ Drown 2 ya na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ Wheezy
Abọm ahụ malitere na No
1 na chaatị Billboard Top R&B / Hip-Hop Albums
N'afọ 2017, Turbo mepụtara ọtụtụ egwu na We Want Smoke, abọm nchịkọta nke ndị na-ese ihe bịanyere aka na TI's Grand Hustle Records

Ọ bụ ónyé isi mepụtara Drip Harder, mixtape jikọrọ aka nke Gunna na Lil Baby wepụtara na 2018, ọ bụkwa ónyé na-emepụta egwu anọ nke mixtape ahụ, gụnyere 'Never Recover' na 'Close Friends' nke e nyèrè Platinum na 'Drip Too Hard' nke e nwetara 3 × Platinum
O mepụtara 'Slimed In' na album nchịkọta nke Young Thug Slime Language, nke e wepụtara na 2018
N'otu afọ ahụ, o mepụtara na mixtape nke atọ nke Gunna Drip Season 3
O guzobekwara otu mmepụta ihe ndekọ ya, The Playmakers
Turkéy (na asụsụ Turké Türkiye) áhà ezíbóté ya bu Republic ndi Turkéy, (na asụsụ Turké Türkiye Cumhuriyeti) bu ala no n'ime obodo ukwu adi-kpo Obodo Békè

Chagatai[lower-alpha 1] ( چغتای, Čaġatāy), makwaara dị ka Turki,[lower-alpha 2] Eastern Turkic ma ọ bụ Chagatai Turkic (Čaġatāy türkīsi), bụ asụsụ Turkic na-ekpochapụ a na-asụbu n'ebe niile n'Ebe Etiti Eshia ma bụrụkwa asụsụ a na-ekekọrịta ede n'ebe ahụ ruo mmalite narị afọ nke 20 Ejiri ya mee ihe n'ofe mpaghara mpaghara gụnyere akụkụ Uzbekistan nke oge a, Xinjiang, Kazakhstan, na Kyrgyzstan Akwụkwọ Chagatai bụ onye bu ụzọ ngalaba Karluk ọgbara ọhụrụ nke asụsụ Turkic, nke gụnyere Uzbek na Uyghur Turkmen, nke na-adịghị n'ime alaka Karluk kama na ngalaba Oghuz nke asụsụ Turkic, Chagatai nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na ya ruo ọtụtụ narị afọ
Turtel Onli (amụrụ na Jenụwarị 25, 1952 na Chicago, Illinois ) bụ onye America na-ese ihe, onye ọchụnta ego, odee, onye na-agwọ ọrịa nka, onye nkuzi, na onye nkwusa
Ọrụ ya emetụla ọzụzụ dịgasị iche iche na nka ọhụụ dị mma ma tinye ya n'ọrụ, na-emepụta ọrụ na eserese, eserese, ihe atụ, mbipụta, ejiji, na mmepụta multimedia
Onli dere ma gosipụta ọtụtụ akwụkwọ na-atọ ọchị na akwụkwọ akụkọ eserese, nke gụnyere NOG, Protector of the Pyramids, Malcolm 10, Nog Nu na Grammar Patrol
A maara ya dị ka 'Nna' nke 'Black Age of Comics', otu a raara nye nkwalite, okike, na nkwado nke akwụkwọ ndị na-atọ ọchị nke Africa na akwụkwọ akụkọ eserese
Onli chepụtara okwu ahụ bụ 'Rhythmism' iji kọwaa ma kọwaa ụdị ya, nke na-ejikọta echiche oge ochie na nke ọdịnihu
Onye nkuzi nka nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ọha na eze, nke lara ezumike nká ugbu a, Onli rụrụ ọrụ na Chicago Public Schools ihe karịrị iri afọ abụọ
Onli gụsịrị akwụkwọ na School of the Art Institute of Chicago na Bachelor of Fine Arts
O mechara laghachi na Art Institute wee nweta Master of Arts na Art Therapy
Agụmakwụkwọ ya gụnyere ọmụmụ na Paris, France, na Sorbonne na Centre Georges Pompidou
N'afọ 1970, Onli hiwere Black Arts Guild (BAG), nke gosipụtara ihe ngosi nka ma bipụta ọrụ ndị otu ya
N'afọ 1974, ya na BAG, bipụtara Funk Book na ọtụtụ kaadị ekele
N'afọ 1980, ya na Osun Center of the Arts bipụtara otu zine a na-akpọ PAPER
Ná mmalite afọ ndị 1980, o mepụtara mbipụta ise nke ihe nkiri mbụ ọzọ, Future Funk
Ndị ahịa ihe atụ Onli gụnyere Playboy Magazine, Chicago Magazine, Avant Garde Magazine, McDonald's, Motown Productions, Holt, Rinehart & Winston, MODE magazine, na Paris Métro magazine
Ọrụ ya dị na nchịkọta nke Miles Davis, Alice Coltrane, Chicago Children's Museum (The Rhythmistic Bench), na Johnson Publishing Company
Onli abụwo onye na-ese ihe na Mahadum nke Illinois na Chicago

N'afọ 2005, Onli haziri 'Reverend Phillips and Turtel Onli An Artistic and Spiritual Legacy', na Center for the Visual and Performing Arts na Munster, Indiana, ihe ngosi nke gosipụtara chaatị ọhụụ nke nna nna ya nwụrụ anwụ, Rev
Samuel David Phillips, na Onli's own Rhythmistic paintings
N'afọ 2010, o mepere Onli Studios ọhụrụ na Bridgeport Arts Center na Chicago
N'ime ọrụ ya niile, Onli mepụtara udị agwa ndị na-abanye n'ime mmasi ebumpụta ụwa nke mmadụ maka ikwubiga okwu ókè, akụkọ ifo nke ike karịrị nke mmadụ na nke adịgboroja na nkà mmụta okpukpe
Ha na-anọchite anya nkwenye Onli na echiche nke ndị dị ike na-agbachitere ndị na-adịghị ike
Ọ na-eji 'dike na onye ọjọọ' paradigm dị ka ụgbọala ya maka iru karịa ụkpụrụ 'nghọta'

Àgwà Onli NOG, Nubian of Greatness, otu n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe nkiri mbụ Afrocentric, ka egosipụtara na Chicago Defender, malite na 1979, tupu ọ gbanwee gaa na akwụkwọ egwu NOG, Onye nchekwa nke Pyramides sitere na 1981-82
NOG laghachiri na NOG is Back!! na 1994 na Nog Nu!! na 2011
N'afọ 1993, Onli duziri mgbakọ mmeghe nke Black Age of Comics na Southside Community Arts Center na Chicago, ebe emere ya afọ atọ n'usoro
Kemgbe ahụ, e meela Mgbakọ Black Age of Comics na Atlanta, Los Angeles, na Detroit; na ECBACC nke Philadelphia kwa afọ bụ nke a ma ama
Emere mgbakọ ndị ọzọ na nso nso a nke Black Age of Comics na Chicago's Bridgeport Arts Center na Kenwood Academy
Site na 1984 ruo 1989 Onli rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-agwọ ọrịa nka na ndị na-eto eto na Chicago's Robert Taylor Homes
Onli rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi nka na Chicago Public Schools
Onli akụziela na Columbia College Chicago, ma ugbu a ọ bụ prọfesọ na-ahụ maka Art Appreciation & Drawing na Harold Washington College
Onli bụkwa Onye guzobere BAG na Black Arts Guild ebe ụdị “Rhythmistic” ya na ụzọ ya na-enye ụlọ ọrụ na-eche echiche n'ọdịnihu maka ndị na-eto eto na-eto eto na-ese ihe iji gbanwee n'ụdị dị iche iche

Tutankhamun (ha na de'kwa ya Tutenkh-, -amen, -amon), na asusu Kemeti twt-ˁnḫ-ı͗mn; *tuwt-ʕankh-yamān (obiri na afo nke 1341 BC, nwuo na afo 1323 BC) bu Pharoah garaga nke ndi Kemeti na afo iri asato ndi obodo Kemeti, biri
Aha ya, Tutankhaten, na'susu Igbo bu 'onyonyo chi nke ha na kpo Aten di ndu', Tutankhamun bukwa 'onyonyo chi nke ha na kpo Amun di ndu'
Afo 1922 bu mgbe onye ha na kpo Howard Carter huru ebe hé liri Tutankhamun
O bu mbge uwa ni'le choro i ma, na choro i hu ebe hé liri ya
Nchoputa nke Carter choputara mere ndi madu i chori ma ihe basiri Kemeti nke mbu
Ekpo hé jiri é lié Tutankhamun bu ihe ndi madu nile mara basiri Kemeti
Tutankhamun di nani afo asato, ma onwere ki bu afo itolu, mgb'o banyere i bu pharaoh
O bu afo iri o bu pharaoh ndi Kemeti

Asụsụ Tuu, ma ọ bụ Taa–ǃKwi (Taa–ǃUi, ǃUi–Taa, Kwi), bụ ezinụlọ asụsụ nwere ụyọkọ asụsụ abụọ a na-asụ na Botswana na South Africa Mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ụyọkọ abụọ ahụ enweghị obi abụọ, mana ọ dị anya Aha Tuu sitere na okwu a na-ahụkarị na ngalaba abụọ nke ezinụlọ maka 'mmadụ'
Tuwon shinkafa bụ ụdị nri Naijiria na steeti Niger sitere na Niger na mpaghara ugwu nke Naijiria
Ọ bụ pudding siri ike nke e ji osikapa dị nro ma na-arapara n'ahụ mee, a na-ejikarị ụdị ofe dị iche iche dị ka Miyar kuka, Miyar kubewa, Miyar taushe
A na-akpọ ụdị abụọ e ji ọka na ntụ ọka sorghum mee Tuwon Masara na Tuwon Dawa n'otu n'otu
Richard Johnson, ónyé a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Tweedy Bird Loc, bụ onye America na-eti egwu
Johnson na ónyé na-emepụta Ronnie M
Phillips haziri ọrụ hip hop Bloods & Crips, mmekorita n'etiti ndị otu Bloods na Crips nké dị na California
Johnson bụ Crip n'onwe ya, nke jikọtara ya na Kelly Park Compton set
Tweedy Bird Loc, site n'enyemaka nke Ronnie Phillips, malitere idekọ abọm izizi ya 187 Ride By na 1992

Ọ ka na Eazy-E na-alụ ọgụ n'oge ahụ; mgbè Tweedy Bird Loc nụrụ Eazy n'ajụjụ ọnụ na-ekwu na ọ gaghị abịanye Tweedy Bird loc na Ruthless, Tweedy chèrè na a naghị akwanyere ya ùgwù nke ukwuu ya mèrè ya na ndị rap ibe ya Big D Mark, Nini X na Notorious Joe dere egwu ọjọọ nke e mere maka Eazy na ónyé njikwa ya Jerry Heller, na onye na-akwado ya akpọrọ 'Hoe bụ Bitch' nke ọ dị mkpà na-emetụta Eazy
Tweedy Bird Loc na-akparị ndị otu hip hop niile HWA
bụ ndị ha na Eazy nwèrè njikọ n'oge ahụ
[citation needed] Kokane na HW'A
azaghachighị egwu ahụ
Tweedy Bird Loc malitere ịrụ ọrụ na abọm nke abụọ na nke ikpeazụ ya, No Holds Barred na 1994
[citation needed] Abọm ahụ wepụtara egwu ọhụrụ ya 'Walk That Walk'
