Na August 2019, Uche Kalu nke Niger na Kenya Peter Opiyo binyere aka na nkwekọrịta FC Altyn Asyr si Turkmenistan
Nke a bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ mbụ si mba ofesi na akụkọ gbasara klọb a na 2019 Ýokary Liga
Ọ bụ onye otu B Naịjirịa ndị meriri na WAFU Nations Cup 2010
Nkwudosike ya mere ka onye nchịkwa klọb Naịjitịa bụ Stephen Keshi kpọlite ya na 2012
Ọ gbara okwe mbụ ya na Eagles n'enweghị goolu ọbụla,megide Angola na Jenụwarị 2012
O nyere goolu nke mbụ ya na egwuregwu enyi na enyi ha gbara n'afọ ahụ megide Egypt
Uche Ndụka (amụrụ ya na 14 Ọktoba1963) bụ onye Naịjirịa na onye Amerịka na-ede abụ, onye na-ede egwu, onye nkuzi na onye na-ede akwụkwọ
E nyere ya awọdụ maka nke ndị Abụ na Association of Nigerian Authors na 1997
O bi na New York City ugbu a
Amụrụ Uche Ndụka na Naịjirịa na ezinaụlọ ndị otu Kristi
Aha ọmụmụ ya bụ Williams Uche Nduka, 'O gosipụtara njimara Afrịka site na aha ya
O mere nkea mgbe Dr

Juliet Okonkwo dere otu akwụkwọ dị ogologo na-akuzi maka 'ọdịbendị agbụrụ nke Afrika' Ọ bụ onye azụlitere n'asụsụ abụọ, ha bụ Igbo na Bekee, ọ nwetara BA ya na Mahadum Nigeria, Nsukka na MFA ya na Mahadum Long Island, Brooklyn
Ọ hapụrụ Nigeria na 1994 were biri na Germany mgbe ọ nwetasiri ihe ndị otu agụm akwụkwọ na Goethe Institute
O biri na Germany na Netherlands afọ iri sochirinụ tupu ọ were kwaga United Steeti na 2007
Ọrụ Nduka bụ ihe ama ama maka ike ya na ngwa ngwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Dịka Joyelle McSweeney siri kwue ' Na akwụkwọ m na-agụ, ọrụ Nduka niile bụ nrọ n'ihi nke a ọ bụ akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ụdịrị ya anaghị ekwu ihe nwere ike ime maobụ kwute maka ya, kama ha ga na-agba eziokwu okirikiri

Ihe a na-ahụ anya n'ọrụ Ndụka bụ ka o si enwe nnukwu mmetụta naanị sọọsọ na ọ bụ onye Naịjirịa na ọgụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, mana ọ bụ maka na ọ bụ onye si ala nna ya were gaa mba ọzọ were na-ebi ka ohu n'ala ahụ'

Ndụka n'aka nke ọzọ kwuru 'Na njete aka, A bụ m onye na-eme ihe sọrọ m na-eleghi mmadụ anya, mata ma ha, a na-ebugo iwu asụsụ bekee elu maọbụ nke ndị na-asụ ya nke ọma; nke ọdịnala maọbụ nke ogbara ọhụrụA na m eji ụdịrị nka asụsụ ọbuụa sọrọ m, dika ọnọdụ m siri dị oge ahụ, na kwa isiokwu ọbụla m nwere mmasị na ya
Na ọmụmụ asụsụ, enwere ebe ndị di iche iche a na-emetụbeghị aka na Abụ
A na m anwa oke m ịchọpụta ihe ndi ahụ
A chọghị m ịche na ndị mmadụ na-atụ anya ka m were ihe ịhere were na-ede bekee'
Ndụka bi na Brooklyn kịta
O so na otu Kristiania, nchịkọta ndị odee edemede nke Brooklyn
Ndụka edeela ọtụtụ akwụkwọ na Abụ na ịdụazị nke gụnyere Nine East (2013), Ijele (2012), na eel on reef (2007), e bipụtara ha niile mgbe o rutere United Steeti

Nchịkọta akwụkwọ ya mbụ gụnyere Heart's Field (2005); If only the Night (2002); Chiaroscuro (1997), nke a turu ugo mmeri na Association of Nigerian Authors nke Abụ ya; The Bremen Poems (1995); Second Acts (1994); na Flower Child (1988)
Belltime Letters (2000) bụ mkpokọta Ịdụazị
Uche Nwaefuna bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlere anya na Naịjirịa
A na-akpọkwa ya Uche Montana
Na 2018, o meriri Moreklue All Youth Awards Africa, nke a makwaara dị ka Maya Awards Africa, dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na usoro TV - Hush
A mụrụ Nwaefuna na Mee 8, 1994, na Lagos
A zụlitere ya na Lagos, ya na nne na nna ya nọ ọge ọ bu mwata
Akwụkwọ mbụ, nke abụọ na nke mahadum bu na Lagos

Ọ gara Loral International School, Festac, Lagos maka ịgụ akwụkwọ nke mbụ na agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị bu na The AOCOED (Adeniran Ogunsanya College of Education) International School (AIS) Ọ gụchara akwụkwọ mahadum ya wee nweta diplọma na Iwu
Ngosipụta nke Nwaefuna dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri malitere na Nigerian Film Industry na 2015 mgbe o mere ọrụ dịka onye ọrụ ụlọ na ihe nkiri Poison Ivy
Na mgbakwunye, ọ pụtakwara na usoro ihe nkiri onyonyo Hush bụ nke ewepụtara na African Magic Showcase na African Magic Family na GOtv Africa site na 2016 – 2017
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, o gosiputara na onye ndu na nkwado n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Nollywood, n'ime ha bụ The Fake Life of Abuja Housewives n'akụkụ Fredrick Leonard, Nancy Isime, na ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri
O gosiputara ya na ndi ozo di ka Uzor Arukwe, Belinda Effah, Alex Ekubo, amongst others in Hire a Woman
Nwaefuna bụkwa ihe nlereanya na o nwe ụlọ mmepụta ihe maka fotoihe kiri nfoto na ihe nkiri vidiyo
Uche Nwaefuna bu onye a họpụtara wee nweta ihe nrite ihe nkiri
Uche Nwaefuna // (na-ege ntị) (amụrụ mgbe ọnwa Mee gbara abalị asatọ, n'afọ 1994) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na ihe nlereanya
A makwaara ya dị ka Uche Montana N'afọ 2018, ọ meriri Moreklue All Youth Awards Africa, nke a makwaara dị ka Maya Awards (Africa), dịka onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kachasị mma na usoro TV - Hush
A mụrụ Nwaefuna na Lagọs
A zụlitere ya na Lagọs, ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ọ bụ nwata bụ ya na nne na nna ya
Uche Nwaefuna's gara akwụkwọ Primari, secọndari, nakwa Mahadum ya na Lagọs
Ọ gara Primari ya na Loral International School, Festac, Lagọs
Agụmakwụkwọ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị dị na Adeniran Ogunsanya College of Education International School Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ dị elu ya na diplọma na iwu

Nwaefuna malitere ịpụta n'ihe nkiri dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Naijiria n'afọ 2015 mgbe o mere nke mbụ ya dịka onye ọrụ ụlọ na ihe nkiri Poison Ivy Ọ pụtakwara na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn Hush nke e gosipụtara na African Magic Showcase na African Magic Family na GOtv Africa site n'afọ 2016 rụọ n'afọ 2017
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gosipụtara na ndu na nkwado na ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Nollywood, n'etiti ha bụ The Fake Life of Abuja Housewives n'akụkụ Fredrick Leonard, Nancy Isime, na ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe nkiri
O gosipụtara na Uzor Arukwe, Belinda Effah, Alex Ekubo, n'etiti ndị ọzọ na Hire a Woman
Uche Innocent Nwofor bụ onye (amụrụ na 17 Septemba 1991) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ
Ọ nọghị ugbu a
A mụrụ ya na Lagos, Nwofor malitere ọrụ ya na Power United nke a na-akpọkwa Anambra Pillars FC
Ọ hapụrụ n'oge ọkọchị 2009 iji gaa ịgbazinye ego na ndị otu egwuregwu nke Naijiria Shooting Stars FC ebe ọ gbara otu oge tupu ọ banye Enugu Rangers
Nwofor bịanyere aka na VVV Venlo n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2011, Nwofor kwupụtara ọbịbịa ya site n'ịgba goolu na nke mbụ ya maka Venlo na 3-3 n'ụlọ ya na PSV Eindhoven na Dutch top-flight na oge uka
N'oge mbụ ya, ọ gbara goolu anọ na Eredivisie
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2013, Nwofor sonyeere SC Heerenveen n'oge mgbazinye ego
Na ụbọchị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Septemba 2014, Nwofor sonyeere Lierse SK
na nnyefe n'efu, na-etinye aka na nkwekọrịta otu afọ

N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011 Nwofor nọchitere anya ndị otu Naịjirịa na-erubeghị afọ iri abụọ ebe ọ gbara goolu anọ n'egwuregwu ise iji mechaa onye kacha gbaa goolu na 2011 African Youth Championship ka Naịjirị meriri nke isii na Johannesburg ma kpọọ ya Goalcom kpakpando nke izu na asọmpi ahụ
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2011 Nwofor nọchitere anya Naijiria na FIFA U-20 World Cup na Colombia
Ọ bụ onye a kụrụ ozugbo, na-abịa site na bench iji gbaa goolu abụọ na nkeji 6 megide Croatia, Naịjirịa ka France kụrụ na nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ na ihe egwu 3 - 2
Nwofor nwetara akara mba ụwa mbụ ya maka Super Eagles na 3 Machị 2010 na egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Congo DR
O nyekwara aka mgbe ndị otu B nke Naijiria meriri Republic of Benin 4ʹ0 na WAFU Nations Cup
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2013, ndị otu mba Naijiria kpọrọ Nwofor maka egwuregwu enyi na enyi mba megide South Africa na Durban n'ụbọchị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ
Ọ gbara goolu abụọ na nkeji nke iri anọ na itoolu na nke iri isii na asatọ ka Naịjirịa meriri egwuregwu ahụ
N'egwuregwu mbụ nke asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke Naịjirịa nke afọ 2014, Nwofor gbara bọọlụ na nkeji ikpeazụ iji zere mmegide Naịjiria megide Scotland
Nwofor mere ndepụta nke World Cup mgbe a mara ọkwa ya ụbọchị atọ ka e mesịrị
Àtụ Nigeria squad 2014 FIFA World Cup

Uche Nwosu bụ onye (amụrụ n' Ọgọstụ 8, 1975), bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria na onye bụbu osote onye isi ndị ọrụ na Gọọmentị Imo Steeti site na 2011 ruo 2013, Kọmishọna maka ala site na 2013 ruo 2015 ma bụrụkwa onye isi ndị isi site na 2015 ruo 2019
Nwaou, nwa nwoke Umunwokwe, Eziama-Obaire na Nkwerre ọkpụrụ ọchịchị nke Imo Steeti , a mụrụ na 8 Ọgọstụ 1975 n'ime ezinụlọ nke Rev

Daniel Nwaobi na Oriakụ Jemaimah Nwaou si Umunwokwe, Eziama-Obaire na Nkwerre ọkpụrụ ọchịchị nke Imo Steeti N'afọ 1995, Uchwen nwetara nnabata na Mahadum Imo Steeti, Owerri ebe ọ gụrụ Urban and Regional Planning
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere BSc nke abụọ
Ọ lụrụ Uloma, nwa nwanyị mbụ nke onye isi ya, Rochas Okorocha na Jenụwarị 2013, ya na nwunye ya mu kwara ụmụ nwoke atọ
N'abalị itoolu n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2019, Nwosu sonyere n'ọkwa gọvanọ nke Imo Steeti n'okpuru usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Action Alliance Party (AA)
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2019, Uche Nwosu meriri Chukwuemeka Ihedioha n'asọmpi ahụ bụ onye gbara ọsọ n'okpuru usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Peoples Democratic Party (PDP)
O nwetara ngụkọta nke votu 190,364 megide ngụkọta 273,404 nke Chukwuemeka Ihedioha onye ụlọ ọrụ Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) kwupụtara na ọ bụ Gọvanọ a họpụtara
Uche Mac-Auley (onye amụrụ di ka Uchechukwu Nwaneamaka ), onye ama di ka Uche Obi Osotule, bụ onye ode akwụkwọ Naijiria, onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri na egwuregwu
Mac-Auley si Delta State na Nijiiria nkesi na mpaghara ndida-south-south nke Nigeria nke ọtụtụ ndi bi na ya na ndi igbo nke Nigeria bi

Ndị nne na nna Mac-Auley bụ ndị nkuzi na-eme njem ọtụtụ n'ihi Mac-Auley kwagara ọtụtụ ihe ma ghara ibi ebe ọ bụla ogologo oge n'ihi nka Mac-Auley gara ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị mana ha nwetara akwụkwọ nzere ụlọ akwụkwọ mbụ ya site n' Osoro Primary School
ọ gụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Anglican Girls Grammar skulu na Idia College ebe ọ nwetara asambodo ule akwụkwọ nke ndị isi ala
Mac-Auley gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum Delta State na ogo mmụta na Bekee
Enwere ike ịkọwa Mac-Auley dị ka nwanyị na-eme ihe nkiri na otu n’ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Nigeria
Mac-Auley bidoro ime ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa ogologo oge tupu ọ bịara ahazi dịka ọ dị taa

Otu ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ kọwara Mac-Auley dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri na-enweghị mgbe ọ bụla na onye ọkachamara dị mkpa Mac-Auley pụtara na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Nigeria na usoro TV nke Nigeria nke akpọrọ Checkmate nke onye nwụrụ anwụ ugbu bụ Amaka Igwe mepụtara ma duzie ya

ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị egwu dịka onye akpọrọ Nkemji, dị ka obodo 'ịma mma eze' ma gosipụta ya na ndị nkiri Nollywood dịka Richard Mofe-Damijo, Norbert Young, Francis Agu, Bimbo Manuel, Kunle Bamtefa, na Binta Ayo Mogaji

N’akwụkwọ akpọrọ The Creation of Nigerian Film Genres, nke onye ode akwụkwọ America bụ Jonathan Haynes dere, Mac-Auley ka ekwuputara n’etiti ndị izizi ga-apụta n' ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nkiri Nigeria tupu e hazie ya yana onye ọsụ ụzọ nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nkiri Nigeria
Mac-Auley were ogologo oge kwụsị ime ihe ka ọ bụrụ nwata akwụkwọ edemede akụkọ mana ọ laghachitere ịme ihe na 2016 mgbe ọ gosipụtara na ihe nkiri akpọrọ Mid-Life

Mac-Auley bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri bụrụkwa onye na-ede akụkọ banyere nwata akwụkwọ, onye edemede ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri wee mepụta ihe nkiri ahụ; Dangerous Twins, Sins of my Mother and In a Lifetime
Mac-Auley lụrụ di na nwunye ugboro abụọ
Nke mbu, o luru onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood Obi Osotule onye o zutere na 1993 na ihe nkiri nke akpọrọ Unforgiven Sin
Mac-Auley hapuru Obi Osotule na afọ 2002 ma n’afọ 2006 lụrụ Solomon Mac-Auley

Mac-Auley buputara na ulo oru ihe nlere na Naijiria nwere aha “Uche Osotule” nke “Osotule” bu aha nna ya n’oge ahu, mgbe o luru di ozo o gbanwere aha ikpeazụ ya na “Mac-Auley” nke bu aha ikpe-azu nke di ya ugbu a
Uche Odoh bụ nwaanyị bụ Nigerian photographer onye na-atụpụta atụmatụ, filmmaker nakwa model Onye nke bidoro wuwe n'afọ 2007 mgbe e mere ndọrọndọrọ nke ndị Amstel Malta Box Office
A mụrụ Odoh na Enugwu Steti dị n'ọdịda anyanwụ nke Nigeria ka ọnwa Ọgọst dị n'abalị iri atọ n'afọ 1989
Ọ gụrụ maka Agronomy na Mahadum nke Enugwu Steti sayensi na Tekinọlọji
Odoh'sbidoro ime ihe nkiri mgbe o sonyere na asọmpị ndi Amstel Malta Box Office n'afọ 2007
O bidoro igosi aka ọrụ site ịbụ ndị a na eṅomi tupu ibanye ise foto

Ọ pụtara n'ọtụtụ vidio egwu ndị oti egwu dika Wizkid's 'Hola at your boy' nakwa Bracket's 'Remember (Yori Yori Remix)' Ọ mechara sonye bido mewe event planning , O bidokwara obere ụlọ ọrụ akpọrọ Eastside Productions nakwa ihe nkiri nke onyonyo akpọrọ, Gosi TV
N'afọ 2011,o jere mụọ maka fim na Del-York International, nke ndị New York Film Academy, o mechara nweta nzere dilọma n'ihe gbasara mmepụta fim n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Vancouver Film School n'afọ 2015
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ọrụ Empire Mates Entertainment (EME) nakwa CMA Group
N;afọ 2016 ọ haziri nkenke fim akpọrọ In Apathy' maka ndị otu Homevida Org, bụ nke ritere ihe nrinte Homevida awards n'afọ 2016
Ọ rụọla ọrụ n;ọtụtụ igwe mmepụta fim nke Nigeria, nke King of Boys na Up North,ka wee wuo ewu
Odoh wepụtara ihe nkiri nke ya a kpọrọ Life As It Is n'afọ 2019
Uche Odoputa // (na-ege ntị) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood na onye ama - ama na-ahụ maka igwe onyonyo
Uche Odoputa si Orlu, Imo steeti dị na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naịjirịa

O nwere ntọala a na-akpọ The Uche Odoputa Foundation nke na-etinye aka na ọrụ ndị dị ka; agụm akwụkwọ nke ndị naenweghi nne na nna, ọrụ ahụike maka ndị na-enweghị ihe ùgwù, na nkwado ego maka ndị inyom di ha nwụrụ anwụ maka ebumnuche azụmahịa
N'afọ puku abụọ na asaa (2007), ụlọ ọrụ mmanye iwu ọgwụ Naịjirịa (NDLEA) jidere Maazị Uche Odoputa maka ịzụ ahịa ọgwụ ọjọọ ma tụọ ya mkpọrọ afọ abụọ na izu atọ

Uchechukwu Sampson Ogah// (na-ege ntị) (amụrụ na abali iri abuo na abuo, n'ime onwa iri na abụọ, na afọ otu puku, nari iteolu na iri isii na iteolu (22/12/1969) bụ Onye-ozi nke Naijiria ugbu a maka Mines na Steel Development
Onye na-emepụta mmanụ, onye ọchụnta ego, onye na-etinye ego na onye ọrụ ebere

Ogah bụ onye isi oche nke Master Energy Group, otu ụlọ ọrụ nwere ngalaba, ụlọ ọrụ ndi enyemake ihe karịrị ụlọ ọrụ iri na ise (15), na mmasị gafee ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche, n'etiti ya bụ Masters Energy Oil na Gas Ltd
Ogah nwere nsọpụrụ mba Naijiria, onye isi nke Order of the Niger (OON)

Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara ya maka nhọpụta nke Onye-ozi ma mesịa họpụta ya dị ka Onye-ozi nke Steeti, Mines na Steel Development na ubochi Wednesday, ọnwa asatọ, abalị iri abuo na otu, na afo puku abụọ na iri n'iteolu (8/21/2019)
A mụrụ Ogah na ezinaụlọ Chief Wilson, onye nnyocha ahụike na ndị ọrụ ụzọ ụgbọ oloko lara ezumike nká na Ezinne Pauline Ogah nke Onuaku Uturu, Isuikwuato Local Government Area nke Abia State
Ogah lụrụ Ngozi Sabina Ogah, onye nyocha ego
Ogah nọrọ afọ iri na ngalaba ụlọ akụ
Ọ malitere na ife ala nnaya na NAL Bank PLC

Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ malitere ọrụ zuru oke na ụlọ akụ All States Trust Bank ma nọrọ ihe dị ka afọ abụọ na ụlọ akụ ahụ tupu ọ banye Zenith Bank na afo otu puku, nari iteolu na iri iteolu na asaa (1997), ebe ọ rịgooro n'ọkwa onye inye-aka nke onye isi oche tupu ọ gbaa arụkwaghịm na afo puku abụọ na asaa (2007)
A na-ekwu na ọ na-enye obodo nta ọkụ eletrik na Uturu Community, wuru ụlọ prototypal maka obodo dum ma wuo ụlọ nzukọ puku ise (5,000) na Mahadum steeti Abia (ABSU) Uturu
Ogah esonyewo n'ịzọ ọchịchị maka oche gọvanọ nke steeti Abia, ugboro abụọ, nke mbụ n'okpuru Peoples Democratic Party na All Progressives Congress na-achị ugbu a
Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari họpụtara Ogah maka nhọpụta onye-ozi na abalị iri na atọ nke onwa asaa, na afọ puku abụọ na iri na iteolu, (23/3/2019} ya na mmadu iri anọ na abụọ (42) ndị ọzọ a họpụtara
N'oge nyocha ya dị ka onye omeiwu na abaị iri abụọ na anọ n;ọnwa asaa (24/7), ọ kọwaputara atụmatụ ya banyere otu esi arụ ọrụ na refineries Naijiria yana atụmatụ ya maka ego ọnụego Naijiria
Senate kwadoro Ogah maka nhọpụta Ony-ozi na July 30 na August 21, 2019 ka a kwadoro ma ṅụọ iyi dị ka Onye-ozi nke Steeti maka Mmanụ na Mmepe Steel

Uche Ogbuji bụ onye mmekọ na Zepheira, LLC, ụlọ ọrụ ngwọta ọkachamara na ọgbọ na-esote teknụzụ Weebụ Mazị Ogbuji bụ onye ndu onye nrụpụta 4Suite, ebe mepere emepe maka ngwa XML, RDF na njikwa ihe ọmụma, yana onye ndu onye nrụpụta asụsụ ajụjụ Versa RDF
Ọ bụ onye injinia kọmputa na onye ode akwụkwọ a mụrụ na Nigeria, bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Boulder, Colorado

A mụrụ Uche Ogbuji na Calabar, Nigeria, ma biri na Egypt, England na ebe ndị ọzọ tupu ya na nwunye ya na ụmụ ya anọ biri na nso Boulder, Colorado Ọ bụ onye injinia eletrọnịkị site n'agụmakwụkwọ, ebe ọ malitela ọmụmụ ya na Naịjirịa tupu ya ebufe na gụsịrị akwụkwọ na US Ọ bụ onye nchoputa na CTO nke Zepheira, nke na-emepụta ngwọta nkà na ụzụ iji mee ka ụlọ akwụkwọ dị mkpa na Weebụ Uche bụ ọkachamara n'ichepụta data na sistemu ekesa, ebe ọ rụburu ọrụ ọsụ ụzọ n'ịkwalite teknụzụ dịka XML, RDF na ọrụ Weebụ N'ime usoro ahụ, o duuru ọtụtụ ọrụ mepere emepe wee bipụta narị narị akụkọ teknụzụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ ụlọ ọrụ, gụnyere XMLcom
Uche bụkwa onye na-agụ agụ na onye ndezi Akwụkwọ uri uri ya, Ndewo, Colorado (Aldrich Press, 2013) bụ onye meriri akwụkwọ nrite Colorado, na ọ na-akwado pọdkastị olu abụ abụ

Onye ọ bụla na-agbaso XML ma ọ bụ ụwa semantic webụ mara maka ọrụ Uche Ogbuji Uche Ogbuji bụ onye mmekọ na Zepheira, LLC, ụlọ ọrụ ngwọta ọkachamara na ọgbọ na-esote teknụzụ Weebụ Mazị Ogbuji bụ onye ndu onye nrụpụta 4Suite, ebe mepere emepe maka ngwa XML, RDF na njikwa ihe ọmụma, yana onye ndu onye nrụpụta asụsụ ajụjụ Versa RDF Ọ bụ onye injinia kọmputa na onye ode akwụkwọ a mụrụ na Nigeria, bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Boulder, Colorado Uche gụrụ Electronic Engineering na University of Nigeria, Nsukka afọ atọ tupu ọ gawa gụchaa na Computer Engineering na Milwaukee School of Engineering na February, 1994
Ọ bụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ ọkachamara XML Web Services (Programmer to programmer) na Linux Ebe nchekwa data
Uche Okafor (amụrụ n'ụbọchị iri nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 1991) bụ onye oche goolu Naijiria na-egwuri egwu ugbu a maka Enugu Rangers

Okafor nọchitere anya otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Naijiria nke ndị n'akarịbeghi afọ iri na asaa na Iko mba ụwa nke ndị n'akarịbeghi afọ iri na ass nke afọ 2007 na South Korea ma gbaa otu egwuregwu na otu egwuregwu nke ụwa
Ọ nọchitere anya Flying Eagles na Asọmpi ndị itorobịa mba Afrịka nke afọ 2009 na Rwanda na Iko mba ụwa nke ndị n'akarịbeghị afọ iri abụọ nke afọ 2009
Uchechukwu Alozie, nke a makwaara dị ka Deniz Uygar bụ onye (amụrụ na 27 Septemba 1967) bụ onye Naijiria bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dị ka onye na-echebe etiti
'Uchechukwu' bụ aha Igbo nke pụtara 'God's will' na igbo
A na-asọpụrụ ya dị ka onye ọkpụkpọ mba ọzọ nke gbara bọọlụ na Turkey ruo ogologo oge (afọ iri na atọ ), na-aga n'ihu inweta nwa amaala Turkey n'okpuru aha Deniz Uygar
Onye natara ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ caps iri ịse maka Naịjirịa, Okechukwu nọchitere anya mba ahụ na iko mba ụwa abụọ na ọtụtụ iko mba Afrịka, na-emeri asọmpi ikpeazụ otu ugboro
Ọ bụ onye a mụrụ na Lagos, Okechukwu malitere ọrụ ya na-egwuri egwu maka Flash Flamingoes na Iwuanyanwu Nationale, na-emeri 1988 na 1989 Nigeria Premier League na nke ikpeazụ
N'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1990, ọ kwagara mba ọzọ iji sonye na klọb Danish Brøndby IF, onye nkuzi ọhụrụ a họpụtara bụ Morten Olsen bịanyere aka na ya na onye otu ya bụ Friday Elahor

N'oge na-adịghị anya, Okechukwu nyeere ndị otu ahụ aka imeri na 1990 na 1991 Danish championship, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị isi nke ndị otu ahụ ruru ọkara ikpeazụ nke 1990 UEFA Cup; mgbe ụfọdụ na-eto Elahor dị ka Brian Laudrup na-esote, ọ ga-ahapụ Afrịka Sports n'oge na'oge na na-adịghịkwa anya, ebe a ga-akpọ Okechukwu onye egwuregwu Brøndby IF nke Afọ nke afọ 1992

Mgbe ọ pụtara na 1992 Afrika Cup of Nations, ebe Naịjirịa ruru ọkara ikpeazụ, Okechukwu jikọtara ya na otu Turkey Fenerbahçe SK ruo ọkara afọ, ruo mgbe a zụrụ ya na nkwekọrịta mbufe nde DKK8 na Nọvemba 1993
Na Istanbul, ya na onye bụbu onye otu Brøndby Jes Høgh guzobere otu ndị na-agbachitere onwe ha, na-enyere klọb ahụ aka na asọmpi Süper Lig mbụ ya n'ime afọ asaa na 1996
Okechukwu so Fenerbahçe gbaa bọọlụ afọ anọ ọzọ, na-ekwughachi ihe nrite league n'afọ 2000 na 2000
Mgbe ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ egwuregwu 250 gasịrị, ọ kwagara na otu egwuregwu ibe ya bụ İstanbulspor AS, laghachi na 2007 na Naịjirịa nke mbụ na Ocean Boys FC
mgbe ahụ na Bayelsa United FC (na-esonyere nke ikpeazụ na July 2008, wee laa ezumike nká n'oge na-adịghị anya, mgbe ọ dị afọ 41)
Okechukwu mere nke mbụ ya maka ndị otu mba Naịjirịa na asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 1990, na mmeri ise na Algeria na egwuregwu mmeghe ha
N'ihe fọdụrụ na asọmpi ahụ, ndị na-agbachitere Super Eagles enyeghị ihe mgbaru ọsọ ọzọ, ruo mgbe otu onye mmegide ahụ meriri ha na nke ikpeazụ
N'ozuzu, Okechukwu gbara bọọlụ mba ụwa iri anọ na asaa, merie CAN na 1994 (2[] megide Zambia) na 1996 Summer Olympics

Ọ nọchitekwara anya mba ahụ na iko mba ụwa FIFA abụọ, na-enyere ya aka ịga n'ihu na asọmpi abụọ na-aga n'ihu nke iri na isii ka ọ pụtara na egwuregwu asaa zuru ezu, naanị na-efu na nke atọ nke Paraguay n'ihi na ọ chịkọtara kaadị odo abụọ
Okechukwu lara ezumike nká mgbe mbipụta 1998 nke 4-1 meriri Denmark, ebe ọ bụ onyeisi ndị otu ahụ ọtụtụ oge site na 1996 gaa n'ihu

Christopher Uchefuna Okeke (Eprel 30, 1933 na Nimo - Jenụwarị 5, 2016 na Nimo), nke a maara dị ka Uche Okeke, bụ onye na-akọwaputa ihe, onye na-ese ihe, onye na-akpụ ihe, onye na-ede uri, onye na-ese ihe na-ahụ maka ihe ịchọ mma, nke na-ebute ụzọ na ọgbara ọhụrụ nke Naijiria
A mụrụ Christopher Uchefuna Okeke na 30 Eprel 1933 na Nimo, Njikoka Local Government Area nke Anambra State, Nigeria, nke Isaac Okonkwo Okeke na Monica Mgboye Okeke (née Okoye)
N'agbata afọ 1940 na 1953, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ St
Peter Claver's (Primary), Kafanchan, Metropolitan College, Onitsha, na Bishop Shanahan College, Orlu, Nigeria, n'oge ahụ ọ malitelarị igosipụta mmasị na eserese na nteji

Tupu a nabata ya ka ọ gụọ Fine Art na Nigerian College of Arts, Science and Technology (NCAST), ugbu a Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria, Okeke egosipụtala ọrụ taxidermy n'oge nzukọ Field Society na Jos Museum, sonyere na nkwadebe na ngosi nke Nigerian Drawings and Paintings na Bernard Fagg dịka onye nlekọta ma nwee ihe ngosi nke eserese na ntejiájá, na Jos na Kaduna na Sir Ahmadu Bello bịara
Dị ka onye na-eto eto na-ese ihe, Okeke bụ onye guzobere Zaria Art Society na 1958

Ndị otu a bụ n'ihi esemokwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Naịjirịa na-agbasi mbọ ike inweta nnwere onwe ma ndị isi dị mkpa nke ọgbara ọhụrụ na nka Naịjirịa dịka Yusuf Grillo, Bruce Onobrakpeya, Oseloka Osadebe, Demas Nwoko na ndị ọzọ hiwere ya

Ọtụtụ n'ime ndị prọfesọ ya na Nigerian College bụ ndị Britain ma kụzie usoro ejiji ọdịda anyanwụ agbanyeghị, The Zaria Society megidere itinye echiche ụlọ akwụkwọ nka nke Europe na ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe na Africa
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ, Okeke gụrụ agbụrụ Igbo, Yoruba, na Hausa, na-achọ ụzọ isi gosipụta onwe ya na Naijiria
A na-ahụkarị akara ndị Naijiria oge ochie na ite ma ọ bụ na eserese ahụ
A na-akpọ atụmatụ ndị Igbo Uli Patterns
N'afọ 1971, Uche Okoke sonyeere Ngalaba nke Fine and Applied Arts na Mahadum nke Nigeria dị na Nsukka dịka Prọfesọ na onye nkuzi
Ya na ndị ọrụ ibe ya na ụmụ akwụkwọ mepụtara ụdị pụrụ iche nke ghọrọ njirimara maka ụlọ akwụkwọ Nsukka
Ya na Chike Aniakor na Obiora Udechukwu guzobere nhazi nke nka na aesthetics nke oge a nke Naijiria n'afọ iri asaa
Okeke bu ụzọ hụ akụkọ ọdịnala ndị Igbo mgbe ọ bụ nwata ma mesịa jiri ha mee ihe dịka mkpali na nka ya
N'ime ụfọdụ n'ime eserese ya, onye na-ese ihe sụgharịrị ndị dike akụkọ ifo iji mee ka a mara ihe nketa Igbo ya
Mpaghara ọdịbendị Igbo dị n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Osimiri Niger, n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ nke Cross River, na ọdịda anyanwụ nke nnukwu ụzọ mmiri Niger nke ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa
N'ebe a niile, e nwere ihe akaebe nke ọdịbendị nka oge ochie
A na-akpọ ụdị nka ọdịnala Igbo Uli Drawing
Dị ka Okeke si kwuo, Uli bụ mgbalị iji mee ka ahụ mmadụ mara mma
Na omenala, onye na-ese ihe na Uli bụ nwanyị n'obodo ndị Igbo nke na-ese ụkpụrụ n'ahụ na mgbe ụfọdụ na mgbidi nke ebe nsọ
A na-akpọ usoro a Ide Uli ma ọ bụ Ise Uli
Ihe osise na akara na Uli na-anọgide na-agbanweghị agbanwe Otú ọ dị, ọ bụ nhazi nke ihe ndị na-emepụta ihe na-agbagha ọgụgụ isi nke ndị na-ese ihe ọdịnala Igbo
Ọtụtụ n'ime atụmatụ ndị dị na Uli sitere na okike
Ndị nwere akara na ntụpọ dị ka pythons na jaguars bụ ihe atụ nke isi mmalite nke ụkpụrụ sitere na ya
Ụdị Uli nwere geometric, osisi, na anụmanụ motifs
Ọzọkwa, nhọrọ agba onye na-ese ihe na-eme nwere ihe dị mkpa
Okeke na-akọwa otú e si eji agba eme ihe na ebe ha si
A na-ewepụta ihe dị n'etiti na Uli Drawings site na pods nke osisi
Uli Oba, Uli Nkilisi, na Uli Ede Eji bụ aha osisi ndị a na-esi na ya wepụta ihe ahụ
A na-ekwu na nka na 'Igboland' sitere na chi nwanyị ụwa Ala
Nka sitere na ọdịdị nne ma a na-ahụta ya dị ka ụzọ isi kwalite ọdịmma ime mmụọ na nke anụ ahụ nke obodo ndị ikwu
Ọ na-anọchite anya ndụ nke ndị mmadụ na ọkpụkpụ nkịtị nke okike
Uli nwekwara ụfọdụ àgwà egwu nke kpaliri abụ na akụkọ ọdịnala ndị Igbo
Uche Okokes na-emepụta ihe osise na-akwado site n'ọtụtụ echiche mara mma na-abịa na ọrụ nka ya
Ihe odide mbụ ya na-ejide echiche nke Pan-Africanism na Négritude
N'etiti ndị ọzọ, ọ bụ ụdị edemede ya na-akpali akpali nke mere ka otu ụmụ akwụkwọ na-eto eto na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello nweta aha 'Zaria rebels'
N'ime ntụgharị uche ya ka e mechara, ọ lekwasịrị anya na ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị na-ese ihe kwesịrị ịzụlite

O meghekwara ụlọ ọrụ ọdịbendị na 30 Ibadan Street, Kafanchan, nke mechara bụrụ Asele Institute, Nimo, ebe n'etiti ọrụ ọdịbendị ndị ọzọ, a gbara akụkụ nke ihe nkiri agụmakwụkwọ nke Smithsonian Institution kwadoro Nigerian Art - Kindred Spirits na 1996
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ nwere nchịkọta ihe ochie, ihe, na ihe osise sitere n'aka ndị enyi Okeke nwetara n'oge njem ya n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke Naịjirịa
Ọ ka bụ otu n'ime ebe nchekwa kachasị mkpa nke akwụkwọ, ihe ochie, na etiti narị afọ nke iri abụọ nke nka Afrịka
A họpụtara Uche ka ọ bụrụ onye nkuzi na onye isi nke Fine Arts Department na Mahadum Nigeria, Nsukka, site na 1971 ruo 1985
Ọ gbanwere usoro ọmụmụ ha iji lekwasị anya na nka na imewe ụmụ amaala Afrịka nke o kwenyere na ọ ga-abara mmepe nke nka Afrịka nke oge a na nke oge a uru
N'afọ 1973, ọ rụgharịrị usoro ọmụmụ nke Ngalaba Fine and Applied Arts, Institute of Management and Technology, Enugu, ma malite ọmụmụ Postgraduate na Ngalaba Fine Arts, Mahadum nke Nigeria, Nsukka

Ọ bụ onye isi nke Institute of African Studies na Mahadum nke Nigeria na Nsukka, Ọkankụna-eleta na Ngalaba Creative Arts, Mahadum nke Port Harcourt, Onye osote onye isi (Africa) nke International Biographical Centre, Cambridge, n'etiti ọtụtụ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ na omenala
Okeke buuru nnwale Uli karịa mgbidi Zaria ma guzoro n'ihu mgbanwe ya n'ime okwu ọgbara ọhụrụ n'afọ ndị 1970, site na ụlọ ọrụ dị na Nsukka bụ nke mbụ
Ọ bụ onye isi na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke nka Afrịka nke oge a
Okeke nwụrụ na 5 Jenụwarị 2016 n'ụlọ ya na Nimo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na abụọ
N'afọ 1958, ọ ghọrọ onye guzobere na onye isi nke Asele Institute and Documentation Center, Nimo, Nigeria

Uche Okpa-Iroha (amụrụ na Enugu n'afọ 1972) bụ onye na-ese ihe dị iche iche nke Naijiria nke na-ejikarị ise foto dị ka ụzọ kachasị amasị ya iji gosipụta nka
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Blackbox Collective na Invisible Borders Trans-African Organisation na 2013, ọ tọrọ ntọala ma guzobe The Nlele Institute, ebe ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye ịsị na onye ndozi
Ọ bụ onye mmeri nke Seydou Keita Prize maka foto ugboro abụọ, ọ ritekwara ihe nrite Jean-Paul Blachere
Ọ bi ma na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na Lagos
A mụrụ Uche Okpa-Iroha na Jenụwarị 2, 1972, nue Maazị Nwokocha Okpa-Iroha na Oriakụ Chidi Okpa-Iroha
O nwere ụmụnne anọ ndị ọzọ
Ezinụlọ a si Abia Steeti na mpaghara South Eastern Niger Delta nke Naịjirịa
Okpa-Iroha lụrụ Ayo Joy Okpa-Iroha ma ha nwere ụmụ abụọ
Uche Okpa-Iroha nwere nzere bachelọ na Food Science and Technology na Federal University of Technology, Owerri, Imo State, Nigeria nke ọ gụsịrị na 1997
N'afọ 2013, ọ gụsịrị afọ abụọ nke ebe obibi nyocha na mmemme mmekọrịta na Rijksakademie na Netherlands
Uche Okpa-Iroha bụ onye na-ahụ maka ọtụtụ ihe, mmasị ya maka foto na foto akụkọ dị ka ndị ọ na-ahọrọ pụtara ìhè na ọrụ ya
Ọrụ ya na-egosipụta ọdịiche na ịdị iche iche nke obodo ndị Africa

Onyinye ya na mmepe nke foto Afrịka site na mkpali sitere na nkwenye ya na nnọchi anya na njirimara bụ ụfọdụ n'ime isi okwu na-egbochi mmepe nke foto Afrịka, dabere na mmetụta nke echiche ndị a na-agafe site na oge ọchịchị
Nke a na-agwa ụzọ o si arụ ọrụ ya, ebe ọ na-enyocha ma isi mmalite nke mmụọ nsọ na nke dị n'èzí iji mepụta ngosipụta nka dị iche iche

Ụdị nka ya bụ ngwakọta nke mmasị ya na ụmụ mmadụ, mmasị ya maka ụdị dịgasị iche iche na mgbagwoju anya nke ọnọdụ mmadụ na mmekọrịta nke ihe ndị a n'ime gburugburu ebe obibi ha nke na-emepụta ihe ndị nkịtị kwa ụbọchị na otú nke ahụ si emepụta akụkọ nke ọdịbendị ya
Uche Okpa-Iroha chọpụtara mmasị ya na foto n'afọ 2005, mgbe ọ gara ihe ngosi nke ndị otu Naijiria Depth of Field (DOF) kwadoro na London
Ọ ghọrọ onye na-ese foto n'afọ 2006, ebe ọ mụtara n'okpuru nwa nwanne nna ya, Prince Claus Laureate, Uche James Iroha
N'afọ sochirinụ, Uche Okpa-Iroha na ụfọdụ ndị enyi ya guzobere Black Box Photography Collective dị ka obodo nke ndị ịse foto na-anụ ọkụ n'obi
Ndị otu a haziri nnukwu ihe ngosi na Lagos, Nigeria na Havana, Cuba
N'afọ 2007, a mara ọkwa na Okpa-Iroha bu onye nke mbụ nke asọmpi Life in My City Art and Photography, nke Alliance Franciase na Rokana Industries haziri na Enugu, Nigeria
N'afọ 2008, ndị nkatọ nabatara nnukwu ọrụ mbụ ya 'The Under Bridge Life' ma kpughee ya nye ndị na-ege ntị na mba ụwa

Ọrụ ahụ mere ka ọ nweta ihe nrite Seydou Keita maka Best Photographic Creation na mbipụta 2009 nke African Photography Encounters na Bamako na n'otu afọ ahụ, ọ natara Jean-Paul Blachere Foundation Prize maka otu ọrụ ahụ

N'afọ 2011, Uche Okpa-Iroha bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe iri abụọ na ise ahọpụtara maka mmemme nyocha nke afọ abụọ na Rijksakademie Van Bleeldende Kunsten Rijskakdemie Van Bleeldende Kunsten, nke Eze William nke Atọ hiwere na 1870 nyere Uche ikpo okwu maka ịzụlite talent ya na mba ụwa ma kpughee ọrụ ya na mba ụwa
E gosipụtara ya n'ebe dị iche iche gụnyere New York, Paris, Canada, Belgium, Spain, Germany, France na Berlin
Ọ nọ na Panel of Nominators maka WorldPressPhoto's Joop Swart Masterclass selection committee na 2016
Ọ bụkwa onye otu International Federation of Kidney Foundation
Plantation Boy (2012)

Emechara ya n'afọ ikpeazụ nke ebe obibi ya na Rijksakademie Van Beeldende Kunsten Amsterdam, Netherlands, usoro 'Plantation Boy' na-ahụ Okpa-Iroha na-etinye aka na ihe nkiri Francis Ford Coppola nke 1972, The Godfather site na ịkewapụ ma na-etinye ihe nkiri iri anọ mbụ site na ihe nkiri ahụ

Site na usoro mmegharị dijitalụ, onye na-ese ihe na-akpaghasị ihe oyiyi Hollywood dị egwu na ọnụnọ nke nwoke Africa n'etiti ndị òtù ezinụlọ nke ọdịbendị Italian-American Site n'iji nlezianya tinye onwe ya n'ime ihe oyiyi ahụ site na atụmatụ nke iwughachi na mmegharị, ọ na-ekwu maka ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke nnọchi anya na sinima ọdịda anyanwụ nke nwere enweghị ahụ ojii

Ọ na-agbakwa ihe ngosi nke njirimara ndị Afrịka aka site n'ịga n'etiti ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri ahụ iji gosipụta 'ihe ngosi nke ọnụnọ nke omission' na dị ka ihe nnọchianya nke ọdịbendị ma ọ bụ agbụrụ na-adịghị na-adịghị na mbụ
Aha a na-etinye ọrụ ahụ n'ime ọchịchọ ndị isi ojii na ndị Afrịka maka nnwere onwe na mkpebi onwe onye nke bilitere n'oge ọrụ ugbo ohu ma na-aga n'ihu na-emetụta ndụ ndị isi ojii n'ụwa niile
O ritere ihe nrite Seydou Keita maka usoro a n'afọ 2009
ISOLATED (Series)

(2011 - Ugbu a) ISOLATED bụ usoro na-aga n'ihu nke Okpa-Iroha malitere na 2011, Ọ na-egosi ụzọ nkwurịta okwu na-enweghị isi n'obodo, ụzọ ederede, mgbasa ozi na-adịghị mma na ụzọ nkwurịta okwu ndị ọzọ na igosipụta ozi ndị dị n'akụkụ nke oghere

Ọtụtụ oge, ihe oyiyi ndị a dị ka ọchịchọ ma jiri ihe ndị ọzọ kpuchie ya, dị ka ọ na-ahụkarị n'obodo ndị dị ka Lagos, ihe ọ na-akpọ mmeghachi omume obodo ahụ na ọ ghaghị ịmegharị ọnọdụ azụmahịa ya mgbe niile, na-eduga na mpụta nke akwụkwọ akụkọ a, echiche organic n'akụkụ asụsụ obodo mepere emepe nke ọ malitere
Ha na-anọkarị n'akụkụ okporo ámá, okporo ụzọ, ebe obibi nke onwe, ụlọ ahịa, ụlọ ụka, osisi eletrik, na ọbụna n'elu ụlọ
Under the Bridge Life (2009)
Under Bridge Life bụ usoro foto nke gosipụtara 'ndụ n'okpuru ogwe' na Lagos
Ọ na-egosi gburugburu ebe obibi zuru oke nke na-eme nke ọma n'okpuru afọ nke àkwà mmiri Lagos, nke ghọworo ihe karịrị naanị ebe mgbaba maka ọtụtụ puku ndị bi na ya
Nke a na-akawanye mma site na akụrụngwa Lagos nke okporo ụzọ na àkwà mmiri, netwọk akwara dị mgbagwoju anya nke na-eto 'Life' n'usoro, ọbụlagodi na-enweghị atụmatụ ma ọ bụ nkwado mpụga
O ritere ihe nrite Seydou Keita maka usoro a n'afọ 2015
2022 - Callanan Excellence in Teaching Award (nke bụbu Center Teaching Award)
2015 - Seydou Keita Prize - Best Photography Creation (The Plantation Boy)
2010 - Prix Pictet “Growth” na 2010 (Nomination)
2009 - Seydou Keita Prize - Best Photography Creation (Under the Bridge Life)
2009 - Jean-Paul Blachere Foundation Prize
Uche great sabastine amuru na 10 June 2000 bu onye egwu bọọlụ Naijiria na-agba osyersund na mbinye ego sitere na Kano pillar
Uche Uzorka bụ onye na-ese ihe na Naijiria
N'afọ 2011, ya na Chike Obeagu meriri n'ọkwa mbụ na asọmpi nka mba Naịjirịa
Uzorka jikọtara mgbasa ozi dị iche iche na ọrụ ya iji nyochaa usoro nke ọdịbendị n'okporo ámá obodo
A mụrụ Uche Uzorka na Delta Steeti, Naịjirịa, n'afọ 1974
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Naịjirịa, Nsukka, n'afọ 2001, ebe ọ gụrụ gbasara ihe osise
N'inyocha usoro ọdịbendị n'okporo ámá obodo, ụzọ Uzorka gụnyere eserese, nchịkọta foto icheku ọkụ, na eserese ink
N'afọ 2011, Uzorka nwetara ọkwa mbụ na asọmpi nka mba Naịjirịa maka ọrụ ya na Chike Obeago mepụtara
Uche malitere n'oge na-adịghị anya na eserese, na-egosighi ihe ngosi doro anya nke nkà ruo mgbe ọ banyere afọ nke atọ ya n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
Ihe osise mbụ ya bụ nke nwanne nna ọ na-ahụtụbeghị mbụ, onye o sere site na foto paspọtụ ochie
Ọ na-etinye aka na ihe ọkpụkpụ, na-anwale ụdị na ụrọ, ma mesịa chọpụta mmasị ya maka eserese
Uzorka gbara arụkwaghịm ka ọ wee nọrọ n'ime ụlọ ụbọchị niile na-ese ihe, ma na-eme ka usoro ya zuo oke ruo mgbe a nabatara ya dị ka nwa akwụkwọ nka na UNN na 1997
Dị ka nwatakịrị na-atụ ụjọ na onye na-eto eto, Uche na-ekwu na ọtụtụ n'ime ụmụ klas ya na ndị enyi ya ka na-eju anya na ihe ịga nke ọma ya na ụwa nka
Uche Uzorka The Organic, ihe ngosi mbụ ya, gosipụtara na Ọktoba 2012 na Goethe-Institut Nigeria na mmekorita ya na African Artists 'Foundation
Ihe ngosi nke abụọ nke Uzorka, Line
Sign
Symbol mere na Jenụwarị 2013 na African Artists' Foundation

Uchechi Kalu bu nwa Naijiria no na mba Amerika ede abu ,onye nkuzi,onye na ekwuchitere ndi nenwenghi onu nobodo na onye ahia kwuru onwe ya ,onye ederede ya putagoro na otutu mbiputa nke gunwere Revolutionary Voices ;nke na ede maka asusu na odinala di iche iche gbagwojuru ndi ntolobia nke Amy Sonnie haziri naafo 2000

Nwada Kalu bu nwata akwukwo nke June Jordan's 'Poetry for the people' okuzikwara na ebe anakpo San Francisco WritersCorpsO bu ya dere akwukwo anakpo Flowers Blooming Against A Bruised Grey Sky bu nke onye anakpo Whit Press biputara naafo 2006 na mba anakpo Seattle
O bu otu nime ndi choputara Wedocracy,bu ndi chikotara onwe ha nihe gbasara nmekorita mmadu na ibeya okachasi nihe gbasara anumu di na nwunye Naafo 2012 ka onuru nwoke anakpo Peter Jacobson
Uchechi Lopez Sunday (amụrụ na 9 Septemba 1994) bụ nwaanyị Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ dịka strika, ugbu a ọ na-agbara klọb FC Nordsjælland na asọmpi Gjensidige Kvindeliga
Ọ bụkwa onye otu egwu bọọlụ ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa, a na-akpọ Super Falcons
Amụrụ Uchechi Sunday na Port Harcourt, Naijiria na 9 Septemba 1994 Ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime nwa nwanyị asaa
Sunday malitere ọrụ ịgba bọl na 2004 na Rivers Angels FC
na Naijiria
Site na 2009, o gbaara na ndi otu bọọlụ nke ụmụ nwaanyị bụ Nigerian Women's Premier League
Na 14 Eprel 2011, ọ banyere otu klọb ndị Switzerland bụ FC Neunkirch na Schaffhausen
Ọ gbaara ha ugboro iri na asatọ
Na August n'otu afọ ahụ, mgbe a gbachara 2010 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup na Germany, ọ laghachiri klọb ochie ya na Naijiria
Na mbido 2015, Sunday sonyere otu egwuregwu ndị Belarus bụ FC Minsk
Ọ nyere goolu atọ na matchị izizi ya
Na mmechi May 2015, ọ nyere goolu iri na anọ n'ime naanị egwuregwu ise
Ọ nyere goolu nke iri na ise mgbe ọ pụtara na matchị nke isii ya na 20 June 2015
Na 11 August 2015, ọ pụtara na UEFA Women's Champions League na nke gbara Konak Belediyespor si Turkey
O nyere goolu ise n'ime asọmpị ahụ, nke mechiri 10-1 nke FC Minsk meriri
Ọ nyekwara otu goolu na matchị nke abụọ, na goolu abụọ na nke atọ, ngụkọta goolu asato n'ime egwuregwu atọ nke otu ntozu
Mgbe ọ na-agbara ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị U-20 nke Naijiria, Sunday pụtara nke izizi ya na asọmpi FIFA na 2010 U-20 World Cup na Germany, e tinyere ya dị ka onye nnọchi mgbe ha na Mexico ndị Group C n'agba
Ọ sonyekwere na asọmpi nke FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup na 2014 emere na Canada, ebe o nyere goolu atọ
Ọ nyekwara goolu atọ na 2014 African U-20 Cup of Nations nke ụmụ nwaanyị

O gbaara nke izizi ya na FIFA Women's World Cupwee pụta na egwuregwu atọ nke 2011 FIFA Women's World Cup Group A maka ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Nigeria otu egwuregwu bọọlụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Naijiria

Uchechukwu Iheadindu (amuru June 29, 1979) bu onye egwuregwu basketball nke Romania onye gbara ndi otu egwuregwu basketball nke Romania n'asọmpi mba uwa n'etiti 2005 na 2007
Ọ bụ onye Naijiria site na nna ya
Uchechukwu Nnam-Obi bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria, na onyẹ otu ndị nnọchi anya Nzukọ Mba Naijiria site na Rivers State na 9th National Assembly (Nigeria)
Nam-Obi na-anọchite anya Ahoada West/Ogba/Egbema/Ndoni Federal Constituency ugbu a na 9th National Assembly (Nigeria) na ikpo okwu nkẹ Peoples Democratic Party (Nigria)
Uchechukwu Peter Umezurike, nke a makwaara dị ka Uche Peter Umez, bụ onye edemede Naijiria na ọkà mmụta na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a dị ka osote prọfesọ nke Bekee na Mahadum Calgary

Na mgbakwunye na ibipụta ọtụtụ ọrụ nke akụkọ ifo ụmụaka, akụkọ ifo dị mkpirikpi, na uri, nyocha agụmakwụkwọ ya sitere na ọmụmụ okike na echiche agbụrụ dị oke egwu iji nyochaa akwụkwọ ndị Afrịka, ndị Afrịka na-achị ala ọzọ, na akwụkwọ ụwa niile yana ihe nkiri
Umezurike kewara ọtụtụ afọ mbụ ya n'etiti Lagos na Owerri, ọ bụ ezie na ọ gara ọtụtụ ebe ma biri n'ọtụtụ obodo na steeti
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ postsecondary ya na Mahadum Abia State dị na Uturu, Naịjirịa
O nwere mmasị na mbụ ịmalite ọrụ na ego ma debanye aha na nchịkwa azụmaahịa na mmemme ụlọ akụ, ọ bụ ezie na o mechara gbanwee gaa na mmemme gọọmentị na nchịkwa ọha na eze, nke ọ rụzuru na 1997
N'agbanyeghị nke ahụ, ọ dịghị ubi ọ bụla jidere ọchịchọ ịmata ihe ya
Ọ bụ n'oge a ka Umezurike malitere inwe mmasị n'akwụkwọ Bekee dị ka ụzọ isi gbochie ike ọgwụgwụ, yana ịnagide egwu na obi nkoropụ ọ nwere n'oge ọchịchị aka ike Sani Abacha nke afọ 1990
Umezurike gara n'ihu na-anwale ụdị dị iche iche mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum
N'afọ 2004, o bipụtara Dark through the Delta (2004), nchịkọta uri, nke Tears in Her Eyes (2005) sochiri, nchịkọta akụkọ dị mkpirikpi, na Sam and the Wallet (2007), ọrụ akụkọ ifo ụmụaka

N'ịgbaso ihe ịga nke ọma mbụ ya, ọ debanyere aha na ọtụtụ mmemme obibi maka ndị edemede mba ụwa, gụnyere International Writing Program na Iowa City na 2008, Château de Lavigny onye edemede bi na Switzerland na 2010, na Civitella Ranieri Foundation bi na Ịtali na 2012
Ọrụ agụmakwụkwọ Umezurike malitere mgbe ọ gara Mahadum nke Port Harcourt iji nweta nzere masta na edemede Bekee

Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ edemede ya n'afọ 2014, na-elekwasị anya na mmekọahụ nke ụmụ nwanyị n'akwụkwọ akụkọ abụọ dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ Afrịka; Beyond the Horizon nke onye edemede Ghana bụ Amma Darko, na On Black Sisters' Street nke onye edemedi Naijiria bụ Chika Unigwe

Mmasị ya n'ịchọpụta etu nnọchiteanya nke okike na edemede Naijiria si mara site na echiche na ụkpụrụ ndị na-akọwa etu ọha mmadụ kwesịrị isi mata, soro, ma nabata ma ọ bụ ọbụna kwado ndị mmadụ mere ka ọ sonye na PhD
na Bekee na mmemme Film Studies na Mahadum Alberta na Edmonton, Canada

N'okpuru nlekọta nke Lahoucine Ouzgane, ọ dechara akwụkwọ edemede doctoral ya na 2021, na-elekwasị anya na nnọchiteanya nke okike na mmekọahụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke ndị edemede Igbo na-ele anya n'ihe oyiyi nke ụmụ nwoke na ụmụ nwanyị ndị chegharịrị, manyere, ma ọ bụ ọbụna na-ama nwoke aka

N'otu afọ ahụ, e nyere ya 2021 Nigeria Prize for Literary Criticism, nke a na-ewere dị ka ihe nrite kachasị maka nkatọ akwụkwọ n'Africa, n'ịghọta omimi, ịdị ike, na mkpa nke edemede agụmakwụkwọ atọ e bipụtara n'oge ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ doctoral
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Umezurike ghọrọ onye mbụ natara onyinye Postdoctoral Awards maka ndị ọkà mmụta obodo na ndị isi ojii na Mahadum Calgary

Ọrụ ya ugbu a na-atụle otú ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ndị edemede Africa Canada si echepụta ebe obibi ọhụrụ ha na Canada, ọkachasị n'ime ihe ndị dị n'etiti ndị obodo na ọbụbụeze ha, na-eme ka oghere dị na agụmakwụkwọ gbasara akụkọ ndị Afrịka na-akwaga Canada
Ọzọkwa, Umezurike anọgidewo na-emepụta ọrụ edemede okike na mgbakwunye na nchụso agụmakwụkwọ ya
N'afọ 2021, o bipụtara Wish Maker, akwụkwọ akụkọ ụmụaka ọzọ, yana nchịkọta akụkọ ọzọ dị mkpirikpi, Double Wahala, Double Trouble
E wepụtara nchịkọta uri ọhụrụ ya, ndị ọzọ, na Machị 2023
Uchenna Charity Onwuamaegbu bụ onye Naịjirịa na akuzi nkụzi STEM ma bụkwa onyeisi ndị otu bọọdu na ahụ maka ịtụ pụta alo na Anambra Steeti, ma bụrụkwazie onye isi oche nke EdufunTechnik

Uchenna Charity Onwuamaegbu bụ onye Naịjirịa na akuzi nkụzi STEM ma bụkwa onyeisi ndị otu bọọdu na ahụ maka ịtụ pụta alo na Anambra Steeti, ma bụrụkwazie onye isi oche nke EdufunTechnik bụ natara Global Gold Award Medal na Teknụzụ World Code na Pitch Challenge, maka ụmụaka umunwanyi na Silicon Valley, USA

Ọ bụkwa Mandela Washington Fellow maka ndị ndu ntorobịa Africa a ma ama ma zụọ ụmụ ụmụaka ụmụnwanyị puku ise na narị isii na ịrị na ịse n'ime ime obodo dị n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa na coding, robotics na sayensị, teknụzụ, Injinịa na Mgbakọ na mwepụ, STEM, Mmụta
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na Psychology, na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe nke dị na Naịjirịa
O tinyela aka n' ịhụ na ụmụaka ụmụnwanyị nwere nsogbu ọgụgụ isi nke obodo ya nwetara akwukwo a choro ma nweta mmuta nke ga enyere ha aka iweta mgbanwe n’obodo ha
Ọ bụ onye na-aru ọrụ ebere ebe ọ kwara ụzọ inweta agụmakwụkwọ maka umunwanyị nwere nsogbu ọgụgụ isi

Uchenna Emedolu (amụrụ 17 Septemba 1976, na Adazi-Ani) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu Naijiria lagoro ezumike nka bụ ọkachamara n'ịgba ọsọ dị mkpụmkpụ, ọkachasị 100 mita na mita 200
Na 100 mita ya kacha mma oge bụ 997 Sekọnd, o nwetara na 2003 All-Africa Games ebe ọ gụchara nke abụọ
Nke a mere ya ọkwa itoolu na Naịjirịa, n'azụ Olusoji Fasuba, Divine Oduduru, Seun Ogunkoya, Davidson Ezinwa, Olapade Adeniken, Deji Aliu, Raymond Ekevwo na Francis Obikwelu
Emedolu sonye kwara na 2000, 2004 na 2008 Summer Olympics
N'afọ 2004, ọ nwetara ebe ọkara ikpeazụ na mita 100
Ya na Olusoji Fasuba, Aaron Egbele na Deji Aliu ha nwetara ihe nrite ọla n'ọsọ mgbanaka 4x100
Olimpik oge okpomọkụ nke afọ 2008 na Beijing enwechaghị nke ọma
N'ime ihe omume onye ọ bụla, ọ rụchara naanị n'ọnọdụ anọ na agba nke mbụ na-ekpo ọkụ 1046 sekọnd wee kpochapụ
Na mita 4x100 relay, ya na Onyeabor Ngwogu, Obinna Metu na Chinedu Oriala akwụsịghị asọmpi ahụ na okpomọkụ n'ihi mmejọ
Uchenna 'UC' Iroegbu (amuru 20 Ọgọst 1996) bu onye ama ama maka College Park Skyhawks nke NBA G League
Ọ gbara bọọlụ nkata kọleji maka Stony Brook
Na-eguzo na 183 cm (6 ft 0 na), ọ bụ onye nche ma gbakwara otu egwuregwu boolu nkata nke Naijiria
A mụrụ Iroegbu na Sacramento, California
Ọ gbara egwuregwu oge anọ niile na Capital Christian High School

N'ime afọ agadi ya, ọ nwetara isi 15, enyemaka 4 na izu ohi 2 n'otu egwuregwu, na-akpọ aha ya na ndị otu mpaghara niile na ndị otu egwuregwu ka ndị otu ya gụchara nke atọ na steeti California na ndekọ 28–4 na CIF Sac
Iroegbu gbara egwuregwu afọ abụọ mbụ ya na kọleji nke Southern Idaho na ọkwa obere kọleji
O nwetara isi 41 n'otu egwuregwu dị ka onye ọhụrụ mana ọ na-enwekwu oge egwu dị ka sophomore, ebe ọ na-enweta isi 66 kwa egwuregwu
Ọ gafere na Stony Brook tupu oge 2016 – 17, isonye na otu Seawolves nwere ndekọ 26 – 7 afọ tupu eme asọmpi NCAA mbụ ha
Ọ malitere 10 n'ime egwuregwu 32 n'oge obere ya wee nweta isi 51
Iroegbu nwetara akara iri na asatọ megide Ball State dị ka onye isi, ọrụ ọhụrụ dị elu
Na Jenụwarị 3, 2018, ọ kụrụ ngwụcha atọ iji nye Stony Brook mmeri 71 – 70 meriri Maine mgbe ndị Seawolves chụpụrụ isi isi iri abụọ
Iroegbu dekọtara egwuregwu ọhụrụ dị elu 20 megide UMBC na Febuwari 21, 2018
Ọ gụchara oge agadi ya na-enweta isi 81 kwa egwuregwu mgbe ọ na-amalite 13 nke egwuregwu 32
N'ịgbaso nnwale obodo, Iroegbu malitere ọrụ ya na ndị Stockton Kings na NBA G League
Na 9 Jenụarị 2019, Iroegbu bịanyere aka na CP La Roda na Spanish LEB Plata iji dochie Jabs Newby
Na 1 Maachị 2020, Iroegbu bịanyere aka na Rivers Hoopers na Naijiria maka oge 2020 BAL
Agbanyeghị, akagbuola oge ahụ n'ihi ọrịa COVID-19 na Iroegbu esonyeghị otu ahụ
Iroegbu binyere aka na College Park Skyhawks nke NBA G League tupu oge 2021–22
Ụmụnne Iroegbu abụọ bụ Chuks na Ikenna gbakwara bọọlụ basketball nke Division I
Chuks Iroegbu gbara Northern Illinois egwu na Ike Iroegbu bụ onye nche mmalite maka steeti Washington
Uchenna Grace Kanu (amuru 20 June 1997) bu onye okachamara n'egwuregwu bọọlụ Naijiria nke na-egwu egwu n'ihu maka ọgbakọ La Liga Mexico MX Femenil Tigres UANL na otu egwuregwu mba ụmụ nwanyị Nigeria
Kanu nọchitere Niaijiria na 2014 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup na 2014 FIFA U-20 iko mba ụwa
O mere mpụta izizi ya na Eprel 8 2019 na mmeri 1–2 enyi na Canada
Uchenna Nwosu (amuru Disemba 28, 1996) bu onye ama ama n'èzí linebacker maka Los Angeles Chargers nke National Football League (NFL)
Ọ gbara bọọlụ kọleji na USC, ndị Chajas depụtara ya na agba nke abụọ ya na nhọrọ 48th n'ozuzu nke 2018 NFL Draft
Nwosu gara ma gbaa bọọlụ kọleji na USC n'okpuru ndị nkuzi Steve Sarkisian na Clay Helton
Mgbe ọ gbasịrị egwuregwu iri na abụọ n'oge oge ọhụrụ ya, Nwosu enweghị ike isonye na 2014 Holiday Bowl n'ihi mmebi iwu otu na-akọwaghị ya
E mechara kwuo na Nwosu edebanyeghị aha na simesta nke na-esote udu mmiri
N'agbanyeghị na a na-eche na ọ nwere ike ịpụ n'òtù ahụ, Nwosu nwere ike ịga ọmụmụ ihe n'oge okpomọkụ wee sonye na otu maka oge 2015
Mgbe oge agadi ya na USC, a kpọrọ Nwosu onye na-akwado MVP nke USC tinyere onye na-agba ọsọ Sam Darnold
Ọ nọkwa na ndepụta nlele maka ihe nrite Butkus
Na-esote oge agadi ya, o sonye na 2018 Senior Bowl
Àtụ NFL predraft
Ndị chaja Los Angeles họpụtara Nwosu na agba nke abụọ (48th n'ozuzu) nke 2018 NFL Draft
Nwosu bụ onye azụ azụ nke isii e depụtara na 2018
Ọ na-egwuri egwu n'obodo ya bụ Carson n'ụlọ nwa oge nke Chargers na StubHub Center
Na Mee 13, 2018, ndị Chajas Los Angeles bịanyere aka na Nwosu na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ, nde $ 575 nke gụnyere $301 nde na-ekwe nkwa yana ego mbinye aka nke $226 nde
Nwosu banyere n'ogige ọzụzụ steere dị ka ndabere n'èzí linebacker
Onye isi nchịkwa Anthony Lynn aha ya bụ Nwosu nkwado ndabere na mpaghara strongside linebacker na-amalite oge niile, n'azụ vetiran soja Kyle Emanuel
O mere mpụta izizi ọkachamara ya oge niile na Los Angeles Chargers' mmeghe 38-28 meriri ndị Kansas City Chiefs
Na Septemba 16, 2018, Nwosu dekọtara mgbako atọ jikọtara ọnụ wee mee akpa ọrụ mbụ ya n'oge mmeri 31–20 na ego Buffalo na izu 2
Nwosu mere akpa ọrụ mbụ ya na onye na-azụ Bills Josh Allen maka mfu ya dị atọ na nkeji mbụ
Ka ndị chaja na-eme egwuregwu ahụ, ha chere ihu na Baltimore Ravens na Wild Card gburugburu
Nwosu mere egwuregwu dị egwu na njedebe nke egwuregwu ahụ, na-amanye Ravens quarterback Lamar Jackson ka ọ na-agba ọsọ na ihe gaara abụ ihe nwere ike imeri egwuregwu maka Ravens
Ndị chaja nwetara mgbakasị ahụ ahụ, na-emechi mmeri 23–17 iji gaba n'ọgbọ nke Divisional
Nwosu ji mkpọ iri atọ na otu, akpa abụọ, na ngafe atọ mechie oge afọ 2019
N'afọ 2020, Nwosu gbara n'egwuregwu iri na atọ na mmalite anọ, na-edekọ akpa 45, takul 33, na ngafe abụọ gbachitere
Edebere ya na ebe nchekwa merụrụ ahụ na Disemba 26, 2020
Ọ bụ onye Naijiria

Ufuoma Isioro Onobrakpeya (amụrụ na Febụwarị 21, 1971 na Lagos, Nigeria) bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe, onye na-ebi akwụkwọ na onye nkuzi nka
Ufuoma bụ ọgbọ nke atọ na-ese ihe, onye nna nna ya bụ Obi Omonedo Onobrakpeya bụ onye na-ese ihe
Mgbe ọ na-etolite, ọ bụkwa onye na-amụ nka nye nna ya Bruce Onobrakpeya ruo afọ iri abụọ
Ufuoma Onobrakpeya gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Benin n'afọ 1995, ebe o nwetara nzere nkwanye ùgwù na nka nke eserese, Prọfesọ Irein Wangboje dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi ya mgbe ọ nọ na Benin

N'afọ 2002, ọ nwetara nzere masta na nka nke mmepụta ihe obibi site na Camberwell College of Arts, University of Arts London, England 2002, ebe onye ama ama na-ese ihe na Naijiria bụ Ben Osawe gakwara na afọ ndị 1960

Mgbe ọ na-amụ ma na-emepụta nka na London, Prọfesọ Paul Coldwell si otú a kọwaa ọrụ ya 'Ọrụ ya na-echetara ọrụ nke ndị na-ese Pop nke Britain bụ ndị so n'ihe ngosi Images of swinging London na 1960s' N'afọ 2005 mbipụta ya akpọrọ Health Care Immunization bụ otu n'ime ọrụ nka iri na abụọ ahọpụtara iji chọọ Guinness 2005 Corporate Calendar mma
Ufuoma Onobrakpeya dị ka onye ọrụ ibe ya Mike Omoighe abụwo onye na-esonyekarị na Harmattan Retreat a na-eme kwa afọ nke Bruce Onobrakpeya Foundation haziri, na Agbarha-Otor, Delta Steeti

Ugali, ma ọ bụ sima, bụ ụdị ntụ ọka siri ike nke e mere n'Africa

A makwaara ya dị ka vuswa, bogobe, fufu, gauli, g, isitshwala, kimnyet, ihe na-eme, mieliepap, mora, nshima, obokima, ovuchima, (o)busuma, oshifima, oruhere, pap, phutu, posho, sadza, ubugali, na umutsima, n'etiti aha ndị ọzọ
A na-eji ntụ ọka ndị ọzọ eme Sima mgbe ụfọdụ, dị ka ntụ ọka ọka ma ọ bụ ntụ ọka sorghum, mgbe ụfọdụ a na-agwakọta ya na ntụ ọka cassava
A na-esi ya na mmiri ma ọ bụ mmiri ara ehi na-esi ísì ruo mgbe ọ ruru ntụ ọka siri ike ma ọ bụ siri ike
N'afọ 2017, agbakwunyere nri ahụ na UNESCO Representative List of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity, otu n'ime nri ole na ole na ndepụta ahụ
A na-eri nri a n'ọtụtụ Mba Di iche iche na ebe n'Africa, ebe o nwere aha obodo dị iche iche
Okwu ugali bụ okwu asụsụ Afrịka nke sitere na Swahili, a makwaara ya nke ọma dị ka nsima n'asụsụ Malawian dị ka Chichewa na Chitumbuka
N'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Kenya, nri ahụ na-ejikwa aha 'okporo ámá' nke nguna ma ọ bụ donee
Aha Afrikaans (mielie)pap sitere na Dutch, ebe okwu ahụ pụtara '(corn) porridge'
E webatara Ugali n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ndị America webatara ọka n'Africa
Ndị Luhyas nọ na Kenya bụ ndị mbụ kwụsịrị na ugali, ka ha na-anwa isi nri porridge siri ike site na ntụ ọka
E webatara ọka n'Africa site na Amerịka n'etiti narị afọ nke 16 na nke 17
Tupu nke a, sorghum na millet bụ ọka ọka ọka na ọtụtụ n'ime mpaghara ndịda Sahara Africa
Ndị ọrụ ugbo Afrịka nabatara ọka n'ụzọ dị mfe n'ihi na ịkọ ya yiri nke sorghum ma nwee ihe ọkụkụ dị elu
N'ikpeazụ, ọka wepụrụ sorghum dị ka ọka ọka bụ isi na mpaghara niile ma e wezụga mpaghara ndị kpọrọ nkụ
Mgbanwe zuru oke nke ihe ọkụkụ ndị a na ọka mere na ọkara ikpeazụ nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ
Na Malawi, ha nwere okwu 'chimanga ndi moyo' nke na-asụgharị 'mkpụrụ bụ ndụ'
A ka na-eji ntụ ọka sorghum eme Nshima /nsima mgbe ụfọdụ ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụ ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe ịchọta nke a
Cassava, nke e webatara site na Amerịka, nwekwara ike iji mee nshima / n'nsima, ma ọ bụ naanị ma ọ bụ gwakọta ya na ntụ ọka
Na Malawi, a na-ahụ ihe e ji cassava (chinangwa) mee n'akụkụ ọdọ mmiri, Otú ọ dị, mgbe owuwe ihe ubi ọka dị njọ, a na'ahụ cassava n'akụkụ niile nke mba ahụ
Ugali (mgbe a na-esi ya dị ka porridge, a na-akpọ ya uji) na poteto na-atọ ụtọ, unere tozuru etozu, poteto Irish na ọbụna achịcha
A na-ejikarị akwụkwọ nri ọdịnala, stew ma ọ bụ sukumawiki (nke a makwaara dị ka kale) enye ugali siri ike
Ọ bụ starch a na-ahụkarị na nri mpaghara nke mpaghara Great Lakes nke Africa na Southern Africa
Mgbe a na-eme ugali site na starch ọzọ, a na-enyekarị ya aha mpaghara
Ụzọ ọdịnala nke iri ugali (na nke a na-ahụkarị n'ime ime obodo) bụ iji aka nri tụgharịa ụyọkọ n'ime bọọlụ wee tinye ya na ofe ma ọ bụ nri ma ọ bụ anụ
Iji mkpịsị aka ukwu mee ka ọ daa mbà na-enye ohere iji ugali mee ihe iji kpoo, ma fụchie anụ iji buru ha n'otu ụzọ ahụ a na-eji achịcha dị larịị na ọdịbendị ndị ọzọ
A pụkwara iri ugali fọdụrụnụ na tii n'ụtụtụ echi ya
Ugali dị ọnụ ala ma si otú a dị mfe maka ndị ogbenye, ndị na-ejikọkarị ya na anụ ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ nri (dịka, sukuma wiki na Kenya) iji mee nri
Ugali dị mfe ime, ntụ ọka ahụ nwere ike ịdịru ogologo oge n'ọnọdụ dị mma
Sagtulga (Hausa tuo zaafi), ma ọ bụ diehuo, bụ nri a ma ama maka ndị Ghana
Sagtulga bụ nri bụ isi a na-eri na ofe dị ka okro soup
Ọ bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na mpaghara atọ dị n'ebe ugwu nke mba ahụ Northern Region, Upper East Region, na Upper West Region
A na-erikarị nri ahụ maka nri abalị, ma ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ (dịka ọmụmaatụ, ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị ọrụ aka) na-amasị ha iri ya maka nri ụtụtụ ma ọ bụ nri ehihie
A na-erikarị ya na akwụkwọ Corchorus olitorius (Dagbani salinvogu, Hausa ayoyo, molokai) na okro (Abelmoschus esculentus) [ihe odide gburugburu] na stew n'akụkụ
Nri a na-agụnye ntụ ọka e siri esi na obere ntụ ọka cassava kpọrọ nkụ na mmiri na-enweghị nnu
Dị ka omenala si dị, a na-eji ntụ ọka ọka nke sitere n'ebe ugwu Ghana
A na-eri ya na ofe akwụkwọ nri na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ nke e ji akwụkwọ ilu mee, ma ọ bụ mgbe ụfọdụ akwụkwọ cassava a na-egbutu ọhụrụ
Otú ọ dị, enwere ike ijikọta ya na ofe dịgasị iche iche gụnyere okra na ofe groundnut

N'omenala Luhya, ọ bụ starch a na-ahụkarị, mana ọ bụkwa akụkụ dị mkpa nke omenala agbamakwụkwọ Luhya; obusuma e ji millet (nke a maara dị ka obusuma bwo bule) mee ka a na-etinye ya n'etiti nri dị ụtọ na tebụl dị elu nke nwanyị ahụ a na-alụ ọhụrụ
A pụkwara ịkwadebe Obusuma site na starch ndị ọzọ dị ka sorghum ma ọ bụ cassava (obusuma bwo 'muoko)
Obusuma na-ejikarị tsimboka, ma ọ bụ n'oge, eliani (akwụkwọ nri), inyama (anụ), inyeni (azụ̀), thimena (whitebait) ma ọ bụ omrere (akwụkwọ jute)
Maka ndị ọbịa ma ọ bụ ndị ọbịa pụrụ iche, a na-ejikarị ingokho (anụ ọkụkọ) enye ya
A na-akwadebe Ugali site na ọka na-acha ọcha yiri otú a na-esi eme tamales site na ọka odo na Central America
N'ọtụtụ ụlọ, ugali na-eme ihe ka ukwuu n'ihe oriri, na akwụkwọ nri ma ọ bụ anụ dị ka ihe na-esote
N'ụlọ ndị bara ọgaranya, ma ọ bụ maka oge pụrụ iche, a na-enye ugali na ọtụtụ akwụkwọ nri na anụ na-atọ ụtọ na ofe na-esi ísì ụtọ
Ọ dị ka poteto mashed a na-enye n'ụlọ ndị America
Na Kenya, a na-ejide smidgen nke ugali buru ibu n'aka ma na-agbadata mkpịsị aka ukwu n'etiti iji mepụta spoon maka ịpị ụdị ọlaọcha a na-eri eri
Ọ bụ ezie na mkpịsị aka ukwu na mkpịakọta nwere ike ịghọtụ aghụghọ na usoro a, ụzọ iri nri dị mkpa na ọdịbendị na mpaghara ahụ
Nsima bụ nri e ji ntụ ọka (ọka ọka na-acha ọcha) na mmiri mee ma bụrụkwa nri a ma ama na Zambia (nshima / Nsim / Ubuli) na Malawi (Nsim)
A na-ebu ụzọ esi ntụ ọka ahụ na mmiri n'ime ntụ ọka
ma, na Zambia, hapụ ya ka ọ sie maka nkeji ole na ole tupu 'agbakọta ya,' iji mepụta ihe siri ike na mgbakwunye nke ntụ ọka
Usoro a chọrọ ka onye na-eme ya dọrọ ihe siri ike n'akụkụ ite na spoon osisi dị larịị (nthiko na Malawi, m'tiko / umwiko na Zambia) ngwa ngwa ka ọ na-aga n'ihu ịnọdụ ala n'elu okpomọkụ
Ozugbo esichara ya, a na-eji spoon osisi / plastik etinye na mmiri ma ọ bụ kpuchie ya na mmanụ a na-akpọ chipande(Malawi), na chipampa(Zambia
Na Malawi, a na-akpọ akụkụ ọ bụla nke a ntanda
A na-eri mgbe niile na efere ndị dị n'akụkụ, nke a maara dị ka 'relish'

Ndị a nwere ike ịbụ mushrooms dị ka kabansa, tente, chitondo, na ichikolowa; isi mmalite protein dị ka egwuregwu, anụ ehi, ọkụkọ, azụ, groundnuts (peanuts), chikanda (orchid na nri ahụekere), agwa; na akwụkwọ nri dị ka akwụkwọ pumpkin, akwụkwọ bean, àkwá ubi ọcha a maara dị ka impwa na Zambia (ndị a bụ obere oblong formed white solum fruit), akwụkwọ amaranth, akwụkwọ mustard, cabbage, wdg
Na Zambia, a na-akpọ akụkụ ndị ahụ na Nyanja /chewa na N'asụsụ Bemba
Ndiwo na Malawi na-ezo aka na efere protein na akụkụ akwụkwọ nri a maara dị ka masamba
A na-esikarị efere protein, ma ọ bụ n'ụdị stew
Na Malawi na Zambia, a na-eri mgbe na azụ a mịrị amị (utaka, Malawi) ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ nri a mịrị
A na-ejikarị nri nshima eme ose ọkụ ma ọ bụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ dị ka ofe ose ọkụ a na-eme n'ụlọ site na peri-peri ma ọ bụ Kambuzi chili peppers ma ọ bụ ofe chili dị ka Nali Sauce
Dị ka omenala si dị, ndị na-eri nri na-anọdụ ala gburugburu tebụl ma ọ bụ n'ala gbara nri gburugburu
Ndị na-eri nri ga-asa aka ha ka a na-eri nshima /nsima na aka nkịtị
A na-eji efere mmiri eme nke a
N'aka nke ọzọ, onye ọbịa ma ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eto eto na-eweta mmiri site na ite n'aka ndị okenye ma ọ bụ ndị ọbịa n'ime efere
A na-eri nri site na iwere obere ụyọkọ n'aka nri gị, tụgharịa ya n'ime bọọlụ ma tinye ya n'ihe oriri
Iji mkpịsị aka ukwu aka nri na-etinye bọọlụ nshima bụ usoro nke ndị na-eri nri nshima dị elu na-eji iji nweta ihe ụtọ ma ọ bụ ofe nke nri ahụ n'ụzọ dị mfe
Na Zambia, umuto (asụsụ Bemba) na-ezo aka na mmiri / broth / sauce nke efere ma ọ bụ stew; na omume nke iji bọọlụ nshima na-aṅụ ọtụtụ ya na-akpọ inkondwa
Nkwupụta ahụ, 'umuto wankondwa' na-asụgharị 'sauce iji kwe ka inkondwa'
Dị ka ọtụtụ ọdịnala Afrịka, afọ dị ezigbo mkpa
Ịsa ahụ tupu nri, iri nri, na ịsa ahụ mgbe nri gasịrị na-amalite site na onye kacha okenye, onye ọ bụla ọzọ na-eso ya site na afọ
Nshima / Nshima dị ọnụ ala ma dị ọnụ ala maka ọtụtụ ndị bi na ya, ọ bụ ezie na mgbe ụfọdụ ọnụahịa arịgoola n'ihi ụkọ, na-enye aka na ọgba aghara akụ na ụba na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Na Na Naijiria, akamu, ogi ma ọ bụ Koko nwere nkwekọrịta yiri nke pudding America
Ogi / Akamu na Naịjirịa na-ejikarị 'moin moin', pudding bean, ma ọ bụ 'akara', nke bụ achịcha bean
E nwekwara ụdị dị iche iche, nke a na-akpọ Eko n'etiti ndị Yoruba, Agidi n'etiti Ndị Igbos
A na-esi pudding ahụ na okpomọkụ ruo mgbe ọ ga-esi sie
A na-ekpuchi ya na akwụkwọ osisi na aha botanical Thaumatococcus daniellii
Ndị Yoruba na-akpọ ya Ewe Eran ebe ndị Igbos na-akpọ ọ Akwukwo Elele
A na-ejikarị ya na ụdị akwụkwọ nri dị iche iche, ofe na ofe maka nri dị mfe ma ọ bụ enwere ike iri ya na agwa ma ọ bụ ngwaahịa ya

Pap /ˈpʌp/, nke a makwaara dị ka mieliepap (Afrikaans maka nri ọka) na Mba South Africa, bụ nri ọdịnala / polenta na nri ndị Afrịka nke Southern Africa (a na-ewere okwu Afrikaans pap site na Dutch ma ọ pụtara naanị 'achị ọka') nke e ji ọka mee (ọka ọka a na-agbari agbari agbari)

Ọtụtụ nri ọdịnala nke ndịda Afrịka gụnyere pap, dị ka ntụ ọka ọka ọka na-atọ ụtọ (nke a na-akpọkwa slap pap ma ọ bụ ntụ ọka dị nro), pap nwere nnukwu ihe a na-ejide n'aka (stywe pap ma ọ dị ike) na phuthu pap (Afrikaans )
A na-ahụkarị nri Phuthu n'akụkụ osimiri nke South Africa
Enwere ike iji ụdị dị iche iche na-atọ ụtọ na-eso papa, nke e ji akwụkwọ nri na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ mee, ma jiri chili mee ya
South Afrikaans ndi no na odida anyanwu nke mba South Afrika na eri ya Di ka nri ututu ha na eji milk, butter, na sugar, eri ya ha na eji kwa Anu efi eri ya
Na obodo Cape Province nke Di na Mba South Africa, a na-ahụ ya dịka nri ụtụtụ
Ebe ọ bụ na mielie-meal dị ọnụ ala, ndị ogbenye na-ejikọta ya na akwụkwọ nri
Enwere ike inye ya ọkụ ma ọ bụ, mgbe ọ jụrụ oyi, enwere ike isi ya
A na-eri nri Phutu mgbe ụfọdụ na chakalaka dị ka nri dị n'akụkụ na braais
N'ógbè ndị dị n'ebe ugwu, pap na-adịkarị nro ma mee ya site na iji ọka ọka na-agba ụka nke na-egbochi pap imebi ngwa ngwa n'ihi eziokwu ahụ bụ na mpaghara ndị dị n'ebe ugwu na-ekpo ọkụ karịa ndịda

Uphuthu bụ usoro nri South Africa nke isi nri nri nke na-eme ka ngwaahịa ikpeazụ bụ nri dị ka ọka siri ike nke a na-enwekarị ya na akwụkwọ nri na anụ na mpaghara Kwa Zulu Natal na Eastern Cape nke South Africa ma ọ bụ dị ka kpakpando nke nri na amasi ma ọ bụ maas na mpaghara Gauteng
Ọdịbendị ụfọdụ na-agbakwunye shuga na uphuthu na amasi iji nụ ụtọ ya dị ka ihe na-atọ ụtọ nke ga-eyi ọka, agbanyeghị na a na-anụkarị ọka dị ka ọ dị na amasi
Phuthu ma ọ bụ Uphuthu (/ˈpʊtuː/), nke a na-asụkwa n'ụzọ na-ezighi ezi dị ka putu ma ọ bụ phutu, bụ usoro nhazi ọdịnala nke nri ọka na nri South Africa
Ọ bụ ụdị pap ma ọ bụ porridge, nke ọtụtụ ndị otu ọdịbendị na South Africa na-eri
A na-eri phuthu na anụ, agwa, ofe na mmiri ara ehi na-esi ísì ụtọ
Ọdịdị na ịdị n'otu nke uphuthu na-abụkarị ihe na-ekpebi ihe oriri ga-eso ya
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, a na-ejikarị phuthu dị mma akwadebe amasi ma ọ bụ mass, ebe a na-enyekarị stew na curries na ụdị dị iche iche, na-adabere na pap siri ike
Phuthu nwere ọdịdị dị mma nwere ọchịchọ nke ịbụ onye mmiri na-adịghị n'ahụ nke ukwuu (akọrọ), dabere na nkà onye na-esi nri na-arụ ọrụ na nri ahụ
A na-ejikarị stews, akwụkwọ nri, na ọtụtụ efere ndị ọzọ na-atọ ụtọ nwere mmiri na-atọ ọchị na-enye phuthu dị otú ahụ
N'aka nke ọzọ, ụdị phuthu a na-enweghị mmiri ga-adaba na efere amasi ma ọ bụ mass, n'ihi na usoro ịsa ahụ ma ọ bụ ịsa ahụ ga-eme ka efere dị ka paste, ebe amasi na-ahọrọ ka ọ bụrụ ata
Isitshwala na isiNdebele ma ọ bụ sadza na Shona, bụ nri ọka e siri esi nke bụ nri bụ isi na Zimbabwe
A na-eji ọka / ọka ọka kpọrọ nkụ (nri nri) eme Isitshwala
A na-akpọ nri ọka a impuphu na Ndebele ma ọ bụ hupfu na Shona
N'agbanyeghị eziokwu ahụ bụ na ọka bụ ihe oriri a na-ebubata na Zimbabwe (ihe dị ka 1890), ọ ghọwo isi iyi nke carbohydrate na nri kachasị ewu ewu maka ndị obodo
Ndị obodo ahụ ma ọ bụ zụta nri nri n'ụlọ ahịa ma ọ bụ mepụta ya n'ihe igwe ihe site na ọka nke ha
Ndị Zimbabwe na-ahọrọ nri ọka ọcha
Otú ọ dị, n'oge ụnwụ nri ma ọ bụ ihe isi ike, ha malitere iri nri ọka na-acha odo odo, nke a na-akpọ 'Kenya' mgbe ụfọdụ, n'ihi na e si na mba ahụ bubata ya
Tupu iwebata ọka, a na-eji inyawuthi mkpịsị aka eme isitshwala
A na-ejikarị Isitshwala eme ihe na efere nke ọ bụla, mana omenala na-eri isitshwala site na efere obodo, omenala nke ụfọdụ ezinụlọ ka na-elekọta karịsịa n'ime ime obodo

A na-ejikarị aka nri eri ya n'enweghị enyemaka nke ite; a na-atụgharịkarị ya n'ime bọl tupu etinye ya n'ọtụtụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ dị ka sauce / gravy, mmiri ara ehi na-esi ísì ụtọ, ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ nri a siri esi
Nri ndị a ma ama a na-eri na isitshwala gụnyere
A maara anụ dị ka inyama na isiNdebele
Nri ndị yiri ya bụ polenta, sitere n'ebe ugwu Ịtali, gh'omi si Georgia na grits na ndịda United States
Fufu, nri sitere na starch sitere na West na Central Africa, nwekwara ike iji nri ọka mee ya, n'ọnọdụ ahụ enwere ike ịkpọ ya ọka fufu

Shilling (Swahili shilingi; mkpirisi USh; koodu ISO UGX) bụ ego nke ndi Uganda
E kewara ya na cents ruo n'afọ puku abuo na iri na ato , n'ihi nnukwu ịrị elu nke ọnụ ahịa shilling ugbu a enweghị nkewa
A na-ede ọnụahịa na shilling Ugandan n'ụdị x / y, ebe x bụ ego dị na shilling, ebe y bụ ego dịka cents
Ihe ịrịba ama hà nhata maọbụ akara na-anọchite anya ọnụ ọgụgụ efu
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, a na-ede cents dịka '-/50' na 100 shilling dịka '100/=' maọbụ '100/-'
Mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-ebu ụzọ tinye mkpirisi USh maka ọdịiche
Ọ bụrụ na edere ego ahụ site na iji okwu na nọmba, a na-eji naanị prefix (dịka
USh nde iri)
A na-eṅomi usoro a na akara nke sterling, nke a na-ede ego na ngwakọta ụfọdụ nke pound (£), shillings (s), na pence (d, maka denarius)
N'ime akara ahụ, a na-ede ego dị n'okpuru otu pound naanị na shilling na ego pence
Shilling mbụ nke Uganda (UGS) nọchiri shilling nke East Africa na afo otu puku nari itoolu Na iri isii na isii na par
N'ịgbaso ịrị elu dị elu, e webatara shilling ọhụrụ (UGX) na afo otu puku nari iteghete iri asato na asaa nke ruru shilling otu nari ochie
Ugba, bu nri ndị igbo nke ana-akpokwa Ukpaka
ọ bụ nri ama n'etiti ndị Igbo na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naijiria
Ugba bụ mgwa ihe a na-eji esi nri na ịkwadebe ụfọdụ nri ọdịnala
N'ala Igbo, a na-eji ugba eme Abacha (nke a na-akpọ African salad), gwakọta ya na azụ̀ esiri esi, ka e kwuo ole na ole
Ugba bara ezigbo uru na-edozi ndị na-eri ya ahụUgba bụ ezigbo isi iyi nke protein, ọ bụkwa ezigbo isi iyi ike, amino acid, phosphorus, magnesium, iron, vitamin, calcium, manganese na ọla kọpa
Ọ bara ụba na phytochemical dị ka; Tannins, alkaloids, flavonoids, sterols, glycosidase na saponins
Ugbad Abdi bụ onye America na-eme ejiji nlereanya

A mụrụ ya na Somalia ma zụlite ya n'ogige ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ Kenya na Des Moines, Iowa, ọ malitere dị ka onye na-emepụta ejiji Valentino haute, wee mepee ihe ngosi maka Marc Jacobs na Michael Kors na izu Ejiji nke New York
Ọ bụ onye nlereanya ejiji mbụ mere ngosi ejiji nlereanya nyena Fendi na Lanvin mgbe o yi hijab
A mụrụ Abdi na Kismayo, Somalia
Ezinụlọ ya gbapụrụ n'ihi agha obodo Somalia, na mbụ gaa n'ogige ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ]] na Kenya, mgbe ahụ na 2009, mgbe Abdi dị afọ itoolu, ha agaa Des Moines, Iowa site n'enyemaka UNICEF
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Des Moines, e nyopụtara Abdi na Instagram
Ọ gara New York na nke mbụ ya iji zute ndị nnọchi anya ụlọ ọrụ, wee bịanye aka nye Next Management
Abdi mere ihe ngosi izizi ya n'afọ 2018/2019 Valentino haute couture show
O meghere ihe ngosi New York Fashion Week maka Marc Jacobs na Michael Kors
Abdi agagharịwokwa na ihe ngosi maka Chanel, Miu Miu, Simone Rocha, Burberry, Fendi, Lanvin, Max Mara, na Dries van Noten
N'ọnwa Eprel nke afọ 2019, ọ pụtara na mbipụta British, American, na Arabic nke Vogue n'otu oge
A na-akpọ Abdi 'otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe ngosi nke ọdịda 2019'
N'afọ 2022, ọ pụtara n'ihu Vogue France na onye Danish model Mona Tougaard
Abdi bụ onye okpukpe Alakụba, ọ malitekwara iyi hijab mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ
Ọ na-eyi ihe mkpuchi isi mgbe ọ na-eme ihe ngosi, na 2019 ọ ghọrọ ihe nlereanya mbụ nke Fendi na Lanvin na-eyi hijab
O nwere ụmụnne ise, abụọ n'ime ha amụrụ mgbe ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara United States

Ejikọtara ụgbọ elu ahụ na Khalifa Airways na 2001, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwụsịrị ịdị na 2003
Ugbo mmanu Benso bụ ụlọ ọrụ nkwụ mmanụ Ghana na ụlọ ọrụ, dabere na Adum Banso Estate na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ Ghana
Edepụtara ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na Ghana Stock Exchange, akara ya bu (BOPP)
E hiwere ya na 1978 wee depụta ya na Ghana Stock Exchange GSE na 2004 ma na-etinye aka na mmepụta na nhazi nke nkwu mmanụ CPO maka nchacha na ọtụtụ ojiji ụlọ ọrụ
Benso Oil Palm Plantation Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ dabere na Ghana na-azụmaahịa nkwụ na-eto eto
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ihe karịrị hectare 5,000 nke nkwụ mmanụ na Ghana
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ enyemaka nke ndi Wilmar International Limited
Àtụ Economy of Ghana

N'ịbụ nke dị na Morrison na Southeast Third, ọ bụ Brett Schulz Architects haziri ụlọ ahụ; Guerrilla Mmepe na Pro-Teck Ihe owuwu rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye mmepe na onye ọrụ ngo, n'otu n'otu
A na-etinye ihe karịrị osisi strawberry 50 n'èzí ụlọ ahụ
A kọrọ na ọrụ ahụ furu $ 127 nde

Brotopia Breaking Up the Boys' Club of Silicon Valley bụ akwụkwọ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo nke Emily Chang dere na puku abuo na iri na asato Ọ bụ akwụkwọ izizi ya ma bipụta ya na Febụwarị 6, puku abuo na iri na asato , site na Portfolio, nkewa nke Penguin Random House
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-enyocha ma na-enyo enyocha ịkpa ókè nwoke na nwanyị na enweghị nhata nwoke na nwanyị n'ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ nke Silicon Valley
Ọ bụ akwụkwọ kacha ere ahịa na mba ahụ ozugbo ma nweta nlebara anya mgbasa ozi dị ukwuu na otuto dị egwu
Chang si n'ihe karịrị narị ajụjụ ọnụ abụọ ọ gbara n'ofe ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ
Ụfọdụ n'ime ajụjụ ọnụ ndị ahụ sitere n'ọrụ ya na Bloomberg, mana ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ndị mbụ ma mee maka ebumnuche nke akwụkwọ ahụ
Vanity Fair wepụtara ihe si n'akwụkwọ ahụ na mbipụta Jenụwarị puku abuo na iri na asato nke akpọrọ Oh My God, This Is So F---ed Up' Inside Silicon Valley es Secretive, Orgiastic Dark Side'
Bloomberg Businessweek wepụtara ihe na Febụwarị 2018 nke akpọrọ 'Women Once Ruled the Computer World
Olee mgbe Silicon Valley ghọrọ Brotopia?'
E bipụtara Brotopia na Febụwarị 6, puku abuo na iri na asato site na Portfolio, nkewa nke Penguin Random House
Chang pụtara na Morning Joe, Good Morning America, CBS This Morning na Marketplace iji kwurịta akwụkwọ ahụ
PBS Newshour-New York Times 'Now Read This' akwụkwọ klọb họọrọ Brotopia dị ka akwụkwọ klọbu ha na-agụ n'April 2019
Chang pụtara na PBS Newshour na Eprel 30, 2019, wee zaa ajụjụ sitere n'aka ndị na-ekiri banyere akwụkwọ ahụ

Kirkus Reviews kpọrọ akwụkwọ ahụ 'nnyocha zuru oke, nke dị mkpa' nke Silicon Valley, na-ede, 'Nnyocha nke Chang na-emeghe ọnụ ụzọ sara mbara, na-enye ohere echiche ọhụrụ banyere ụlọ ọrụ rụrụ arụ ka ọ gbasaa ma kpalie mkparịta ụka'

E depụtara akwụkwọ ahụ maka Financial Times Business Book of the Year 2018 na 2018 800-CEO-Read Business Books Awards, a kpọkwara ya otu n'ime Amazon's Best Books of the Year So Far, Tech Crunch's Best Tech Books of 2018, na Financial Times Best Books of 2018
Ugezu Jideofor Ugezu ọkachamara a maara dị ka Ugezu j
Ugezu bụ onye nduzi Naijiria, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na'ede ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe
Ugezu bụkwa onye na-ede egwu na onye na-agụ egwu Highlife
A mụrụ Ugezu na Enugwu Ukwu, Anambra steeti, Naịjirịa na abalị iri na iteolu, n'ime onwa iri n'afo otu puku, nari iteolu na iri asaa (19/10/1970)

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị ya, ọ gara Community Secondary School, Umueze Anam site na afo otu puku, nari iteolu na iri asatọ na abuo ruo na afo otu puku, nari iteolu na iri abuo na ise (1982-1985) wee gaa Fr

Joseph High School, Aguleri site na afo otu puku, nari iteolu na iri asatọ na isii ruo na afo otu puku, nari iteolu na iri asatọ na asatọ (1986-1988) ebe ọ gụsịrị agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya wee nweta asambodo ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọrịtandrị ya
Ugezu J
Ugezu nwetara nnabata na Enugu State University of Science and Technology nke a maara nke ọma dị ka ESUT
N'ụlọ ọrụ a ka o nwetara nzere bachelọ na Pulic Administration
Ugezu J
Ugezu anọwo na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ụlọ ọrụ Nollywood kemgbe afọ puku abụọ (2000) ma mee ihe nkiri ihe karịrị otu nari (100)
Ugezu na-ede, na-eme ihe nkiri ma ọ bụ na-eduzi ihe nkiri ndị lekwasịrị anya n'ịkwalite ọdịbendị na ọdịnala Igbo
Ughelli North bụ ọchịchị ime obodo nke Delta State, Nigeria
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya dị n'obodo Ughelli
Ọ nwere mpaghara 818 km2 na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ 321,028 na ngụkọ 2006
Transcorp Power Limited's Ughelli Power Plant bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-eji gas were na-emepụta ọkụ eletriki nke dị na Ughelli, Steeti Delta na mpaghara Niger Delta nke Nigeria
Ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ kachasị nụ na-eji mmanụ ala were na-emepụta ike n'ime obodo Nigeria
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ nke nwere mwunye ikike dị 972 MW; ma nwekwaa ike ịmepụta 2500 GWh nke ọkụ eletrik kwa afọ
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-ezute nkọwa zuru ụwa ọnụ ugbu a maka ụdị ụlọ ọrụ ọ bụ, ma gụnyekwa ụlọ nchịkwa emelitere, ime ụlọ switchgear, ụlọ akwụkwọ ọzụzụ ndị ọrụ na ebe ntụrụndụ
A na-ebugharị ọtụtụ n'ime ọkụ eletrik nke Ughelli mepụtara site na netwọk nke ndị nduzi, gaa na ọdọ izugbe nke ala Nigeria
Mmelite nke ụlọ ọrụ ike dị ugbu a na mgbakwunye nke ọrụ 400 MW ọhụrụ nwere ike ịkpata mmụba 4x na ego ruru ijeri NGN100 site na 2020
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ akụ nke Transnational Corporation of Nigeria Plc (Transcorp) na-ahụ maka ike, Transcorp Ughelli Power Limited (TranscorP Power)
E wuru ọdụ ahụ na 1964 na ikike arụnyere nke 2X36MW ma ọ bụ 72MW site na turbines gas Stal-Laval abụọ wee malite ọrụ na 1966

Mgbe ahụ, a kpọrọ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ Delta I n'okpuru ụlọ ọrụ ọkụ eletrik nke Nigeria (ECN), nke bu ụzọ na Nigerian Electric Power Authority (NEPA) na onye nọchiri ya, Power Holding Company of Nigeria (PHCN)

N'afọ 1975, a rụnyere nkeji isii nke General Electric (GE) Frame 5 gas turbines (20MW nke ọ bụla) na ọdụ ahụ a maara dị ka Delta II, mgbe njikọta nke Niger Dam Authority (NDA), Kainji na ECN iji guzobe National Electric Power Authority (NEPA)
N'afọ 1978, agbakwunyere nkeji isii ọzọ nke GE Frame 5 gas turbines, dị ka ndị arụnyere na 1975, na Delta Power Station (A maara dị ka Delta III) iji bulie ikike arụnyere ruo ngụkọta nke 312MW
N'afọ 1991, a gbakwunyere turbines gas 100MW (600MW) isii nke GE Frame 9
Site na 2000 ruo 2008, nkeji Delta II na Delta III GE ka emelitere ka nke ọbụla n'ime ha bụrụ 150MW nke Hitachi nke Japan wuru
E buliri usoro nchịkwa ahụ ka ọ bụrụ Mark V, usoro nchịkwa kọmputa zuru oke maka Delta II na III
Mgbe a tụfuru Delta I
A kwalite usoro nchịkwa Delta IV ka ọ bụrụ Mark V site na GE nke USA bụ ndị nke wuru ọdụ ahụ

Na Septemba 25, 2012, Transcorp Ughelli Power Limited (TUPL) (nke gụnyere Wood Rock Energy Resources Limited, Symbion Power LLC, Thomassen Holding Limited, Medea Development SA, Tenoil Petroleum and Energy Services Limited na PSL Engineering and Control Limited) ritere ntinye akwụkwọ $300m maka ịzụta Ughelli Electric Plant, otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ isii na-emepụta ike nke Power Holding Company of Nigeria (PHCN) nke gọọmentị etiti nke Nigeria na-eme ka ọ bụrụ nkeonwe
Symbion Power banyere n'azụmahịa ndị ọzọ na Septemba 2015

N'abalị mbụ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2013, Transcorp Power weghaara Ughelli Power Plc, onye nwe ma bụrụkwa onye na-arụ ọrụ na Ughelli Electric Plant na-esote emume nnyefe nke gọọmentị etiti nke Naịjirịa kwadoro

Ugochukwu Chiedozie Monye (amụrụ n'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1983) bụ onye England na-ahụ maka egwuregwu na onye bụbu onye egwuregwu rugby, Monye gbara bọọlụ ugboro iri na anọ maka England, ugboro narị iri anọ na otu maka naanị klọb ya bụ a kpọrọ Harlequins ma gbaa bọọlụ ugboro abụọ maka British & Irish Lions na njem ha n'afọ 2009 na South Africa
Monye meriri ma nkewa nke abụọ na aha na ihe a kpọrọ Premiership na Harlequins, o mmeri kwara na ihe a kpọrọ European Rugby Challenge Cup
Dị ka onye dị afọ iri na asatọ, Monye sonyere na asọmpi egwuregwu nke ụlọ akwụkwọ England na mita otu nari, ma mecha dịka onye nke ise na okpomọkụ ya, n'ime oge nke nkeji iri na otu sekọnd iri
Ya na ndị Olympians, Mark Lewis-Francis na Tyrone Edgar, bụ ndị sonyekwara na asọmpi English Schools' Championship bụ enyi
Monye gbaara ndị Hampshire RFC bọọlụ ha maka ndị na-erughị afọ iri na asaa na ndị na-erughị afọ iri abụọ
Harlequins nyere ya nkwekọrịta ọkachamara
ma n'iiri na abụọ ọnwa 12 ọ bụ ondị a kpọrọ nye otu England RFU Sevens nkendị a kpọrọ meriri Hong Kong Sevens

Monye dịomkpa n'nye a kpọrọ ndị otu Sevens n'oge 2002-03 na n'ihe a kpọrọ 2003-04 IRB World Sevens Series, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime sonyere ndị otu na-kesa kpọrọ ọmpi na 2005 Rugby World Cup Sevens na Hong Kong
Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị England RFU Saxons meriri Churchi'lfọl Cup na 2005 na 2008

O bu ụzọ gbaa bọọlụ maka Harlequins na egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Glasgow Warriors RFC n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2002, malite oge na-esote site na ịnwale ise na egwuregwu abụọ, gụnyere otu hat trick megide Rotherham Titans na Millmoor

Monye nyere goolu ise megide ndị a kpọrọ Exeter Chiefs na mmeri 70-5 nke Harlequins na Twickenham Stoop ka akụkụ ahụ laghachiri na ihe a kpọrọ Guinness Premiership mgbe oge na nke mba ahụ gasịrị nke Monye gbara mgbalị iri na isii
Tupu oge 2009-10, ọ gbara ọsọ na iri anọ na asaa na egwuregwu otu narị na ise maka klọb ahụ
Monye nyeere ndị England goolu nke mbụ mbụ ya mgbe ha gbara megide Scotland na Twickenham na Mba Isii n'ụbọchị nke iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Maachị n'afọ 2009

Monye nyeere England goolu mbụ ya na mmeri 39-13 nke England meriri ndị Pacific Islanders na Twickenham n'afọ 2008 wee malite ndị ọzọ na-eme egwuregwu mba ụwa n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ megide Australia, South Africa na New Zealand
Mgbe a họpụtara ya maka njem ndị Lions jere na South Africa n'afọ 2009 Monye nwetara ihe a kpọrọ XV nke mbụ ya na Durban
N'ime ọkara mbụ, e gbochiri ya ịnye goolu ka ọ na-abanye n'elu akara nnwale mgbe Jean de Villiers tinyere aka ya n'okpuru bọọlụ iji gbochie mgbali ya
Na ọkara nke abụọ, Monye gafere iji gbaa bọọlụ mana Morne Steyn jidere ya ma mee ya ka Ọ ghara ịchịkwa bọọlụ ya
Lions tụfuru ule ahụ nke mere ka Monye tụfuo ọnọdụ ya, Luke Fitzgerald nọchiri ya
Lions tụfuru ule nke abụọ ma kpo ha chi Monye, onye gbapụtara onwe ya site na mgbalị mịta iri asaa nke e jidere n'agbanyeghị na Lions tụfuru usoro 2-1
Ọ bụ onye kachasị elu Lions na-agba mbọ ịgba goolu na njem ahụ na mgbalị ise
N'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2010, Ugo tara ahụhụ mmerụ ahụ na-eyi ọrụ egwu ma mgbe a wasịrị ya ahụ, a hapụrụ ya izu iri na abụọ
Nke a wepụrụ ya pụa na ndị otu a kpọrọ Martin Johnson's England Squad maka Usoro ule mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke Autum ma wepụ kwa ya na asọmpi mba isii nke afọ 2011
Ọ laghachiri I gwụrụ Harlequins egwu bụ ndị o nyeere aka imeri ihe
kpọrọ a
imeri Amlin Challenge Cup, tupu a kpọọ aha ya na ndị otu ọzụihe a kpọrọ zụ England maka 2011 Rugby World Cup na ngwụcha oge ahụ
Monye malitere rubara Harlequins ọrụ na mmeri ikpeazụ ha meriri ndị a kpọrọ Leicester Tigers n'oge 2011-12
N' ubochi nke iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Machị n'afọ 2015, Monye kwupụtara na ọ na-ala ezumike nká na ngwụcha oge ahụ
N'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2021, a họpụtara Monye ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke otu ndụmọdụ nọọrọ onwe ya nke Rugby Football Union na-ahụ maka ọdịiche

N'ọnwa June n'afọ 2022, n'oge a na-agba ya ajụjụ ọnụ na The Telegraph, Monye kwuru na ọ dị mkpa ka ndị otu akpọrọ Rugby Union na-alụso 'ịṅụbiga mmanya ókè' na omenala a kpọrọ 'laddish' ọgụ iji bụrụ ndị zuru oke

N'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2017, a mara ọkwa na ọkarandị a kpọrọ Danny Care nke England ga-akwado pọdkastị ahụ mgbe ọ bụla Jones na-anọghị
Ọ na-egosikwa ugbu a na BT Sport, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchi anya onye a kpọrọ Maximuscle
bido n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2021 Monye bụ onye asọmpi maka usoro nke iri na itoolu nke ihe akpọrọ Strictly Come Dancing, e jikọtara ya na ọkachamara ịgba egwu Oti Mabuse

Ugo Njoku gbara na Rivers Angels na Nigerian Women's Championship site na 2013 ruo 2017, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ gara Croix Savoie Ambilly

Ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị mmeri na 2014 African Women's Championship
