Vengo (Vəŋo), ma ọ bụ Babungo, bụ asụsụ Grassfields na asụsụ ndị Vengo si n'ime obodo Babungo dị na ubi ahịhịa nke Cameroon A na-ahụkwa mkpoputa Bamungo
Venita Akpofure (amuru Janụwari 1, 1987 bu onye omee ihe nkiri Britain-Nigeria na vidiyo vixen
Ọ bụrụ onye a ma ama mgbe ya na ndị ọzọ bị na ụlọ n'ime oge nke anọ na Big Brother Naija Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ndu dị ka Nengi na Africa Magic's Unmarried
Amuru Akpofure na United Kingdom ma sikwa na Delta steeti di na Naijiria
O tolitere na Benin, Edo State ebe ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị nke Our Lady of Apostles tupu ọ laghachi England
Ọ gụrụ Accounting na Mahadum Kingston Hertfordshire dị na United Kingdom
Akpofure rụrụ ọrụ di ka Mimi na AY Makun’s Ay's Crib ma pụtakwa na 2Face Idibia Ihe Ne Me na Mukulu site na Skales dị ka vidiyo vixen
Tupu ọ rụọ ọrụ na Big Brother Naija, a kacha mara ya maka ọrụ ya na Mukulu
Ọ bụ onye nne mụrụ ụmụ abụọ wee lụọ Terna Tarka rụọ afọ anọ
O kwuru na N'ajụjụ ọnụ May na Punch gbara na 2021 na ịhapụ di ya bụ otu n'ime mkpebi siri ike o mere na obi dị ya ụtọ maka usoro nkwado ya
Akpofure mere ịwa ahụ ịgbatị ara na Quartz Clinic, Istanbul na 2020
O kwuru gbasara ahụmịhe ya na ọwa YouTube ya
Ventersdorp bụ obodo nwere 4,200 na Dr Kenneth Kaunda District Municipality, North West Province, South Africa Ọ bụ oche nke ime obodo Ventersdorp kwụsịrị ruo 2016
Verónica Nataniel Macamo Dlhovo (amụrụ na onwa Nọvemba 13, na afo 1957) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Mozambik nke jere ozi dị ka Minista nke Mmekọrịta Mba Ọzọ kemgbe afo 2020
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi oche nke Nzukọ nke Republic of Mozambique site na 2010 wee ruo afo 2020
Dlhovo bụ onye otu Frelimo

Ọ malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Gaza Province dị ka onye otu nke Organization of Mozambican Women ma ruo n'ókè nke ọrụ ya mgbe ọ buru nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi oche nke Nzukọ ahụ kemgbe Mozambique nwetara nnwere onwe
A mụrụ Veronica Nataniel Macamo Dlhovo na ubochi iri na atonke onwa Nọvemba na afo 1957, na Bilene, Gaza Province
Ọ lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ atọ
Dlhovo nwetara akara ugo mmụta na Mahadum Eduardo Mondlane n'afọ 1994
Ọ gakwara ọmụmụ na physics na mgbakọ na mwepụ n'otu mahadum ahụ
Dlhovo malitere ịrụ ọrụ maka Frelimo ọbụna tupu nnwere onwe na mgbe Mozambique nweere onwe ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ebe maka pati ahụ

Ọ na-etinye aka na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na-arụ ọrụ na Kọmitii ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke nkwadebe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ndị agha na Moamba 1975 wee ruo 1977, dị ka onye ndụmọdụ iwu nke ụlọ ọrụ kemgbe 1994, onye ndụmọdụ ikpe ziri ezi site na 2005 wee ruo 2007, yana dịka onye ndụmọdụ ikpe na onye isi oche nke Board of the Tourism Fund site na afo 2000 wee ruo 2009

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na òtù ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ dị ka National Secretary for Formation of the Organization of Mozambican Women site na 1985 wee ruo afo 1989, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu nsọpụrụ nke Mozambican women's Organization na onye isi nke ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị na isi ụlọ ọrụ Central Committee, site na 1994 wee ruo afo 1995
Dị ka onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, a họpụtara Dlhovo ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu na 1999 site na mpaghara Gaza
N'afọ 1999, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke National Assembly
N'afọ 2004, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye otu Pan-African Parliament site na Mozambique
A họpụtara Dlhovo dị ka nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi oche nke Nzukọ ahụ n'afọ 2010, na ngụkọta vootu nari iri iteolu na abuo n'ime nari iri iteolu na ano
Dị ka onye isi oche nke nzukọ ahụ, a maara Dlhovo maka àgwà ya siri ike
O nyere echiche ya n'isiokwu ndị metụtara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mozambique ma rụọ ọrụ dị mkpa n'ịmepụta iwu, gụnyere iwu gbasara alụmdi na nwunye ndị nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na mmetọ ụmụaka
A họpụtara ya ọzọ dị ka ọkà okwu n'afọ 2015
Na ubochi 17 Jenụwarị na afo 2020, onye isi ala Filipe Nyusi họpụtara ya dị ka Minista na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi na kọmitii ọhụrụ ya
Vera Elkan (afọ 1908 rụọ afọ 2008) bụ onye na-ese foto na South Africa nke a na-echeta màkà foto ya nke International Brigades na Agha Obodo Spain
N'ịbụ onye nne na nna South Africa na German, Elkan zụrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto na Berlin n'afọ ndị 1930 ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye-ese foto Na Germany na South Africa
Ógè ọ nọ na London, ọ natara ego site na mkpọsa Britain iji kwado International Brigades ịga Spain iji see foto ọrụ Brigades
O ji ụgbọ ala ambulance gaa Alabacete n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 1936 ebe ọ na-ese foto ndị Germany, French na British recruits na ebe ọzụzụ
Foto ndị ọzọ na-ekpuchi ndị nta akụkọ mba ụwa, ụlọ ọgwụ Valencia, mmịnye ọbara na ndị nwụrụ na mwakpo ikuku na Madrid
Ihe osise ya gụnyekwara foto nke Mikhail Koltsov nke Pravda, Claud Cockburn nke Daily Worker na nke dọkịta Norman Bethune
Elkan mechara rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto na London mana ụlọ ọrụ ya mebiri n'agha, tinyere ọtụtụ ọrụ ya
Ógè agha ahụ gasịrị, o lekwasịrị anya na ndụ ezinụlọ
Vera Jackson (Julaị 21, 1911 , Janụwarị 26, 1999) bụ 'nwaanyị na-ese foto na akwụkwọ akụkọ ojii'
O sere foto ndụ ọha na eze nke ndi Afrịka-Amerịka na omenala ndị ama ama na ndị 1930s na 1940s Los Angeles
Ihe ndị a ma ama na-ese foto gụnyere onye na-egwu baseball Jackie Robinson, onye nkuzi Mary McLeod Bethune, na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Dorothy Dandridge, Hattie McDaniel na Lena Horne
Jackson bụ onye na-ese foto n'onwe ya na California Eagle

Onye nchịkọta akụkọ Charlotta Bass mechara were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese foto ma na-ejikarị ya na onye nchịkọta akụkọ Jessie Mae Brown (mgbe e mesịrị Jessie Brown Beavers) rụọ ọrụ ruo mgbe Brown hapụrụ Los Angeles Sentinel
Mgbe Jackson hapụrụ California Eagle, ọ nwetara ma BA
(n'afọ 1952) na Masterz (n'afọ 1954) na agụmakwụkwọ wee ghọọ onye nkuzi nke Los Angeles University School District
Ọ lara ezumike nká mgbe afọ iri abụọ na ise gasịrị
Vera Okolo (mụrụ 5 Jenụwari n'afọ1985) bụ nwaafọ Nigeria na-agbara otu egwuregwu bọọlụ nke ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa bọọlụ
Ọ gbara bọọlụ Delta Queens n'asọmpị iko ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa
Ọ bụ onye nchịkwa Isamaila Mabo tinyere Okolo maka ndị otu egwuregwu 2004 asọmpi ahụ
Ka emechara egwuregwu ahụ, a họpụtara ya ịbụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ nke ụmụnwaanyị n'Afrịka mana emesịrị nye Perpetua Nkwocha ihe nrite ahụ
O gwuru egwuregwu na Algiers n'afọ 2007 ,o nyere goolụ mere ha ji merie
Okolo so na ndị otu ekweghị ịlaghachi Algiers rue mgbe a kwụrụ ha ụgwọ
E kwere ha nkwa ego mgbe ha laghachiri Naijiria, mana ahụmịhe gwara ha na a ga-emebi nkwa ndị a
Onye isi otu mechara kwụụ ha $ 1m site n’aka Onye isi ala
Okolo tinyere aka na esemokwu ya na Njikọ nke Naijiria na-esochi mmerụ ahụ ya n'afọ 2007 mgbe ọ na-egwu maka mba ya
Ọ chọrọ ịwa ahụ na Germany mana esemokwu dịịrị onye ga-akwụ ya
Vera Perostiyska (Bulgarian Вера Перостийска) (amụrụ na May 25, 1982) bụ onye bụbu onye na agba bọọlụ bọọlụ na Bulgaria
Ọ bụ otu nime ndị egwuregwu basketball kachasị nwee ọganihu na Plovdiv, Bulgaria
O sonyere na asọmpi iri dị iche iche noge ọrụ ọkachamara ya
Perostiyska bụ onye otu mba Bulgaria ogologo oge, ebe a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi ndị otu n'afọ 2012
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Florida Mba ụwa nafọ 2004
Vera Tembo (amụrụ na Julaị 25, na afo 1953) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zambia na onye otu Movement for Multi-Party Democracy (MMD)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka First Lady nke Zambia site na afo 1991 ruo mgbe ya na di mbụ ya, President Frederick Chiluba, kewara na afo 2001
N'afọ 2006, ọ laghachiri na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị site n'ịbụ onye a họpụtara na National Assembly of Zambia site na mpaghara Kasenengwa
Tembo lụrụ Frederick Chiluba, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ itoolu, ruo afọ iri atọ na atọ, ruo mgbe ọ kwupụtara nkewa ha n'afọ 2000
Chiluba ghọrọ onye isi ala Zambia na 1991, na-eme ka Tembo bụrụ nwanyị mbụ nke mba ahụ site na afo 1991 ruo mgbe ha gbara alụkwaghịm
Tembo hapụrụ State House, ebe obibi onye isi ala, n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe Chiluba kwupụtara ọkwa wee soro ezinụlọ ya biri na Ndola
Ịgba alụkwaghịm ha ghọrọ nke ikpeazụ na Septemba 25, na afo 2001, mgbe ụlọ ikpe dị na Ndola nyere ikike ka a kagbuo ya mgbe afọ iri atọ na atọ nke alụmdi na nwunye gasịrị
Vera Tembo kọwara ọnọdụ nkewa ya na ịgba alụkwaghịm ya na Chiluba dị ka 'ihe ihere'
O mere mkpọsa n'oge ntuli aka nke afọ 2001 site n'ịgba ụmụ nwanyị Zambia ume ka ha gbaa vootu na ntuli aka ahụ
O gosikwara ebumnuche ya ịbanye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Chiluba hapụrụ ọrụ na Disemba na afo 2001 mgbe ọ na-enwetaghị nkwado maka oge nke atọ nke onye isi ala, nke iwu obodo machibidoro iwu
Onye bụbu onye isi ala Frederick Chiluba lụrụ enyi ya nwanyị, Regina Mwanza, n'afọ 2002, ọnwa ole na ole mgbe ịgba alụkwaghịm ya na Tembo kwụsịrị
Ka ọ na-erule mmalite afọ 2002, akwụkwọ akụkọ Zambia kọrọ na Tembo nọ na ịda ogbenye mgbe Chiluba kwuru na ọ kwụsịrị akaụntụ ụlọ akụ ya
O tinyere akwụkwọ $ 25 US dollar megide Chiluba dị ka akụkụ nke nkwekọrịta ịgba alụkwaghịm
Gọọmentị Zambia nyere Tembo enyemaka ego na Mee na afo 2002 mgbe o depụtara ihe onwunwe ya n'ahịa
N'afọ 2006, Tembo gbara ọsọ maka oche Kasenengwa na Zambia dị ka onye otu Movement for Multi-Party Democracy (MMD)
Ọ meriri ntuli aka ahụ wee bụrụ nwanyị mbụ nọchitere anya Kasenengwa, oche ime obodo n'ụlọ ya bụ Eastern Province, na National Assembly
N'ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2006, obere oge ka ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị, Onye isi ala Levy Mwanawasa họpụtara Tembo dị ka osote minista na-ahụ maka njem nleta, gburugburu ebe obibi na akụrụngwa n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ya
Vera Tembo, onye onye onye nọchiri Mwanawasa, Onye isi ala Rupiah Banda, họpụtara ọzọ dị ka osote minista, nwere ọfịs minista site na 2006 ruo na afo 2011, mgbe ọ hapụrụ Nzukọ Mba

N'afọ 2010, Tembo lekọtara ịkwaga anụ rhinoceroses ojii na North Luangwa National Park na mpaghara okike ndị ọzọ nke Zambia, na-ekwu na mmemme ahụ bụ ihe na-akwalite ma gburugburu ebe obibi mba ahụ na ụlọ ọrụ njem nleta
Na Machị na afo 2015, Vera Tembo kwupụtara na ọ ghọwo onye ụkọchukwu Ndị Kraịst ma guzobe chọọchị ọhụrụ a na-akpọ Healing International Ministry

Verckys Kiamuangana Mateta (a mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị 19 Mee, n'afọ 1944, Kinshasa, Zaire - 13 Ọktoba 2022) bụ onye egwu (nke bụ isi saxophonist), onye na-ede egwu, onye isi otu, onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, na onye isi azụmahịa egwu na Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC)

Ọ bụ ezie na a ma ya ama dị ka onye na-eti egwu nwere nkà ma na-eme nke ọma, ọ ga-abụ na ọ bụ onye ama karịa dị ka 'onye Afrịka mbụ nwere akara ndekọ' na maka iwebata ọtụtụ ndị isi egwu Congo na ụwa site na ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ Veve ya na akara ya
A mụrụ ya dị ka Georges Kiamuangana
O si n'ezinụlọ bara ọgaranya; nna ya bụ onye ọchụnta ego na Leopoldville (nke bụ Kinshasa ugbu a)
Ọ mụtara egwu n'ụlọ ụka
Dị ka onye saxophonist, ọ nakweere aha Verckys dabere na onye na-egwu saxophone nke America bụ King Curtis, na-anụ aha 'Curtis' dị ka 'Verckys'
Ọ bụbu onye otu soukous band TPOK Jazz, nke François Luambo Makiadi duziri, nke na-achịkwa egwu egwu Congo site n'afọ 1950s ruo afọ 1980s
N'afọ 1969, Verckys Kiamuangana hapụrụ TPOK Jazz wee guzobe otu egwu ya, Orchestre Vévé
Verkys chịkwara ìgwè abụọ ọzọ, nke o nwere Orchestre Kiam na Orchestre Lipua Lipua
N'ime ndị egwu na-egwuri egwu maka Verkys n'afọ ndị 1970 bụ Nyboma Mwandido na Pepe Kalle
N'oge mmalite afọ 1980 Verckys kwụsịrị egwu egwu, iji chụsoo ọdịmma ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 2015, Sterns Music wepụtara na MP3 ụdị ọtụtụ n'ime mmepụta nke akara ndekọ nke Verckys's Éditions Vévé (post blọọgụ na-ekwupụta nke a gụnyere akụkọ ndụ nke Verckys)
A na-akpọkwa asụsụ Gwèri ma ọ bụ Vere dị ka Kobo ma ọ bụ Mama Jango, bụ onye so na ngalaba Duru nke asụsụ Savanna A na-asụ ya n'ofe mpaghara ugwu Naịjirịa na Cameroon
Verka Aleksieva (Bulgarian; amụrụ na 24 Septemba 1943) bụ onye Bulgaria na akwọ ụgbọ mmiri
O sonyere na asọmpi ụmụ nwanyị anọ na 1976 Olimpik oge okpomọkụ
Vermeulen bụ aha nna toponymic Dutch ma ọ bụ aha ọrụ, nke pụtara 'site na igwe igwe (ikuku / mmiri)' (Molen Dutch nke oge a)
Ọ bụ nkwekọrịta nke aha nna Van der Meulen
Na Netherlands 20,633 ndị mmadụ bu aha ahụ na 2007, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ aha nna nke 30, ebe na Belgium 13,552 ndị mmadụ ka akpọrọ Vermeulen na 2008, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ aha nke iri na otu n'ebe ahụ
Vermin (colloquially varmint(s) ma ọ bụ varmit(s)) bụ ụmụ ahụhụ ma ọ bụ anụmanụ na-enye nsogbu nke na-agbasa ọrịa ma ọ bụ na-ebibi ihe ọkụkụ ma ọ bụ anụ ụlọ
Ebe ọ bụ na akọwara okwu ahụ gbasara mmadụ ihe omume, nke ụdị na-agụnye iche iche site na mpaghara na ụlọ ọrụ
Okwu a sitere na Latin vermis (nkpuru), ma jiri ya mee ihe na mbụ maka ikpuru nke ụmụ ahụhụ ụfọdụ, ọtụtụ n'ime ha na-ebute nri
Achọpụtala okwu varmint (na vermint) na isi mmalite site na 1530-1540s
A na-eji okwu ahụ bụ 'vermin' na-ezo aka n'ụdị dị iche iche nke ntule, gụnyere òké, oke bekee, termites, bed bugs, ferrets, stoats, sables, rats, na mgbe ụfọdụ nkịta ọhịa

N'akụkọ ihe mere eme, na narị afọ nke iri na isii na nke iri na asaa, a malitekwara iji okwu mkparị nke metụtara ìgwè ndị na-enwekarị ahụhụ, ya bụ ndị arịrịọ na ndị na-agagharị agagharị, na ndị ogbenye n'ozuzu ndị ogbenye

Ụmụ ahụhụ na-ebu ọrịa bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị, mana a na-etinyekwa okwu ahụ na ụmụ anụmanụ buru ibu - ọkachasị obere anụ - na-eri anụ - n'ihi na ha na-eri ihe onwunwe nke ụmụ mmadụ na-ewere dị ka nke ha, dị ka anụ ụlọ na ihe ọkụkụ
Nnụnụ ndị na-eri mkpụrụ ọka na mkpụrụ osisi bụ ihe atụ
Ndị ọrụ ugbo kpọrọ okpuru America (Corvus brachyrhynchos), asị n'ihi mmebi ihe ọkụkụ
A na-ewerekwa nduru, nke e webatara n'ọtụtụ ebe n'obodo ukwu, mgbe ụfọdụ dị ka ụmụ ahụhụ
A pụkwara ịkpọ ụfọdụ ụdị agwọ na arachnids dị ka ụmụ ahụhụ
Ụfọdụ ndị na-ejikwa 'Vermin' dị ka okwu mmetọ, ma n'otu n'otu ma ọ bụ n'otu n'otu
Varmint ma ọ bụ varmit bụ American-English colloquialism, nrụrụ aka nke 'vermin' karịsịa na-ahụkarị na American East na South-east n'ime steeti ndị dị nso nke nnukwu mpaghara Appalachia

Okwu a na-akọwa ụdị ndị na-awakpo ugbo site n'èzí, n'adịghị ka ụmụ ahụhụ (dịka òké) nke na-efe site n'ime, si otú a na-ezo aka na ndị na-eri anụ dị ka nkịta ọhịa, nkịta ọhịa, weasels, na coyotes, mgbe ụfọdụ ọbụna anụ ọhịa wolf ma ọ bụ na-adịkarịghị anụ ọhịa bea, kamakwa, n'ọkwa dị nta, ahịhịa ahịhịa na anụmanụ na-egwupụta ihe na-emebi ihe ọkụkụ na ala ozugbo

Ọ bụ ezie na 'varmint /varmit' abụghị ihe eji eme ihe na Standard Written English, ọ bụ nkọwa nkịtị maka ụdị ụfọdụ nke ngwá agha na ọnọdụ nchịkwa ahụhụ na Appalachian na steeti ndị dị nso na American West na South-west nke nakweere okwu dịka égbè varmint na varmint hunting
Vermont bu state no n'ime ala ndi United States of Amerika
Verna Norberg Aardema Vugteveen (June 6, 1911 May 11, 2000), nke a mara nke ọma site na aha Verna Aardema, bụ onye odee Amerika nke akwụkwọ ụmụaka
A mụrụ Verna Norberg na New Era, Michigan
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Michigan State jiri BA
nke ọrụ nta akụkọ n'afọ 1934

Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị malite n'afọ 1934 ruo n'afọ 1973 wee bụrụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ maka Muskegon Chronicle n'afọ 1951, ọrụ nke dịgidere ruo n'afọ 1972, otu afọ tupu ọ laa ezumike nká na nkụzị
N'afọ ikpeazụ ya na Michigan State, Norberg meriri asọmpi edemede atọ; ọ bụ ezie na ọ bụghị nke mbụ ya, ha bụ ndị kachasị emetụta na mkpebi ya n' ịchụso nrọ ụmụaka
O buru ụzọ chee echiche ide maka ụmụaka mgbe nwa ya nwanyị jụrụ iri nri ruo mgbe ọ nụrụ otu n'ime akụkọ nne ya kọrọ
A na-etinyekarị aka azụ ndị a n'ebe ọ nọ na-agụ maka ya na nso nso a, ma ka ọ na-enwewanye mmasị na Afrika, a malitere itinye ha ebe ahụ ugboro ugboro
Akwụkwọ ya, Why Mosquitoes Buzz in People's Ears (1975), nke Leo na Diane Dillon gosipụtara, nwetara Caldecott Medal na n'afọ 1976 na akwụkwọ ǹkà Brooklyn maka ihe nrite ụmụaka n'afọ 1977
Ònye nọ n'ụlọ Oke? 1977 bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ọba akwụkwọ akụkọ kacha mma n'afọ ahụ nke afọ 1977 na onye mmeri Lewis Carroll Shelf Award na n'afọ 1978
Aardema natara ihe nrite n'okirikiri okpokoro ihe ọgụgụ ụmụaka n'afọ 1981, ma ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya abụrụla nke ahọpụtara dị ka akwụkwọ ama ama site na n'aka American Library Association
Oh Kojo ya! Kedu ka isiri! merie na Parents' Choice Award nke afọ 1984 na Agụmagụ

N'akụkọ a nke akụkọ ndị Maasai, mongoose na-enyere nnụnụ aka iweghachite ụmụ ya n'aka ọdụm owu na ya nke zuru ha
Nchịkọta akụkọ ọdịnala sitere n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke Africa

Verna Hart (Jenụwarị 28, 1961 eprel 26, 2019) bụ onye Africa-America na-ese ihe nke a maara màkà ihe osise ya na-elekwasị ányá na egwu jazz
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na mpaghara Harlem nke New York City
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ụlọ ọrụ nnọchiteanya United States na Africa na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ nke United States Department of State
Otu n'ime ihe osise ya, nke e mepụtara na 1999 ma kpọọ Jammin 'N'okpuru El, bụ nkè New York City Metropolitan Transportation Authority (MTA) nyéré iwu
Ọ bụ ihe a ma ama na ọdụ Myrtle Avenue (BMT Jamaica Line) na Brooklyn
O nwèrè windo enyo na-acha anụnụ anụnụ na ihe ngosi nke ikpo okwu yana ụlọ ọdụ ụgbọ okporo ígwè na-egosi ihe dị iche iche metụtara egwu
Ọ bụ ónyé nkụzi nka na Springfield Gardens High School na Queens na Medgar Evers College nke City University of New York na Brooklyn
A mụrụ Hart na Harlem n'aka Earl Alphonso Hart, ónyé uwe ojii na ndị uwe ojii New York City, na Pauline (Shomo) Hart
Ha kwagara Middle Village, Queens Mgbè ọ dị afọ anọ
Mgbè ọ na-agụ akwụkwọ na Andrew Jackson High School na Cambria Heights, Queens, ọ gàrà klas ise ihe na Cooper Union

Ọ gara n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na School of Visual Arts na nzèrè bachelọ nke nka dị mma na eserese, nzèrè masta nke nka dị elu na eserese site na Pratt Institute na nzèrè masta na nlekọta agụmakwụkwọ na nchịkwa site na Bank Street College of Education, ha abụọ na 1991
Hart kwagara Wilmington, Delaware ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ 20 tupu ọnwụ ya ka o wee nwee ike inweta ọgwụgwọ maka otu n'ime ụmụ ya
Ọ nwụrụ n'ụlọ ya n'ebe ahụ
Dị ka nwa ya nwoke Romare si kwuo n'oge gara-aga, ọ nwèrè nkụchi mgbè ọ na-ehi ụra

Ihe osise Hart apụtala na ihe nkiri, ihe ngosi telivishọn, na mkpuchi ndekọ, gụnyere ihe nkiri Spike Lee nke 1990 Mo' Better Blues, na album Branford Marsalis nke 1992 I Heard You Twice the First Time
Verna Barbara Robertson Vels (13 June 1933 – 21 Ọgọst 2014) bụ onye odee South Africa na onye nkwuputa na onye ngosi redio na TV
Ọ bụ ya na-ahụ maka mmemme nka na mmemme gbasara ntorobịa
O tinyere aka na nhazi ihe omume telivishọn maka nguzobe nke ọrụ Afrikaans ma wee malite akwụkwọ akụkọ ụmụaka
Ọrụ ya kachasị ama bụ Liewe Heksie ; Edere akụkọ ndị ahụ na mbụ maka redio wee bipụta ma dezie ya maka telivishọn na vidiyo
Amụrụ Verna Vels na Reitz, Orange Free State, South Africa
Ọ gara Mahadum Pretoria, na 1954 ọ gụchara nzere BA, n'ụbara Afrikaans na Dutch, English, na Art History
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 1954, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-eme nkwuputa na redio na SABC na Durban, bụ ebe ọ malitere inwe mmasị na mmemme ụmụaka
Na 1963, ọ kwagara Johannesburg
Na 1968 ọ rụrụ ọrụ otu afọ na Radio Netherlands na Hilversum Wereldomroep
Na 1973 ọ kwagara Durban dị ka onye nhazi nke Mmemme Afrikaans na Natal wee bụrụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara dị ka onye nhazi na mpaghara
N'afọ 1974, Vels laghachiri na Johannesburg, ebe ahọpụtara ya na mmemme Televishon dị ka onye nhazi akwụkwọ akụkọ Afrikaans nke gụnyere mmemme ụmụaka
Emebere mmemme dịka Kraaines na Wielie Walie n'okpuru nduzi ya
N'ime afọ niile nke ịdị adị ya, o kwupụtara Wielie Walie ' Bennie bookworm
N'ime afọ abụọ tupu telivishọn agbasa ozi ọma (na 5 Jenụwarị 1976), Vels tinyere aka na mmepụta na nhazi nke mmemme na n'ikpeazụ na ịzụrụ mmemme na mba ọzọ
Ọ malitere ide ihe maka redio ná mmalite ọrụ ya, e bipụtakwara ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ a n'ikpeazụ
Ọtụtụ usoro Liewe Heksie ekesara
E bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ 'Liewe Heksie' na 1965 site n'aka ndị mbipụta Human & Rousseau
N'ime afọ ndị gafeworonụ, e mepụtara ngụkọta nke akwụkwọ 10, ihe ndekọ asatọ, na ọtụtụ CD, vidiyo, na DVD
Akwụkwọ kacha ọhụrụ bụ 'Liewe Heksie en die rekenaar' (Ezigbo obere amoosu na kọmputa) nke pụtara na 1999 (nke Piet Grobler gosipụtara)
Liewe Heksie mere ihe ngosi telivishọn ya na 1978 n'usoro nke mmemme iri abụọ na isii
Usoro nke abụọ sochiri na 1981
Maka ngụkọta iri ise na abụọ nke mmemme telivishọn Vels deziri akụkọ ochie wee dee akụkọ ọhụrụ
Usoro ahụ malitere mwepụtakwa ọtụtụ akwụkwọ nwere ihe atụ sitere na telivishọn
Liewe Heksie pụtakwara na egwuregwu ụmụaka na ebe egwuregwu dị ka Nico Malan-ihe nkiri dị na Cape Town, Sand du Plessis Theatre na Bloemfontein na State Theatre na Pretoria
Vels dekwara ihe nkiri Liewe Heksie maka 'Klein Karoo Nasionale Kunstefees' na Ngalaba Drama nke Mahadum Pretoria iji mee mmemme ncheta afọ iri atọ ha
Vels dere akwụkwọ akụkọ ntorobịa, Alet, na 1965 maka redio; Ndị mbiputa akwụkwọ Perskor-bipụtara ya na 1978
Ọ haziri ọtụtụ ihe nkiri redio, ma dee ihe mbụ maka mmemme redio
Ebusara ya ugboro abụọ
Na February 1983, a họpụtara ya Onye isi mmemme maka TV1 (Afrikaans) ọkwa kachasị elu nke nwanyị nwere n'afọ ndị ahụ
Mgbe emezigharịrị ụfọdụ n'ime SABC, ọ nwere ọtụtụ ọkwa ndị ọzọ wee lara ezumike nka na 1993 ka ọ rụchara ọrụ ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri anọ na redio na telivishọn
Ọ natara ọtụtụ onyinye n'aka Kultuurinstansies, gụnyere

Veronica Isala Eragu Bichetero bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye ọka iwu so na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda maka Mpaghara Kaberamaido kemgbe 2016
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi na onye ndụmọdụ ukwu na EDG Venture Consult, Kampala site na 2007 rụọ Veronica Isala Eragu Bichetero
A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị nke atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 1953
Ọ gara St Mary's College, Aboke maka East African Certificate of Education (EACE), na 1970 na Dr
Obote College, Boroboro maka East African Advanced Certificate of education (EAACE)
N'afọ 1972, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere dị na Uganda na Bachelor of Laws wee nweta Postgraduate Diploma na Legal Practice site na Law Development Centre, Kampala n'afọ 1978

Ọ bụ Senior Fellow na United States Institute of Peace, Washington DC site na 2011 ruo 2012; Commissioner na Uganda Human Rights Commission site na 2001 ruo 2007; ọ bụkwa naanị onye mmekọ na Eragu & Co

Advocates, Kampala, site na 1998 ruo 2001; ọ bụ Managing Partner & Consultant na Sentinel, Nairobi, site na 1995 ruo 2001; Ọ bụkwa Senior Professional Consultant na UNICEF Eastern and Southern Africa Regional Office, Nairobi, Nairobi, Site na 1992 ruo 1994

Ọ bụ onye nduzi / onye isi njikwa na Apollo Insurance Company, Kenya, site na 1987 ruo 1991; ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa nkwupụta / onye isi nchịkwa na Kenya Commercial Insurance Corporation site na 1983 ruo 1987; yana dịka onye ọrụ iwu na Rhodes & Rhodes, Lagos, Nigeria, site na 1980 ruo 1981; na dị ka odeakwụkwọ iwu na National Insurance Corporation, Uganda, site na 1976 ruo 1980
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu ndị omeiwu na Uganda ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye dị otú ahụ site na 2016 ruo ugbu a

Veronica Ogechi Nnaji (onye amuru n' ubochi iri n'onwa Jenuarị 1940) bu onye nọọsụ na onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria
Na 1979 ọ bụ otu n'ime ìgwè mbụ nke ụmụ nwanyị atọ ndị were oche ha na Ụlọ Nnọchiteanya
A mụrụ Nnaji na Umuaka n'ọnwa Jenụwarị 1940, otu n'ime ụmụ asaa onye ọrụ ugbo bụ Therea Ezendu na onye na-azụ ahịa Mathias Ezendu mụrụ
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Holy Rosary School n'etiti afọ 1948 na 1955, emesia ọ zụrụ ọzụzụ dịka onye nọọsụ na ụlọ ọgwụ Our Lady of Lourdes dị na Ihiala site n'afo 1956 ruo 1960
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ nke ịdị ọcha na Aba ma gakwa Health Center dị na Nsukka, ọ tozuru oke dịka nọọsụ na 1963
O mechara rụọ ọrụ na Amaigbo Joint Hospital dị na Nkwerre n'etiti 1963 na 1965, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ụmụaka na-enweghị nne na nna na Okwelle ruo 1970
Ọ lụrụ di n'afọ 1965 ma mụọ ụmụ ise
N'afọ 1974, ọ ghọrọ onye nwe ụlọ ebe a na-amụ nwa
Na nhoputa ndi omeiwu nke afo 1979, Nnaji bu onye Naijiria ndi otu pati Isu ma tinye ya n'ulo omebe iwu
N'akụkụ Abiola Babatope na Justina Eze, ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụnwaanyị atọ mbụ a họpụtara na ụlọ omeiwu ka ha nọrọ n'oche ha (A họpụtara Esther Soyannwo n'afọ 1964 mana ọ nọghị oche ya)
Ọ jere ozi na nzuko omeiwu ruo 1983
Veronica Martha Agowa Quarshie bụ onye Ghana na-emepụta ihe, onye nduzi na onye na-ede ihe nkiri, nke a maara na ọ gbanwere ọnọdụ akụkọ mgbe ahụ ebe a na-egosi ụmụ nwanyị dị ka ndị nọ na-azụ azụ
Ọ gbanwere akụkọ ụmụ nwanyị site na akụkọ a na-amaghị ama, nke na-enweghị isi na nke na-abụghị nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị gaa na ụmụ nwanyị nwere ohere ha
Quarshie nwetara ọzụzụ ya na mmepụta ihe nkiri site na National Film and Television Institute na 1992, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na isi na Film Directing
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Quarshie malitere ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
O mepụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya, Twin Lover, site n'aka Piro Production na 1994
Kemgbe ahụ, o mepụtala ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ nke gụnyere Ripples na A Stab in the Dark
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ dịka Ghana Broadcasting Corporation, TV Africa, Film Africa Limited na Princess Films na Accra
Ọ jere ozi ma ka na-eje ozi ugbu a na ndị ọka ikpe nke ọtụtụ atụmatụ onyinye nke gụnyere Golden Movie Awards
O ritere ọtụtụ ihe nrite maka ọrụ ya
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nrite ndị o meriri gụnyere
Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe nkiri ọ mepụtara gụnyere
Ọ lụrụ Samuel Nai ma nwee nwa nwoke
Veronica Waceke bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri
O bu ụzọ pụta na ihe nkiri afọ 2015 Fundi-Mentals Maka arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri My Faith, Waceke ritere ihe nrite Best East African Female Actress na Mashariki Film Festival
O gosipụtara Lesedi na Kenya National Theatre nke Walter Sitati's play; Necessary Madness 2 na Deliberate Contempt n'afọ 2019
A họpụtara Waceke maka 2014 Africa Magic Viewers' Choice Award for the Best Actress in a television drama series 'Higher Learning'
Onye na-akwado ihe nkiri kachasị mma - Riverwood Awards
Best Actress - Mashariki Film Festival Awards afọ 2015
Veronica van Dyk (Amụrụ n'ụbọchị 1 Jenụwarị 1968) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa nke jere ozi dị ka onye otu National Assembly kemgbe ọnwa Mee 2014
Onye otu Democratic Alliance, ọ bụ osote minista na-ahụ maka egwuregwu, nka na ọdịbendị
Van Dyk jere ozi dị ka onye kansụl mpaghara nke Nama Khoi Local Municipality site n'afọ 2011 ruo afọ 2014
Van Dyk guzobere akwụkwọ akụkọ a na-ebipụta kwa ọnwa a na-akpọ Namakwa Kletz ma gosipụta ihe ngosi redio mpaghara na Namaqualand
Ọ bụkwa onye isi Daisy Ubuntu Charity, otu na-enweghị uru
Vertner Woodson Tandy (Mee 17, 1885 ruo Nọvemba 7, 1949) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere asaa (nke a na-akpọkarị 'The Seven Jewels') nke Alpha Phi Alpha fraternity na Mahadum Cornell na 1906
Ọ bụ onye Africa America mbụ debanyere aha na New York State
Tandy jere ozi dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba mbụ nke isi Alpha na onye na-emepụta pin fraternity
E debanyere òtù ahụ n'okpuru nkwado ya
A mụrụ ya na Mee 17, 1885, na Lexington, Kentucky
Nne na nna ya bụ Henry A
Tandy na Emma Brice Tandy
Henry Tandy bụ onye ọchụnta ego na-aga nke ọma na onye na-ewu ụlọ
A mụrụ ya dị ka ohu, na 1893 o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ Tandy & Byrd na Lexington
N'etiti ọrụ ndị a ma ama nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ Lexington Opera House na Fayette County Courthouse, ugbu a ebe Lexington Visitor Center
N'afọ 1904, Tandy gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Tuskegee Institute na-amụ ihe osise ụlọ
N'afọ 1905, ọ gafere na Mahadum Cornell, nke ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1907 na nzere na ihe owuwu
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị guzobere, ndị a na-akpọ 'Anya asaa,' nke Alpha Phi Alpha Society nke mbụ Afrịka-Amerịka fraternity na 1906
Mgbe ha gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Tandy na George Washington Foster malitere ụlọ ọrụ nke ha, Tandy & Foster, nwere ọfịs na Broadway na New York City
Tandy ghọrọ onye isi ojii mbụ debanyere aha na steeti New York
Ọrụ a ma ama nke Tandy nwere ike ịbụ Villa Lewaro, nnukwu ụlọ $250,000 maka nwa nwanyị nke Harlem millionairess Madam C
Walker, na Irvington na Hudson, New York
E wuchara nnukwu ụlọ ahụ n'ụdị Italianate na 1918 wee bụrụ ihe dị mkpa na Harlem Renaissance tupu ọnwụ Walker
N'etiti ọrụ ya ndị ọzọ dị ugbu a bụ Ivey Delph Apartments, na St
Philip's Episcopal Church na 204 West 134th Street na Harlem, site na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ya nke Tandy & Foster
Ivey Delph Apartments, nke e mere na 1948, edepụtara na National Register of Historic Places na 2005
Tandy nwekwara ọdịiche nke ịbụ onye Afrịka Amerịka mbụ gafere ule ndị agha ma bụrụ onye isi ala na 15th Infantry nke New York State National Guard
Vertner W
Tandy nwụrụ na oyi bara ya n'ahụ na Nọvemba 7, 1949, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri isii, na Manhattan, New York City
Verve International bụ ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ ego na kaadị ịkwụ ụgwọ nke Naijiria nke Interswitch Group nwere
E hiwere ya na 2009, dị ka onye ngalaba nke Interswitch
N'afọ 2013, ọ ghọrọ ụlọ ọrụ azụmaahịa na-achị onwe ya n'ime mmezigharị
N'afọ 2005, Central Bank of Nigeria nyere ụlọ ụrụ ịkwụ ụgwọ Naijiria iwu na ndị ọrụ kwesịrị ịkwaga site na eriri magnetik gaa na EMV chip na PIN platform site na 2009
A nabatara iwu mbata CBN iji wepụ eriri magnetik mgbe teknụzụ ahụ ghọrọ ihe na-emetụta azụmahịa aghụghọ
Na mbụ, o nyere kaadị nde isii na mmekorita ya na ọtụtụ ụlọ akụ Naijiria
Verve na-enye ngwaahịa kaadị na Naijiria
N'afọ 2013, a kọrọ na Verve nwere 'ihe karịrị nde kaadị iri abụọ na mgbasa ma nweta ihe karịrị ebe POS di 119,631, ATM di 11, 287 na ihe karịrị 1,000 ndi na-ere ahịa n'ịntanetị'
Na Machị 2013, Discover Financial Services na Interswitch jikọrọ, nke mere ka a nabata Verve Cards gafee netwọk Discover zuru ụwa ọnụ, na-ekpuchi mba 185 na mpaghara dị ka n'oge nkwekọrịta ahụ
Njikọ ahụ nyekwara ohere ịnabata Discover and Diners Club International (DCI) kaadị na ATM Interswitch na ebe ire ere (POS) maka ịzụta na Naịjirịa

N'ọnwa Ọktoba n'otu afọ ahụ, Verve malitere ịbanye n'ahịa ịkwụ ụgwọ nke East Africa na mmekọrịta mmekọrịta ya na Kenya Commercial Bank (KCB) 'iji gbasaa ọrụ nnabata Verve Card na ịkwụ ụgwọ na ahịa isii dị mkpa nke East Africa', ya bụ Kenya, Tanzania, Burundi, South Sudan, Rwanda na Uganda
Vetkoek (/ˈfɛtkʊk/, Afrikaans ) bụ achịcha e siri esi nke ọdịnala South Africa
Vetkoek bụ akụkụ nke ọdịbendị na Ndida Afrika
Ọ dị ka achịcha Caribbean Johnny, oliebol Dutch, na sopaipillas nke ndi Mexico
Nchịkọta nri ọzọ yiri nke South Afrika bụ Amagwinya, aha Xhosa maka bọọlụ ntụ ọka a e siri esi
Mana nsụgharị a nwere ike ịdị ụtọ ma ọ bụ dị ụtọ, n'adịghị ka vetkoek
Okwu vetkoek pụtara n'ụzọ nkịtị 'keki abụba' n'asụsụ Afrikaans
Ọ dị ka donut na-enweghị oghere, a na-ejikwa ntụ ọka yeast eme ya
A na-emekarị Vetkoek n'akụkụ curry mince, nke a na-etinye n'ime
A makwaara ya dị ka curry bunnie mgbe a na-etinye ya na mince na mpaghara cape
Nke a bụ ma eleghị anya egwu kachasị ewu ewu
A na-erekarị Vetkoek na ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ ezinụlọ na ememme Africa na ihe omume ọdịnala

Vetkoek bụ nri a ma ama maka ọtụtụ ndị bi na South Africa ebe a na-enye ya n'ụzọ dị mfe ma ọ bụ na etinye ya ma na-ekpo ọkụ ma na-ere ya site na ọtụtụ obere azụmuahịa, ndị na-ere ahịa na ọdụ tagzi, ndị na'akụkụ ụzọ, na ụlọ ahịa nri ngwa ngwa dị na South Africa, Namibia na Botswana
Veye Wirngo Tatah (amụrụ c1971) bụ ónyé sayensị kọmputa na ónyé nta akụkọ Cameroon bi na Germany
Ọ bụ ónyé na-akwado Africa nke natara Order of Merit site na steeti Germany
A mụrụ Tatah n'ihe dị ka afọ 1971 ma ọ bịarutere Germany n'afọ 1991
A mụrụ ya na Cameroon mana ọ ghọrọ nwa amaala Germany n'afọ 2002
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ihe karịrị afọ isii dị ka ónyé enyemaka nyocha sayensị kọmputa na Mahadum Nkà na ụzụ nke Dortmund
Ọ ghọrọ ónyé ndụmọdụ IT na-achịkwa ọrụ na ọkachasị ndị na-emetụta nkwurịta okwu ọdịbendị
Tatah nwèrè ụlọ ọrụ nri a na-akpọ Kilimanjaro Food
Tatah nwèrè ụmụ abụọ
O setịpụtakwara ọtụtụ atụmatụ gụnyere Learning and integration mobile app African-LIM, 'African Women's Network' na Africa Positive
Tatah na-agba mbọ ịbawanye nghọta mba ụwa
Na 25 Febụwarị 2010 Tatah natara Order of Merit nke Federal Republic of Germany màkà mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya pụrụ iche
O sonyere na ọzụzụ nke ndị nta akụkọ iri atọ si Gambia na Erich-Brost-Institut na 2019
A na-enye ndị nta akụkọ ebumnuche nke ịkọ akụkọ banyéré mbata

La Vía Campesina (site na Spanish la vía campesine, li) bụ òtù ndị ugpo mba ụwa nke e guzobere na 1993 na Mons, Belgium, nke òtù otu narị na iri asatọ na ábụọ guzobere zoro na mba 81, ma kọwaa onwe ya dị ka 'otu òtù mba niile nke na-ahazi òtù ụmụ amaala nke obere ndị na'etiti na ha, ndị Ọrụ ugwo, ụmụ nwanyị ime obodo, na obodo ndị obodo si Eshia, Africa, America, da Europe'
La Via Campesina na-akwado ọrụ ugbo na ụlọ ọrụ na ya, ọ bụkwa otu ahụ chepụtara okwu ahụ bụ 'nchịkwa nri'
La Vía Campesina na-eme mkpọsa iji chebe ikike onye ọrụ ugbo nwere mkpụrụ, ịkwụsị ime ihe ike megide ụmụ nwanyị, maka mgbanwe ala, na n'ozuzu maka ịnakwere ikike nke ndị ọrụ ubi

Malite n'afọ ndị 1980 gọọmentị na-etinye obere aka n'ime ime obodo, nke na'eme ka ikike ụlọ ọrụ na ndị otu ndị ọrụ ugbo ghara ịdị ike ka ha na na - na 'na-ebi ndụ n 'n'ọrụ ugpo' na N'ihi ya, ìgwè ndị ọrụ ugbo mba malitere ịmekọrịta na òtù mba dị iche iche, malite na Latin America wee gaa n'ụwa niile

Ihe ndị ruuru ndị ọrụ ugbo sitere na nkwado ikike ọhụrụ nke bilitere na 1990s; n'oge ahụ, ihe ndị Ruuru Mmadụ na ihe omume mmepe jikọtara ọnụ nke gbasaa site na ikike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nke obodo iji tinye ikike mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na akụ na ụba
Ndị ọrụ ugbo na-arụ ọrụ n'ọrụ ugwo na'ihu na ịma echiche nke neoliberalism aka na akụ na ụba ụwa na ịchọta ụzọ ndị ọzọ ga-echebe ikike nke ndị ọrụ gburugburu ụwa
Ndị otu ndị ọrụ ugbo si Europe, Latin America, Eshia, North America na Africa guzobere nzukọ ahụ na 1993

Ntọala ahụ sochiri Uruguay Round nke General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT), ebe a bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta World Trade Organization (WTO) maka Ọrụ Ugbo na Azụmaahịa metụtara Ikike Nzuzo (TRIPS)
Nkwekọrịta ndị a kpatara mmeghachi omume site n'aka ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ gburugburu ụwa maka ilekwasị anya na nsogbu teknụzụ karịa ikike mmadụ inweta nri, ọkachasị maka ndị bi na Global South
Ijikọ ụwa ọnụ na-aga n'ihu n'oge a, na'emetụta ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere ọrụ ugbo
La Vía Campesina nyere ndị ọrụ ugbo obere ikpo okwu iji nụ olu ha banyere otu mgbanwe ndị a si emetụta ndụ ha
Mmegharị ahụ etoola ma bụrụkwa nke a ghọtara ugbu a dị ka akụkụ nke mkparịta ụka zuru ụwa ọnụ banyere nri na ọrụ ugbo
O gosila ya n'ọtụtụ mba ụwa, dịka
Via Campesina etinyela aka na mkparita uka nke Nkwupụta United Nations na ikike nke ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị ọzọ bi na mpaghara ime obodo, nke UN General Assembly nakweere na Disemba 2018

Dị ka weebụsaịtị La Via Campesina si kwuo, mmegharị ndị bụ isi okwu na-akwalite nri ọbụbụeze; na-achọ mgbanwe agrarian; ikike ndị mmadụ n'elu ala, mmiri, ókèala; iguzogide ahia efu; na-akwalite ụmụ nwanyị na-ewu ewu na-ewu ewu; na-akwado ikike mmadụ, ikike nke ndị ọrụ na-akwaga mba ọzọ; na-akwalite agroecology; na-akwalite usoro mkpụrụ osisi ndị ọrụ ugbo; na-amụba òkè ndị ntorobịa n'ọrụ ugbo
N'afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, òtù ahụ etinyela uche dị ukwuu na nsogbu nwoke na nwanyị na ikike ụmụ nwanyị, ma mee ka mmegide ya na ụlọ ọrụ mba dị iche iche sikwuo ike
O lekwasịrị anya n'inweta nkwado maka okwu gbasara ọbụbụeze nri, iweghachite okwu ahụ bụ 'onye ọrụ ugbo' ma mepụta njirimara ndị ọrụ obodo n'ofe ókèala na ọdịbendị mba
La Vía Campesina na-ejikọkwa aka na òtù ndị ọzọ na ndị na'abụghị gọọmentị (NGOs) iji mee ka ọnụnọ mba ụwa ya sie ike
Mkpebi ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya bụ isi na ọrụ La Vía Campesina, a raara ya nye nnọchiteanya ziri ezi na itinye aka nke ndị niile sonyere, na-eme mgbanwe nhazi mgbe ọ dị mkpa
Echiche nke ndị mmadụ gburugburu ụwa dị mkpa iji nyochaa ma melite mmepụta nri na ọbụbụeze ụwa
Akụkụ nke mgbalị a maka ịha nhata n'etiti ndị otu ahụ bụ ịmepụta njirimara ndị ọrụ ugbo
A na-akpọ iweghachite njirimara a 're-peasantization'

Dị ka Desmarais si kwuo (2008), okwu ahụ bụ 'onye ọrụ ugbo' n'asụsụ Bekee nwere ihe jikọrọ ya na feudalism, mana n'asụsụ na ọnọdụ ndị ọzọ, ihe ọ pụtara sara mbara; campesino sitere na okwu campo, nke pụtara 'obodo', nke na-ejikọta ndị mmadụ na ala
Nkọwa feudalist a bụ otu ihe mere nzukọ ahụ ji họrọ ịghara ịsụgharị aha ya n'asụsụ Bekee
N'ọnwa Nọvemba 2018, La Vía Campesina natara XV Navarra International Prize for Solidarity (Premio Internacional Navarre a la So solidaridad)
Na June 2018, ndị kwụụrụ onwe, ọtụtụ na ọtụtụ omenala, bụ nke na-adabere kpamkpam na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma ọ bụ nke akụ na ụba ọ bụla, enwetara onyinye nrite nke Lush Spring Prize Prize Award

N'afọ 2015, nzukọ ahụ natara onyinye site na Latin American Scientific Society for Agroecology (SOCLA) 'n'ịghọta ihe atụ ya nke ọgụ na-adịghị agwụ ike maka agroeconology na ikike nke ndị ọrụ ugbo, n'imezu ọrụ ya ilekọta ụwa, inye ụwa nri, chekwaa ụdị dị iche iche ma mee ka mbara ala dị jụụ, site n'
Na 2004, La Vía Campesina nwetara onyinye nturu ugo International Human Rights Award site na Global Exchange, na San Francisco
La Vía Campesina bụ òtù na-eme ihe ike, na mpaghara na nke mba
Ndị otu si mba ịrị asatọ na otu, nke a haziri n mpaghara itoolu
Kọmitii Nhazi Mba Nile na-anọchite anya otu nwoke na otu nwanyị na mpaghara ọ bụla na maysa onye ntorobịa na kọntinent ọ ọwụwa anyanwụ, nke ọkara ahọpụtara site na ndị otu mpaghara ha
N'inwe ihe dị ka òtù 182 nke obodo na nke mba dị iche iche dị na mmegharị ahụ, La Via Campesina na-anọchite anya ndị ọrụ ugbo 200 gburugburu ụwa

Dị ka Menser si kwuo (2008), La Via Campesina bụ ihe atụ nke ihe ịga nke ọma na mgbasawanye nke mmegharị mba na mba n'ihe gbasara ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya n'ihi usoro nhazi ya na mgbanwe ya iji hụ na nnọchiteanya ziri ezi
Ndị nnọchiteanya si n'ógbè ọ bụla na-ezukọ na Nzukọ Mba Nile ihe dịka afọ anọ ọ ga-abụ
E nwere nzukọ ndị gara aga na Mons na 1993, Tlaxcala City na 1996, Bangalore na 2000, São Paulo na 2004, Maputo na 2008, Jakarta na 2013, na Derio na 2017
Ngalaba odeakwụkwọ mba ụwa na-agbanwe ebe etiti ya kwa afọ 4 dabere na mkpebi e mere na Nzukọ Mba Nile
Ebe ndị gara aga bụ Belgium (1993-1996), Honduras (1997-2004), Indonesia (2005-2013) na Harare (2013-2021)
Kemgbe Nọvemba 2021, odeakwụkwọ ahụ nọ na Bagnolet, France
Onye nhazi nke ugbu a bụ Morgan Ody, onye na-emepụta akwụkwọ nri si Bretagne, France, otu (La Confédération paysanne na European Coordination Via Campesina (ECVC)
E leghaara nwoke na nwanyị anya dị ka ihe atụ na mmalite nke mmegharị ahụ
Mgbe a bịanyere aka na Nkwupụta Managua - onye bu ụzọ na La Vía Campesina - mmadụ asatọ niile nọ ebe ahụ bụ ụmụ nwoke
Ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ ugbo malitere itinye aka ma na'ịgba mbọ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị n'oge Nzukọ Mba Nile na Tlaxcala na 1996
Na nzukọ a, ha kpebiri ịmepụta kọmitii raara onwe ya nye ikike ụmụ nwanyị na nsogbu okike, nke mesịrị ghọọ Kọmiti Ụmụ nwanyị nke Vía Campesina
Ụmụ nwanyị nọ na kọmitii ahụ tinyekwara aka nke ukwuu n'ịdezi atụmatụ nke ọnọdụ isi nkuku na ọbụbụeze nri nke e gosipụtara na World Food Summit na 1996
Ha gụnyere ahụike dị ka ihe atụ maka mmepụta nri na-enweghị agro-chemicals, yana mkpa ụmụ nwanyị itinye aka na mgbanwe iwu n'ihi na a na'egbochi ụmụ nwoke itinye akwụkwọ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
Ụmụ nwanyị nke La Vía Campesina ka na-arụ ọrụ maka nnọchiteanya ka ukwuu na itinye aka nke ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọrụ ugbo, ọkachasị n'ọkwa ndị ndu

La Vía Campesina webatara ikike nke ọchịchị nri na Nzukọ nri ụwa na 1996 dị ka 'ikike nke ndị mmadụ inwe nri ahụike na omenala kwesịrị ekwesị nke a na-emepụta site na ụzọ na-adigide na ikike ha ịkọwapụta nri na usoro ugbo nke ha' Okwu ahụ bụ 'ọdịbendị kwesịrị ekwesị' na-egosi na nri dịnụ ma nwee ike ịnweta maka ndị mmadụ kwesịrị dabara na ọdịbendụ nke ndị na'eri ya
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ngwaahịa ọka wit a kwadoro na nke a na-ebubata agaghị adaba n'okpuru ụdị a n'ala ebe nri ọka bụ ihe ndabere nke nri ọdịnala
Nchịkwa nri dị iche na nchekwa nri
A kọwapụtara nchekwa nri dị ka 'nweta anụ ahụ, mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, na akụ na ụba maka nri zuru oke, dị nchebe, ma na-edozi ahụ
n'oge niile iji zute nri na nri [ndị mmadụ] họọrọ maka ndụ dị mma ma dị ndụ' site n' nke D
Moyo na nzukọ kwa afọ nke American Society of International Law na 2007
Nchebe nri na-elekwasị anya n'inye nri maka mmadụ niile site n'ụzọ ọ bụla dị mkpa, ma ọ bụ site na mmepụta mpaghara maọ bụ mbubata ụwa
N'ihi ya, iwu akụ na ụba metụtara nchekwa nri na-emekarị ka ọrụ ugbo nke nwere ike ịmepụta nri dị ọnụ ala
Friedmann na-akọwa usoro nri dị ka usoro na'okpuru iwu nke mmepụta na oriri nke nri n'ụwa niile
A na-eji oge mgbanwe na mmepụta nri nke na'ihi mgbanwe dị ịrịba ama na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, na akụ na ụba mara ọchịchị nri
Enwere ike ịkpọ ọnọdụ dị ugbu a nke mmepụta nri zuru ụwa ọnụ 'usoro nri ụlọ ọrụ' n'ihi oke nke inye na nhazi nri na ngalaba onwe
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, ụlọ ọrụ US nwere ikike ịchịkwa mmepụta nri site na ịnye ndị ọrụ ugbo obere, nke na-enye ha ohere isonye na uru na enweghị ihe ize ndụ nke ọrụ ubi, dị ka ihu igwe na ọrịa
Usoro nri bụ nsonaazụ nke ọgụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị n'etiti ndị otu na-ese okwu maka ịchịkwa otu esi emepụta nri na echiche, dị ka McMichael si kwuo

Ọchịchị nri ụlọ ọrụ malitere na echiche akụ na ụba neoliberal nke na-akpali site na arụmọrụ na nnwere onwe azụmahịa, ma kwuo na mba kwesịrị ilekwasị anya na mgbalị na akụ ha na mmepụta ngwaahịa na ọrụ ebe ha nwere uru karịa mba ndị ọzọ (ya bụ, ngwaahịa ha kacha mma na imepụta), dịka Philip McMichael kwuru
Usoro nri ụlọ ọrụ adịla naanị maka afọ 100 gara aga, ma e jiri ya tụnyere puku afọ tupu mmepụta ihe na Green Revolution

Vicoa bụ ụdị osisi na-agbasa okooko osisi nke sitere na agbụrụ elecampane n'ime Asteraceae (ezinụlọ ifuru anwụ A na-ahụ ya n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Afrika ma gbasaa gafee Eshia ruo Indochina
Ọ bụ Alexandre Henri Gabriel de Cassini (Cass) kọwara ya na 1829, mana e mechara tinye ụdị ahụ na Pentanema genus (nakwa n'ime ezinụlọ Asteraceae)
Ruo mgbe nyocha nke mkpụrụ ndụ na 2018, kpebiri na ọ bụ ụdị dị iche
Ha bụ ahịhịa na-adị kwa afọ ma ọ bụ nke na-adịgide adịgide, nke nwere akwụkwọ dị mfe (nke a na-ekewaghị ma ọ bụ na-ekewaraghị), ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ zuru ezu (nke a naghị ekewa)

A na-ahazi akwụkwọ ndị ahụ n'ụzọ dị iche iche (na ọkwa dị iche iche n'akụkụ ogwe osisi ahụ), na eriri pinnately (a na-a haziri akwara ndị dị n'akụkụ ọ bụla nke isi akwara ahụ) ma ha na-abụkarị amplexicaule (ala na-agbasa ma na-ejide ogwe osisi) na ala
Ha nwere okooko osisi ndị nwere naanị ha, isi na-egbuke egbuke (ray floret gbara okooko osisi diski gburugburu), nke bụ ma axillary (n'akụkụ nkwonkwo akwụkwọ) ma ọ bụ akwụkwọ na-emegide
Ha nwere peduncle (ogwe okooko osisi), na bracts involucral nke na-agbakọta (na-ekpuchi) n'ọtụtụ ahịrị
Achenes (otu mkpụrụ indehiscent) bụ subterete (nke dị okirikiri na mpaghara) na pappus (tuft ma ọ bụ mgbanaka nke ntutu ma ọ bụ ibe a na-ebu n'elu ovary) nke bristles na-ahaghị nhata

A mụrụ ya n'akụkụ ụfọdụ nke Afrika na Eshia

Site n'àgwàetiti Cape Verde, (Macaronesia), mgbe ahụ mba Afrịka nke; Angola, Benin, Burkina Faso, Central African Republic, Chad, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Guinea-Bissau, Ivory Coast, Malawi, Mali, Mauritania, Mozambique, Senegal, Somalia, Sudan, Tanzania, Togo, Uganda, Zambia na Zimbabwe

Obodo India; East Himalaya, India, Nepal, Pakistan, Sri Lanka na West Himalaya
N'ikpeazụ, akụkụ Indochina; Myanmar, Thailand na Vietnam
Ụfọdụ ụdị dị ka Vicoa indica ejirila ya mee ihe na ọgwụ ọdịnala, na Himalayas
A na-eji mgbọrọgwụ ahụ agwọ nsogbu akụrụ ma jiri akwụkwọ ya mee ihe maka nsogbu afọ
N’ụbọchị ọ bịarutere obodo ahụ, iji sọpụrụ ndị ogbugbu ahụ metụtara, ọ gara n’ogige ncheta nke Gisozi Genocide Memorial Center

N'okwu ya banyere ịdị n'otu na ime n'udo, o kwuru na amụma ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ugbu a ezughị ezu iji mee ka udo dị, ma kwuo dị ka ihe atụ na ncheta ahụ ekwenyeghị Hutus bụ onye nwụkwara n'oge mgbukpọ ahụ
O kwusiri ike na a ga-akpụga ndị mere mpụ ogbugbu nakwa ndị mere mpụ agha na mpụ megidere mmadụ n'ụlọ ikpe ikpe
E mechara nyefee okwu ya n'ụlọ ikpe ka ejidechara ya dị ka ihe akaebe nke ntụgharịgharị mgbukpọ
N'ụbọchị ọ bịarutere mba ahụ, iji kwanyere ndị e gburu na mgbukpọ ahụ ùgwù, ọ gara Gisozi Genocide Memorial Centre
N'okwu ya banyere ịdị n'otu na nkwekọrịta, o kwuru na usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị ugbu a ezughị iji weta nkwekọrịta, ma kwuo dị ka ihe atụ na ncheta ahụ anabataghị ndị Hutus nwụrụ n'oge mgbukpọ ahụ
O kwusiri ike na a ga-akpọta ndị mere mgbukpọ agbụrụ yana ndị mere mpụ agha ndị ọzọ na mpụ megide mmadụ n'ihu ụlọ ikpe ziri ezi
E mechara nyefee okwu ya n'ụlọ ikpe mgbe e jidere ya dị ka ihe akaebe nke ntụgharị mgbukpọ

Victoire Sidémého Dzidudu Dogbé Tomegah (amụrụ na ọnwa 23 Disemba na afọ 1959) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mba Togolese onye jere ozi dị ka praịm minista nke mba Togo kemgbe ọnwa 28 Septemba na afọ 2020
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ nwere ọfịs ahụ

Tupu ọ bụrụ onye isi gọọmentị, Tomegah Dogbé bụbu Minista nke Grassroots Development, Handicrafts, Youth and Youth Employment na Gọọmentị Komi Sélom Klassou na onye isi oche nke Onye isi ala Faure Essozimna Gnassingbé

N'afọ 2008, mgbe ọ nọ n'ọfịs United Nations Development Programme na Benin, Onye isi ala nke mba ahụ Faure Essozimna Gnassingbé na Praịm Minista Gilbert Houngbo gwara Dogbé Tomégah ka ọ jikwaa ọfịs onye nnọchi anya Minista na Praịma Minista na-ahụ maka mmepe na ntọala nke e mepụtara na mba Togo
N'afọ 2010, mgbe a họpụtara onye isi ala Faure Gnassingbé ọzọ, a họpụtara Tomegah Dogbé ka ọ bụrụ Minista na-ahụ maka mmepe, ọrụ ndị ntorobịa na ọrụ ndị ntụrụndụ na nke abụọ nke Gilbert Houngbo
Ọ nọgidere na-arụ ọrụ minista ya na gọọmentị nke mbụ nke Kwesi Ahoomey-Zunu site na afọ 2012 ruo an afọ 2013 na gọọmentụ nke abụọ nke Ahoomey na-Zunu sitere na afọ 2013 ruo na afọ 2015
Mgbe ntuli aka onye isi ala nke Eprel 2015, Komi Sélom Klassou nọchiri Ahoomey-Zunu dị ka praịm minista na ọnwa 5 June nke afọ 2015
Klaassou guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ya na 28 June 2015 nke Tomegah Dogbé ka nọgidere na-enwe Ministry of Development at the Base, crafts, youth and youth employee
Onye isi ala Faure Gnassingbe họpụtara Tobegah Dogbe dịka praịm minista na ọnwa 28 Septemba nke afọ 2020 mgbe Komi Selom Klassou gbara arụkwaghịm

Obong Victor Bassey Attah (amụrụ na 20 Nọvemba 1938) bụ Gọvanọ nke Akwa Ibom Steeti na Naịjirịa site na 29 Mee 1999 ruo 29 Mee 2007
Ọ bụbụ onye otu Board of Trustees nke People's Democratic Party (PDP), mana ọ mesịrị sonyere na Patị All Progressives Congress
A mụrụ Obong Victor Attah na 20 Nọvemba 1938
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndri na 1956
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta na Leeds College of Art nakwa post graduate diplọma na Building Science na Mahadum Liverpool na 1965
O ritere ohere ịgụ akwụkwọ n'efu iji gụọ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Columbia dị na New York, ebe ọ nwetara MA na Advanced Architectural Design and Planning
Ọ gakwara Kennedy Graduate School of Governance na Mahadum Harvard
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ewu ụlọ na Caribbean, New York City, na Nigeria
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi ala nke Nigerian Institute of Architects

O so na Peoples Democratic Movement nke Shehu Musa Yar'Adua duziri na mmemme mgbanwe Sani Abacha nke a kwụsịrị ya na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dịka Atiku Abubakar, Abdullahi Aliyu Sumaila, Magaji Abdullahi, Chuba Okadigbo na Sunday Afolabi
A họpụtara Victor Attah ka ọ bụrụ gọvanọ nke Akwa Ibom n'afọ 1999 na Patị PDP nke Akwa Ibom, a họpụtakwara ya ọzọ n'afọ 2003
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Forum of the 36 Governors of Nigeria n'afọ 2003
N'afọ 2001, Attah gara United States ya na ihe ruru mmadụ iri abụọ na otu, ha gara ichọ ndị na-etinye ego na mba ọzọ
Nleta a na ndị ọzọ rụpụtara ihe a na-ahụ anya
O kwere nkwa imeziwanye telecoms, ọkụ latrịk na akụrụngwa njem ụgbọelu, na imegharị Silicon Valley na Uyo
O mere atụmatụ iwu ọdụ ụgbọ elu na Uyo tupu ọ hapụ ọrụ na 2007
Ọ tọrọ ntọala maka nguzobe nke Akwa Ibom State University of Technology
Attah pụtara ịzọ maka nhọpụta onye isi ala nke Peoples Democratic Party na 2007, mana o mechara pụọ
Obong Victor Attah lara ezumike nká na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mgbe ọ tụfuru ọkwa onye isi ala PDP na 2007
Ya na nwunye ya Alison onye na-arịa ọrịa shuga Type 2 nọrọ ọtụtụ oge
Na Machị 2008, Victor Attah sonyeere ExecutiveAction, ndụmọdụ nke na-enyere ụlọ ọrụ aka ijikwa nsogbu na gburugburu azụmahịa siri ike

Na Nọvemba 24, 2018, na nkwupụta ihu ọha, Gọvanọ Udom Emmanuel nke Akwa Ibom steeti, gbanwere aha Akwa Ibom International Airport ka ọ bụrụ Victor Attah International Airport, A kpọrọ ya aha onye bụbu gọvanọ iji kwanyere ya ùgwù maka ịbụ onye guzobere ọdụ ụgbọ elu ahụ mgbe ọ nọ n'ọchịchị site na 1999 ruo 2007
Àtụ AkwaIbomStateGovernors
Victor Adebukunola Banjo, bido n'abalị mbụ nke ọnwa (Eprel afọ 1930 rue n'abalị irí abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 1967) bụ onye colonel na ndị agha Naijiria
Ọ lụrụ agha na Biafran Army n'oge Agha Obodo Naịjirịa
Gọọmentị Aguyi Ironsi boro Banjo ebubo na ọ bụ onye na-agba izu megide Praịm Minista Naijiria Abubakar Tafawa Balewa
E boro ya ebubo na ọ kpara nkata iwe ọchịchị megide onye isi ala Biafra Odumegwu Ojukwu ma gbuo ya n'ihi ya
Onye ọka ikpe agha mbụ nke Ojukwu kwuru na ọ bụghị ihe akaebe zuru ezu iji maa ya ikpe maka ebubo ọchịchị, mana ụlọ ikpe ndị agha nke abụọ mara ya ikpe
Lieutenant Colonel Banjo bụ onye nduzi Naijiria mbụ nke bụ Electrikal Injinia na Mekanical Injinia Corps nke ndị agha Naijiria
Ọ sonyeere ndị agha n'afọ 1953 dị ka Warrant Officer nke iri ise na abụọ
Ọ bụ onye Naijiria nke iri na isii a ga-enye ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ
Ngwaahịa nke Royal Military Academy Sandhurst, ọ nwetakwara BSc ya na injinia igwe
Nsogbu ya malitere mgbe nnupụisi nke abalị irí na ise nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 1966, nke mere ka Major-General Johnson Aguiyi-Ironsi nwee ike
Ụbọchị atọ mgbe Aguiyi-Ironsi batara n'ọchịchị, a kpọrọ Banjo n'ọfịs nke Onye Ọchịagha Kasị Elu ma jide ya mgbe ọ ka na-echere ịhụ onye isi ala
Banjo, onye Yoruba, nwara ịgbachitere onye ọrụ Yoruba , [onye?] mana Lieutenant Colonel G
Kurubo na Major P
Anwuna jidere ya ma tụba ya n'ụlọ mkpọrọ site n'aka General Aguiyi-Ironsi
E boro ya ebubo na ọ na-eme atụmatụ igbu onye isi ala
Banjo kwupụtara na aka ya dị ọcha, mana ekweghị ka ikpe ya
A na-enyo enyo [onye?] na e jidere Banjo n'ihi na e chere na o nwere aka na nnupụisi nke afọ 1966
Mgbagha ọchịchị ahụ kpasuru iwe agbụrụ ma kewaa ndị agha
E jidere Banjo n'ụlọ mkpọrọ dị iche iche n'agbata Jenụwarị afọ 1966 na Mee 1967
Ndị isi ndị agha ọchịagha si na ugwu nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịgba ọchịchị megide Aguiyi-Ironsi, onye Igbo
E gburu Ironsi na Colonel Fajuyi, Gọvanọ nke Western Region
Mgbe a mara Biafra N'abalị iri atọ nke ọnwa Mee afo 1967, Onye isi ala Odumegwu Ojukwu tọhapụrụ Banjo n'ụlọ mkpọrọ dị n'Ebe Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naịjirịa ma bulie ya n'ọkwa Colonel
Mgbe ndị agha Naijiria wakporo Biafra n'abalị isii nke ọnwa Julaị afọ 1967, Ojukwu zigara Banjo na Major Albert Okonkwo ka ha wakpo Naijiria
Banjo nwere ike weghara Benin City n'ihe na-erughị otu ụbọchị ma nwee ike ịbanye n'ime kilomita narị atọ site na isi obodo Lagos n'oge ahụ
Mgbe a chụpụrụ Banjo na Agha nke Ore, e boro ya na ndị isi ndị ọzọ (Emmanuel Ifeajuna, Phillip Alale, na Sam Agbam) ebubo na ha na-akpa nkata iwe ọchịchị megide Ojukwu
Mgbe ikpe ngwa ngwa, nke ụfọdụ ndị edemede gosipụtara dị ka ndị na-ele mmadụ anya n'ihu, a chọpụtara na ikpe mara ha maka ịgba ọchịchị mgba okpuru ma maa ha ikpe ọnwụ
E gburu ha site na ndị na-agba égbè n'abalị irí abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa Septemba afọ 1967

Victor Ehikhamenor bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe, onye edemede, na onye na-ese foto nke a maara maka ọrụ ya sara mbara nke na-etinye aka na ọdịbendị ọdịbendị mba dị iche iche na postcolonial socioeconomics nke ndụ ndị isi ojii nke oge a
N'afọ 2017, a họpụtara ya (ya na ndị omenkà abụọ ndị ọzọ) ka ọ nọchite anya Naịjirịa na Venice Biennale, nke bụ nke mbụ Naịjirịa ga-anọchite anya ya na mmemme ahụ
A kọwara ọrụ ya dị ka onye na-anọchite anya 'ihe nnọchianya nke iguzogide' na colonialism
A mụrụ Ehikhamenor na Udomi-Uwessan, Edo State, Nigeria, akụkụ nke alaeze Benin oge ochie, nke a maara maka akụkọ ihe mere eme ya
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Nigeria na United States
O si United States lọta n'afọ 2008 iji rụọ ọrụ na Lagos
Nne nne ya bụ onye na-akpa ákwà, nwanne nna ya bụ onye na-ese foto, nna nna nne ya bụ onye na-akpụ ọla, nne ya bụ onye na-ese ihe n'obodo
Ọrụ ya na-emetụta ọrụ nke ukwuu site na ọrụ ndị obodo karịsịa nne nne ya

O kwuru na nkuzi ọdịnala a bụ ntọala nke ya; site na nne nne ya na-eji eriri a na-acha ọcha wee na-akpa ákwà n'ime obodo ya na-ahụ eserese nne ya iji hụ eserese nne ya na ụrọ a na-eme n'ụlọ na icheku ọkụ, na-ekiri ndị obodo ndị ọzọ na-eme akara na mgbidi ụlọ nsọ oge ochie na ebe ịchụàjà

Nke a abụrụla akụkụ na-adịgide adịgide nke ọrụ ya, nke bụ ihe na-enweghị isi, ihe atụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị; ma nwee mmetụta site na ọnụọgụ abụọ nke okpukpe ọdịnala Afrịka na ntinye nke nkwenkwe ọdịda anyanwụ, ncheta na nostalgia
Ehikhamenor emeela ọtụtụ ihe ngosi nka n'ụwa niile
N'afọ 2016, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà iri na otu a kpọrọ ka ha sonyere ndị omenkà iri abụọ na atọ nke Indonesia na nnukwu ngosi na Biennale
Na Jogja National Museum, o gosipụtara ntinye akpọrọ 'The Wealth of Nations'
A kpọrọ Ehikhamenor na Art Dubai na Maachị 2018
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2018, ọ bụkwa otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na Naijiria ahọpụtara izute ma gosipụta ọrụ maka ileta onye isi ala France bụ Emmanuel Macron
Ihe ngosi a, nke ART X Lagos haziri mere na Afrika Shrine, ụlọ oriri na nkwari abalị nke Femi Kuti

E gosipụtala ọrụ ya n'ihe ngosi nke naanị ya na nke otu ya na ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na ụlọ ngosi ihe ngosi n'ụwa niile, nke gụnyere Tyburn Gallery (London), Rele Gallery (Lagos, Nigeria), Jennings Gallery (Washington, DC), 5th Meditationa Biennale (Poznan, Poland), 12th Dak'art Biennale (Dakar, Senegal), Biennale Jogja XIII (Yogyakarta, Indonesia)
Ejirila nka na foto Ehikhamenor mee ihe maka nchịkọta akụkọ yana ihe osise mkpuchi na akwụkwọ ndị edemede dịka Chimamanda Adichie, Helon Habila, Toni Kan, Chude Jideonwo, na Chika Unigwe
E gosipụtala ha na ákwà ma gosipụta ha na ngagharị ejiji mba ụwa
E bipụtara nchịkọta uri mbụ ya, Sordid Rituals, n'afọ 2002
Akwụkwọ ya nke abụọ, Excuse Me! (2012), bu akwụkwọ na-akpa ọchị nke na-abụghị akụkọ ifo, banyere ndụ dị ka onye Africa ma n'ụlọ na ná mba ọzọ, bụ ihe akwadoro na mahadum abụọ Nigeria

O bipụtala ọtụtụ akụkọ ifo na edemede dị egwu na akwụkwọ akụkọ agụmakwụkwọ, magazin na akwụkwọ akụkọ sitere na gburugburu ụwa nke gụnyere The New York Times, CNN Online, Washington Post, Farafina, AGNI Magazine na Wasafiri
E nwere mgbe a kọwara ya dị ka 'otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe n'oge a n'Africa' na otu n'ime '42 African Innovators to Watch'
Na Mee 8, 2017, mgbe ọ na-ekere òkè na Venice Biennale, Ehikhamenor bu ụzọ kpọkuo uche na ihe ọ kọwara dị ka Damien Hirst omenala nke nka Yoruba nke Naijiria
Ihe ngosi nke onye Britain na-ese ihe, nke a na-akpọ Treasures From the Wreck of the Unbelievable, gosipụtara ihe ọkpụkpụ dị iche iche a ga-ele anya dị ka ihe mkpofu a napụtara site na ụgbọ mmiri
Mana otu n'ime ihe ndị e gosipụtara bụ mbipụta nke 'Ori Olokun', ihe osise ọla nchara Ife a ma ama site na narị afọ nke iri na anọ nke a kọwara ugbu a dị ka 'isi ọla edo'
N'ihe banyere ego ahụ, Ehikhamenor dere na Instagram 'Maka ọtụtụ puku ndị mmadụ ọ bu izizi ha na-ekiri nke a, ha agaghị eche Ife, ha agaghị eche Nigeria
Ndị na-eto eto ha ga-etolite mara ọrụ a dị ka nke Damien Hirst
Ka oge na-aga, ọ ga-agafe maka Damien Hirst n'agbanyeghị obere edemede ya
Anyị chọrọ ndị ọzọ na-ede akụkọ ndụ maka anyị echefuru echefu
Okwu ya mere ka okwu a pụta ìhè na mgbasa ozi obodo na nke mba ụwa

N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2018, Ehikhamenor meghere Angels and Muse, nke a kọwara dị ka 'ebe a na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ dị iche iche na Lagos nke nwere ihe osise esere na ahụ aja, iko ndị nwere ntụpọ, na ọkụ mara mma, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ahụmahụ dị egwu na nke mikpuru onwe ya

' Oghere ahụ, nke a na-ejikwa maka ebe obibi ndị na-ese ihe, dị na mpaghara Ikoyi nke Lagos steeti ma nwee 'ọnụ ụlọ dị iche iche,' nke a na-eji maka 'ụlọ ọrụ, ọzụzụ, ịgụ akwụkwọ, nnwale ma ọ bụ ihe ngosi nka, n'etiti ojiji ndị ọzọ
' E gosipụtara ọrụ ahụ na ihe omume nke iri nke usoro Netflix 'Amazing Interiors' na July 2018
Victor Ekpuk (amụrụ n'afọ 1964) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Naijiria nke bi na Washington, DC
Ekpuk bịara bụrụ onye a ma ama site na eserese ya, nke na-egosipụta nkà ihe ọmụma ụmụ amaala Afrịka nke ụdị nka Nsibidi na Uli
Ọrụ Ekpuk na-enyocha ọnọdụ mmadụ nke njirimara na ọha mmadụ
Ọ na-esite n'ọtụtụ ihe mpụtara nke gbanyere mkpọrọgwụ na okwu nka nke Africa na nke ụwa
N'afọ 1989, Victor nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Fine Art (BFA), site na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo, Ife, Nigeria, ebe o bu ụzọ nyochaa nkà ihe ọmụma nke Nsibidi
Akụ̀ na ụba ya nke akara na ihe ọ pụtara mere ka ọ gaa n'ihu inyocha eserese dị ka edemede, na ịmepụta Glyphs nke Ekpuk
Na mbipụta 2017 nke Diaspora Quarterly, Visual Collaborative kwupụtara ọrụ Ekpuk na ihe nketa nke nka Africa

Ihe osise ya dị na nchịkọta onwe ya na nke ọha dịka Smithsonian Institution National Museum of African Art, Newark Museum, The World Bank, University of Maryland University College, Hood Museum, United States Art in Embassies Art Collection na Fidelity Investment Art Collection

E gosipụtara ọrụ Ekpuk n'ọtụtụ ebe nke gụnyere Krannert Art Museum, Champaign, Illinois; The Fowler Museum, Los Angeles; Museum of Art and Design (MAD), New York City; Newark Museum, New Jersey; The World Bank, Washington DC; Smithsonian Institution, National Museum of African Art, Washington DC; New Museum of Contemporary Art, New York City; Johannesburg Biennial, South Africa
Victor Gordon (amụrụ n'afọ 1953) bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri nke amụrụ na South Africa
Gordon bụ onye na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe
Ọ na-emepụta ihe owuwu, eserese na foto
A mụrụ Gordon n'oge oge ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Africa
O tolitere na Alberton, obodo dị nso na Johannesburg tupu ezinụlọ ya akwaga Hillbrow
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Germiston nke ndị ọcha naanị (1966 -1968) na Parktown Boys High School (1968 -1970)
E jidere ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise mgbe ọ wakporo onye uwe ojii ọcha maka itinye nkịta ya n'elu nwoke ojii na Hillbrow
Nke a mere ka a tụọ ya mkpọrọ ma gosipụta ya n'ụlọ ikpe ụmụaka, ebe a mara ya ikpe maka mwakpo
E debara aha ya n'akwụkwọ na South African Air Force Gymnasium Valhalla (SAAF) n'afọ 1971 n'afọ 1972
Mgbe ọ nọsịrị oge ụfọdụ na London na kọntinent Europe, ọ laghachiri Johannesburg ebe o guzobere otu na 30 Wellington Road na Parktown

N'afọ 1975, ọ kwagara Cape Town, wee laghachi Johannesburg n'afọ 1977 iji mụọ Fine Arts na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand Ndị na-ese ihe Judith Mason, Robert Hodgins, Giuseppe Cattaneo na Paul Stopforth kụziiri ya Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum, o guzoro n'enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma maka Progressive Party na ntuli aka 1982 na Johannesburg Metropolitan City Council na Vrededorp / Mayfair Ward
Ka ọ na-erule n'oge ahụ, ọ bụ onye na-akwado ọgụ megide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ
Na nzuzo ọ gara n'ihu na-eme nka nguzogide
Mahadum nke Witwatersrand (WITS) Students Representative Council (SRC) were Gordon n'ọrụ n'afọ 1982 ruo 1987 dị ka Onye isi nchịkwa ụmụ akwụkwọ

Ọ chịkọtara nchịkwa SRC nke Mahadum site na 1982 ruo 1987 na ikike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị elu dị ka onye na-ahụ maka nchịkwa, na-emeziwanye mmetụta nke ndị uwe ojii South Africa na egwu egwu nke ngalaba nchekwa SAP, ime ihe ike na mmegbu na ụmụ akwụkwọ WITS

N'oge nke abụọ e kwupụtara South African State of Emergency na 1985 na 1986 e ji ya mee ihe, n'etiti ihe ndị ọzọ, dị ka onye ozi n'etiti nchịkwa mahadum dị elu na nnọchiteanya iwu ha iji nye Brigadier Jan Coetzee, onyeisi ndị uwe ojii na Protea Police Station na Soweto, akwụkwọ n'aka, n'aha ọtụtụ ụmụ akwụkwọ e jidere
Nke a bụ mgbe ndị uwe ojii SA na-acha ọcha bi na Soweto dum na obodo iri atọ na ise n'ime obodo niile

N'afọ 1987, n'ihi na a kpọrọ ya maka njem nke abụọ nke ọrụ na ndị agha SA, ọ hapụrụ South Africa iji mee ka nka ya na-emegide ịkpa ókè agbụrụ bụrụ nke n'aga ọma na ịmụtakwu ihe ma mesịa biri na Australia
O nwetara nzere masta na Sydney College of the Arts, Mahadum Sydney site na 1988 na 1990
Ihe ngosi mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ bụ 'Behold the Lands where Satan Reigns' mere na Waterside Workers Federation Hall na Sussex Street Sydney na June na July 1990
Gordon nwere ụmụ abụọ, Sarah na Hannah, ma biri na Orange, NSW, Australia

Gordon kụziri ihe n'oge ụfọdụ na Sydney College of The Arts na Mahadum nke Sydney 1989-1993, na Mahaduma nke Western Sydney na kọleji dị iche iche nke Metropolitan TAFE N'afọ 1999 ọ kwagara Broken Hill, New South Wales, ebe ọ na-elekọta Western Institute of TAFE (WIT) Art School ruo n'afọ 1993 mgbe ọ kwagara na WIT's Orange Campus, New SouthWales, iji duzie nnukwu ụlọ akwụkwọ nka, mmewe na egwụ ruo mgbe onyinye ego gọọmentị New South Wales maka ọmụmụ nka kwụsịrị na 2013

Blake Prize 1996 Finalist
Ihe nrite Sulman na 2007 Finalist, Portrait of Mike Parr Mike Parr na MCA 2006

Victor Moses (amụrụ na 12 Disemba 1990) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba egwu dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ n'akụkụ ọ bụla maka klọb Russia Spartak Moscow
A na-ejikwa ya dịka onye na-agba ọsọ n'azụ mgbe ụfọdụ n'oge ọrụ ya
Moses malitere ọrụ ya na Asọmpi na Crystal Palace, tupu arụmọrụ ya adọta anya Wigan Athletic, ebe o mere Njikọ Njikọ mbụ ya na 2010
Mgbe afọ abụọ gasịrị, egwuregwu ya emeela ka ọ dịkwuo mma ruo n'ókè nke ndị mmeri Europe bụ Chelsea nwere mmasị, ọ bịanyere aka na ha n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2012
N'agbanyeghị goolu iri na asọmpi niile n'oge oge mbụ ya, ọ nọrọ oge nke abụọ ya na Liverpool, nke atọ ya na Stoke City na nke anọ ya na West Ham United
A kpọghachiri Moses na Chelsea maka oge 201617 ebe ọ pụtara 34 ka Chelsea meriri Njikọ Njikọ
Mgbe ọ na-enweghị mmasị n'oge mkpọsa ọzọ, Moses nọrọ na Fenerbahçe, Inter Milan na Spartak Moscow n'oge ndị na-esonụ

A mụrụ ya na Naịjirịa, Moses nọchitere anya ndị otu ndị ntorobịa England n'okpuru afọ 16, n'okpuru 17, n'okpuru 19 na n'okpuru 21, mana ọ họọrọ igwu egwu maka Naịjirịa ma ọ bụghị ịbụ onye zuru oke maka England
O mere nke mbụ ya maka ndị otu Naijiria n'afọ 2012 wee nweta 38 caps ma gbaa bọọlụ ugboro 12 tupu ọ laa ezumike nká na egwuregwu mba ụwa n'afọ 2018
Ọ gbara na mkpọsa mmeri nke Naijiria na 2013 Africa Cup of Nations, yana mkpọsa na 2014 FIFA World Cup na 2018 FIFA World Cup
A mụrụ Moses na Lagos, nwa nke onye ụkọchukwu Ndị Kraịst
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu, e gburu nne na nna ya na ọgba aghara okpukpe na Kaduna mgbe ndị na-eme ọgba aghụghọ wakporo ụlọ ha
Moses na-egwu bọọlụ n'okporo ámá n'oge ahụ
Otu izu mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, mgbe ndị enyi ya zoro ya, ndị ikwu ya kwụrụ ya ụgwọ ka ọ gaa UK iji rịọ maka mgbaba
E debere ya na ezinụlọ nkuchi na South London
Ọ gara Stanley Technical High School (nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Harris Academy) na South Norwood
N'ịbụ onye Scout na-egwu bọọlụ na Tandridge Njikọ maka Cosmos 90 FC, Crystal Palace bịakwutere ya, na ámá egwuregwu Selhurst Park nke klọb ahụ dị n'okporo ámá dị anya site n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ya

N'ịbụ onye e nyere ọnọdụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Ugo, Palace tụụrụ ya aro ka ọ gaa ụlọ akwụkwọ Whitgift na-akwụ ụgwọ na Croydon, ebe onye bụbu onye Arsenal na Chelsea bụ Colin Pates na-azụ ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụlọ akwụkwọ
Moses malitere ịpụta na 14 mgbe ọ gbasịrị goolu 50 maka ndị nọ n'okpuru afọ 14 nke Palace

N'ịgba bọọlụ afọ atọ na Whitgift na Palace, Moses gbara ihe karịrị 100 goolu yana inyere Whitgift aka imeri ọtụtụ iko ụlọ akwụkwọ, gụnyere iko mba ebe Moses gbara goolu ise niile na nke ikpeazụ megide Ụlọ akwụkwọ na-agwọ ọrịa Grimsby na Ama egwuregwu Walkers, Leicester
Moses mere egwuregwu mbụ ya maka Palace mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii na 6 Nọvemba 2007 na 1 China na Cardiff City na Asọmpi
Ọ nọgidere n'ọnọdụ ya n'akụkụ mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị wee gbaa goolu mbụ ya dị elu na 12 Machị 2008 na 1 - 1 ise na West Bromwich Albion
N'ozuzu, Moses gbara bọọlụ ugboro iri na isii n'afọ 2007 ka Palace ruru asọmpi asọmpi Asọmpi ebe ha meriri Bristol City

Na ngwụcha oge ahụ, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ na Selhurst Park, nke mere ka onye njikwa Neil Warnock nwee obi ụtọ, onye kwuru, 'Ntinye aka Victor bụ nnukwu ihe maka klọb ahụ; agwa m Victor na ọ nwere ike ịga elu dịka ọ chọrọ
Ọ na-akawanye mma kwa ụbọchị ma enwere m obi ụtọ na ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta a n'ihi na ọ bụ onye ọkpụkpọ ga-esi n'ike gaa n'ike
Moses gbara ugboro abụọ n'ime egwuregwu 32 n'afọ 2008 n'ihi na Palace nwere mkpọsa na-akụda mmụọ, na-agwụ na ọnọdụ nke iri na ise
N'afọ 2009, Moses gbara goolu isii n'egwuregwu asatọ mana Palace nwere nnukwu nsogbu ego ma klọb ahụ batara n'ọchịchị na Jenụwarị 2010
N'ụbọchị ikpeazụ nke Jenụwarị 2010, ọ rụzuru £ 25 nde na Wigan Athletic nke Njikọ Njikọ mgbe Palace banyere na nchịkwa
O mere nke mbụ ya na 6 Febụwarị 2010 dị ka onye na-anọchi Sunderland na 1 China draw
Na 20 Machị 2010, Moses bịara dị ka onye nọchiri Burnley wee nweta enyemaka mbụ ya maka klọb ahụ, na-eguzobe Hugo Rodallega maka onye mmeri oge mmerụ ahụ
Ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya maka Wigan na 3 Mee 2010 megide Hull City
Moses merụrụ ahụ ugboro abụọ na mbido oge 2010 na 1911, ọ na-esikwa ya ike ịlaghachi n'ime otu mbụ n'ihi mmụba asọmpi maka ebe
Ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya n'egwuregwu ahụ n'ụbọchị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2010 na mmeri ya na West Bromwich Albion
Mgbe ọpụpụ nke onye na-agba ọsọ Charles N'Zogbia gasịrị, Moses ghọrọ onye mbido Wigan na oge 2011 na 12
N'abalị iri n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2011, ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya n'oge ahụ megide West Brom bụ goolu mbụ ọ gbara kemgbe ọ gbara otu otu otu egwuregwu ahụ n'oge gara aga
N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2012, Wigan nabatara arịrịọ nke ise site n'aka Chelsea mgbe ha mechara zute ọnụahịa Wigan na-arịọ arịrịọ mgbe arịrịọ anọ na-enweghị isi
E nyere onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ ikike ịgwa Chelsea okwu
N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, Chelsea kwupụtara na ebufeela Moses
Moses gbara egwuregwu mbụ ya maka Chelsea mgbe ọ pụtara dị ka onye na-anọchi anya ndị na-asọmpi West London Ogige QueensRangers na 15 Septemba

Moses mere nke mbụ ya zuru oke maka Chelsea mgbe ọ malitere egwuregwu Iko Njikọ megide Wolverhampton Wanderers wee gbaa goolu mbụ ya mgbe nkeji iri asaa na otu gachara n'egwuregwu nke mechara na Blues
Moses malitere egwuregwu mbụ ya na Nordsjælland
N'abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba, a kpọrọ Moses Man of the Match megide Manchester United na Iko Njikọ, egwuregwu Chelsea meriri 5o4
N'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2012, Moses gbara goolu mbụ ya na Njikọ Njikọ maka Chelsea n'egwuregwu ya na Swansea City, nke gwụrụ na 1 01

Ụbọchị anọ ka e mesịrị, ọ gbara goolu mbụ ya na Njikọ Njikọ maka Chelsea megide Shakhtar Donetsk; Moses nọchiri Oscar na nkeji nke 79 wee gaa n'ihu na nkuku Juan Mata na sekọnd fọdụrụ iji nweta mmeri 3 South2

N'ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2013, Moses meghere akara ya n'afọ ahụ site n'ịgba ọsọ dị ike n'akụkụ ala mgbe ọ na-egwu na agba nke atọ nke Iko FA megide Southampton, dịka Chelsea si n'azụ wee merie ndị Saints n'azụ
Moses gbara goolu mbụ ya na Europa League maka Chelsea na mmeri 3 na 1 n'ụlọ megide Rubin Kazan, wee gbaa nke abụọ ya na egwuregwu ọzọ otu izu ka e mesịrị
Ọ gara n'ihu n'ụdị ya dị mma na asọmpi ahụ site n'ịgba goolu mbụ nke otu ya na mmeri 1 South na Basel na 25 Eprel

Ọ gbakwara bọọlụ n'egwuregwu ọzọ megide Basel mgbe Blues meriri 3o1 n'ụlọ wee nweta òkè ha na Europa League Final, egwuregwu nke Moses na-egosighị mana Blues meriri 2o1 megide Benfica na Amsterdam na 15 Mee
Na 2 Septemba 2013, Moses bịanyere aka na Liverpool na nkwekọrịta mgbazinye ego ogologo oge
Ọ gbara bọọlụ na nke mbụ ya na 16 Septemba megide Swansea City na 2 na-aga n'ihu
N'abalị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2014, ọ gbara goolu mbụ nke mmeri 2 na AFC Bournemouth na agba nke anọ nke iko FA
N'ihi ụdị Raheem Sterling n'oge oge 2013 na 14, Moses chọtara ohere siri ike ịbịa n'okpuru Brendan Rodgers, na-egwu egwuregwu 22 nke naanị itoolu n'ime ha malitere
N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2014, Moses sonyeere Stoke City na mgbazinye maka oge 2014 na afọ 15
O mere egwuregwu Njikọ Njikọ mbụ ya maka Stoke City na 30 Ọgọstụ na mmeri 1 na Manchester City
Na mmeri Stoke meriri Newcastle United na 29 Septemba, Moses nyere aka maka otu goolu Peter Crouch gbara ma họpụta ya Nwoke nke egwuregwu maka arụmọrụ ya

N'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba, na mmeri ha meriri Swansea City, Moses meriri ntaramahụhụ mgbe ọ gbadatara n'okpuru ihe ịma aka nke Àngel Rangel; mgbe egwuregwu ahụ gasịrị, onye njikwa Swansea Garry Monk kwuru na Moses dara
Onye na-ahụ maka egwuregwu nke ụbọchị nke abụọ bụ John Hartson kwukwara na Moses ghọgburu, mana o mechara rịọ Moses mgbaghara maka okwu ya
Moses gbara goolu mbụ ya maka Stoke na 1 Nọvemba na 2 na West Ham United
O merụrụ ahụ n'apata ụkwụ megide Burnley na 22 Nọvemba nke mere ka ọ ghara ịga izu asatọ
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2015, Moses laghachiri na mbido megide Leicester City, nke mechiri na mmeri Stoke
N'abalị iri abụọ na otu n'ọnwa Febụwarị, Moses gbara penalty na nkeji iri itoolu iji nweta Stoke mmeri iri abụọ na iri na otu na ndị na-asọmpi Midlands Aston Villa na Villa Park
O nwetakwara goolu na mmeri 2 na Everton na 4 Machị

Site na André Schürrle na Mohamed Salah na-apụ na-adịgide adịgide na ịgbazinye ego, n'otu n'otu, a mara ọkwa na onye njikwa Chelsea bụ José Mourinho gbalịrị icheta Moses site na Stoke n'etiti oge, naanị maka onye na-agba ọsọ ịjụ ịlaghachi azụ
Moses merụrụ ahụ n'ọkpụkpụ ụkwụ mgbe ọ na-egwuri egwu megide West Ham na 11 Eprel, nke mere ka ọ ghara ịga n'ihu n'oge fọdụrụnụ
Mgbe oge gara nke ọma na Stoke, Moses laghachiri na Blues wee pụta na egwuregwu anọ niile tupu oge ezumike ma gbaa otu ugboro, megide Paris Saint-Germain FC
Moses mere asọmpi mbụ ya kemgbe ọ laghachiri n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2015 megide Arsenal maka Ọta obodo mgbe ọ nọchiri John Terry na nkeji nke iri asatọ na abụọ
N'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Septemba n'afọ 2015, Moses sonyeere West Ham United na mgbazinye oge
Tupu ọ banye West Ham United na mgbazinye ego, Moses bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ anọ ọhụrụ, nke ga-eme ka ọ nọrọ na Chelsea ruo 2019
N'egwuregwu nke abụọ ya, na 19 Septemba megide Manchester City, Moses gbara naanị goolu West Ham ya, na mmeri 1 02
N'ụbọchị nke ise n'ọnwa Disemba, n'oge egwuregwu ahụ megide Manchester United, Moses nwere mmerụ ahụ n'ọkpụkpụ ụkwụ nke mere ka ọ ghara ịga ruo n'ọnwarị
N'ọnwa Eprel, a kpughere na nkwekọrịta mgbazinye ego nwekwara nhọrọ iji mee ka ọ gaa na njedebe nke oge, mana West Ham kpebiri ịjụ nhọrọ ahụ
Mgbe o masịrị onye njikwa ọhụrụ Antonio Conte n'oge mmalite oge, a gụnyere Moses na ndị otu mbụ
N'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2016, Moses gbara bọọlụ mbụ ya na Chelsea n'ime afọ atọ, na-apụta n'oche maka Eden Hazard megide West Ham United na mmeri 2
N'abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ, Moses bidoro nke mbụ ya wee gbaa goolu mbụ ya kemgbe ọ laghachiri, na agba nke abụọ nke iko EFL megide Bristol Rovers na mmeri 3[[2
Mgbe e merisịrị ya n'azụ azụ, Conte gbanwere n'ime usoro 3[] na Moses na-egwuri egwu dị ka onye na-agbachitere n'akụkụ aka nri na egwuregwu na-esonụ megide Hull City
N'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2016, Moses gbara goolu nke abụọ ya n'egwuregwu ahụ megide Leicester City na mmeri n'ụlọ
Moses gbara egwuregwu iri anọ na asọmpi niile maka Chelsea n'afọ 2016 na afọ iri na asaa, na-agba goolu anọ
Site na Chelsea na-emeri n'asọmpi Premier League, Moses ghọrọ onye egwuregwu Naijiria na-eme ọtụtụ egwuregwu Premier League maka otu mmeri
Moses kpatara nnukwu esemokwu n'oge 2017 FA Cup Final megide Arsenal nke Chelsea meriri 2[]]
Ebe ọ bụ na edepụtara ya maka mmejọ Danny Welbeck na mbụ, e nyere ya ndebanye aha nke abụọ, nke mere ka ọ nweta kaadị uhie, mgbe ọ gbasịrị n'ebe a na-eme ntaramahụhụ
Ọ ghọrọ onye egwuregwu nke ise a chụpụrụ na ngwụcha FA Cup
E mere egwuregwu ahụ ụbọchị ise mgbe bọmbụ Manchester Arena nke mmadụ iri abụọ na atọ, ọtụtụ n'ime ha bụ ụmụaka, nwụrụ
Chelsea eyighị armbands ojii n'oge ọkara mbụ mana o mere n'oge nke abụọ
Mgbe ahụ, Moses, mgbe ọ na-apụ n'ámá egwuregwu wepụrụ nke ya ma tụba ya n'ala, na-akpata iwe na mgbasa ozi mmekọrịta, ọtụtụ na-ebo ya ebubo na ọ naghị egosi nkwanye ùgwù nye ndị nwụrụ anwụ
Moses gbara goolu mmeghe na 2017 FA Community Shield, nke Chelsea meriri ndị na-asọmpi Arsenal na penalties
Na Jenụwarị 2019, Moses bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta mgbazinye ọnwa iri na asatọ na otu Turkey, Fenerbahçe
N'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2019, Moses gbara goolu mbụ ya na Fenerbahçe n'asọmpi ahụ n'asọmpị ahụ n'egwuregwu 2 na Göztepe
Mgbe e belatara nkwekọrịta Fenerbahçe, Moses bịanyere aka na Inter Milan na nkwekọrịta mgbazinye ọnwa isii na nhọrọ ịzụta na 23 Jenụwarị 2020
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị egwuregwu atọ bụbu ndị Premier League sonyeere Inter Milan na windo Jenụwarị, n'akụkụ Ashley Young na Christian Eriksen
O mere klọb mbụ ya na 29 Jenụwarị, na-abịa dị ka onye nọchiri Antonio Candreva na ọkara nke abụọ na mmeri Fiorentina n'ụlọ na nkeji iri na ise nke Coppa Italia
O mere egwuregwu mbụ ya ụbọchị ole na ole mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, na 2 Febụwarị, malite n'aka nri na mmeri 2 na Udinese
N'abalị iri na ise n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2020, Moses sonyeere otu egwuregwu Russian Premier League Spartak Moscow na mgbazinye oge na nhọrọ ịzụta
Ụbọchị abụọ ka e mesịrị n'ụbọchị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Ọktoba, o mere nke mbụ ya na klọb ahụ site na bench na mmeri 3 na 2 megide Khimki
N'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, ọ pụtara nke mbụ ya dị ka onye mbido wee gbaa goolu mbụ ya maka Spartak na mmeri 3 na 1 megide Krasnodar
N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2021, ọ gbara bọọlụ n'egwuregwu ikpeazụ nke 2020 Russian Premier League megide FC Akhmat Grozny iji guzobe akara ikpeazụ nke 2
Isi ihe Spartak nwetara nwetara nwetara nwetara ọnọdụ nke abụọ na ntinye nke Champions League maka klọb ahụ
N'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2021, Chelsea kwupụtara na Moses emechaala ịkwaga Spartak Moscow, na-akwụsị mmekọrịta afọ itoolu ya na klọb ahụ
Spartak mara ọkwa n'otu ụbọchị ahụ na ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ abụọ na klọb ahụ
Na 10 Febụwarị 2022, Moses gbatịkwuru nkwekọrịta ya na Spartak ruo 2024
Moses meriri 2021-22 Russian Cup na klọb ya na 29 Mee na mmeri 2-1 Old Russian Derby meriri Dynamo Moscow

N'agbanyeghị na o si Kaduna, Naịjirịa, Moses họọrọ na mbụ ịnọchite anya ebe obibi ya nke England, na-egosi maka ndị otu na-erubeghị afọ iri na isii, ebe ọ meriri Victory Shield na 2005, na ọkwa na-erughị afọ iri na asaa

Ya na ndị otu ahụ gara 2007 UEFA European U-17 Championship na Belgium, na-agba goolu ugboro atọ (gụnyere naanị goolu na mmeri ikpeazụ na France) iji nyere John Peacock aka na asọmpi ikpeazụ, ebe Spain meriri ha otu goolu, ọ bụ ezie na Moses jisiri ike mechaa dị ka onye kacha gbaa goolu na asọmpi ahụ ma nweta Golden Boot maka ime otú ahụ
N'otu oge okpomọkụ ahụ, ndị otu ahụ gara South Korea maka FIFA U-17 World Cup
Moses mechiri dị ka onye kacha gbaa bọọlụ nke Young Lions, na-agba bọọlụ ugboro atọ na egwuregwu Group B, mana o merụrụ ahụ na mmeri ya meriri Brazil nke mere ka ọ pụọ na asọmpi ahụ
Ndị otu Moses gara n'ihu ruo n'ọkwa nke anọ

Mgbe asọmpi ahụ gasịrị, a kwalitere Moses ka ọ bụrụ onye na-erubeghị afọ iri na asatọ, ma na-agbaso ihe ọ na-eme maka ndị otu mbụ nke Crystal Palace, a kwaliri ya ka ọ bụrụ ndị na-erughị afọ iri na itoolu n'enweghị ihe zuru ezu maka U-18 iji nweta okpu n'ezie
Ọ gara na U-19s na 2008 UEFA European U-19 Championship na Czech Republic, na-egwu egwuregwu abụọ ma na-enweta otu enyemaka ka Young Lions na-enweghị ike ịpụta na Group B
Nkọwa na-etolite ka onye njikwa Stuart Pearce na-eleghara ya anya na Moses ga-alaghachi igwu egwu maka Naịjirịa na 2010 FIFA World Cup
A kwalitere Moses ka ọ bụrụ onye na-erubeghị afọ iri abụọ na otu na mbido oge 2010 na iri na otu wee mee nke mbụ ya megide Uzbekistan na mmeri abụọ
A họpụtara Moses ka ọ gbaa bọọlụ maka Naịjirịa megide Guatemala na Febụwarị 2011, mana a kagburu egwuregwu enyi na enyi
Ọ nabatara oku na Machị 2011 maka egwuregwu Naịjirịa megide Ethiopia na Kenya
Otú ọ dị, a chụpụrụ ya n'egwuregwu ndị ahụ n'ihi na enwetaghị akwụkwọ ya na FIFA iji gbanwee mba n'oge
A mara ọkwa na 1 Nọvemba 2011 na FIFA ewepụla Moses na Shola Ameobi ka ha gwuo egwu maka Naịjirịa

A kpọrọ Moses ka ọ bịa n'òtù ndị ikom iri abụọ na atọ nke Naịjirịa maka iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 2013, na-enweta ntaramahụhụ abụọ n'egwuregwu ikpeazụ ha na Etiopia, nke Naịjarịa chọrọ iji merie iji gafee
Maka nke abụọ, e nyere onye na-edebe goolu nke Etiopia bụ Sisay Bancha akwụkwọ nke abụọ ya na ihe omume ndị dugara na penalty ma chụpụ ya
Ethiopia ejirila ndị nnọchi anya atọ ahụ mee ihe n'ihi ya onye na-ejide ha n'etiti etiti gara n'ime goolu, wee hapụ penalty Moses
Naịjirịa gara n'ihu merie asọmpi ahụ, nke atọ ha
Moses malitere na ngwụcha wee gbaa egwuregwu ahụ dum
A họpụtara Moses maka ndị otu Naịjirịa maka 2014 FIFA World Cup wee malite na egwuregwu mmeghe ha na agba nke 16 megide France ka ha meriri 2 00
Mgbe Gernot Rohr malitere dị ka onye isi nchịkwa Naịjirịa n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2016, Moses gosipụtara mgbe niile na egwuregwu FIFA 2018
Moses nyere Naịjirịa akara n'oge egwuregwu FIFA 2018 megide Algeria na Nọvemba 2016, na-enyere ha aka inweta mmeri 3o1

N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2018, a kpọrọ aha ya na ndị otu mmadụ iri atọ nke Naijiria maka 2018 World Cup na Russia, ebe ọ nwetara ihe dị mkpa megide Argentina, ọ bụ ezie na, akụkụ ya meriri egwuregwu ahụ na nkeji ole na ole iji hụ Argentina site na Naijiria ka e wepụrụ
Mgbe asọmpi ahụ gasịrị, Moses mara ọkwa na 15 Ọgọstụ na ọ lara ezumike nká n'ịgba bọọlụ mba Naịjirịa

Victor Nekesa bụ dọkịta Uganda, onye agha na onye omeiwu
Ọ na-anọchite anya ndị agha nchekwa ndị Uganda (UPDF) na ndị omeiwu nke Uganda
Nekesa bụ dọkịta site na ọrụ
Ọ bụkwa onye ọrụ ndị agha Uganda People's Defense (UPDF) na ọkwa nke Colonel
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu n'akụkụ ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ndị ọzọ na-arụ ọrụ na UPDF gụnyere Charity Bainababo na Jennifer Alanyo site na kansụl nchekwa
Nekasa nwetara ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị elu nke vootu na ngalaba ụmụ nwanyị
Kansụl na-ahụ maka nchekwa họpụtakwara ma họpụta ndị ikom asaa ka ha nọchite anya ndị agha mba ahụ na ndị omeiwu nke Uganda
Nekesa bụ onye agha ọkachamara na dọkịta
Ọ bụ dọkịta nke Yoweri Kaguta Museveni onye isi ala nke mba Uganda
Na omeiwu, Nekesa na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu kọmitii ahụike

O meriri ma 100 na 200 mita na asọmpi Africa nke 1992
Omagbemi gbara nke anọ ọsọ 4 x 100 mita relay na asọmpi mba ụwa nke 1991 ya na ndị otu egwuregwu George Ogbeide, Olapade Adeniken na Davidson Ezinwa
