Victor Omololu Olunloyo (amụrụ n'afọ 1935) bụ onye mgbakọ na mwepụ nke mechara bụrụ gọvanọ Oyo Steeti na Naịjirịa n’ọnwa Ọktoba afọ1983, o jidere ọkwa ọchịchị ahụ nwa obere oge rue mgbe ọchịchị ndị agha nke Muhammadu Buhari were ikike ọchịchị n’ọnwa Disemba afọ 1983
O mechara bụrụ onye ike n'otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchi People's Democratic Party (PDP) na Oyo Steeti
A mụrụ Victor Omololu Sowemimo Olunloyo na Ibadan n’abalị iri na anọ n’ọnwa Eprel, afo 1935
Nna ya, Horatio Olunloyo bụ Onye otu Kraịst na nne ya nwụrụ anwụ Alhaja Bintu Tejumola Abebi Olunloyo onye nwụrụn'ọnwa ọctoba afọ 2013 n'afo otu narị na abụọbụ onye alakụba
Nna ya nwụrụ n'ọnwa Decemba afọ 1948 mgbe Victor Olunloyo dị afọ iri na-atọ
Olunloyo nwetara Akara PhD na Mahadum St Andrews n'afọ1961
Nkọwapụta ya dị na Mkpebi Ọnụọgụ nke Ngwọta nke Eigenvalue Nsogbu nke Sturm – Liouville –dị
O bipụtara ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ na tiori ọnụọgụ ma tinye mgbakọ na mwepụ
A họpụtara Olunloyo dịka Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka mmepe akụ na ụba maka mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ na-afọ 1962 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri abụọ na asaa, n'ụlọ omebe iwu nke Dr
Moses MajekodunmiA họpụtakwara ya ọzọ mgbe a họpụtara Colonel Adeyinka Adebayo dịka gọvanọ ndị agha nke ọdịda anyanwu

Ọnọdụ ndị ọzọ gụnyere Kọmishọna maka mmepe obodo, mmuta (ugboro abụọ), Ọrụ ndị pụrụ iche, Gọọmentị Obodo na Onyeisi omume nke gụnyere ichi eze nke ndị eze abụọ na Naijiria bụ Alaafin nke Oyo, Oba Lamidi Adeyemi III na Soun nke Ogbomosho King Oyewunmi
A họpụtara ya onye isi oche nkeA họpụtara ya onye isi oche nke mmepe ụlọ ọrụ na odịda anyanwụ Naijiria

N'afọ 1983, Olunloyo zọrọ ọkwa gọvanọ nkeOyo steeti na Oyo steeti nke ochie na okpuru otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị National Party of Nigeria (NPN), wee merie onye bụ gọvanọ mgbe ahụ, Bola Ige na okpuru otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Unity Party of Nigeria (UPN), were bido ọchịchị n'ọnwa October afo 1983
Oge ọchịchị ya gwụrụ n'ọnwa atọ mgbe General Muhammadu Buhari were ọchịchị n'ike wee chụpụ gọọmentị ahọpụtara n'ụbọchị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Disemba, afọ 1983
N’ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2002, Olunloyo kwuru na ya ga-abụ onye ga-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ nke steeti Oyo na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ọnwa Eprel 2003
Mana emechara họpụta Rasheed Ladoja dịka onye ga-eji aha otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị PDP dọọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ
N’afọ 2009, ọ bụ onye isi oche otu kọmitii ga-enyocha ọdịda nke otu ngalaba ahịa ọgwụ na Mahadum Ladoke Akintola University of Technology
Panel rụrụ ọrụ ahụ boro onye ọrụ ngo ahụ na gọọmentị steeti ebubo, nke a mere gọvanọ Oyo Steeti Adebayo Alao-Akala ji chere ha ọgụ

A hoputara ya dịka onye isi oche komittii nke otu PDP na-eme atụmatụ na atụmatụ maka ala Ibadan iji kwadebe maka ndọrọ ọchịchi nke afọ 2011, e mekwara ya onye isi oche nke komitti otu PDP n'ahụ maka akụrụ ngwa mgbasa ozi na mgbasa ozi nke steeti
N’afọ 2012, Olunloyo hapụrụ otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị PDP wee banye ACN
Ikike Njikwa
Victor James Osimhen (amụrụ na 29 Disemba 1998) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba ọsọ dị ka onye na-agbachitere Serie A klọb Napoli na ndị otu mba Naijiria
A mụrụ ya na Naijiria, Osimhen malitere ọrụ ya dị elu na Germany na VfL Wolfsburg na 2017
Mgbe otu oge na ọkara gachara na klọb ahụ, ọ kwagara n'akụkụ Belgian Charleroi na mgbazinye na 2018 na 19, tupu ọ kwaga France na Lille
N'afọ 2020, Osimhen gafere na klọb Serie A Napoli maka ego ndekọ klọb nke € 70 nde
Osimhen meriri Ọla edo Ihe nrite buut na 2015 FIFA U-17 Iko Mbaụwa, nke Naịjirịa meriri
O mere nke mbụ ya na mba ụwa na June 2017 wee gbaa bọọlụ na 2019 Iko Mba Afrịka
A mụrụ Osimhen na LagosOlusosun ebe o tolitere) nne na nna si Edo Steeti
Ka ọ na-etolite, onye ọ na-agba bọọlụ bụ Didier Drogba
Osimhen malitere ọrụ ya na Nke kacha Ndị na-eti ihe Ụlọ akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ, nke dị na Lagos, Nigeria
Na Jenụwarị 2016, mgbe a chọpụtara maka arụmọrụ ya na 2015 FIFA U-17 Iko Mbaụwa, Osimhen kwenyesiri ike na nkwekọrịta tupu ya na VfL Wolfsburg, na-ekwu na ọ ga-esonye na klọb ahụ na Jenụwarụ 2017
Na Jenụwarị 5, 2017, Osimhen bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ atọ na ọkara na klọb ahụ, nke ga-adịgide ruo June 2020
N'ịbụ onye merụrụ ahụ mgbe ọ bịarutere, Na 13 Mee, Osimhen mere nke mbụ ya na Bundesliga maka Wolfsburg, na-abịa dị ka onye nnọchi anya na nkeji nke 59 na 1o1 ise megide Borussia Mönchengladbach
Osimhen bịakwara n'izu na-esote n'egwuregwu dị mkpa megide Hamburger SV, n'ihe bụ ụbọchị egwuregwu ikpeazụ nke oge 2016 Xi17
Ọ nọchiri onye na-agbachitere Sebastian Jung na akara jikọtara 1o1, Hamburg wee gbaa onye mmeri n'azụ oge iji gafee Wolfsburg na tebụl, na-eziga Wolfsburg ka ọ gaa na Eintracht Braunschweig
Osimhen nọ na ndị otu maka egwuregwu abụọ ahụ, na-enweta cameo na njedebe nke akụkụ nke abụọ na ntinye Wolfsburg na Bundesliga na-esote gosipụtara, ka ha meriri 2o 0 na ngụkọta
A kpọrọ Osimhen aha na 12 n'ime ndị otu 17 na ọkara mbụ nke oge 2017 na 1918, na-apụta na egwuregwu 5
O nwetara nke mbụ ya zuru oke na Bundesliga na 28 Jenụwarị 2018 megide Hannover, na-egwu nkeji 90 zuru ezu na mmeri ha
Osimhen bidoro ugboro abụọ ọzọ n'ime mkpọsa ahụ, na-egwuri egwu zuru ezu megide Werder Bremen na 11 Febụwarị ma bụrụ onye Daniel Didavi nọchiri na ọkara megide Hertha Berlin na 31 Machị
Wolfsburg nọkwa na mgbada egwuregwu onye mmeri, mana Osimhen furu efu n'ihi mmerụ ahụ
Ọ pụtakwara n'otu egwuregwu nke Wolfsburg's DFB Pokal mkpọsa, na-anọchi onye na-agba bọọlụ n'etiti Josuha Guilavogui maka nkeji iri ikpeazụ nke mmeri ha meriri Schalke na nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ
Osimhen gara ịwa ahụ n'ubu n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Mee, na-emechi oge ya na egwuregwu iri na abụọ na Bundesliga n'aha ya
Osimhen nwere ule oge okpomọkụ na klọb Belgian Zulte Waregem na Club Brugge, ndị bụ ndị mmeri na-achị
Otú ọ dị, ọgụ n'oge ọkọchị na ịba metụtara ọnọdụ ahụike ya, ọ dịghịkwa otu klọb kpebiri ịkwụ ụgwọ ya

N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2018, Osimhen sonyeere otu egwuregwu Belgian Charleroi na nkwekọrịta mgbazinye ego ogologo oge, ebe ọ na-emeghị akara na nke ọ bụla n'ime egwuregwu iri na isii ya na Wolfsburg
Ọ nọchiri Kaveh Rezaei, onye e rere na Club Brugge mgbe ọ gbasịrị goolu atọ na egwuregwu atọ mbụ nke oge ahụ
Osimhen mere nke mbụ ya na 1 Septemba megide Excel Mouscron, na-abanye dị ka onye na-anọchi anya Jérémy Perbet
Osimhen mere nke mbụ ya zuru oke na 22 Septemba, na-agba goolu mbụ ya dị ka onye ọkachamara na azụ azụ megide Waasland-Beveren
Waasland-Beveren ga-ejikọta ya na mmadụ 10 Charleroi, Perbet ga-emesị bụrụ onye a chụpụrụ n'egwuregwu ahụ, na-enyere onye njikwa Felice Mazzu aka ịhọrọ n'elu
Osimhen ga-amalite na Adama Niane maka egwuregwu anọ sochirinụ, na-agba naanị goolu klọb ahụ na mmeri Cercle Brugge na Gent
O gbakwara bọọlụ ugboro abụọ na nkeji ise gara aga na mmeri 3102 meriri Zulte Waregem na 21 Ọktoba, mgbe Hamdi Harbaoui nyere Waregem mmeri 2101 na ọkara nke abụọ
Osimhen esighị n'akụkụ ahụ daa ruo n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na ise n'ọnwa Nọvemba, mgbe ọ gbara goolu n'elu bench na mmeri 4o2 nke klọb ahụ meriri Lokeren
Osimhen ji goolu asatọ n'egwuregwu iri na isii mechie ọkara mbụ, nke abụọ bụ naanị Cristian Benavente na otu ahụ
Mgbe ọ nwesịrị ihe ịga nke ọma n'akụkụ Belgium, na-egwu egwuregwu 36 ma gbaa goolu 20, Charleroi mere ka nhọrọ ha nweta Osimhen na-esote arụmọrụ ya dị mma mgbe ọ na-agbazinye ego
Na Julaị 2019, Osimhen bịanyere aka na Lille
N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2019, o mere Ligue 1 mbụ ya maka klọb ahụ, na-agba goolu na mmeri 2 na Nantes
A kpọrọ Osimhen onye egwuregwu Ligue 1 nke ọnwa maka Septemba 2019, ebe ọ gbara goolu abụọ ma nyere aka abụọ ọzọ na egwuregwu ise nke Lille
Na 2 June 2020, e nyere ya Lille's Player of the Season, ebe ọ nwetara ọnụ ọgụgụ kachasị elu nke votu site n'aka ndị na-akwado ya

Osimhen gbara goolu mbụ ya na UEFA Champions League n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2019, na-abịa na mmeri e meriri Chelsea n'ụlọ n'afọ 192 Onye Naijiria ahụ mechiri oge ahụ dị ka onye kacha gbaa bọọlụ na Lille, ya na goolu 13 na egwuregwu 25 nke Ligue 1, na goolu 18 na asọmpi niile

N'abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2020, ụlọ ọrụ Serie A Napoli kwupụtara mbinye aka Osimhen, maka ego ndekọ nke € 70 nde nke nwere ike ịrị elu ruo € 80 nde na mgbakwunye, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye kacha ọnụ ahịa Afrịka ruo ugbu a
N'abalị iri na asaa n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2020, Osimhen gbara goolu mbụ ya maka Napoli na mmeri 4 na Atalanta
Mgbe ọ gbara bọọlụ, o welitere uwe elu na-akpọ oku ka a kwụsị obi ọjọọ ndị uwe ojii na-aga n'ihu n'ala nna ya Naịjirịa
N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2020, n'oge egwuregwu asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke e mere mgbe ọ nọ na ezumike mba ụwa na Naịjirịa, Osimhen merụrụ ahụ
A chọpụtara nke a dị ka mmerụ ahụ n'ubu nke ga-eme ka Osimhen ghara ịga egwuregwu ruo ọnwa abụọ
Ka ọ na-agbake site na mmerụ ahụ, Osimhen nwetara ikike site na klọb ya ka ọ nọrọ oge na obodo ya, ebe o nwetara ohere ime ememe ncheta ọmụmụ ya
Ọ bụ n'oge emume ncheta ọmụmụ ndị a ka ekwere na Osimhen butere nje COVID-19, ebe ọ nwalere na ọ nwere mgbe ọ laghachiri Naples

Ule a dị mma, tinyere mmerụ ahụ n'ubu ya, mere ka Osimhen ghara ịrụ ọrụ ruo mgbe ọ laghachiri n'akụkụ na 29 Jenụwarị 2021, mgbe a kwadoro ya maka ihe dị ka nkeji iri abụọ nke mmeri Napoli na Coppa Italia megide Spezia
N'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2022, ọ gbara bọọlụ mbụ ya na Serie A na mmeri 4 na Sassuolo

N'abalị iri na otu n'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2022, ọ gbara goolu ma nyere onye ọzọ aka inyere Napoli aka imeri 2-1 na Atalanta, na-aghọ onye kacha gbaa goolu na Naịjirịa na Italian Serie na goolu iri atọ na abụọ, ma gafee Simy Nwankwo nke iri atọ na otu
Osimhen bụ onye otu Naijiria na-erubeghị afọ iri na asaa nke meriri 2015 FIFA U-17 World Cup na Chile
Ọ gbara goolu iri n'egwuregwu asaa na asọmpi ahụ wee merie Golden Boot na Silver Ball
Osimhen mere nke mbụ ya na Naịjirịa na mmeri ha meriri South Africa na 10 June 2017
Ọ hapụrụ na mkpọsa 2018 FIFA World Cup nke Naịjirịa mgbe oge ya na-adịghị agbanwe agbanwe na Wolfsburg
Mgbe ọ malitere ịgbazinye ego na Charleroi, Gernot Rohr kpọghachiri ya maka ezumike mba ụwa na Nọvemba 2018, malite mmeri enyi na enyi ha meriri Uganda
N'ọnwa Machị 2019, a tọhapụrụ Osimhen n'òtù Super Eagles ka ọ nọchite anya ndị Naijiria U23 n'ihi na ha gbara goolu abụọ megide onye iro ha bụ onye Libya
Ọ gbara goolu atọ n'egwuregwu mmeghachi omume megide Libya na Asaba
Osimhen depụtara na ndepụta nke mmadụ iri abụọ na ise nke onye nkuzi Gernot Rohr maka asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke 2019 na Egypt ma depụtakwuo ya na ndepụta ikpeazụ maka asọmpi ahụ
N'egwuregwu maka ọnọdụ nke atọ, ọ nọchiri Odion Ighalo merụrụ ahụ na ọkara oge na mmeri 1 0 nke otu ahụ meriri Tunisia
Ọ gbara ngụkọta nke nkeji iri anọ na ise na asọmpi ahụ
Super Eagles mechiri 2021 AFCON qualifiers na elu, na-emeri Lesotho 3o0
Otú ọ dị, Osimhen hapụrụ iko mba Afrịka nke a na-eche na ọ bụ n'ihi COVID‐19 dị ka klọb ya kwuru

Nkwupụta a kpaliri nzaghachi sitere n'aka onye ọka iwu egwuregwu na Naịjirịa nke dere iji kwupụta nkụda mmụọ ya maka ebumnuche a na-ekwu na ọ bụ otu Osimhen, SSC Napoli, iji napụ Naịjirịja ọrụ nke onye na-eme ihe nkiri ha

Victoria Adaobi Obasi (amụrụ n'abalị iri na anọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1952) bụ osote onye isi nke Mahadum Imo State ugbu a
Ọ si Ogboko na Ideato South Local Government Area nke di Na Imo Steeti Naijiria
N'agbata afọ 2011 na afọ 2013, ọ bụ kọmishọna maka agụmakwụkwọ na steeti Imo
Victoria Adaobi Obasi bụ nwa nwanyị nke Chief Fred na Ezinne Felicia Nnoham
Obasi malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya n'oge ọ bụ nwata na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Holy Rosary, Oguta ma mesịa gaa na Holy Rosary Secondary, Ihioma
Ọ gakwara Alvan Ikoku Federal College of Education, Owerri
Obasi nwetara nzere bachelọ (1984), masters (1985) na doctorate (1989) na Mahadum Hull, England
O mere National Youth Service Corps na Women Training College, Enugu (1980)
Adaobi lụrụ Chief Charles Obasi nke Dim Na Nume na Isu Local Government Area nke Imo Steeti ma mukwazia ụmụ ise
O meriri Bursary Award for Excellence, Mahadum Hull ugboro atọ n'usoro na 1987,1988 na 1989
O dego akwụkwọ ise, gụnyere mmejuputa nyocha na-aga n'ihu n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na Imo Steeti, Naijiria, ma bipụta akụkọ akwụkwọ akụkọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba ụwa

Ọ bụ onye otu ndị ọkachamara na Naijiria dịka Nigeria Academy of Education, Curriculum Organization of Nigeria (CON), na mba ndị ọzọ dịka College of Preceptor England (CPE) na World Council of Curriculum and Instruction (WCCI)
Victoria Adukwei Bulley bụ onye Ghana na-ede uri a mụrụ na obodo Britain
Bulley bụ onye obodo Ghana, amụrụ ma zụlite ya na Essex, dị naEngland
N'afọ 2019, e nyere ya agụmakwụkwọ na akwughi ugwo Techne maka ọrụ dọkịta na Royal Holloway, Mahadum nke London

Ndị mbiputa akwụkwọ ana kpo Akashic Books bipụtara akwụkwọ mbụ ya bu Girl B nke etinye kwaara na nchikota ndị agburu-ọhuru na-ede uri nke Afrịka A Chapbook Box Set (ISBN 9781617755408) Karen McCarthy Woolf kporo ya 'mpụta mbụ na-achọgharị, na-eche echiche na nke na-atọ ụtọ nwayọ
O mepụtara ọrụ Mother Tongues intergenerational, ebe ndị na-ede uri na nne ha na-arụkọ ọrụ iji sụgharịa uri ha n'asụsụ nne ha
Bulley meriri Eric Gregory Award nke afọ 2018

Victoria Agbodobiri (onye Edo Steeti) bụ onye Naịjiria na-eme ihe egwuregwu judoka onye na-asompi na katigori ụmụ nwanyị
O ritere ọla nchara na 2011 All-Africa Games, na katigori U52kg
Victoria sonyere na 2011 All-Africa Games nke e mere na Maputo, Mozambik
N'emume a, o ritere ọla nchara, n'ihe omume ụmụ nwanyị 52kg
Victoria Nwanyiocha Aguyi-Ironsi (21 Nọvemba 1923 ̊ 23 Ọgọst 2021) bụ nwanyị mbụ nke abụọ nke Naịjirịa site na Jenụwarị irí na isii 1966 ruo Julaị iri abụo na iteghete 1966
Ọ bụ nwanyị di ya nwụrụ nke General Johnson Aguiyi-Ironsi onye bụ onye isi ndị agha Naijiria mbụ, e gburu ya na Ibadan na nnupụisi nke Murtala Muhammed duziri nke dugara n'ịtinye General Yakubu Gowon
Ọ si Ohokobo Afara na okpuru ọchịchị Umuahia North Ọ lụrụ Johnson Aguiyi-Ironsi dị ka nwa akwụkwọ nke Holy Rosary Convent School, Okigwe na 1953
Mgbe Samuel Ademulegun na nwunye ya nwụsịrị, ọ kpọgara ụmụ ya site na Kaduna gaa Legọs ma lekọta ha anya
O nwere ụmụ asatọ ndị nọn na Ibadan kpọpụrụ ma na-elekọta anya n'okpuru nduzi nke Adekunle Fajuyi n'oge Agha Obodo Naịjirịa
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye kọmishọna nke Kọmitii Ọrụ Gọọmentị Obodo na Umuahia
Ọbịbịa nke ọfịs nke nwanyị mbụ nke Naịjirịa bịara site n'aka Ironsi
Aguiyi-Ironsi wetara ùgwù n'ọfịs ahụ
A na-eyikarị ya uwe ọdịnala ma kọwaa ụdị ya dị ka 'ọmarịcha ma na-enweghị mgbalị'
Aguiyi-Ironsi nwụrụ na 23 Ọgọstụ 2021, na Federal Medical Centre Umuahia mgbe ọ rịara ọrịa strok
Ọ gbara afọ iri iteghete na asaa
Victoria Fikile Chitepo (27 Machị 1928 8 Eprel 2016) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa - Zimbabwean, onye na-eme ihe ike na onye nkuzi

Ọ bụ nwunye Herbert Chitepo, onye isi na Zimbabwe African National Union (ZANU), mana ọ bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị dị mkpa n'onwe ya ma jee ozi dị ka minista na gọọmentị nke Zimbabwe nwere onwe ya n'etiti mwikipediaorg › wiki › Victoria_Chi
Victoria Fikile Chitepo (27 Maachị 1928 - 8 Eprel 2016) bụ onye South Africa - onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zimbabwe, onye ndọrọndọrọ na onye nkuzi Ọ bụ nwunye Herbert
mụrụ ya dị ka Victoria Mahamba-Sithole na obodo Dundee nke South Africa na KwaZulu-Natal
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na South Africa ma gaa Mahadum Natal, ebe e nyere ya nzere BA, wee nweta nzere postgraduate na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Birmingham na UK
Ọ zutere onye ga-abụ di ya, Herbert, na Adams College dị nso na Durban na South Africa

N'agbata afọ 1946 na afọ 1953, ọ kụziri ihe na Natal, mana ọ kwagara n'ihe bụ n'oge ahụ British colony nke Southern Rhodesia na 1955 mgbe ọ lụrụ di ya Zimbabwe, onye na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na isi obodo Salisbury (nke bụ Harare ugbu a)

N'afọ 1960, Chitepo sonyeere National Democratic Party (Rhodesia) n'otu òtù National Democratic Party, otu òtù na-ahụ maka mba na-eme mkpọsa maka ikike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka ndị isi ojii na-enweghị ikike na Rhodesia
Ọ duziri nnọkọ ụmụ nwanyị na ụlọ ikpe ndị isi Salisbury na 1961 iji kwalite mkpọsa maka ụmụ amaala ojii

Otu afọ mgbe e mesịrị, ya na di ya gara Tanganyika (nke bụzi Tanzania) wee rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na-enyere ndị ojii Rhodesian gbara ọsọ ndụ aka na Dar es Salaam ruo afọ atọ, n'etiti 1966 na 1968
N'afọ 1975, ndị ọrụ gọọmentị Rhodesia gburu Herbert Chitepo na Lusaka, Zambia
Ọ nọgidere na Tanzania ruo mgbe Rhodesia a gbanwere aha ya na Zimbabwe nwetara nnwere onwe ya ma guzobe ọchịchị ndị isi ojii n'afọ 1980
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Zimbabwe, Victoria Chitepo guzoro maka ntuli aka na mpaghara Mutasa na Buhara West na ntuli aka agbụrụ mbụ nke mba ahụ
O meriri oche maka ZANU-PF na ụlọ nke ala, Ụlọ Nzukọ
A họpụtara ya dị ka osote minista nke agụmakwụkwọ na ọdịbendị ma mesịa bụrụ minista nke ozi na agụmakwụkwọ site n'aka praịm minista nke oge ahụ, Robert Mugabe
N'afọ 1982, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka akụ na njem nleta
Ọ guzoro ọzọ maka ntuli aka na ntuli aka 1985 ma họpụta ya ọzọ ma họpụtaghachi ya ọzọ n'ọkwa minista ya, nke ọ nọgidere na ya ruo n'afọ 1990
Ọ malitere ọrụ dị ka Minista nke Ozi, Post na Telecommunications tupu ọ laa ezumike nká na 1992
N'ime afọ 1990 na 1992 ọ nwere mmasị dị ukwuu iso gọọmentị John Major na-arụ ọrụ, na-ekwu na nzukọ ya na ndị ọrụ Britain na-atọ ụtọ ma na-ewuli elu mgbe niile
O kwuru na ndị ọrụ Britain 'na-akwanyere ùgwù mgbe niile ma na-agbakwụnye na ndị ọrụ France 'na-abụkarị ndị na-enweghị'
Chitepo lara ezumike nká n'afọ 2005 mgbe o guzoro ọzọ na tiketi ZANU-PF maka oche ndị omeiwu nke Glen Norah na Harare

Ọ bụ ezie na ọ meriri na ntuli aka ahụ, ọ nọgidere bụrụ onye isi nke ndị na-achị ZANU-PF, politburo, ma bụrụ onye United States na-elekwasị anya na ndị 'na-emebi usoro ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Zimbabwe'
Portugal, Spain, France, Germany, Belgium, Italy, Netherlands, Luxembourg, Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Switzerland na Republic of Ireland kwadokwara ya
N'ụzọ dị ịrịba ama, United Kingdom enyeghị ya ikike
N'afọ 2014, e wepụrụ ya na ndepụta mmachibido iwu nke United States
N'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2016, a hụrụ ya nwụrụ anwụ n'ụlọ ya dị na Mount Pleasant, Harare, mgbe o doro anya na ọ dara n'ime ụlọ ihi ụra ya
E liri ya na 13 Eprel na National Heroes' Acre

Victoria Garden City bụ obodo a na-akpọ gated (ala) na okporo ụzọ Lekki, mpaghara Ajah, Lagos Steeti [ebe?[Ihe e dere n'ala ala peeji] Ọ na-agafe ihe dịka hekta 200 ma na-eje ozi dị ka ebe obibi, azụmahịa na ọrụ ọha na eze
Ọ bụ HFP, ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ, nwe ya ma na-arụ ọrụ ya
Ọ bụ nke onwe ya na uto obodo dị n'etiti 16% na 18%
Obodo a nwere ihe owuwu ọgbara ọhụrụ zuru oke ma dị n'akụkụ Lekki-Epe Expressway
Ọ na-etu ọnụ maka ezigbo netwọk okporo ụzọ, nchebe elekere, ogige ntụrụndụ, ụlọ akụ (First Bank PLC), ụlọ akwụkwọ (Chrisland Schools), ụlọ ụka, ụlọ alakụba, 24 awa mmiri ọgwụgwọ na nnyefe na ụlọ ahịa
A maaa ahụ nke na-ahụ maka mmezi na njikwa nke Victoria Garden City dị ka VMMCL (VGC Maintenance and Management Company Limited)
Victoria Hansatu Gowon (amụrụ ya n'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1946) bụ onye nọọsụ Naijiria na nwanyị mbụ nke atọ nke Naijiria
Ọ lụrụ General Yakubu Gowon onye bụ onye isi ala Naịjirịa site na 1966 ruo na 1975
A mụrụ Victoria Hansatu Zakari na Ọgọstụ iri abụo na abụo,b1946 n'aka Malam Walter Bala, onye ọrụ gọọmentị na Lydia Fati Zakari na Zaria
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị na Zaria na Kaduna
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya n'afọ 1964
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Nọọsụ na University College Hospital, nke do na Ibadan ma ruo eru dị ka onye nọọsụ edebanyere aha na July 1968
Ọ lụrụ Yakubu Gowon n'oge Agha Obodo Naijiria na Eprel iri na iteghete, 1969 na emume e mere na Cathedral Church of Christ, Legos
Ọ pụtara n'ihu ọha n'ihi na Yakubu Gowon jikọtara ọrụ ya na ọrụ mmeme ya
Ejiji ya dị ka nwanyị mbụ ka akọwara n'ọdi mfe ebe ọ na-eyi uwe ọdịnala mgbe ọbula
Victoria Herrmann bụ ónyé America na-ahụ màkà ọdịdị ala na onye na-ahụkarị mgbanwe ihu igwe

Ọ bụ ónyé isi nchịkwa nke The Arctic Institute, ónyé nchọpụta National Geographic, na ónyé enyemaka prọfesọ nyocha na Mahadum Georgetown nke Walsh School of Foreign Service, ébé nyocha ya na-elekwasị ányà na mmekorita Arctic na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mgbanwe mgbanwe ihu igwe na US na US Territories
Herrmann bụkwa ónyé American Association for the Advancement of Science (AAAS) IF/THEN Ambassador ma na-arụ ọrụ iji nyé ụmụ agbọghọ na ụmụ nwanyị ike na STEM

A na-akpọ ya áhà na Forbes 30 Under 30 list, National Trust for Historic Preservation 40 under 40 list, a North American Young Leader by Friends of Europe, otu n'ime otu narị Most Influential People in Climate Policy world by Apolitical, na dị ka akụkụ nke 'CAFE 100 ː extraordinary change-emers who are take action to dozie ụfọdụ n'ime nsogbu ndị kachasị mkpà na America na gburu-gburu ụwa' site n'aka ónyé ọka iwu US Preet Bharara
A mụrụ ya na Paramus, New Jersey, Herrmann nwèrè mmasị n'ihe gbasara gburu-gburu ébé obibi
A zụlitere ya dị ka ónyé Juu ma kwuo na nné na nnà ya ochie bụ ndị lanarịrị Oké Mgbukpọ ahụ dị ka ihe kpaliri nyocha ya na nkwado ya na mmetụta nke mgbanwe ihu igwe na obodo ndị na-enweghị ikike
Ọ gara Paramus High School
N'afọ 2012, ọ gụsịrị BA

na International Relations and Art History na Mahadum Lehigh ma mesịa nyé ya otu afọ Junior Fellowship na Carnegie Endowment for International Peace na Washington, DC, ébé ọ rụrụ ọrụ na njem na-adịgide adịgide na iwu ihu igwe n'obodo ukwu
Herrmann kwagara Canada na 2013 dị ka Fulbrightgrantee, na-emecha MA na International Affairs na Mahadum Carleton Norman Paterson School of International Affairs
N'afọ 2014, e nyèrè ya Gates Cambridge Scholarship maka ọmụmụ doctoral na Scott Polar Research Institute
N'afọ 2017, e nyèrè Herrmann onyinye Bill Gates Sr
maka mkpebi imeziwanye ndụ ndị ọzọ, n'afọ 2019 natara PhD ya na Mahadum Cambridge
N'afọ ikpeazụ nke PhD ya, Herrmann nọrọ ọnwa atọ na National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine dị ka ónyé otu na mmemme Christine Mirzayan Science and Technology Policy Fellowship
Herrmann sonyeere The Arctic Institute n'afọ 2015, na 2016 ọ ghọrọ ónyé isi oche na ónyé isi nchịkwa
Ọ na-eduzi atụmatụ atụmatụ iji mezuo ebumnuche ya iji mee ka iwu màkà ezi omume, na-adịgide adịgide, na Arctic dị nchebe
Herrmann na-ahụ màkà mmejuputa mmekọrịta nyocha zuru ụwa ọnụ ma na-elekọta otu ìgwè gafee North America na Europe

N'okpuru ógè Herrmanns, The Arctic Institute anọgidewo na-ahọrọ dị ka ébé kachasị elu-iri asaa na ise na-eche echiche site na Mahadum nke Pennsylvania Think Tanks and Civil Societies Program ma bụrụ nke Prospect Magazine depụtara dị ka US Energy and Environment Think Tank kacha mma
Herrmann na-arụ ọrụ ma dị ka onye nkwurịta okwu sayensị màkà ndị na-ege ntị ọha na eze ma dị ka ọkà mmụta nyocha agụmakwụkwọ na-amụ nkwurịta Ókwú mgbanwe ihu igwe
O bipụtara ihe karịrị akụkọ irí abụọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ na isi akwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ

Nnyocha ya na-elekwasị ányà n'otú ihe oyiyi eji eme ihe na mgbasa ozi ọha na eze si ewulite ụkpụrụ, njirimara, na echiche nke ike banyéré mgbanwe mgbanwe ihu igwe, obodo ndị na-adịghị ike, na iwu Arctic
Herrmann ekwuola na agụmakwụkwọ mgbanwe ihu igwe nwèrè ike ma kwesịkwa ịkọwa ihe doro ányà, na otu omume nwere ike isi mee ka agụmakwụkwọ baa ọgaranya
N'ịtụle nyocha ya na mahadum, ọ gbara ndị nchọpụta ndị ọzọ ume ịchọta olu ọha na eze ha ma tụlee mkpà ịkọ akụkọ dị ịkwalite mgbanwe ihu igwe
Ọ na-edekarị édémédé echiche banyéré mgbanwe ihu igwe na iwu Arctic maka The Guardian, Scientific American, na CNN

N'afọ 2019, a kpọrọ Herrmann American Association for the Advancement of Science (AAAS) IF/THEN Ambassador, ọ bụkwa ónyé na-akwado ịhụ ụmụ nwanyị n'anya na nyocha mgbanwe ihu igwe na ụmụ agbọghọ na-etinye aka na STEM
E gosipụtara Herrmann dị ka ihe nlereanya màkà ụmụ agbọghọ na STEM site na National Children's Museum the Ad Council o She Can STEM campaign
Victoria Inyama bụ nwaafọ Naịjirịa nke mere ihe nkiri
A mụrụ Inyama na Steeti Enugwu, nke bụ mpaghara ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria nke ọtụtụ ndị asụsụ Igbo na- asụ Naịjirịa bi na ya
O nwetara BSc nke mbụ ya na mahadum gọvụmentị etiti dị na Naịjirịa akpọrọ; Mahadum nke Lagos
O kwuru na Channels TV ebe o kwuru n'oge a na-agba ajụjụ ọnụ, na ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ugbu a na-agụ ndụmọdụ na Lewisham Counselling School of London ka ọ nwee ike inyere ndị mmadụ aka n'uche
Ọ gakwara ụlọ akwụkwọ njikwa Greenwich dị na London
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 1990
N’oge a gbara ya ajụjụ ọnụ, o kwuru na onye omekome ibe ya, Alex Usifo hụrụ ya ma kpọbata ya na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri nke Naijiria
Inyama mgbe ọ lụsịrị Godwin Okri, kwagara United Kingdom na omume a mebiri ọrụ ọ na-arụ ka ọ hapụrụ azụmaahịa ntụrụndụ ma lekwasị anya na ezinụlọ ya
Inyama lụrụ Godwin Okri ma nwee ụmụ atọ
Site na mgbasa ozi ya, Inyama gosipụtara agha ya na kansa n'afọ 2006
Victoria Island (VI) bụ mpaghara bara ọgaranya nke gụnyere agwaetiti mbụ nke otu aha ahụ dị nso na Lagos Island, Ikoyi na Lekki Peninsula site na Lagos Lagoon
Ọ bụ isi ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa na ego nke Lagos Steeti, Nigeria
Victoria Island bụ otu n'ime ebe ndị pụrụ iche na ndị dị oke ọnụ iji biri na Lagos
Obodo na agwaetiti ahụ dị n'ime ókèala nke Eti-Osa Local Government Area (LGA)
Akụkụ kachasị ukwuu nke agwaetiti ahụ bụbu akụkụ nke ikike nke ezinụlọ Oniru nke Lagos na ndị bi n'ala ahụ
N'afọ 1948, Ụlọ Ọrụ Mmepe nke Lagos kwụrụ 250,000 pound dị ka ụgwọ maka ala e nwetara n'aka ezinụlọ Oniru na pound 150,000 ọzọ dị ka ụgwọ ọrụ maka ndị bi na ebe nsọ mebiri emebi
E mechara weghachite ndị bi n'obodo Maroko
Mmiri gbara Victoria Island gburugburu na mbụ
Oké Osimiri nke Atlantic dị n'ebe ndịda, ọnụ Lagos Lagoon dị n'Ebe Ọdịda Anyanwụ, Five Cowrie Creek dị n'Oké Osimiri Atlantic, na ala mmiri dị n'Ọwụwa Anyanwụ
Gọọmentị na-achị mba ahụ malitere usoro nke imejupụta mmiri n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ iji belata ebe anwụnta na-amụ
Nke a mepụtara àkwà mmiri dị n'etiti Victoria Island na Lekki Peninsula na-eme ka ịdị adị ya dị ka ezigbo agwaetiti
Mgbe nnwere onwe gasịrị, gọọmentị steeti ndị sochirinụ gbasaa mmepe a, na-agwụcha n'iwu okporo ụzọ awara awara jikọtara Victoria Island na Epe
Ọrụ a, tinyere ngwa ngwa azụmahịa nke Victoria Island, rụrụ ọrụ iji kpalie mmepe obibi n'akụkụ Lekki-Epe corridor, malite na Lekki Phase 1
Mpaghara nke àkwà mmiri ahụ, nke nwere ala mmiri ochie, ghọrọ nnukwu ogige a na-akpọ Maroko Town nke nwere ọtụtụ ndị mbịarambịa ọhụrụ na Lagos State
Ndị bi n'àgwàetiti ahụ mere mkpesa banyere nsogbu a, na-eduga Gọvanọ ndị agha nke steeti ahụ, Raji Rasaki, iji ike wepụ ndị bi na 14 Julaị N'afọ 1990, na-akpata ọtụtụ mmerụ ahụ
Gọvanọ Rasaki na ndị agha nchekwa ya mere ka a chụpụ ihe ruru mmadụ 300,000 bi na ya, ụfọdụ n'ime ha nwere ikike iwu maka ihe onwunwe ha
A na-akpọ mpaghara ọhụrụ a mgbe a chụpụrụ ha Victoria Island Annex
E wepụrụ ya ma ree ya ndị na-azụ ụlọ
[citation needed]
Nchịkọta na-esote gbasaa mpaghara ahụ ruo n'ókè nke Victoria Island Annex jikọtara ya na Lekki Peninsula ugbu a
A na-akpọ mpaghara ọhụrụ a, nke buru ibu 'Oniru Estate' mgbe ezinụlọ na-achị mpaghara ahụ
[citation needed]

Na mbụ, a họpụtara ya dị ka ebe obibi dị elu, mmebi akụrụngwa na oke mmadụ na mpaghara azụmaahịa ochie na Lagos Island na mmanye mpaghara dị ala na Victoria Island dugara na nnukwu ọpụpụ nke azụmaahịa n'ime afọ iri abụọ na ise gara aga
Taa, Victoria Island bụ otu n'ime ebe ndị na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ na azụmahịa na Naijiria, ebe ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ Naijiria na nke mba ụwa nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ na agwaetiti ahụ
Àgwàetiti ahụ anọgidewo na-eto ngwa ngwa ma ya na Ikoyi, bụ ebe kachasị amasị ndị Naijiria na ndị mba ọzọ ibi ma kpọọ egwu
Otú ọ dị, mbata nke ụlọ akụ na azụmaahịa ndị ọzọ agbanweela ọnọdụ dị jụụ nke agwaetiti ahụ
Ndị bi ogologo oge na-eme mkpesa banyere mmụba nke okporo ụzọ na mbata nke ndị ahịa n'okporo ámá na-elekọta ndị ọrụ ụlọ akụ na ndị ọchụnta ego
Ọrụ ọhụrụ nke Chagoury Group mepụtara gụnyere Eko Atlantic City, nke dị nso na Victoria Island
A na-ewu ọrụ ahụ n'ala e weghachiri nke furu efu n'ihi mbuze mmiri

N'afọ 2021, ka ọchịchọ maka Apartments / Condos dị elu na-abawanye na Victoria Island, mmepe ọhụrụ nke Periwinkle Condos Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ nwanne nwanyị nke Periwinkles Residences Limited malitere ọrụ pụrụ iche na Premium a na-akpọ Atlantis City Towers n'etiti Victoria Island, na Bishop Aboyade Cole Street
Ụlọ ọbá akụ nke ndi Guaranty Trust Bank na ụlọ ọbá akụ nke ndi Access Bank plc nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ ha n'àgwàetiti ahụ, Halliburton na IBM na-arụ ọrụ n'ọfịs na Victoria Island
Ndị bibu na Maroko Town na-agbasi mbọ ike n'ime usoro ikpe ziri ezi nke Naijiria, n'enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma
N'afọ 2008, otu òtù na-ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ, Social and Economic Rights Action Centre (SERAC), tinyere akwụkwọ mkpesa na African Commission on Human and Peoples' Rights n'aha ndị Moroko
Ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na ndị bi na Maroko na-aga n'ihu na-eme Maroko ncheta kwa-ubochi ,kwa -ubochi na iri otu na anọ July
Victoria Island na-anabata ọtụtụ n'ime ndị nnọchi anya na Lagos, ọtụtụ n'etiti ha bụbu ndị nnọchianya na Naịjirịa tupu ịkwaga isi obodo Abuja

Ndị nnọchi anya ugbu a, ụlọ ọrụ alaka ụlọ ọrụ nnọchi anya, ma ọ bụ osote Kọmitii Ukwu na Victoria Island gụnyere Benin, Brazil, Canada, China, Germany, India, Indonesia, Italy, Lebanon, Netherlands, Russia, South Africa, United Kingdom, na United States
British International School Lagos, na Lycée Français Louis Pasteur de Lagos dị na Victoria Island
Ọzọkwa dị na Victoria Island bụ American International School of Lagos
Victoria Kakoko Sebagereka (17 Julaị 1946 - 4 Ọgọst puku abụọ na iri abụọ na otu ) bụ onye omeiwu Uganda, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-ahụ maka ọrịa AIDS
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka nwanyị omebe iwu maka mpaghara Kayunga na omebe iwu nke asaa nke Uganda
A mụrụ Sebagereka na Bernard Kakoko na Princess Agnes Nkwenge Bagaya Kakoko (nke a na-akpọkarị Anne Mega)
Ọ gara Kasukuru Palace Nursery na Kyebambe Primary School tupu ọ banye na Bweranyangi Girls Senior Secondary School
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Maryhill High School na Mbarara
Agụmakwụkwọ ya dị elu dị na London College, England na Kianda College, Kenya ma ọ ruru eru dị ka odeakwụkwọ
Kakoko jere ozi dị ka Onye isi oche nke National Council of Women na 1986

Dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eme nzukọ nke International Conference on Women's Healthcare na Gayaza High School na 1990, ọ kpọrọ Philly Bongole Lutaaya nwụrụ anwụ ka ọ kwuo okwu na nzukọ ahụ gbasara ọnọdụ HIV / AIDS ya
N'oge ntuli aka nke 1994 Ugandan Constituent Assembly, a họpụtara Sebagereka dị ka onye nnọchi anya Mukono
N'oge a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Kọmitii Nhọrọ nke mmadụ 45 nke na-ahụ maka 'ịkwurịta isi na; Republic, Citizenship, Gọọmentị Obodo na General na ndokwa ndị ọzọ' na usoro iwu ahụ
Sebagereka mechara bụrụ onye nnọchi anya nwanyị maka Kayunga na omeiwu nke asaa nke Uganda
Sebagereka bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii ụmụ nwanyị nke International Federation of Agricultural Producers na mgbakwunye na ịnọchite anya Central Region na Uganda National Farmers Association

Victoria Kalima Phiri (4 Ọktoba na afo 1972 na 11 June na afo 2018) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Zambia bụ Minista nke Mmekọahụ na onye otu National Assembly maka Kasenengwa site na afo 2016 na afo 2011, ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
A mụrụ Kalima na 4 Ọktoba na afo 1972 na Kitwe, nwa nke atọ nke Mustered na Evelyn Kalima
Ọ gara Kabale Primary School na Lwitikila Girls School na Mpika
Ọ gụrụ maka MBA na Mahadum Cavendish dị na Lusaka ma nwetakwara diplọma na njikwa azụmahịa ugbo na mmekọrịta mba ụwa
Mgbe ahụ, ọ malitere ụlọ ọrụ site na ihe ọhụrụ, ọrụ agr-chem, na-etolite ya ka ọ bụrụ otu n'ime ndị na-ere ahịa agro kachasị mma na Zambia
Kalima rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkwa azụmahịa maka Zambia Cooperate Federation na Lusaka site na afo 1994 ruo na afo 1998
N'afọ 1999, o guzobere ma bụrụ onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ nke ya, Plant Agri-Chem
A họpụtara Kalima dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye otu Movement for Multi-Party Democracy maka mpaghara Kasenengwa maka ntuli aka afo 2011
Ọ bụ ezie na a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omebe iwu nke mba ahụ na ihe karịrị 17,500, Ngoni Chief Madzimawe mechara katọọ ya maka ịghara ileta ndị omebe iwu ya

A tụgharịrị mmeri ya na ntuli aka na Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu na Disemba na afo 2013 n'ihi na o nyere ndị na-eme ntụli aka ịnyịnya ígwè na ihe chitenge ma kwuo na Patriotic Front ga-egbu ndị agadi ma kwụsị nkesa ọgwụ antiretroviral
A họpụtara Kalima ọzọ dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa MMD ma sonye na ntuli aka nke afọ 2014, ebe a laghachiri ya na National Assembly na ọnụ ọgụgụ ka nta nke 7,452
Mgbe a họpụtara ya ọzọ, ọ sonyeere Kọmitii na-ahụ maka nkwa gọọmentị na Kọmitii nke na-ahụkarị ihe gbasara iwu, ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ, nduzi mba, ihe gbasara nwoke na nwanyị na ọchịchị

N'oge ntuli aka onye isi ala nke afọ 2015 ọ gbara mbọ maka Hakainde Hichilema nke United Party for National Development, nke mere ka ọtụtụ ndị kansụl mpaghara na Kasenengwa na-ekwu na ha ga-achọ ịhụ na ọ tụfuru oche ya na ntuli aka n'afọ na-esote
Tupu ntuli aka nke afọ 2016 Kalima kpọrọ oku maka njikọ aka n'etiti MMD na Patriotic Front
N'agbanyeghị na ọ katọrọ ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị MMD ndị ọzọ maka ime nke a, o mechara banye na Patriotic Front ma họpụta ya dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa na Kasenengwa na ntuli aka
A họpụtara ya ọzọ na National Assembly na 9,259 vootu
Mgbe ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke Mmekọahụ
N'afọ 2012, ọ gbachitere ikike nke ndị nta akụkọ e jidere ma weghara kamera ha
N'afọ 2017 ọ ghọrọ onye na-emegide enweghị nhata nwoke na nwanyị na alụmdi na nwunye ụmụaka
N'otu afọ ahụ, ọ tụkwara aro ka e dezigharịa iwu alụmdi na nwunye nke ga-amachibido alụmdi na ụba ọ bụla n'etiti nwoke na nwanyị ruo mgbe ha abụọ dịkarịa ala afọ 21
Kalima bụ nwanyị di ya nwụrụ, na nwa nwa nke onye bụbu onye isi ala Rupiah Banda
O nwere ụmụ abụọ ma bụrụkwa Onye Kraịst na-anụ ọkụ n'obi
Kalima nwụrụ na Maina Soko Military Hospital na Lusaka na 11 June na afo 2018 mgbe ọ dị afọ 45
Victoria Keon-Cohen (amụrụ n'afọ 1989) bụ onye Australia na-ese ejiji na onye na-eme ihe ike
Keon-Cohen malitere ọrụ ime ihe ngosi ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise na Australia mgbe ọ meriri asọmpi ọchụchọ ihe nlereanya nke magazin Girlfriend na 2002 (n'okpuru aha Victoria Boston)
Ọ na-eje ije n'okporo ụzọ maka ndị na-emepụta ihe dịka Chanel, Vogue, Dior, Replay na Armani ma pụta na mgbasa ozi maka ụdị gụnyere Levis, David Jones
Keon-Cohen gụrụ akwụkwọ na Lauriston Girls' School na Melbourne, Australia na klas nke afọ 2003
Na Disemba 2007, Keon-Cohen gakwuuru Actors Equity na UK iji nọchite anya ihe nlereanya maka nchebe Union
Keon-Cohen ghọrọ ọnụ na-ekwuchitere ikike ndị nlereanya maka Equity
Ọ bụ onye guzobere oche nke Equity Models' Committee site na 2007 ruo 2012
The Guardian kpọrọ ya aha n'ime aha iri atọ kachasị elu iji lelee dị ka onye ọhụrụ na-eme ihe ike na magazin Marie Claire kọwara ọrụ ya dị ka 'mgbasa ozi ọsụ ụzọ'

Na-arụ ọrụ na Equity, e guzobere Model Programme, njikọ aka n'etiti British Fashion Council, Association of Model agencies, Equity models committee na Greater London Authority iji dozie nsogbu ahụike nke ụlọ ọrụ ejiji na ọdịmma nke ụdị, gụnyere Code of Conduct mbụ maka London Fashion Week
Ọ na-aga n'ihu dị ka onye otu Equity Models Committee na onye nnọchi anya na mgbasa ozi
N'afọ 2013, Equity kwupụtara nkwekọrịta mbụ ya na British Vogue bịanyere aka

N'afọ 2011, Keon-Cohen rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-emepụta ejiji nke Robert De Niro na ihe nkiri Killer Elite N'afọ 2012, o mere ndokwa maka ngosipụta mbụ nke Girl Model na UK, ihe ngosi banyere usoro nnyefe nke ụmụ agbọghọ si Siberia gaa n'ahịa ihe ngosi nke Japan
N'afọ 2012, o mere ihe nkiri mkpirikpi mbụ ya, Eternal Return, na-emekwa ka a mara ọrụ ebere Bipolar UK

Ọ natala ọtụtụ onyinye gụnyere Onye nduzi kacha mma site na California International Film Festival, Nhọrọ gọọmentị na Oscar qualifying Fickerfest na Australia, Phoenix Film Festival, New York City Independent Film Festival na Los Angeles Women's International Film Festival
Victoria bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ nwanyị atọ nke onye ọka iwu Australia a ma ama Bryan Keon-Cohen QC, onye ndụmọdụ nke onye gbara akwụkwọ na Mabo v Queensland (No 2)
Nwanne ya nwanyị Emily Keon-Cohen rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye na-ese ejiji mba ụwa
Victoria na onye Irish na-eme ihe nkiri Jonathan Rhys Meyers nwere mmekọrịta ịhụnanya na 2012
A mụrụ Lilian na Legọsi Island n'aka nne Yoruba na nna Polish
N'ihi ọrụ nna ya, ọ biri n'akụkụ dị iche iche nke mba ahụ n'oge ọ malitere, na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụaka ndị agha, Port Harcourt na Idi Araba Secondary School, Legọsi
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Theatre Arts na Mahadum Legọsi
Nna ya nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri

Victoria Macaulay (ka amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 7 n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1990) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ bọọlụ bọọlụ na Naijiria maka otu ụmụ nwanyị Naịjirịa ma bụrụ onye nweere onwe ya na Women's National Basketball Association (WNBA) na
Na 2015 na 2019 ọ gbara bọọlụ na Chicago Sky na Women's National Basketball Association
N'oge ọ nọ n'akụkụ Nice nke France, ọ nwetara akara 158, 86 rebounds na 08 rebounds
Àtụ WNBA player statistics legend
A kpọrọ Macaulay ma nọchite anya Naịjirịa na 2019 FIBA Women's AfroBasket ebe ndị otu ahụ meriri ọla edo na-eme ka onye nnọchi anya ya na Dakar
O nwetara akara 64, 34 rebounds na 12 na-enyere aka n'oge asọmpi ahụ na Dakar
O sonyekwara na 2020 FIBA Women's Olympic Qualifying Tournaments na Belgrade

Victoria Nalongo Namusisi (mgbe ụfọdụ a na-akpọ Victoria Okoth Nalongo Namumisi) (amụrụ na onwa 19 Jenụwarị na afọ 1956) bụ onye nta akụkọ egwuregwu na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Uganda, onye nchịkwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye ọrụ ebere
A na-ewere Namusisi dị ka nwanyị mbụ na-ede akụkọ egwuregwu na Uganda na mgbakwunye na ije ozi dị ka onye isi oche nke mpaghara Mpigi n'etiti na afọ 1991 na 1997
N'afọ 2010, ọ natara Nalubaale Medal
A mụrụ Namusisi na Paul Mukasa, onye ọrụ ugbo na onye ọkụ azụ na Miriam Nalunga na onwa 19 Jenụwarị nke afọ 1956
N'ime afọ ndị ọ malitere, Namusisi gụrụ akwụkwọ na Kisubi Girls School na Entebbe na Old Kampala Senior Secondary School
O mechara sonye na Institute of Public Administration (IPA) maka ọrụ odeakụkọ n'afọ 1975 wee gụchaa akwụkwọ ahụ n'afọ 1977
N'afọ 1976, Namusisi bụ naanị nwanyị na-ede akụkọ egwuregwu na Uganda Times
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ na Voice of Uganda na afọ 1984 mgbe ọ lọtara na Kenya
N'afọ 1988, mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ na akwụkwọ akụkọ Ngabo, Namusisi kọọrọ egwuregwu Olimpik nke afo 1988 na Seoul dị ka onye nta akụkọ egwuregwu na mgbakwunye na ịbụ onye na-elekọta otu ahụ
N'afọ 1986, Namusisi gbanwere gaa na akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma kenye ya na Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu na Ụlọ SteetiỌ bụ site n'ọkwa a ka a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Kọmishọna Mpaghara (RDC) maka Mpaghara Mpigi

N'agbata afọ 1991 na afọ 1998, a họpụtara Namusisi ma jee ozi dị ka onye isi obodo (RDC) maka mpaghara Mpigi nke oge ahụỌ bụkwa onye otu National Steering Committee na 1998 n'ihi ọnọdụ ya na gọọmentị ime obodo
Mgbe ọ gbara arụkwaghịm dị ka onye ndụmọdụ onye isi ala na 2003, Namusisi na Manuel Pinto guzobere ogige ụmụ mgbei, Bright Kids Uganda

N'afọ 2010, Namusisi bụ onye natara ihe nrite Nalubaale Medal nke a na-enye ndị ọrụ obodo niile nyere aka na mmepe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Uganda ma ọ bụ site na ọgụ agha ma ọ bụ nnupụisi obodo na n'ụzọ ọzọ site n'oge ọchịchị ruo taa

Ka e mesịrị na Mee 2019, ọ natara nzere nsọpụrụ nke Doctor of Humane Letters na Mahadum Carlow, USA, nke dị ka ebe nrụọrụ weebụ nke nzukọ ya si kwuo bụ 'ịghọta ọrụ enyemaka ya na ndị na-adịghị ike na Uganda'
Namusisi lụrụ onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke National Council of Sports, Martin Okoth, ruo 1984 mgbe ha kewara
Ha nwere ụmụ atọ
Victoria Nkong bụ onye ndụmọdụ ntụrụndụ n'ọtụtụ asụsụ Naijiria na onye na- emepụta ihe omume
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ekwuputa okwu n'asụsụ abụọ, nakwa onye na-emepụta ihe maka Kora Awards, Headies Awards, o nyekwara aka chọta ụlọọrụ ebere akpọrọ Life Fountain Orphanage Home

Victoria bụ onye isi nke mmepụta nke Cruise & Chills ụgbọ mmiri ịkparịta ụka n'ụgbọ mmiri maka ndị na-azu ahịa, ndị a ma-ama nakwa ndi ụlọọrụ mgbasa ozi Ọ bụkwa ya na-ahazi ma na-achikọba ememe Slum Invasion, omume ebere a na-eme kwa afọ
Na 2017, Victoria pụtara na 'Women Rock Project'
A mụrụ Nkong na ezinụlọ ndị gụrụ akwụkwọ
Nkong nwetara akara ugo mmụta mbụ ya na asụsụ ọgbara ọhụrụ site na mahadum Calabar dị na ndịda Naijiria wee mụọ nzikọrịta ozi azụmahịa na mahadum Cape Town na South Africa
Ọ gụkwara Entrepreneurial Management na Lagos Business School WomenX
Nkong rna KORA ụkọrọ ọrụ na All Africa Music Awards dị ka onye nkwuputa okwu n'asụsụ abụọ, o jere ozi dị ka PA nye onye isi oche KORA wee bụrụ onye nrụpụta ihe ngosi

N'agbata afọ 2011 ruo 2014 ọ haziri mmemme mba ụwa dị ka ememe arọ iri ise (50th Anniversary) nke African Music ya na Akon, Vlisco Annual fashion show, MTN Yellow Summer na Benin Republic, International African Athletics Competition 2012
Nkong nyere aka iguzobe ụlọọrụ ebere na Life Fountain Orphanage Home

Victoria Nneji (amụrụ n'afọ 1972 ) bụ onye Naijiria bụbu onye na-eme egwuregwu Paralympian
N'ihe mmemme 675kg nke ụmụ nwanyị nke afọ 2012, ọ meriri nrite ọla
Mgbe ihe omume ahụ gasịrị, o kwupụtara ịla ezumike nká ya na egwuregwu asọmpi na-ekwu maka mmerụ ahụ na-emekarị na afọ ya dị ka ihe kpatara ya
Nwada Victoria Okojie bụ librerian, onye mmụta, na onye nchịkwa nke Naijiria
O bụ onye na-edebe aha/ onye isi oche nke Librarians Registration Council nke Naijiria nọ na okpụrụ ọchịchị gọọmentị nke ṅaijiria
Okojie is also a past president of the Nigerian Library Association as well as a member of the governing board of the International Federation of Library Associations and Institutions (IFLA)
She is a lecturer at the Department of Library and Information Science, University of Abuja, Abuja
Okojie gụsịrị nzere masta ya na Library Science (MLS) na Mahadum Ibadan,nke dị na Ibadan, tupu ọ gaa Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria, ebe ọ gụsịrị PhD ya na Library and Information Science na 2012
Ọrụ Okojie na ọbá akwụkwọ malitere na na afọ nari iri itoolu iri asatọ na anọ na Mahadum Ibadan
Ọ sonyeere Kansụl Britain na afọ nari iri itoolu iri itoolu na anọ wee ruo ọkwa onye nduzi na kansụl ahụ, onye Naijiria mbụ mere ya
N'oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ, ọ gakwuuru World Bank, United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization, yana UK Department for International Development
N'afọ puku abụọ na itoolu, Okojie sonyeere ọrụ nke Gọọmentị Federal nke Naịjirịa n'okpuru nchebe nke Kansụl Ndebanye aha nke Naịjarịa, ebe ọ ghọrọ onye na-edeba aha / onye isi oche nke kansụl ahụ
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Nigerian Library Association site na afọ puku abụọ ruo afọ puku abụọ na iri
Okojie jere ozi dị ka Onye isi oche nke International Federation of Library Associations and Institutions (IFLA) Africa Section
n'etiti afọ puku abụọ iri na otu na afọ puku abụọ iri na ise
N'afọ puku abụọ iri na abụọ, ọ so n'etiti ndị isi ọbá akwụkwọ iri na abụọ zuru ụwa ọnụ ahọpụtara ka ha na IFLA rụọ ọrụ na Ngalaba Ọbá Akwụkwọ na Ozi

Okojie jere ozi dị ka onye otu IFLA na-achịkwa; Kọmitii ndụmọdụ mba ụwa, UNESCO Memory of the World Programme; Kọmiti ndụmọdụ, Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation Global Libraries Program; na West African Library Association
Okojie meriri ihe nrite ọrụ a ma ama nke Nigerian Library Association n'afọ puku abụọ

O nwetakwala ihe nrite 'Daughter of Destiny' nke isi nke Oyo State nke Nigerian Library Association, na mgbakwunye na Nigeria Youth Initiative for Transparency, Good Governance, Peace and Social Orientation (NYITGPSO) Merit Award dị ka 'Icon of Education' nke afọ puku iri na abụọ
N'afọ puku abụọ iri na abụọ, Mahadum Commonwealth, Belize, nyere Okojie nzere doctorate, maka onyinye ya n'ọhịa nke Ọbá Akwụkwọ na Sayensị Ozi

Okojie bụkwa onye otu Nigerian Library Association (puku abụọ na ise); International Visitor Leadership Program (IVLP) nke US Department of State, United States Government, USA (puku abụọ na asatọ), na UNESCO Institute for Lifelong Learning, Hamburg, Germany (puku abụọ na asaa)
Victoria Uzoamaka Onejeme bụ onye ọka iwu ukwu Naijiria na nwanyị mbụ nọ n'ọkwa ahụ
A kpọrọ ya ka ọ bụrụ ọkàiwu n'afọ 1965, wee bụrụ onye ọka iwu ukwu na steeti Anambra ochie n'afọ 1976
N'afọ 1976, a ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka Kọmishọna maka Ikpe Ziri Ezi na Anambra Steeti
O mekwara akụkọ ihe mere eme na 1984 mgbe ọ ghọrọ onye ọka ikpe ọsụ ụzọ maka Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Federal, Abuja
Ọ bụ onye Igbo si Awka na Anambra Steeti
Victoria Rusoke Businge nke a makwaara dị ka Rusoke Victoria Businge (amụrụ na 3 Jenụwarị 1956) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye nkuzi Uganda
Victoria jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi anya ụmụ nwanyị nke mpaghara Kabarole na nke itoolu nke Nzukọ Ndị Omeiwu nke Uganda
A họpụtara ya ọzọ dị ka onye otu ndị omeiwu nke iri na otu nke Uganda na ntuli aka Jenụwarị puku abụọ na iri na otu
Ọ nwere njikọ na National Resistance Movement

Justice Bart M
Katureebe na isi ụlọ ikpe na Kampala
O nwere Master of Education na Mahadum Makerere (2001) wee nweta Bachelor of Education na Маhadum Makerer na 1991

O nwere diplọma na agụmakwụkwọ onye nkuzi site na Institute of Teacher Education, Kyambogo (1986), asambodo onye nkuzi nke Grade II, Mahadum Makerere (1980), na 1977, e nyere ya asambodo agụmakwụkwọ nke East Africa
Nne Victoria enweghị ike ịkụziri ya ihe karịrị O-level ya mere o nweghị ike iru nrọ ya nke ịghọ onye ọka iwu kama ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi agụmakwụkwọ distrikti, Kabarole site na 2003 ruo 2010
Site na Febụwarị ruo Julaị 2003, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi nkuzi na Kalinaabiri Primary School ma bụrụkwa onye isi nkuchi nke Old Kampala Primary School site na 1997 ruo pụkụ abụọ na abuo
Ọ bụ onye isi nkuzi nke City Primary School site na 1994 ruo 1995
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye isi nkuzi nke Nakasero Primary School site na 1991 ruo 1993 na dị ka onye nkuzi na Kibuli TTC site na 1986 ruo 1990
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Shimoni Demonstration School site na 1980 ruo 1985
N'afọ 1978, ọ sonyeere ma rụọ ọrụ na Institute of Teacher Education Kyambogo (ITEK) nke bụzi Mahadum Kyambogo
Victoria Sekitoleko bụ onye bụbu Minista nke Ọrụ Ugbo na gọọmentị Uganda, ọfịs o nwere site na 1986 ruo 1995

Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya United Nations Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) na China, Mongolia, na South Korea (Ọktoba 2006 Eprel 2011) Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nnọchianya FAO na Ethiopia na African Union (AU), na Economic Community for Africa (ECA) (2005 Chine2006)
Ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya mpaghara FAO na Eastern na Southern Africa, nke dị na Harare, Zimbabwe
A họpụtara ya n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na Biyinzika Poultry International Limited (BPIL) Board na June 2017
Sekitoleko gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere dị na Kampala, ebe ọ nwetara BSc na Ọrụ Ugbo na-eme ihe na Farm Management and Extension (1970)
N'afọ 1983, ọ gara Eastern and Southern Africa Management Institute (ESAMI) ebe ọ nwetara asambodo na Agriculture Project Identification, Appraisal and Management
N'afọ 2003, ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Zimbabwe Institute of Systemic Counseling, nweta asambodo na Systemic Coanselling
N'afọ 2004, ọ gara Mahadum Limpopo na South Africa (na njikọ aka na Mahadum nke ndịda Hampshire, USA) ebe ọ nwetara asambodo na Micro Enterprise na Development
Sekitoleko bụ onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ na-achịkwa Uganda Agribusiness Alliance ugbu a

Ebumnuche nke Uganda Agribusiness Business Alliance bụ ijikọ ndị niile na-etinye aka na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ iji melite ikike ha iji nweta uru na nke na-adịgide adịgide na-achụso ọtụtụ ohere zuru ụwa ọnụ nke gosipụtara onwe ha dị ka akụkụ nke ịsọ mpi na ụlọ ọrụ kachasị n'ụwa
Sekitoleko sonyeere Business and Professional Women Kampala (BWP) n'afọ puku abụọ na iri na atọ
Ọ sonyekwara Uganda Women Entrepreneurs Association Limited (UWEAL) n'otu afọ ahụ
N'afọ 2010, Victoria Sekitoleko guzobere Uganda Community Cultural Center nke na-azụ ahịa dị ka ndị ọkà okwu
N'okpuru ndị ọkà okwu, ọ na-ekwu okwu n'ihu ọha na ọbá akwụkwọ obodo
A na-ahụ ọfịs ahụ na Victoria House na Bukoto n'ihu Ụlọ Ọgwụ Kadic
O guzobere nzukọ ahụ iji nye ndị ọkachamara ikpo okwu ịghọ ndị na-eme ihe ngosi ụwa
Ruo ugbu a, ọ na-etinye ihe ka ukwuu n'oge ya na Speakers Forum ebe ọ na-eduzi ọzụzụ nke ndị ahịa ya n'ikwu okwu n'ihu ọha
Ọ na-enye ha ikpo okwu iji mee ihe ma sonye na arụmụka na mkparịta ụka
Na nzukọ ndị ọkà okwu, ndị mmadụ si n'ụdị ndụ niile na-ezukọta na ngwụcha ọnwa ọ bụla iji kesaa echiche ma kwurịta okwu ndị metụtara ndụ ha
Site na ndị ọkà okwu, Sekitoleko guzobekwara ma kwado ọbá akwụkwọ obodo, na-enye nhọrọ dị iche iche nke akwụkwọ iji nye ndị na-eto eto ozi dị mma iji melite ọdịbendị ịgụ akwụkwọ ha
Ọbá akwụkwọ ndị dị otú ahụ gụnyere nke dị na Bukoto, ógbè dịpụrụ adịpụ na Kampala
Ọbá akwụkwọ Bukoto a na-enyekwa ozi zuru oke gbasara omenala China na omenala Uganda
Ndị ọzọ nọ na Budondo Headquarters, Namulesa trading center, Wanyange, ma nyekwa aka n'ọbá akwụkwọ na Life Skills Center, Bugembe ebe ụmụ akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na-aga maka ọzụzụ n'oge ezumike

Onye bụbu onye nnọchi anya mba ọzọ enyerela aka ịmalite ọtụtụ ọbá akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ dịka ọmụmaatụ na Uphill Nursery na Primary School na Bugobya na mpaghara Jinja, Namaganga, ọbá akwụkwọ obodo Kigalagalagala na mpaghara Busede, Jinja, Bugodi na Mayuge District, Kasambira na mpaghara Kamuli, Nkondo, Buyende district, na Bubaale Primary School, District Kamuli
Sekitoleko na-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ maka obodo ebe ọ kwenyere na inyeghachi obodo bụ akụkụ na akụkụ nke mmepe
N'afọ 2012, Sekitoleko ghọrọ onye Rotarian
Ọ bụ onye isi oche Charter nke Rotary Club nke Kampala-Impala
Ọ bi na Ntinda n'ụlọ ezumike nká ya
Ọrụ ya bụ isi bụ Ịkwalite Ọganihu Ọha na Eze, Ọganihu akụ na ụba nke ndị ogbenye site n'inye ha ike ilekọta ọdịnihu ha
Victoria Yar Arol (1948), bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Sudan

Nwanyị mbụ si Southern Sudan gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum nke Khartoum ọ mechara bụrụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nwere oche na nzukọ mpaghara maka Bahr el Ghazal Province na National Peoples Assembly of Sudan
A mụrụ Victoria Yar Arol na 1948 na Sudan
Ọ bụ nwa nwanyị nke onye isi agbụrụ Dinka nke nwere ọtụtụ ndị nwunye na ụmụ 20 ruo 30
Arol bụ onye mbụ n'ezinụlọ ya na-aga ụlọ akwụkwọ mgbe niile
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ si Southern Sudan ịbanye na Mahadum nke Khartoum, gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na akụ na ụba na sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na afọ 1960
Arol lụrụ Toby Maduot, onye dọkịta na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ga-emesị bụrụ onyeisi oche nke Sudan African National Union (SANU), ha nwere ụmụ atọ
Arol bụ onye otu SANU ma bụrụ nwanyị mbụ a họpụtara na People's Regional Assembly maka Bahr el Ghazal Province, ebe ọ bụ onye isi oche kọmitii na-emegide nrụrụ aka
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote minista na odeakwụkwọ mpaghara nke Sudanese Socialist Union na 1979
N'afọ 1979, ọ tụrụ aro ka e weghachite obodo ndị a na-ese okwu nke Abyei, Kurmuk na Kafia Kingi na mpaghara ndịda dịka a na-ejikọta ha tupu nnwere onwe
O mechara nwee oche na National Peoples Assembly of Sudan dị ka onye nnọchi anya nwanyị
Ọ bụ nwanne nne nke onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Nyandeng Malek Deliech, gọvanọ steeti nke Warrap
Mgbe Deliech fọrọ nke nta ka ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ praịmarị ya n'ihe dị ka afọ 1977, Arol kpọọrọ ya gaa Juba ka ọ gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya kama ịhapụ na ngwụcha ụlọ akwụkwọ praịm dị ka ọ dị n'obodo ya
Arol nwụrụ n'afọ 1980
Onye isi ala South Sudan Riek Machar kwuru na ọ bụ ihe na-akpali ụmụ nwanyị Southern Sudan
AdebayorZakariAdje (amụrụ na 12 Nọvemba 1996) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba maka klọb Niger Premier League USGN, na mgbazinye site na klọb Danish 1st Division HB Køge
N'afọ 2016, Adebayor nwere nnwale na Ligue 1 FC Lorient na AS Monaco mana enyeghị ya nkwekọrịta na klọb ọ bụla
N'abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2018, Vejle Boldklub dị na Denmark kwupụtara mbinye aka Adebayor site na Inter Allies na nkwekọrịta mgbazinye ego ruo ụbọchị iri atọ n'ọnwarị n'afọ 2019
Otú ọ dị, otu ọnwa mgbe e mesịrị, klọb ahụ kwupụtara na ha chọrọ ịkwụsị nkwekọrịta mgbazinye ego ahụ n'ihi na Adebayor apụtaghị dị ka ha kwekọrịtara na klọb enweghị ike ịkpọtụrụ onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ

Otú ọ dị, ọ laghachiri Denmark n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, mgbe ọ bịanyere aka na klọb nke 1st Division nke Danish HB Køge, nke bụ klọb bọọlụ Danish ọkachamara nke dị n'obodo Her останови, na nke abụọ n'obodo Køge, ma na Køge Municipality
Otú ọ dị, na 4 Machị 2021, klọb ahụ kwupụtara, na a gbazinyere Adebayor na Legon Cities, n'ihi na ọ chọrọ ịnọ nso na ezinụlọ ya n'ihi ihe onwe onye
Na 10 Septemba 2021, Adebayor kwetara na ya na ENPPI SC nke Egypt ga-akwụ ụgwọ otu afọ
Ọ bụ onye kacha gbaa goolu na Niger na goolu iri na asatọ n'egwuregwu iri anọ na atọ
Victorious Zawedde bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Uganda na onye otu ndị omeiwu

Hannah AfriyieVida Anim (amụrụ na 7 Disemba na afọ 1983 na Accra, Greater Accra) bụ onye Ghana na-agba ọsọ nke maara nke ọma na mita 100 na 200
Ya na Mavis Akoto, Monica Twum na Vida Nsiah nwere ihe ndekọ Ghana na 4 x 100 mita relay na 4319 sekọnd, nke o nwetara n'oge okpomọkụ na afọ 2000 Summer Olympics na Sydney
Vida Anim nọchitere anya Ghana na afọ 2008 Summer Olympics na Beijing na-asọmpi na 100 mita sprint
Na agba nke mbụ ya, ọ nọ n'ọnọdụ nke abụọ n'azụ Shelly-Ann Fraser na oge nke 1147 iji gaa n'ihu na agba nke abụọ
N'ebe ahụ, ọ meziwanyere oge ya ruo 1132 sekọnd, na-emecha nke atọ n'azụ Debbie Ferguson na Oludamola Osayomi
Na semifinal ọ nweghị ike iru eru maka nke ikpeazụ ebe oge ya nke 1151 bụ naanị oge nke asatọ na nke ikpeazụ nke okpomọkụ ya, na-akpata mwepụ

Vida Bruce bụ onye na-agba ọsọ na Ghana lara ezumike nká
O ritere ọla nchara na 4 × 100 mita relay na na afọ 2002 African Championships, ma sọkwara mpi na 100 mita na 200 mita n'otu ihe omume ahụ n'erughị nke ikpeazụ
N'oge asọmpi nke abụọ nke TrafieCall na afọ 2002, Vida gara n'enweghị ihe ịma aka na 100 na 200 mita ma setịpụ ndekọ ọhụrụ nke 1209 sekọnd, na-eti ihe ndekọ ya gara aga nke 1214 sekọnd
Vida Nsiah (amụrụ n'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1976) bụ nwanyị na-agba ọsọ na-agba ịnyịnya na-agba bọọlụ na onye na-agba ụta si Ghana
Na afo1998 Commonwealth Games na Kuala Lumpur, ọ bụ onye nke ise na mita 100 na nke isii na mita 200
Ya na Mavis Akoto, Monica Twum na Vida Anim nwere ihe ndekọ Ghana na 4 x 100 mita relay na 4319 sekọnd, nke o nwetara n'oge okpomọkụ na afọ 2000 Summer Olympics na Sydney
Vida Amaadi Yeboah (1944-2006) bụ onye nkuzi Ghana, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye isi obodo
Osote Minista nke Mmụta na Ọdịbendị site na afọ 1988 ruo afọ 1993, Yeboah nyere aka guzobe Forum for African Women Educationalists (FAWE) na 1992
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu na 1992, Yeboah ghọrọ onye otu gọọmentị Jerry Rawlings, na-eje ozi dị ka minista njem nleta site na afọ 1997 ruo na afọ 2001
A mụrụ Vida Yeboah na 27 Julaị, na afọ 1944 n'obodo nne ya na mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ, nwa nwanyị nke Kate Oye Ntow Ofosu na Eric Perigrino Nelson
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Wesley Girls High School tupu ọ nweta BA ya na French na Mahadum Ghana
Ọ gụrụ maka MA na French na Mahadum Bordeaux na France, na diplọma post-graduate na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadim Cape Coast
Ọ kụziri ihe afọ iri na anọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị na Ghana, ọ ghọrọ onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ụmụ nwanyị Mfantsiman, tupu a họpụta ya dịka osote odeakwụkwọ maka agụmakwụkwọ n'afọ 1985
Site na afọ 1988 ruo afọ 1993 Vida Yeboah bụ osote minista nke agụmakwụkwọ na ọdịbendị
Yeboah gbanwere usoro agụmakwụkwọ tupu mahadum, na-eme ka ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ agbọghọ na-aga

N'afọ 1992, ya na ụmụ nwanyị anọ ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ n'Afrịka guzobere Forum for African Women Educationalists Fay Chung na Zimbabwe, Simone Testa na Seychelles, Paulette Moussavon-Missambo na Gabon, na Alice Tiendrebengo na Burkina Faso

A họpụtara Vida ka ọ nọchite anya Akuapim South na nzuko omeiwu mbụ nke mba nke anọ nke Ghana na 7 Jenụwarị, na afọ 1993 mgbe a kwupụtara na ọ bụ onye mmeri na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu Ghana nke afọ 1992 nke e mere na 29 Disemba, na afọ 1992
A họpụtara ya ọzọ n'ime ndị omeiwu nke abụọ nke mba nke anọ mgbe ọ nwetasịrị pasent 48 nke votu na ntuli aka afọ 1996
A họpụtara ya na afọ 1997 dị ka Minista nke Njem ebe ọ jere ozi ruo afọ 2001, ọkwa minista na-abụghị nke Cabinet
A na-echeta Vida Yeboah dị ka otu n'ime ndị guzobere Forum for African Women Educationalists (FAWE) Ghana's Chapter

Ihe omume ndị dị ka Annual Global Game Jam enyerela aka nke ukwuu n'ịmepụta ịgba chaa chaa dị ka nhọrọ ọrụ
Òtù ndị dị ka Virtual Union na Gamers' Republic na-agba mbọ maka ndị egwuregwu pro na njikọ dị ka Ghana E-sports Association na-agba ume iwebata oge ọhụrụ maka E-s Sports na Ghana

Viljoen bụ aha nna Afrikaans, nke sitere na French Villion
Ndị Huguenot French butere ya na South Africa na 1671 bụ ndị mechara lụọ na ndị Dutch bi na mpaghara
Ndị nna nke ezinụlọ Viljoen agbatịkwuru bụ François Villion (amụrụ Clermont, Île-de-France, France) na Cornelia Campenaar (amụrụ na Middelburg, Zeeland, Netherlands)
N'ịbụ ndị lụrụ na Cape nke Good Hope, ha mesịrị rụọ ọrụ ugbo maka ihe ha ga-eri na nso Stellenbosch
Ụfọdụ n'ime ụmụ ha gụnyere
Villasayas bụ village no na South ala ana-kpo Soria
Vilma Glücklich (1872-1927), bụ onye Hungary na-eme mgbanwe agụmakwụkwọ, onye na-eme udo na onye na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 1896, ọ ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ na Hungary natara nzere na Faculty of Philosophy na Mahadum Budapest State, mgbe ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ nabatara na mahadum Hungary
N'akụkụ Rosika Schwimmer, a na-agụ ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi abụọ na-eduga na Movement ụmụ nwanyị Hungary na ngwụcha narị afọ nke 19 na mmalite narị afọ nke 20

A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu kọmitii onye isi ala nke National Association of Female Employees (1902), onye guzobere otu ndị inyom na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na Hungary (Feministák Egyesülete) ma ọ bụ HFA (1904), onye guzobere otu Women's International League for Peace and Freedom (1915), onye otu Kọmitii Nlekọta nke nchịkwa obodo Budapest (1918), onye guzpụtara odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Women's World League for Peace na Freedom (1924),1926)
Vilma Glücklich bụ nwanyị mbụ gara Mahadum dị na Budapest na Hungary, na onye mbụ gụsịrị akwụkwọ n'afọ 1896
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi
Site n'afọ 1902, ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ọrụ ndị ọrụ aka, na n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị na òtù ụmụ nwanyị
N'afọ 1913, ya na Rosika Schwimmer kwadoro nnọkọ nke asaa nke International Alliance for Women Suffrage na Budapest
N'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, ọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'òtù ndị na-ahụ maka udo
Ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime ụmụ nwanyị abụọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike n'ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya n'afọ 1918
N'ihi nke a, a napụrụ ya ọrụ ya ma chụga ya n'afọ 1921, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị ọ kwagara Switzerland
Desmond edeela ihe mbipụta na magazin n'ịntanetị
Ọ bụbu onye edemede na BellaNaija na onye nchịkọta akụkọ na Zikoko, akwụkwọ omenala ndị ntorobịa na Naịjirịa
Desmond bụ onye na-edina nwoke n'ihu ọha
N'afọ 2020, o kwupụtara echiche ya banyere ịmụ nwa ma gbasara ndụ nne na nna na saịtị blọọgụ ya
'Obi ojom m na ịmụ ụmụ bụ na echere m na ịmụ ụmụ bụ ihe na-adabaghi Onwe ọdịmma onwe onye n'akụkụ ndị nne na nna n'ihi na ị na-eweta mmadụ dum ma na-amanye ha ibi ndụ ma sonye na ndụ nke ọha mmadụ
Maka gịnịkwa? Ikike ịja mma? N'ihi na ị na-eche na oge eruola
N'afọ 2021, RED Media Africa depụtara ya n'etiti 'Ndị Naịjirịa otu narị na iri ise kachasị amasị na ọdịbendị n'afọ 2019', a họpụtakwara ya maka The Future Awards Africa Prize For Leading Conversation
Vincent Kigosi (Ray) (a mụrụ na 16 Mee 1980) bụ onye Tanzania na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye nduzi
Kigosi dị na Dar-es-Salaam
Kigosi, onye a maara nke ọma dịka Ray, malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ 2000 na ihe nkiri telivishọn / usoro ma malite ịpụta na ihe nkiri dị iche iche ruo ugbu a
O nwere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nkiri nke ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri ibe ya bụ Blandina chagula (Johari) ụlọ ọrụ a na-akpọ Rj Company
Vincent Akwete Kofi (1923-1974) bụ onye Ghana na-ese ihe, ma burukwa onye agụmakwụkwọ
A mụrụ Vincent Akwete Kofi na Odumasi-Krobo, Ghana na 16 Jenụwarị,1923
Ọ nwụrụ na 31 Julai, 1974

Ọ gụrụ akwukwo na Achimota College, nke nwere ngalaba nke mbụ na nke kachasị na West Africa, ọ gụkwara akwụkwọ na Royal College of Art, London (1952-1955), wee gaa Columbia University, New York (1959)
Mgbe ọ nọ na New York, ọ mụtara ịkpụ ígwè ma, site n'enyemaka nke Harmon Foundation, o mepụtara ihe nkiri na ịkpụ ọla nchara
Ọ lụrụ Felicia Korkor Djabatey tupu afo 1946, na Krobo, Kwaebibirem, Eastern, Ghana
Ha mụrụ nwa nwanyị Janet ayerko Kofi

Mgbe ọ laghachiri Ghana, ọ kụziri na Winneba Teacher Training College (1961-1969) ma bụrụkwa Onye isi nke Fine Art, College of Art, na Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology (KNUST) Kumasi (1969-1974)
Ọ bụ onye otu ndị nnọchi anya Ghana na First World Festival of Negro Arts, Dakar, 1966
Na afo 1971 ọ gara India na oku nke Gọọmentị
Vincent Kolo is a Nigerian artist
Kolo ritere ihe nrite Nefertiti nke mbụ maka ihe osise ya 'Cords of Yesterday' iji cheta ụbọchị njikọta Afrịka
Dị ka ndị nhazi nke African Union kwadoro si kwuo, ngalaba ahụ bụ maka ọrụ ndị weghaara “ọchịchọ nke oge a maka Africa iji mụta ihe site n'oge gara aga ya, lekọta ugbu a ma wuo ọhụ

A họpụtara Vincent Obasi Usulor dị ka onye nnọchianya maka mpaghara Ebonyi Central nke Ebonyi Steeti, Naijiria na mbido Republik nke anọ nke Naịjirịa, na-agba ọsọ na ikpo okwu People's Democratic Party (PDP)
Ọ malitere ọrụ na 29 Mee 1999
Mgbe ọ nọsịrị n'oche ya dika onye nnọchianya, a họpụtara ya na kọmitii na Iwu na Usoro, Ụlọ Ọrụ, Sayensị na Teknụzụ, Ihe Ndị Uwe Ojii, Atụmatụ Mba na Federal Capital Territory (onye isi oche)

Vincent Willem van Gogh (Önwa àtó 30, 1853 – Önwa asaa 29 1890) bu mgbe mbu onye Dọọch bu Ọ'shí-Nkwúnàányá onye ntènté nke orü ya di mkpà na ǹkà ichié 20 màkà otu àgwà nor na ǹkà ya na charírí nke kpátárá mádu na ányá
Ọ tàrà afúfú nchèkasị na íshí ya kófùrù na mgbe gáfèrè mgbe mbu na ndu ya, na ȯ nwürü na mgbe mádu amághị ya na afọr ó dị 37 shí mgbe ȯ gbàrà onwe yá égbè
Na mádu à túfùgịrị yà ȯnu, ewù màkà yá tòrò na afọr byárá mgbe ȯ nwüchàrà
Na úbọchị nke ta, ndi mádu sị ọ bu onye ǹkà di mkpà na nke díkárí ọmá na ákíkó mbu na onye nyérírí ihe na nke ǹkà ógè nsò
Van Gogh è téghị ihe rüo mgbe ọ di na mgbèdè írí na abụọ ndu yá, na ǹkà nke ó kèrè kárírí fùtàrà na afọr abụọ gáwá nke ȯ gùchàrà
O kèrè orü ǹkà rúfwuó púkú abụọ, nke nwéré nke òtìté 900 na nsè 1,100
Mànà màkà ha mághị ya na ndu ya, orü nwèrè àgbà na ǹkà ọmúmú-òhúrü nke byárá mgbe ndu ya mèchàrà
Na úbọchi ta orü ya-dí kà nke ó sèrè onwé ya, na àlà, na íshí ndi mádu na ìfulūánwü-dì na ǹkà di ókȯ ȯnu na nke mádu màkàrì
Van Gogh bìrì na mbu ó di dímkpà na orü di ne ré ǹkà na ȯ fụrụ íjè na ímé Den Haag, London na Paris, na mgeb ȯ fùchàrà ȯ rü ka ónyé nkúzí na England
Ihe ȯ chọrí bu na mgbe mbu bu onye ụkò Jésu na Í gbaasà okwu Jésu, shí 1879 ȯ rürü ka onye íjè okwu Jésu na ébé ha na bá àlà na Belgium
Mgbe ógè nké ȯ bu mgbe ó bịdọrọ Í sé mádu shí ébé ȯ nọr, na ímé afọr 1885 ó tèrè orü ya ukwu nke mbu The Potato Eaters
Éféré àgwà ya na ógè áhù jùrù na àgwà nke chárá kà ájá na o zígì àgwà nke chárírí ka nke ȯ gi kè
Na Önwa àtó nke afọr 1886, ȯ gàrà Paris na ngáhù ȯ hùrù nkwúnàányá nke ndi France
Na ógè gáfèrè ȯ gàrà nledà anyanwu France na ȯ hùrù ánwü chárá ike nà ányá
Àgwà ya charìrì na élú na orü ya, na o nwètèrè ágwà nke ya di iche nke mádu gi ma mgbe ȯ nọr na Arles na 1888
Nkè íshí ya kófùrù nke bànyèrè na ímé ihe ȯ tèrè bu ihe nkwúlítá okwu shí mgbe ȯ nwụrụ
Na nke ndí mádu ne mè ka ȯrià ya di kà mmá, ndi nsikwụ tìrì yá ka onye ǹkà di íwé màkà órià gàrà na uzọr orü ya
Nke onye nsikwụ ǹkà Robert Hughes si bu na orü Van Gogh nke mgbèdè zịrị onye ǹkà nor na élú orü ya, di ya na áká na 'onye nke ọnụ nke mmili ótụ na úrè na dọ ya bu ihe ọ chọrọ'
Vinette Ebrahim (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụo na otu nke ọnwa Febrụwarị,na 1957) bụ ome ihe nkiri na odee nke South Africa amaara maka ọrụ ya dịka Charmaine Meintjies na SABC 2 soap opera 7de Laan
Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị ome ihe nkiri bụ Vincent Ebrahim
Ebrahim bụ nwanne nwanyị onye na-eme ihe nkiri South Africa-British bụ Vincent Ebrahim
Nwanne-ya nwoke, ji afọ isi wee tọta ya we kpọ aha-ya Ebrahim
Nna Ebrahim rụrụ ọrụ dịka onye nkuzi na Woodstock, nke dị na Cape Town, South Africa, onye bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ode akwụkwọ na onye nduzi
N'ọgwụgwụ afọ 1950, ọ kwagara ezinụlọ ya na Coventry, England, maka ọrụ ya dị ka onye njikwa nkwago
Ezinụlọ ahụ mesịrị laghachite South Africa
Ebrahim ekwuola na ọ mụtara ime ihe nkiri 'na odụrụkọ' na Cape Town, ịrụ ọrụ dịka onye na-enyee aka na nkwago ihe nkiri, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na ọrụ ndị ọzọ na ụlọ ihe nkiri
Ebrahim rụrụ ọrụ kasị nke Charmaine Beukes Meintjies na telivishọn soap opera nke South Africa 7de Laan kemgbe 2000
Ebrahim egosịpụtala n'ụlọ ihe nkiri na n'ememme ihe nkiri na South Africa dum, gụnyere Suidoosterfees na Klein Karoo Nasionale Kunstefees
N'ememme Klein Karoo na 2007, ọ rụrụ na mmepụta asụsụ Afrikaans nke ihe omume Athol Fugard, Boesman en Lena
Ọ natara awọd Kanna nke nwanyị ihe nkiri kacha mma bụ Best Actress maka ọrụ ya dị ka Lena
Na 2013 Naledi Theater Awards, Ebrahim meriri nturu ugo maka ịrụ ọrụ kacha mma na ihe omume dị ka onye (Nwanyị) ọrụ ya kacha maka Naam / Name bụ Ellen Pakkies
Ihe omume a a na-akọ akụkọ ndụ n'ezie nke otu nwanyị South Africa nke a mara ikpe igbu nwa ya nwoke iñụ ọgwụ ike maarala ahụ mgbe o nwela ntachi obi na mmegbu ọtụtụ afọ
Ebrahim edela ọtụtụ ihe omume, gụnyere Die Ongelooflike Reis van Max en Lola, ọrụ nwere agwa abụọ ya na onye na-ede ihe omume nke South Africa na onye ntụzi Hugo Taljaard dere
Ebrahim kwadoro ihe omume a n'akụkụ enyi ogologo oge ya na onye ome ihe nkiri South Africa bụ Chris van Niekerk nwere
N'ime ihe omume na ndụ n'ezie,bụ enyi dị n'etiti nwoke na-acha ọcha na nwanyị nwere agba nọgidere na-adị, ọbụna site n'oge Apartheid
Ebrahim ekwuola na n'oge Apartheid, Van Niekerk ga-aga otu sinima, ebe ọ na-aga ọzọ, na 'mgbe ahụ, anyị ga-ezukọta ọnụ mee ihe nkiri stukkies'
N'mmemme Klein Karoo na 2016, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Invisible, ihe omume ọzọ o dere na Bekee na Afrikaans
Na Invisible, ọ gosipụtara otu nwanyị na-enweghị ebe obibi nke bụbu onye bi na Cape Town District nke isii

Ebrahim mekwara ihe ngosi otu nwanyị gbasara ndụ ya, Praat Die Storie Smaak Kry (Let's Spice It Up), nke o megoro n'asụsụ Afrikaans na bekee na South Africa niile dịka akụkụ nke mmemme ụbọchị ụmụ nwanyị mba
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2019, a mara ọkwa na Ebrahim ga-ahapụ ọrụ abụọ ya nke Charmaine na nwanne ya nwanyị ọjọọ Vivian n'ihi na 'akụkọ niile dị mkpa na Charmaine na Vivian agwụla'
Ebrahim kwụsịrị nsonye afọ iri na iteghete ya n'ihe nkiri ahụ n'abalị iri abụọ na anọ n'ọnwa Octoba 2019
N'ajụjụ ọnụ e bipụtara na magazin South Africa nụ Kuier, Ebrahim kwuru na a manyere ya ịhapụ 7de Laan
O kwuru na ya echerela ụzọ ọpụpụ ya ruo oge ụfọdụ, na ọ rụrụ ụka na o nweghị ọgwụgwọ akụkọ maka agwa Charmaine ọzọ
N'abalị asaa nke ọnwa Nọvemba 2019, Ebrahim malitere ọrụ ngosi onye ọbịa izu isii na rival South Africa, Binnelanders
A họpụtara Ebrahim maka ma nweta ọtụtụ onyinye maka ọrụ nka ya

Ebrahim dọtara nkatọ sitere n'aka ndị na-akpa ókè agbụrụ na mbido January 2015 mgbe o kwuchara okwu na ndetu Facebook site n'aka Onye ọcha bụ onye mgbachi the nyere ndị ka ibe ha akpọrọ Supremacist Sunette Bridges, bụ nke Bridges rụrụ asị banyere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ka ebubo nke ndị ọrụ ugbo ndịọcha egburu na 2014
Bridges kwukwara na mwakpo/ igbu ọchụ bụ ndị 'ndị isi ojii' mere ya ,bụ nke bụ adị na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ

Okwu Ebrahim na ndetu gbasara ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke Facebook mere ka nke ahụ pụta ìhè ma dọtiaa okwu na ndị India na ndị ojii South Africa nwetara ọkwa dị elu nke mpụ ime ihe ike na nkezi (na igbu ọchụ nke ndị ọrụ ugbo ọcha ma ọ bụ onye otu ezinụlọ ha bụ naanị pacenti efu n'ụma atọ nke igbu ọchụ niile e dekọrọ na South Africa n'afọ ahụ) n'afọ ahụ
Ebrahim mekwara ka ozizi ịkpa ókè agbụrụ nke e ji wuo njirimara Afrikaan na enweghị mmasị nke ndị Afrikaan idoziharị mmehie ha mejọrọ South Africa na ndị obodo ya
Nke a kpalitere nnukwu mkpagbu ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na soshal midia
Nkwụghachi azụ ịkpa ókè agbụrụ a butere ọtụtụ ndị Afrikaan gosipụtara isi okwu Ebrahim, site n'ikwu okwu mkparị megide onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ebe ndị Afrikaan ndị ọzọ họọrọ iji ohere a enyere ha site na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'ụdị site n'ịgbalị ịwepu 7de Laan na mbọ ichetara Ebrahim ọnọdụ ya n'ime ndị isi ọchịchị nke ndị ọcha site n'ịnapụ ya ego
Ntsetsao Viola Motsumi bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2019, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke North West Provincial Legislature ma si otú a ghọọ onye isi oche kachasị nta na South Africa
Motsumi bụ onye otu African National Congress
A mụrụ Motsumi n'obodo nta Madibe-Mak Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mmabatho High School na 2001 wee gaa n'ihu na-agụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum North-West
Site na mahadum, o nwere nzere BSc
na physics, asambodo postgraduate na agụmakwụkwọ, na nzere BScHons na microbiology
O nwetara MBA na mahadum na 2019
Motsumi rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi na Mmabatho High n'etiti afọ 2008 na 2015
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2019, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu North West Provincial dị ka onye nnọchi anya African National Congress
A ṅụrụ ya iyi dị ka MPL na 22 Mee
N'otu ụbọchị ahụ, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote ọkà okwu, na-anọchi Jane Manganye
Motsumi na-eje ozi dị ka osote ọkà okwu kachasị nta na South Africa
