Viola Adaku Onwuliri (amuru na 18 June 1956) bụ onye prọfesọ mmuta biochemistry na mahadum na onye ndọrọ-ndọrọ ọchịchị jere ozi dika Minista na Naijiria
Viola Onwuliri bu ada mbu nke ezinụlọ eze nke His Highness Eze Cletus na Ugoeze Dorathy Oparaoji nke Amuzi, Ahiazu Mbaise LGA, Imo Steeti
O si Ahiazu Mbaise na Imo steeti, Nigeria ma a muru ya na Legos na 1956
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị nke ụmụnwaanyị dị na Owerri tupu ọ gaa Mahadum Naijiria na Nsukka ebe ọ nwetara nzere na Biochemistry
Ọ gakwara Mahadum Jos ebe o nwetara PGCE, MSc na Applied Organic Chemistry na PhD na Molecular Biochemistry
O mechara gaa maka asambodo na Mahadum Howard na ụlọ akwụkwọ Harvard School of Public Health na USA
Viola laghachiri Naịjirịa ebe ọ malitere ọrụ dịka onye enyemaka gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 1981
Na 2004 ọ ghọrọ prọfesọ nke Biochemistry na Mahadum Jos Ya na di ya, Celestine Onwuliri, nwere ụmụ ise
Na 2004 Viola ghọrọ onye Naijiria na nwanyị Afrika mbụ a họpụtara ịbụ onye otu International AIDS Society (IAS) nke nọ na Geneva wee bụrụ onye nnọchi anya mpaghara Afrika site na 2004 rua 2008
A họpụtara ya na 2008 ruo afọ anọ ọzọ
N’afọ 2011 ọ bụ onye ga-azọ okwa nke osote gọvanọ Imo steeti ya na Gov
Ikedi Ohakim, mgbe emriri ha, ọ jụrụ onyinye ọkwa nke ije ozi di ka Kọmishọna site n'aka Gọvanọ Rochas Okorocha mana o jiri nwayọ wee kwuo ya

O mechara bụrụ onye Minista ma mee ihe ama ama na Ọktoba 2013 mgbe ọ duru ndị nnọchi anya Nigeria ka ha merie oche nke United Nations Security Council (UNSC) na nhoputa ndi ochichi a na-enwetụbeghị ụdị ya
Ọ nọkwa na okwa ahụ mgbe ọ kpọrọ oku ka onye ọchịchị Libya, Moammar Gadhafi, gbaa arụkwaghịm na-ekwu na otu nnupụisi Libya kacha anọchite anya ndị Libya
N'otu ọnwa ahụ ka Mịnịsta, ọ gara ebe bọmbụ metụtara ala nke bụAbuja United Nations bombing nke gburu ihe karịrị mmadụ iri abụọ

Ọ kwuru na 'Ihe a abụghị ọgụ Naịjirịa mana na ọgụ mba ụwa niile' Ihe ojoo dakwasiri ya mgbe ụgbọelu nke Dana Air Flight 992 si na mbara igwe daa na June 2012 nke gburu di ya Celestine Onwuliri na ihe karịrị mmadụ 150 ndị ọzọ
Di ya bụbu onye isi ọchịchị Federal University of Technology Owerri (FUTO)

Dika nwunye onye isi ọchịchị Mahadum FUTO na onye guzobere ma bụrụ onye isi nzukọ ụmụnwaanyị nke Mahadum FUTO(FUTOWA) (2006-2011), ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị oke mkpa n'ịmepụta ọrụ na mmepe nke FUTO site na FUTOWA gunyere okike ulo oru nlebara umuaka anya maka ndi oru na umu akwukwo, nguzobe ebe nlebara umuaka anya na ibuli onodu ndi nwanyi noo na FUTO

Ọ kpalitere ọgbaghara na 2013 dị ka Mịnịsta mgbe ọ rịọrọ ka Gọvanọ Imo n'oge ahụ nye akụkọ mmefu nke ego n'ụdị nke ndị gọọmentị etiti ọ natara n'aha Imo Steeti, gunyere ego Sure-P, Ego njikwa ide mmiri, ego ngalaba LGA, ego nkesa NDDC na ego ndị ọzọ nke gọọmentị nyere ya

Dị ka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka Ofesi na-arụ ọrụ iji weghachite ma melite mmekọrịta na ndị Naijiria nọ na mba ọzọ, dịka ụzọ mbụ iji mepụta gburugburu ebe obibi dị mma iji dọta ndị Naịjirịa nọ na-esonye na imezu ya Ebumnuche nke Onye isi ala na iji nweta ego ntinye ego nke Foreign Direct Investment na Foreign Direct Remittances nke ruru 8billion dollars na 21billion dollars n'otu n'otu n'oge ahụ, arụ ọrụ iji kwalite nkwanye ùgwù na ịkwalite ọgwụgwọ nke ndị Najiria nọ na mba ndị ọzọ; ọ ghọrọ onye isi ala Naijiria mbụ ka onye isi obodo ya nabatara na Mahadum Howard University

Dika Mịnịsta Ofesi na Naijiria o jere ozi site na 11 Julaị 2011 ruo 22 Ọktoba 2014 nke gunyere ije ozi dika onye Steetị-1 Minista na mgbe ahụ, Minista na-elekọta ngalaba ọrụ nke ofis ofesi n'etiti 2013 na 2014 tupu akwaga ya na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ dị ka State-1 Mịnịsta
N’afọ 2013, ọ meriri ọkwa onye isi oche nke GlobalPOWER Women Network Africa
Mgbe afọ ahụ gasịrị, ọ natara oninye nsọpụrụ nke 'European Union Honorary Platinum Leadership Award in Politics na 28 November 2013 na Stockholm, Sweden
Onwuliri bu onye isi oche maka otu nke African continental women's society SWAAN ma na-arụ oru dika onye isi nchoputa na onye ọrụ nduzi na mmekorita nke Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation
Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan kpaliri Onwuliri site na okwa nke Minista maka Mba Abroad ka ọ bụrụ Minista nke steetị maka agụmakwụkwọ na October 2014 mgbe Ezenwo Nyesom Wike gbara arụkwaghịm
N’afọ 2015, gọọmentị Naịjirịa họpụtara Onwuliri dịka Pro-Chancellor nke Nigerian Maritime University (NMU) na dịka onye isi oche kansụl ya
Viola Shafik bụ onye Egypt-German na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nhazi, na onye na-eme fim
A mụrụ Shafik na Schönaich, Baden-Württemberg, Germany nye nna onye Ijipt na nne onye Germany
Ọ gụrụ gbasara ọmụmụ Oriental na ọmụmụ German na Academy of Fine Arts
Ọ natara PhD ya n'afọ 1994
E mechara bipụta akwụkwọ edemede ya, Arab Cinema History and Cultural Identity n'asụsụ Bekee n'afọ 1998
Ọ biri na New York na 1996 n'ihi onyinye sitere na Rockefeller Humanities Foundation
Shafik akụziwo na Mahadum America dị na Cairo na Mahadụ Zürich Ọ bụkwa onye ndụmọdụ maka ọzụzụ La Biennale di Venezia, al-Rawi Screenwriters Lab, na Dubai Film Connection
Ọ na-ahazi mmemme ihe nkiri
Shafik abụwo onye ntụgharị maka telivishọn German
Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye isi ọmụmụ nke MENA (Middle Eastern na North African) Programme Documentary Campus, atụmatụ nke na-elekwasị anya na iduzi na imepụta ihe nkiri na mba Middle East na North Africa
Violet A Akurut also known as Akurut Violet Adome (born 25 August 1976) is a Ugandan politician and teacher by profession
She is the district woman representative of Katakwi District in the 10th Parliament of Uganda
She is a member of the National Resistance Movement political party
She was the aspiring Woman Member of Parliament 2021-2026, of Katakwi under NRM political party
N'afọ 1989, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Primary Leaving Examination na Madera Girls Primary School ma mesịa sonye na Kangole Girls Senior Secondary School maka asambodo agụmakwụkwọ Uganda ya n'afọ 1993
N'afọ 1996, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ Uganda Advanced Certificate of Education na Tororo Girls School
N'afọ 1999, ọ nwetara asambodo na Project Planning and Management site na Uganda Management Institute

N'afọ 2003, e nyere ya nzere Bachelors na agụmakwụkwọ na Mahadum Makerere O nwere Post Graduate Diploma na Resource Mobilization and Management site na Uganda Management Institute nke ọ nwetara na afo 2010
O mechara laghachi iji nweta Master of Diplomacy and International Studies na Mahadum Uganda Martyrs na afo 2016
Site na afo 2012-2016, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Kọmishọna na Uganda Human Rights Commission
N'afọ 2012, ọ bụ onye nhazi na Women of Uganda Network
N'etiti afọ 2010-2011, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa mmemme na Transform Uganda Site na afo 2009 ruo na afo 2010, ọ bụ onye isi mmemme na ANPPCAN
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi mmemme na World Vision International na afo 2007 ruo na afo 2008
N'afọ 2002 ruo na afo 2005, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Ngalaba Mmụta, Soroti Catholic Diocese dị ka Onye Nlekọta mmemme
Ọ bụ onye ọrụ nwoke na nwanyị na Katakwi District Local Government n'afọ 2000 ruo na afo 2001
Site na afo 2012 ruo taa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka Onye isi oche, Advisory Board na Katakwi Grassroots Women Development Initiative
Ọzọkwa site na afo 2015 ruo taa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye isi na-ahụ maka ego na Uganda National AIDS Services Organization
Site na afo 2016 ruo taa, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye omeiwu na ụlọ omeiwu nke Uganda
Ọ lụrụ di
Violet Obiamaka Odogwu-Nwajei (amụrụ na May 15, 1942) bụbu onye Naịjirịa na-eme egwuregwu ọsọ na iwuli elu
Ọ bụ onye bụbu onye isi nke Athletic Federation of Nigeria na osote onye isi nke Confederation of African Athletics
A mụrụ Odogwu na Asaba, Delta State
Ọ malitere agụmakwụkwọ na obodo ahụ tupu ọ kwaga Lagos ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị
N’afọ ndị 1950, Violet na nwanne ya nwanyị bụ Juliet gbara ọsọ maka Sports Club
Na 1958, ọ nọchitere anya Naịjirịa na 1958 Commonwealth Games
Ọganihu ọ na-aga n'ihu na ihe egwuregwu mere ka ọ nweta onyinye nsọpụrụ nke 'Sports Woman of the Year'
Mgbe egwuregwu ahụ gasịrị, ọ gara n'ihu na ọmụmụ ya na-agụ akwụkwọ n'ihe ọmụmụ gbasara odeakwụkwọ
Na 1963, ọ laghachitere n'egwuregwu ma nọchitere anya Naịjirịa n'egwuregwu All-African Games nke mbụ na-ọsọ ihe mgbochi 80m
Odogwu bụ onye otu ndị egwuregwu nọchitere Naịjirịa anya na 1966 Commonwealth Games nke emere na Kingston
Na egwuregwu ahụ, o nwetara ọla nchara mgbe ọ wuliri elu ruo ukwu iri abụọ, sentimita abụọ na ọkara iji bụrụ nwanyị mbụ merụrụ ọla ahụ n'Afrika na mmemme egwuregwu Commonwealth
N’afọ 1968, ọ duru ndị otu egwuregwu ụmụnwaanyị Naịjirịa n’egwuregwu Olimpik na 1968
O riteghi ọla ma ọ bụ onye nke ikpe-azu na egwuregwu nke iwuli elu
Ọ bụ onye merụrụ ọla nchara na mmemme nke Little Olympics, emere otu afọ tupu mgbe ahụ maka nkwadebe maka isi mmemme ahụ
Violet Sizani Siwela bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Portfolio na Mmepe Obere Azụmaahịa na National Assembly of South Africa kemgbe 2019
Onye otu African National Congress, ọ bụ onye omeiwu kemgbe 2019
Siwela jere ozi dị ka onye otu Mpumalanga Provincial Legislature na dị ka onye so na Executive Council (MEC) na gọọmentị mpaghara
N'afọ 2009, a họpụtara ya dị ka osote onye isi oche nke ndị omeiwu mpaghara
Siwela ghọrọ MEC maka Ọrụ Ugbo n'afọ 2011
N'afọ 2014, a họpụtara ya dị ka MEC maka Human Settlement, ọkwá ọ nọ na ya ruo mgbe a chụpụrụ ya na kansụl ndị isi na mgbanwe nke onye isi ala David Mabuza mere n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2016
Na Machị 2018, a họpụtara ya dị ka ọkà okwu nke ndị omeiwu mpaghara
A họpụtara Siwela ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu n'afọ 2019
Àtụ Current MPs of South Africa
Violeta Nikolaeva Ninova (Bulgarian; amụrụ n'abalị iri na itoolu n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1963) bụ onye Bulgaria na akwọ ụgbọ mmiri
A mụrụ ya na Sofia
Lee Arthur Carter (amụrụ n'October 7, 1971), nke a maara site na aha egwu ya bụ Viper, bụ ónyé America na-eti egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe
Viper anọwo na-emepụta egwu kemgbe ọ bụ nwata, mana ọ nwetara nlebara anya zuru oke n'ịntanetị maka abọm ya nkè afọ 2008, You'll Cowards Don't Even Smoke Crack

Ọdịdị na-arụpụta ihe nkè ọrụ ya, tinyere mkpebi ya màkà mmepụta onwé ya, emeela ka ọ bụrụ ónyé ofufe na-eso ya dị ka onye na-ese ihe n'èzí, na ntụnyere nke ónyé na-eti egwu Lil B na onye na-agụ egwu Wesley Willis, a na-ewerekwa ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị malitere rap igwe ojii
A mụrụ Viper na El Dorado, Arkansas
Ọ malitere ịkpọ piano mgbè ọ dị afọ ise
Mgbè ọ dị afọ isii, ọ kwagara n'ógbè Hiram Clarke nke Houston, Texas wee malite ịgba egwu rap mgbè ọ dị afọ itoolu
N'afọ 1997, ọ bụ ónyé na-eme ihe nkírí na ihe nkírí Fifth Ward, nke nwanne ya nwoke, Greg Carter duziri
Ọ bụ ezie na a kọrọ na Viper malitere ịgba egwu mgbe ọ bụ nwatakịrị, egwu mbụ ya pụtara bụ na soundtrack màkà Fifth Ward, n'okpuru aha 'J-Ride'
Na mbụ n'okpuru aha ónyé na-ese ihe Lee Dogg, Viper wepụtara abọm mbụ ya, Lee Dogg، na Ọktoba 7, 2003, nke a ga-emesị kpọgharịa Hustlin ' Thick
E kere abọm ahụ karịsịa na mmekorita ya na ndị omenkà dị iche iche bịanyere aka na akara egwu mpaghara Dope House Records n'oge ahụ, ónyé Viper kelere ọtụtụ ugboro na ederede ederede

Viper mere atụmatụ ịga n'ihu na-ewepụta abọm n'okpuru aha Lee Dogg ma nwee ọtụtụ atụmatụ màkà mmekorita, mana n'ihi ihe ndị a na-amaghị ama nke a emeghị, ọ gbanwere aha abọm ya ka ọ bụrụ Hustlin 'Thick na aha ónyé na-ese ihe ya ka ọ bụ Viper
Carter nwèrè ụmụ anọ; a mụrụ otu n'afọ 2002, abụọ ya na nwunye mbụ ya, a mụrụ nke ikpeazụ n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020
Ọ na-ekwu na ya kwenyere na ọ bụ Kraịst nke abụọ, ma na-ezo aka n'onwe ya dị ka 'Black Jesus' ma bụrụ Ónyé Kraịst na-anụ ọkụ n'obi
Na June 2016, Carter nwèrè oyi bárá ya n'ahụ
N'afọ 2021, Betty Carter, nne Lee Carter, nwụrụ mgbè ọ dị afọ 79
Àkù-ñkịtị nke Virginia bu otu nkeji obodo nọr nà Njikota Obodo Amerika nke nọr na ikpele ya nke Atlantic na Nledà anyanwu Njikota Obodo
Ha tùrù Virginia ótụ áhà nke 'Old Dominion' ('Obodo ichié') na ọ di mgbe ha na kpó ya ('Mother of Presidents') 'Mmá ndi íshí Obodo' màkà ndi íshí US bu ébé ha mùrù ha ímérímé
Àlà na ufùlù nkeji nke di na áká Blue Ridge Mountains na Chesapeake Bay, ébé ìfulū na ihe àlà ndi ozor nke ya nọr
Íshí Àkù-ñkịtị nka bu Richmond; Virginia Beach bu nke mádu kàrìrì na Fairfax County bu nkeji-ndọndó nke kárírí mádu
Nkeji nke nwèrè mádu rúrú nde asaátọ
Virginia Alice Camealio-Benjamin bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa bụ onye otu ndị omeiwu nke Eastern Cape Provincial kemgbe Mee, na afọ 2019
Ọ bụ onye kansụl nke Kouga Local Municipality tupu nhọpụta ya na ndị omeiwu mpaghara
Camealio-Benjamin bụ onye otu African National Congress
Camealio-Benjamin bụ onye otu African National Congress
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye kansụl nke Kouga Local Municipality
Na Juun, na afọ 2011, onye a họpụtara ọhụrụ dị ka onye isi obodo Kouga bụ Booi Koerat họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye otu kọmitii onye isi obodo maka njem nleta na ụlọ ọrụ okike
Koerat gbara arụkwaghịm na afọ 2015 ma họpụta Daphne Kettledas dị ka onye nọchiri ya
Ọ nọgidere na Camealio-Benjamin n'ọkwa ya
O mechara bụrụ onye isi ụtarị nke caucus ANC
Na ntuli aka ime obodo nke afọ 2016, Democratic Alliance wepụrụ ANC dị ka otu na-achị obodo ahụ
N'oge nnọkọ kansụl, ANC họpụtara ya dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi obodo ha
Ọ meriri Elza van Lingen nke DA mgbe ọ nwetasịrị naanị votu 12 ma e jiri ya tụnyere Van Lingen 17
Camealio-Benjamin nọgidere bụrụ onye isi ụtarị ANC
A họpụtara Camealio-Benjamin ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu nke Eastern Cape Provincial mgbe ntuli aka mpaghara nke 8 Mee, na afọ 2019 gasịrị
A ṅụrụ ya iyi na 22 Mee ma ANC họpụtara ya dị ka ụtarị
Na 3 June, ọ natara ọrụ kọmitii ya
Virginia DeBerry na Donna Grant bụ ndị edemede America bụ ndị so dee ọtụtụ akwụkwọ n'etiti afọ 1990 na afọ 2010
DeBerry na Grant zutere na mbụ na New York dị ka ụdị ndị ọzọ na-asọ mpi maka otu ọrụ ahụ
Ha abụọ malitere magazin Maxima, magazin ejiji na ndụ maka ụmụ nwanyị buru ibu, ebe DeBerry bụ onye isi nchịkọta akụkọ na Grant bụ onye nchịkọta akụkọ
Mgbe mbipụta nke Maxima kwụsịrị, ha gbalịrị ide akwụkwọ ọnụ
E bipụtara akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ha, Exposures, n'okpuru aha Marie Joyce (maka Donna Marie na Virginia Joyce)
Akwụkwọ nke abụọ ha, nke e dere dị ka DeBerry na Grant, bụ Tryin' to Sleep in the Bed You Made nke nọrọ ọnwa 18 na ndepụta Essence Magazine Bestseller na ọnwa 5 dị ka nọmba 1 na ndepụta ahụ
Ndị dere ya natara n'afọ 1998 Honor Award na Fiction site na Black Caucus nke American Library Association
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ nwetakwara onyinye Book of the Year site na Blackboard, na New Author of the Year Award site na Go On Girl Book Club

Akwụkwọ akụkọ ha ọzọ, Far From the Tree, bụ Bestseller yana Essence Magazine Bestseller na Better Than I Know Myself nwetara Open Book Awards abụọ, ma tinye ya na akụkọ ifo kacha mma nke afọ 2004 nke Borders na Waldenbooks
Grant gara Barnard College ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum New York
Ọ bụ nwa afọ Brooklyn, New York ma na-ebi ugbu a na di ya Hiram
Tupu ọ bụrụ onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ, ọ nọrọ ihe karịrị afọ iri dị ka ihe nlereanya, nke ngalaba 12+ nke Ford Models na-anọchite anya ya
DeBerry bụ onye bụbu onye nkuzi Bekee n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị si Buffalo, New York
Ọ gara Mahadum Fisk ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na SUNY na Buffalo
Ọ lụrụ onye na-egwu jazz tenor saxophonist Jerry Weldon ma biri na New Jersey
N'afọ 2008, DeBerry na Grant sonyeere ndị mmekọ Tyrha Lindsey na Tracey Kemble iji guzobe 4 Colored Girls Productions
Ha nwere olile anya ime ihe nkiri nke Tryinī to Sleep in the Bed You Made, dabere na akwụkwọ akụkọ ha nke afọ 1997, dị ka ihe ngosi mbụ ha nwere onwe ha
Ha enweghị obi ụtọ na ụdị ihe nkiri Hollywood chọrọ ma emeghị ihe nkiri ahụ
N'afọ 2009, ha kwuru okwu na California Book Club Summit nke mbụ kwa afọ ma bụrụ akụkụ nke mkparịta ụka panel banyere obi erughị ala nke ndị Africa America banyere ụlọ ọrụ mbipụta
Virginia Etiaba bula onye governor na Anambra State, Novemba 2006 ruru Febrụwarị 2007, mgbe achufuru Peter Obi si o mere he ojo
Ha hapuru office ahu, nyeyachi ya Peter Obi mgbe a mata eziokwu basiri he mere

Virginia Gibson (amuru Virginia Gorski ; abalị itolu na onwa nke ano, na afọ 1925 - abalị iri abụo na ise na onwa nke anọ, na afọ 2013) bụ onye egwu America, onye na-agụ abụ na onye na-eme ihe nkiri, ihe onyonyo na ihe nkiri egwu
Site na agbụrụ Polish na Irish, Gibson bụ ada nke Mr
na Oriakụ
John S
Gorski, Gibson gụsịrị akwụkwọ na St
Alphonsus Parochial School
Gibson, onye Warner Bros bịanyere aka na ya na 1950 wee mee ihe nkiri mbụ ya na Tea for Two (1950), malitere ọrụ ya na egwu egwu n'obodo ya St
Louis, Missouri
Na 1937, ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ agbọghọ 35 ahọpụtara maka ballet na mmepụta ụlọ ọrụ St
Louis Opera
Ọ gbara egwu na egwu egwu nke mmepụta Onye isi mmụta n'ebe ahụ na 1940, na na 1943 ọ bụ akụkụ nke egwu egwu nke oge okpomọkụ nke Muny Opera
N'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ nke 1943, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-agba egwú atọ sitere na otu ahụ iji bịanye aka na nkwekọrịta iji mee na Roll Up Your Sleeves na Broadway
O jiri aha ọmụmụ ya na Broadway ruo 1949
Na 1947, ọ laghachiri ịrụ na Muny Opera, oge a dị ka kpakpando nke No, Mba, Nanette
N'ịbụ onye a na-akwụ ụgwọ dị ka starlet, ọ bụ akụkụ nke otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Hollywood bụ ndị mere njem na mba ahụ na 1951-1952 na-akwalite 50th Anniversary nke ụlọ ihe nkiri
Ya na Roscoe Ates na Charles Starrett ọ gara n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Oklahoma na-ekele ọha mmadụ
Na Hollywood ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado ma ọ bụ na-eduga n'ọtụtụ egwu egwu Warner Brothers
Ọrụ ihe nkiri ya ama ama bụ Liza na nwunye asaa maka ụmụnna asaa (1954)
N'ịtụgharị uche na Warners 'na-adịghị ọhụrụ nke nhọrọ ya, Gibson kwuru, sị, 'E nwere nnọọ ọtụtụ egwu egwu, na ha nwere Doris Day
Ma ònye nwere ike na-enwu ma e jiri ya tụnyere ịdị ndụ ya?”
Na ìgwè onyonyo, Gibson bụ onye na-eme ihe mgbe niile na Captain Billy's Showboat (1948)
O mekwara ihe nkiri na So This Is Hollywood (1955)
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe ngosi oge niile na The Johnny Carson Show (1955–56), usoro Carson gara aga, ka a ghara inwe mgbagwoju anya na Ihe ngosi Tonight Starring Johnny Carson
N'afọ 1956 ọ laghachiri na Broadway ka ọ kpọọ ada Ethel Merman na egwu Ịchụ nta obi ụtọ
Ọ ghọrọ otu n'ime kpakpando nke Parade gị Hit, otu n'ime ihe ngosi TV kachasị ewu ewu nke 1950, maka otu oge
O nwere ọnwa atọ dị ka onye na-agụ egwú jazz na ụdị TV nke Young Doctor Malone
Site na 1962 ruo 1971 ọ kwadoro, ya na Frank Buxton (na emechaa, Bill Owen ), mmemme akwụkwọ akụkọ ụmụaka ABC-TV Discovery
Gibson pụtakwara na mkpọsa ngwá ahịa maka ngwakọta keki, igwefoto, ebe a na-ere swiit, ihe ncha, ihe na-agba ntutu, akwa nhicha akwụkwọ, na ncha
Mgbe ọrụ ime egwuregwu kwụsịrị, ọ kuziri ihe na HB Studio dị na New York
Na abalị iri na atọ na onwa nke anọ, na afọ 2013, Gibson nwụrụ na Newtown, Pennsylvania, mgbe ọ dị afọ 88
E liri ya na ebe a na-eli ozu Calvary na Mausoleum na Saint Louis, Missouri
N'afọ 1957, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha amasị Tony Award na egwu egwu, maka ihe ngosi ya nke Beth Livingstone na Ịchụ nta obi ụtọ
Gibson alụghị di ma ọ bụ mụọ nwa
Ọ rapaara n'okpukpe Roman Katọlik na ọ bụ onye Republican ogologo ndụ nke kwadoro Dwight Eisenhower n'oge ntuli aka onye isi ala 1952

Virginijus Sinkevičius (amụrụ na 4 Nọvemba 1990) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Lithuania nke na-eje ozi dị ka European Commissioner for the Environment, Oceans and Fisheries na European Commission nke Ursula von der Leyen duziri kemgbe afọ 2019
Ọ bụbu onye otu Seimas nke Republic of Lithuania na Minista nke Economy na Innovation nke Republic of Lithuania

N'afọ 2009, Sinkevičius gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Salomėja Nėris Gymnasium nke Vilnius, Lithuania, ebe a mụrụ ya Ọ gara n'ihu na mahadum Aberystwyth ebe ọ nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Economic and Social Studies na 2012

Na 2012, Sinkevičius bụ onye a na-azụ ọzụzụ na Unit of Regional and Ethnic Affairs na Office nke Prime Minister nke Republic of Lithuania Na 2013, ọ natara Master of Arts na European Studies na Maastricht University
Sinkevičius na-asụ Lithuanian dị ka asụsụ, nakwa Bekee, Russian na Polish
Site n'afọ 2012 ruo afọ 2015, Sinkevičius bụ onye edemede na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke ụlọ ọrụ akụkọ Lithuania Tribune
N'afọ 2013 ruo 2014, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote onye njikwa ọrụ na Centre for European Policy Analysis (CEPA) na Washington, DC
N'afọ 2014, Sinkevičius rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye njikwa ọrụ mba ụwa na Lietuvos paštas; n'afọ 2014 ruo afọ 2015, o sonyere na mmemme Lithuania
N'afọ 2015 ruo 2016, ọ bụ onye nhazi ọrụ na ọrụ nkwenye nke ọdụ ụgbọ elu Lithuania (LTOU)
N'afọ 2016, ọ bụ onye isi otu nke Group for Improving the Investment Environment na Public Enterprise Invest Lithuania
N'afọ 2017, Sinkevičius gụsịrị akwụkwọ Digital Policy na Mahadum Oxford

Na ntuli aka ndị omeiwu nke afọ 2016, a họpụtara Sinkevičius na Seimas nke Republic of Lithuania na otu onye dị ka onye na-azọ ọkwa onye nweere onwe ya na mpaghara Šeškinė na Vilnius; a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba

N'abalị iri abụọ na asaa n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 2017, a họpụtara Sinkevičius ka ọ bụrụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba n'ọchịchị Praịm Minista Saulius Skvernelis ma, mgbe a haziri Minista na-ahụ Maka akụ na ụba, ọ ghọrọ Mịnịsta Na-ahụ maka Akụnụba na Innovation

N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2019, ndị omeiwu Lithuania kwadoro nhọpụta Sinkevičius maka onye kọmishọna Europe; Praịm Minista Skvernelis na Ramūnas Karbauskis, onye ndú nke Lithuanian Farmers and Greens Union (LVŽS) kwetara nhọpụta ahụ
Mgbe ọ banyere n'ọkwa, Sinkevičius ghọrọ onye Kọmishọna Europe kacha nta, mgbe ọ dị afọ 28

N'afọ 2022, Sinkevičius tụrụ aro ihe ndị iwu kwadoro iji belata ojiji nke ọgwụ ahụhụ na-eme ka okike dị n'ofe EU ruo ọ dịkarịa ala 20% nke ala EU ka ọ na-erule afọ 2030, na mgbalị iji chebe ahụike nke ọma ma weghachite ọnụ ọgụgụ anụ ọhịa na-ada
N'afọ 2018, Sinkevičius nwetara onyinye maka The Best Solution for Better Business Environment of the Year site n'aka njikọ Investorsz Forum, na Blockchain Leadership na #SWITCH! Ihe nrite Tech
N'afọ 2019, ọ natara onyinye Partnership Leader 2018 maka mgbanwe ọhụrụ na mmepe nke usoro okike mmalite site na nzukọ Lithuanian Business Confederation
N'afọ 2018, a gụnyere Sinkevičius na ndepụta nke 100 Worlds Most Influential Young People in Government site na ebe nrụọrụ weebụ nke a kpọrọ Apolitical

Faịlụ ikike nke mba ụwa (VIAF) bụ faịlụ ikike mba ụwa Ọ bụ ọrụ jikọrọ ọnụ nke ọtụtụ ọba akwụkwọ mba yana ụlọ ọrụ ọbá akwụkwọ kọmpụta dị n'ịntanetị (OCLC) na-arụ ya
Onye ezinaụlọ Visagie kacha ochie amara ugbu a si Europe gaa South Africa bụ Pieter Visagie
A mụrụ Pieter Visagie na 1630 na Antwerp, Spanish Netherlands (Belgium ugbu a), nye Guillaume Guillielmus Visagie na Catharina Wouters
Pieter lụrụ Catharina Catrina Pouisseon na June 21 1671, mgbe ọ dị afọ 41 na de Caep de Goede Hoop, Dutch Cape Colony na South Africa
Vispring, nke a maara dị ka Vi-Spring, bụ ụlọ ọrụ àkwà e hiwere na 1901 na Eagle Street, Holborn, London
Ime matarasị na àkwà ndị e ji ihe okike mee

Akụkụ nke Vispring's notbility na-abịa site n'ịbụ ndị mbụ na-eme àkwà n'England iji patent nke onye injinia a mụrụ na Canada, James Marshall na-etinye spring coil n'akpa uwe ugbu a a a na-akpọkarị Marshall coil

Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 1914, a chọtara ọhụrụ nke dị ka ndị mmadụ n'ihe ndị mere n'oge gara maka nsogbụ ụra akpa nwa agbọghọ nwere ike ịbelata ọtụtụ ndị na ụdị nke ụra ihe ndị Marshall Mattress chịkọtara n'ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ, klọb na ụgbọ mmiri, gụnyere Queen Mary & The Titanic
Vispring bụ ndị ọrụ Marshall Mattress abụọ nke James Marshall guzobere bụ ndị nyere ha ikike ikike ikike imepụta matarasị Marshall na England
Ha gara n'ihu na-eji aha Marshall ruo na mbido afọ 1930 mgbe ha gbanwere aha ha dị ka Vispring
A na-eji aka eme akwa Vispring site na iji ihe okike dịka ajị anụ, ogho, ntutu ịnyịnya, coir, silk, cashmere, mohair na alpaca fleece karịa ihe ndị aka mere na ụfụfụ
'VI' na Vispring na-anọchite anya nọmba Roman 6
Nke a na-anọchite anya ntụgharị isii na coil ọ bụla nke bụ akara ahịa ha
A na-eji Vanadium Steel Wire eme coils, nke na-arụ ọrụ iji melite ihe ndị na-eguzogide spring ma na-emepụta springing na-agbanwe agbanwe nke nwere ike ọ gaghị enwe ike ịta ahụhụ site na iji ya

Visst Katten har djüren Sjál - En samling historier av och for djurvanner na Swedish na Jovisst har dyrene sjel na Norwegian (na English Sure an Animal Has a Soul - An Anthology of Tales about and for our Animal Friends; a sụgharịbe akwụkwọ a nʼasụsụ na bekee) ọ bụ akwụkwọ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo banyere ụmụ anụmanụ nke onye dere ya bu onye Norwegi-Swedish aha ya bu Margit Sandemo

E nwere egwuregwu okwu na aha mbụ nke akwụkwọ ahụ na Swedish, n'ihi na a na-ejikwa okwu ahụ bụ 'katten,' na mgbakwunye na ihe ọ pụtara 'kịta, ' mee ihe na ahịrịokwu Swedis nke pụtara 'ata ya ahụhụ!' atụgharịrị n'ụzọ, aha akwụkwọ ahụ bụ An Animal Has a Soul, (a Cat) Damn It!
E dere akwụkwọ a dị ka esi dee Vi är inte ensamma, akwụkwọ banyere ndị mmụọ ozi na-eche nche
Sandemo jụrụ ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ akụkọ Norwegian kwa izu Hjemmet na Swedish Hemmets Journal ma ha kwenyere na ụmụ anụmanụ nwere mkpụrụ obi
Ọ natara ihe karịrị akwụkwọ ozi 1500 site n'aka ndị na-agụ magazin, na enweghị otu azịza na'etiti ha
E ji azịza ndị a mee ihe dị ka ihe bụ isi nke akwụkwọ ahụ
Visst katten har Jüren Sjál onwe ya nwere ọtụtụ akụkọ mkpirikpi na foto ndị na-atọ ọchị karịsịa banyere anụ ụlọ, yana anụ ọhịa
Margit Sandemo hụrụ ụmụ anụmanụ n'anya mgbe ọ bụla, ọ gosikwara na akwụkwọ akụkọ ya
Ọ bụ onye nsọpụrụ nke otu Kjemp för Dyrene, nzukọ na-ahụ maka ikike ụmụ anụmanụ na Norway
Vitafoam Nigeria Plc bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ụfụfụ nke dị na Lagos, Naijiria
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-emepụta ụfụfụ na Naịjirịa, na-emepụta ngwaahịa polyurethane na-agbanwe agbanwe na nke siri ike
Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwekwara mmasị na Vitafoam Ghana na Vitafoum Sierra Leone
N'afọ 2011, ọ banyere n'ime njikọ aka na onye na-asọmpi, Vono Products tupu ọ zụta ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Ịzụta Vono Products mụbara òkè ụlọ ọrụ nke ahịa oche
N'afọ 2000, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gbasaa ngwaahịa ya site na itinye ego na nhọrọ ụra nke oge a nke anọ n'ime ndị enyemaka ya na-achịkwa ugbu a Vitapur, Vitagreen, Vitavisco na Vitablom
Vitapaur na-enye ihe owuwu na-egbochi mmiri
British Vita guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1962 na mmekorita ya na onye na-ekesa mpaghara GB
Ollivant
Mmepụta nke akwa ụfụfụ latex na matarasị malitere na afọ 1963 na Ikeja Industrial Estate
N'okpuru iwu ọhụrụ dị irè na afọ 1978, British Vita belatara ego ya site na 50% ruo 20%
Vivian Konadu Adjei ( born 14 January 2000) is a [[Football | A Ghanaian footballer who plays for Thunder Queens and the Ghanaian women's national team
Black Queens in Lagos for Aisha Buhari Tournament
Graphic Online
Nwa afọ Techiman na Bono East Region nke Ghana, Adjei nwere ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na nke okenye na Kumasi Sports Academy JHS na SHS
Kumasi Sports Academy bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ bọọlụ nke na-enye ndị na-eto eto egwuregwu bọọlụ ohere agụmakwụkwọ ka ha na-azụlite nkà ha dị ka ndị na-agba bọọlụ
Adjei malitere ọrụ ya na otu egwuregwu Ghana Women's Premier League nke Kumasi Sports Academy Ladies
O mechara sonye na Thunder Queens wee gbaa goolu asaa na 2020 21 Ghana Women's Premier League na-emechi oge ahụ dị ka onye kacha gbaa goolu na klọb ahụ
Ihe kachasị ama n'etiti ihe mgbaru ọsọ ndị ahụ bụ mgbe ọ gbara isi na nkeji nke 85 iji nye Thunder Queens mmeri 2 na 1 na Immigration Ladies na 5 Mee 2021
E kpebiri ya dị ka nwoke nke egwuregwu ahụ na ngwụcha nkeji iri itoolu
Adjei emeela maka Ghana na U17 na ọkwa dị elu
N'afọ 2016, ọ nọchitere anya Ghana U17 na 2016 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup ya na ndị egwuregwu dị ka Sandra Owusu-Ansah
Ọ gbara egwuregwu atọ ka South Korea wepụrụ Ghana na nkeji iri na ise nke ikpeazụ
N'ọnwa Julaị 2021, Adjei mere ndị otu maka Aisha Buhari Cup na 2022 Africa Women Cup of Nations qualifiers megide Naịjirịa
O mere nke mbụ ya n'oge egwuregwu Aisha Buhari Cup megide ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị Cameroon na 20 Septemba 2021
O gosipụtara nke mbụ ya site n'ịgba goolu mbụ ya na nkeji nke 89 nke egwuregwu ahụ iji nyere Ghana aka inwe mmeri 2o0
Vivian Jepkemoi Cheruiyot (amụrụ na 11 na onwa Septemba, na afọ 1983) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke na-ahụ maka ịgba ọsọ na ịgba ọsọ

Ọ nọchitere anya Kenya na Summer Olympics na afo 2000, 2008, 2012, na 2016, na-emeri ihe nrite ọlaọcha na 5000 m na ọla nchara na 10000 m na afọ 2012 Olympics, ihe nrite ego na 10000 m, na ihe nrite edo na 5000 m n'egwuregwu Olimpik nke 2016, na-etinye ihe ndekọ Olympic ọhụrụ na ihe omume 5000 m

Cheruiyot ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha na mita 5000 na afọ2007 World Championships in Athletics wee bụrụ onye mmeri ụwa na ihe omume ahụ na mbipụta 2009, na-ekwughachi ihe a na afọ 2011 World Championships, ebe ọ merikwara 10,000 m

Mgbe o nwetasịrị ọlaọcha na afọ 2010 IAAF World Indoor Championships, ọ meriri ọtụtụ utu aha n'èzí n'afọ ahụ, ghọọ onye mmeri Afrịka, onye mmeri Commonwealth Games na onye mmeri IAAF Continental Cup, yana mmeri nke afọ 2010 IAAF Diamond League
O nwere ihe ndekọ Kenya na ihe ndekọ Commonwealth maka 10,000 m na oge kachasị mma ya nke 29 3253, nke e debere na Rio Olympics na afọ 2016
Ọ bụ Ricky Simms zụrụ Cheruiyot
A mụrụ ya na nso Keiyo na Rift Valley Province, na-abịa site n'otu obodo ahụ dị ka nwanyị ọzọ na-agba ọsọ Alice Timbilili
Afọ ọganihu ya bịara na afọ 1999 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ise, o nwetara ihe nrite ọlaọcha na afọ 1999 IAAF World Cross Country Championships n'azụ Werknesh Kidane
Na 1999 World Youth Championships in Athletics ọ meriri ọla nchara na mita 3000
Ọ nwetara ọkwa dị elu maka na afọ 1999 All-Africa Games, ebe o nwetara ọla nchara na mita 5000
Ọ ghọrọ onye mmeri na 2000 IAAF World Cross Country Championships
Ọ nwetara nhọpụta maka na afọ 2000 Olympic Games wee ruo na 5000 m ikpeazụ mgbe o setịpụrụ ihe kachasị mma n'onwe ya na agba nke iru eru
Ọ dị nwayọ na ngwụcha ma bụrụ onye ikpeazụ na-agba ọsọ iji mechie
Vivian Cheruiyot meriri nrite ọlaọcha na 5000m ikpeazụ nke afọ 2007 World Championships na Osaka na 14 5850, n'azụ Meseret Defar (14 5791)
Na mbido afọ 2009 ọ mebiri ihe ndekọ nke Kenyan 3000 mita ime ụlọ (8 3053) na Birmingham wee merie asọmpi World's Best 10K na Puerto Rico
N'ọnwa Mee, ọ meriri na ọsọ Great Manchester Run 10K
Cheruiyot meriri n'asọmpi 5000m nke ụmụ nwanyị na 2009 World Championships na Berlin na oge nke nkeji 14 5833 sekọnd, ebe onye obodo Sylvia Kibet weere ọlaọcha
O mechiri oge egwu ahụ na ọlaọcha 3000m na ọla nchara 5000m na 2009 IAAF World Athletics Final
O meriri na asọmpi Afọ Ọhụrụ nke afọ 2009 San Silvestre Vallecana
Ọ nọgidere na World's Best 10K title na afọ 2010
Ọ pụtara na 2010 IAAF World Indoor Championships mere ka o nweta ọlaọcha na 3000 m n'azụ Meseret Defar
Ọ duziri ihe ịma aka nke Kenya 5000 m na 2010 African Championships in Athletics na Nairobi ma merie Defar n'oge a iji nweta aha Afrịka
Mgbe nke a gasịrị, isi ihe ọ lekwasịrị anya n'afọ ahụ bụ 2010 IAAF Diamond League
O meriri na 5000 m na Meeting Areva na Memorial van Damme ma họpụta ya dịka onye mmeri Diamond League Trophy maka ihe omume ahụ n'ozuzu
O meriri Sentayehu Ejigu na 2010 IAAF Continental Cup iji nweta ihe nrite ọla edo 5000m maka Africa
Ihe nrite ọla edo ọzọ na ihe omume ahụ bịara na afọ 2010 Commonwealth Games na Delhi, ebe ọ na-eduzi asọmpi Kenya na Sylvia Kibet na Ines Chenonge
Ọ laghachiri Kenya iji zụọ ma merie kilomita 8 na nzukọ Tuskys Cross Country
Ọ mechiri afọ ahụ na ọkwa dị elu site na mmeri na asọmpi BOclassic 5K na New Year's Eve

Cheruiyot malitere ịkwadebe maka World Cross Country Championships na Jenụwarị na afọ 2011 wee bịa nke atọ na Great Edinburgh Cross Country tupu ọ gbanwee Linet Masai iji merie Cross de Itálica na Seville
Ọ bụrụ onye nke abụọ na Kenyan Cross Country Championships mere ka o nwee ọnọdụ na ndị otu Kenya ma, n'adịghị ka ihe ịga nke ọma ya n'okporo ụzọ ahụ, ọ na-achọ inweta ihe nrite mbụ ya n'ụwa
Onye na-asọmpi ya bụ Masai duziri ebubo mbụ na afo 2011 IAAF World Cross Country Championships, mana Cheruiyot gbapụrụ na agba ikpeazụ iji nweta ihe nrite ọla edo ma duru Kenya gaa n'ọkwa ụmụ nwanyị
Ọ malitere na afọ 2012 site na mmeri na World's Best 10K ma melite ihe kachasị mma ya n'okporo ụzọ ruo minit 30 47
Ọ meghere na afọ 2012 Diamond League circuit na mmeri dị warara n'ihu Meseret Defar, nke mbụ na 3000 m na Doha mgbe ahụ karịa 5000 m na Rome
O mere ka o doo anya na ọ nọ n'egwuregwu Olimpik site na mmeri nke 10,000m na Nairobi na June
N'egwuregwu Olimpik, o ritere ihe nrite ọlaọcha na mita 5000 na ọla nchara na mita 10,000
N'afọ 2018, o meriri na 2018 London Marathon na oge nke 2 18 31
Ọ mechara nke abụọ na 2018 New York City Marathon, mechie na 2 26 02 n'azụ onye mmeri Mary Keitany na 2 22 48, na 20 sekọnd n'ihu Shalane Flanagan onye mechara na 2 26 22

Vivian Chukwuemeka ónyé amụrụ na abalị anọ nke ọnwa Mee 1975, bụ nwaafọ Naijiria n'eme egwuregwu aka akpọrọ shot put',ma bụrụ onye gaárálá nzukọ egwuregwu Olympic ụgbọro abụọÓ ritere nrite ọla edo n'egwuregwu asọmpi Commonwealth nke afọ 2002 ma nwee mmeri ugboro atọ áchàghị̀ acha na All-Africa Games site n'afọ 1999 ruo 2007
Ọ bụ ya bụ onye Afrịuka wetara mmeri na egwuregwu a na 2002, 2006 na 2008
Ọ na-esonyekwa na asọmpi -discus throw na hammer throw ma ọ̀ bụ́ghị́ n'ogo mba ụwa
shọt putu kachasị ya mma bụ mita 1843,nke ọ rụrụ na Eprel 2003 na Walnut
Nke a bụ nchịkọta Mgbalị ya nke Afrịka
Ó sonyere na asọmpi 2000 Summer Olympics na World Championship na 2003 na 2005 ma o-rughị na njedebe
O ritere ihe nrite ọla ọcha na 2006 Commonwealth Games
Ọ́ gụchara akwụkwọ na mahadum nke Azusa Pacificnke nzere bachalọ ya bụ ma bachalọ bụ maka ọrụ ọhà
Ọ́ natara mmachi afọ abụọ n'egwuregwu maka nyocha ọgwụ íkē nke kụrụ afọ n'ala na 2009 na asọmpi nke Naịjirịa
Chukwuemeka na ndị otu egwuregwu Naịjirịa nwere ọgbaghara kpụ ọkụ n'ọnụ

Nlereanya ọbàrà a n'eme maka nyocha a nwere ọtụtụ ihe n'edoghi anya, gúnyéré enweghị nkweko na ọnụ ọgụgụ karama,ọgbakọ gbasara ime nlele a, ya na ị́jû ịnabata onye nnọchi anya ya na nyocha nke abụọ na South Africaọ́ bòrò ndị ọrụ ha bụ maka nyocha ọgwụ íkê à na Naịjirịa ebubo nrụrụ aka na mmekpa ahụ gbasara mmekọahụ, na-ebokwa onye isi ala nke ọchịchị ahụ bụ Solomon Ogba ebubo ịmanye Amaka Ogoegbunam ka ọ́ kpọpụta ya dị ka onye n'ekesa ọgwụ ike a
Ndị otu mkpegharị ikpe kagburu ihe ọ na-ekwu ma mmachi afọ abụọ ya na IAAF nọkwa

Vivian E
Browne (April 26, 1929 - July 23, 1993) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe
A mụrụ ya na Laurel, Florida, a maara Browne nke ọma màkà i
Vivianse mkpesa ya nke ndị Africa na America, na ijikọ abstraction na okike
Ọ natala ọtụtụ onyinye maka ọrụ ya, bụrụ ónyé na-eme ihe ike, prọfesọ na onye guzobere ọtụtụ gallery
Dị ka nne ya si kwuo, Browne nwụrụ mgbè ọ dị afọ 64 site na ọrịa kansa afọ
Vivian Browne was born in Laurel, Florida, on April 26, 1929
She spent most of her life in New York City and Kern County, California
She received her Bachelor of Science in 1950 from Hunter College, New York, NY and a Master of Fine Arts from Hunter College in 1959
Her early painting career was fostered by a scholarship from the New School for Social Research, and a Huntington Hartford Foundation fellowship in 1964 and a fellowship with the MacDowell Colony
O tinyere ego na njem ya gafee Europe na Africa, ọ gụkwara akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ibadan na Naịjirịa n'afọ 1972
Browne rụrụ ọrụ na Mahadum Rutgers dị na Newark site na 1971 ruo 1992 dị ka ónyé otu ngalaba nke ngalaba nka na sayensị ka ọ na-aga n'ihu dị ka ónyé na-ese ihe n'onwe ya na ihe ngosi gafee mba ahụ
Browne nwèrè ọtụtụ ihe ngosi onwé ya na SoHo 20 Gallery n'oge ndụ ya, yana ihe ngosi na Bronx Museum, Mahadum California, Santa Cruz na Mahadum Western Michigan
O gosikwara na oghere MoMA PS1 na Clocktower Gallery na 1986
Vivian Browne bụ ónyé natara ọtụtụ onyinye n'oge ndụ ya niile
Vivian Fowler nwere ịchọ ya na
Vivian Fowler Memorial College For Girls bụ kọleji kwụụrụ onwe ya nke ụmụ nwanyị niile guzobere n'afọ 1991 site n'aka Chief Mrs

Ọ dị na Ikeja nke obodo Lagos

guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ na Jenụwarị 8, afọ 1991
Leila Fowler A gụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ aha nwa ya nwanyị nwụrụ anwụ
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ meghere na 17, Bola Shadipe St, Surulere Lagos, mgbe e mesịrị ọ kwagara na No
4, Adedamole Ojomo Close, n'okporo ámá Bode Thomas, Surulere Lakes
Ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ wee kwaga ebe obibi ya na Jenụwarị afọ 2000, Ebe a dị na Plot 5, Balogun Street, Billingsway Oregun, Ikeja Lagos Steeti
Agụmakwụkwọ agụmakwụkwọ na kọleji na-ewe afọ isii ma nwee afọ atọ na Junior Secondary School wee soro afọ atọ na Senior Secondary School

Senior Secondary School na-elekwasị anya na nkwadebe na ule atọ West African Senior School Certificate Examination (WASSCE), na International General Certificate of Secondary Education (IGCSE)
Vivian Mensah (amụrụ na 13 na onwa isii, na afọ 1972) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke gbara bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agbachitere otu egwuregwu bọọlụ ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Ghana

Thomson gụsịrị akwụkwọ AB
na gburugburu ebe obibi na Mahadum Princeton
O nwetara nzere MA na gburugburu ebe obibi na Mahadum California, Santa Barbara
Thomson gụsịrị PhD
na gọọmentị na Mahadum Virginia
Thomson bụ onye isi nyocha na onye njikwa ikuku na United States Environmental Protection Agency
Site na 1997 ruo 2017 ọ bụ prọfesọ na Ngalaba nke Sayensị gburugburuebe obibi na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Mahadum Virginia College of Arts and Sciences
O guzobere ma duzie mmemme Interdisciplinary Environmental Thought and Practice BA
Program

Onye gọvanọ Virginia bụ Mark Warner họpụtara n'afọ 2002, Thomson jere ozi dị ka osote onyeisi oche na onye otu State Air Pollution Control Board, otu na-achịkwa mmadụ asaa nke na-eme iwu mmetọ ikuku ma kwado iwu maka Virginia
Gọvanọ Tim Kaine họpụtara ya ọzọ ma jee ozi na Board ruo n'afọ 2010
N'afọ 2018, akwụkwọ Thomson, Climate of Capitulation, meriri PROSE Award na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọchịchị

Vivian Aminu Yusuf (amụrụ ya na ọnwa nke asatọ n’afọ 1983) bụ judoka onye Naijiria onye gbara otu udi ọkara heavyweight O ritere ihe nrite ọla ọcha abụọ n'afọ 2007 All-Africa Games nke Algiers, Algeria
n'afọ 2008 Judo Championship nke Agadir, Morocco, abụọ ndị Houda Miled nke Tunisia meriri n'egwuregwu ikpeazụ
Yusuf nọchitere anya naijiria na asọmpi Summer Olimpik nke 2008 na egwuregwu nke XXIX Olympiad na Beijing, China, ebe ọ zọrọ mpi maka klas nke ọkara nke ụmụ nwanyị (78 n'arọ)
Ọ natara a bye maka nke abụọ mbido gburugburu, onye jamani bụ Heide Wollert mechara merie ya
onye nwere ike igbanye akpịrịka akpaka na sekọnd iri atọ na asaa
Viviane Wade née Vert (Amụrụ na 13 Septemba 1932) bụ onye Senegalese a mụrụ na France nke jere ozi dị ka First Lady nke Senegal site n'afọ 2000 ruo 2012, dị ka nwunye Onye isi ala Abdoulaye Wade
A mụrụ ya na Besançon, a zụlitere ya na France
Ọ zutere Abdoulaye Wade mgbe ha na-aga Mahadum Franche-Comté na Besançon; ha lụrụ n'afọ 1963
Abdoulaye Wade mechara bụrụ onye na-arụsi ọrụ ike dị ka onye ndú nke Senegalese Democratic Party na mmegide
Mgbe ntuli aka onye isi ala nke afọ 1993, nke e meriri Wade, e nwere ụfọdụ ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na mba ahụ ma gbuo osote onye isi oche nke Ụlọikpe Iwu, Babacar Seye
E jidere Abdoulaye na Viviane ma tụọ ha mkpọrọ n'ihi ebubo na ha na-etinye aka
E mechara wepụ ebubo ndị ahụ, a mara mmadụ atọ ndị ọzọ ikpe maka igbu ọchụ ahụ
Mgbe a họpụtara di ya dị ka onye isi ala nke Senegal n'afọ 2000, Viviane ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ
Vivica Rayy ( born 19 April , 1983 , Nigeria ) is an American erotic actress
He entered the adult film industry in 2005
Viyé Diba (amụrụ n'afọ 1954) bụ onye Senegal na-eme ihe nkiri, ntinye ihe, na arụmọrụ
A maara ya maka iji ihe ndị a chọtara, mpaghara, ndị a na-ejighị n'aka, na ndị a rụgharịrị arụgharị n'ọrụ ya, na-egosipụta mmasị ya na isiokwu gburugburu ebe obibi
A gụnyere ọrụ Diba n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi mba ụwa, nke gụnyere DakāArt, Johannesburg Biennale, na Biennale dābidjan, ma gosipụta ya na ihe ngosi onwe ya na National Gallery na Dakar, Senegal
Enwere ike ịhụ ọrụ ya na North Carolina Museum of Art, Brooklyn Museum, na National Museum of African Art na Washington, DC

Diba nwetara nzere bachelọ na nka mara mma na National School of Fine Arts na Dakar, Senegal na 1979, nke soro ya bu inweta nzere afọ anọ ọzọ na agụmakwụkwọ nka na National School nke nka nke Senegal, kwa na Dakar
Diba nwetakwara PhD na Urban Geography site na Mahadum Nice na Nice, France, ebe edemede ya jiri mmetụta nke ọrụ mmadụ na gburugburu ebe obibi nke Dakar tụnyere nke Nice
Ọrụ Diba dị ka onye na-ese ihe malitere na 1980s
Ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ mbụ ya bụ ihe atụ, ọrụ Diba mechara jiri echiche kọwaa ụdị anya nke nka 'ọdịnala' Africa na ịchọpụta ihe onwunwe nke oghere obodo
N'afọ 1998, e nyere ya Grand Prize na Dak'Art Biennial n'afọ 1998 maka Echappement, ọrụ mgbasa ozi na-agwakọta na canvas
Diba jere ozi dị ka prọfesọ nke nka anya na National School of Fine Arts nke Senegal kemgbe 1986
Vlamertinge bụ obodo dị n'ógbè Belgium nke West Flanders na obodo Ypres
Obodo nta nke Vlamertinge dị nnọọ n'azụ obodo Ypres, n'okporo ụzọ N38 gaa n'obodo dị nso nke Poperinge
Na mgbakwunye na obodo Ypres n'onwe ya, Vlamertinge bụ obodo kachasị ukwuu nke Ypres
N'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ nke Vlamertinge, n'okporo ụzọ Poperinge, bụ ebe obibi nke Brandhoek
Ihe mbụ banyere Vlamertinge bụ site na oge ochie
Na 857 e wuru otu ụlọ ụka na Vlamertinge
Na 970 Ypres bibiri na ụlọ nsọ nke Vlamertinge ọkụ ala
Akwụkwọ ochie, bụ nke a maara n'oge a, nke gụnyere aha Flambertenges, bụ akwụkwọ nke afọ 1066
Baudouin van Lille, ndị Flanders, nwunye ya Adela na nwa ha nwoke bụ Baudouin, natara akwụkwọ a na chọọchị site na Sint-Pieters na Lille

Ngwa ndị a, n'ime ihe ndị ọzọ, otu ụzọ n'ụzọ iri dị na Elverdinge nakwa otu ụzọ n'ụzọ iri dị na Vlamertinge - 'In territorio Furnensi, in villa Elverzenges, decinam unam ; Flambertenges decinam similiter unam '
N'okpuru Ụkpụrụ Oge Ochie Vlamertinge bụ ebube nke Veurne-Ambacht na 22 n'azụ na ahụhụ dị ukwuu site na nnọchibido nke Ypres dị nso
Vlamertinge dị mita 17 n'elu elu igwe
Obodo ahụ nwekwara ókèala Ypres na East, Voormezele na Ebe Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ, Kemmel na Dikkebus na Ndịda, Reningelst na Southwest, Poperinge na West, Elverdinge na North na Brielen na Northeast
Site na 1487 ruo 1697, anyị na-ahụ nnukwu ọdịda nke ndị bi na Vlamertinge
Nkọwa kachasị mma maka nke a ga-abụ afọ 80 nke afọ 'Agha na Netherlands
N'oge Agha Ụwa Mbụ, anyị na-ahụ na ndị mmadụ na-alaghachi azụ
Nke a bụ n'ihi na Ypres dị nso, bụ nke dị n'ihu obodo ahụ, bu bombu buru ibu na Vlamertinge nwekwara nnukwu nsogbu site na mbuso agha ndị a
Vlokia bụ mkpụrụ osisi na-akụ ifuru na ezinụlọ Aizoaceae
E bipụtara nkọwa mbụ nke ụdị ndụ (yana ụdị Vlokia ater) na 1994 site na Steven A
Hammer
Aha ọnụ ọgụgụ a na-asọpụrụ onye chọpụtara Vlokia ater, onye na-ahụ maka ihe ọkụkụ na South Africa Jan H
Vlok (amụrụ 1957)
A kwadoro ịkpọpụta 'Flow-key-a' dabere na ịkpọ aha ya

Voices of Sarafina! bụ ihe nkiri akwụkwọ akụkọ America nke afọ 1988 gbasara egwuregwu egwu ịkpa oke agbụrụ nke Sarafina! Nigel Noble duziri A na-enyocha ya na ngalaba Un Certain Regard na 1989 Cannes Film Festival
Longto (Lɔ̀ŋtó, Lõtó), ma ọ bụ Voko (Woko), bụ onye otu alaka Duru nke asụsụ Savanna nke a na-asụ na mpaghara Poli nke ngalaba Faro, Cameroon
Voluntary Socialism bụ ọrụ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo nke onye America na - Francis Dashwood Tandy (1867-1913)
Nke mbụ e bipụtara na 1896, ọtụtụ ndị ọgba aghara n'otu n'otu, gụnyere Clarence Lee Swartz, minarchists Robert Nozick na onye nnwere onwe aka ekpe Roderick T
Long, bụ ndị kwuru na 'ọtụtụ n-aga nʼihu na echichendị ọgba aghara nke ahịa taa adịlarị ihe akaebe na Tandy'
Tandy bụ onye otu 'Denver Circle', otu ndị ikom jikọtara na Benjamin Tucker ma nye aka na akwụkwọ akụkọ Liberty
N'okwu mmalite nke Voluntary Socialism, ọ kwupụtara ebumnuche ya 'inye nkọwa zuru oke nke [Afọ ofufo] n'ihe ndị kachasị mkpa'
Iji mezuo nke ahụ, isi nke otu ruo anọ na-akọwa ntọala maka anarchism nke Tandy, na'ụzọ dị ukwuu site na Max Stirner nakwa Herbert Spencer
Isi nke ise ruo iri na anọ na-ekpuchi ebe ndị a kapịrị ọnụ, gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ nchebe onwe onye, echiche ọrụ nke uru, ụlọ akụ, njem, na atụmatụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A raara akwụkwọ ahụ nye Benjamin Tucker, 'onye edemede ya doro anya na nkatọ ya siri ike emeela ọtụtụ ihe iji kpochapụ igwe ojii nke nkwenkwe ụgha a na enwekari na akụ na ụba'
Vonani Bila bụ onye edemede na onye na-ede abụ na South Afrika, a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1972 na Obodo Shirley dị nso na Ụlọ ọgwụ Elim
Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye nchịkọta akụkọ nke akwụkwọ akụkọ abụ Timbila ma na-eduzi Timbila Poetry Project na Shirley Village, Elim na Limpopo Province
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nhazi nke Limpopo NGO Coalition ma na-edezi akwụkwọ akụkọ Community Gazette
O dere akwụkwọ akụkọ asatọ n'asụsụ Bekee na Tsonga maka ndị okenye na-agụ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ
E bipụtara abụ ya na nchịkọta 'No Free Sleeping'
N'afọ 2003, Vonani Bila wepụtara CD egwu na abụ mbụ ya, 'Dahl Street, Pietersburg'
Bila sonyere na 'Poetry Africa 2005', emume mba ụwa nke uri nke emere na Durban, South Africa

Vonani Bila malitere agụmakwụkwọ ya na Shirley Primary School n'obodo ya bụ Shirley, ọ gara n'igụ agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Ụlọ akwụkwọ Lemana High na obodo Njhakanjhaka Village dị nso na Elim Hospital
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị Lemana, ọ gara Mahadum Natal
O nwere MA na Creative Writing na Mahadum Rhodes

Vonjiniaina (onye amụrụ dika Vonjiniaina Annie Ratovonirina; June 26, 1975), bụ onye na-ese ihe na Madagascar nke oge a, onye nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo na ihe ọkpụkpụ na nke ise Jeux de la Francophonie na 2005
A mụrụ ya nye nne na nna na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mba na mba, Vonjiniaina kwagara Germany mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na ato
Ọ gara Illkirch-Graffenstaden iji mụọ gbasara ahịa na Robert-Schuman University Institute of Technology
Vonjiniaina malitere ọrụ nka ya na ihe ngosi De l'Ame à la Matière (Site na Mkpụrụ Obi gaa n'Ihe) ma nweta nlebara anya na-eso usoro ihe ọkpụkpụ ya, Paroles de boue (Okwu nke Mud)
Ọrụ ndị a pụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi mba ụwa
O gosipụtara na Dakar Biennale (2002), Hôtel de Ville (2003), Musei Di San Salvatore na Lauro na Rome (2012), na Gallery of African Art na London (2014)
Vonjiniaina na-arụ ọrụ karịsịa na ala, na-enweta mkpali site na ihe nketa ọdịbendị Madagascar 'N'ọrụ m, enwere ala mgbe niile, nke mbụ dị ka ihe dị ka isi nke mmadụ
N'ime ọrụ nke ụwa, e nwere ihe ime mmụọ nke jikọtara ala na akụkọ ihe mere eme, ohere na oge, mmadụ na Chineke, ihe dị adị na nke e chepụtara echepụta, mkpụrụ obi na ihe'
Samuel Ifeanyi 'Vop' Osili, Jr
bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị otu Patị Democratic si Indianapolis, Indiana
Ọ bụ onye otu Indianapolis City-County Council site na mpaghara nke iri na otu, na mpaghara ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke Center Township
Kemgbe ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2018, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke kansụl ahụ

N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Disemba n'afọ 2011, onye ọka ikpe nke Indiana kwupụtara na ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ nke steeti ahọpụtara nke Indiana n'ihi enweghị ikike nke onye mbụ bụ Charlie White, ọ bụ ezie na e mechara gbanwee nke a na mkpesa
A mụrụ Osili na Lagos, Nigeria, nna ya bụ onye Naijiria ebe nne ya bụ onye Amerịka
E kwuru na ọ na-ekwu okwu nke ọma mgbe ọ bụ nwata, nke mere ka nne na nna ya kpọọ ya 'Vop' - nke pụtara 'Voice of the People'
Aha njirimara ahụ nọgidere
N'etiti agha obodo Naịjirịa, ya na nne ya gbagara United States; nna ya esoghị ha ruo afọ ise ọzọ
Ha biri n'ụlọ nne nne nne ya na Haughville
O tolitere dị ka onye Republican mana ọ ghọrọ onye Democrat na 1990s
Osili gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Carnegie-Mellon ebe o nwetara nzere bachelọ na ise ụkpụrụ ụlọ, ma nweta nzere masta na ụkpụrụ ụlọ na imewe obodo na Mahadum Columbia
O mechara jee ozi dị ka onye ozi ala ọzọ na Haiti na mba ndị ọzọ na-emepe emepe
Ọ bụ onye mmekọ ntọala nke A2SO4, ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ụkpụrụ ụlọ nke dị na Indianapolis nke bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design-certified firms na mba ahụ
Ọ bụ onye otu Indiana Fire and Building Services Commission site na 2001 ruo 2005, na onye isi oche nke Indianapolis Board of Zoning Appeals site na 2005 ruo 2008
N'oge dị iche iche, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye otu bọọdụ nke YMCA nke Greater Indianapolis, United Way nke Central Indiana na Children's Museum of Indianapolis
N'afọ 2011, Osili meriri na City-County Council District 15 megide onye Republican, A
Feeney-Ruiz na onye Libertarian, Zachary Capehart
O nwetara pasent irí asatọ nke vootu
N'afọ 2015, e degharịrị mpaghara kansụl ahụ, wepụ oche anọ buru ibu, ma wega Osili na District 11
Osili meriri na ntuli aka 2015 maka District 11 megide Republican Remington O'Guin ebe o nwetara nke votu
N'ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2018, onye isi oche nke City-County Council bụ Stephen Clay kwụsịrị ma kwado Osili ka ọ nọchie ya
A họpụtara Osili dịka onye isi ala n'otu olu
N'afọ 2010, Osili bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Democratic maka ọkwa odeakwụkwọ nke steeti Indiana, na-ekwe nkwa ịmaliteghachi ngalaba ọrụ azụmahịa nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Na mbụ, ọ bụ onye na-enweghị ike megide onye Republican bụ Charlie White

Otú ọ dị, a karịrị White maka ịzọ ụlọ ya mbụ na Fishers dị ka ebe obibi ya ma nọgide na-eje ozi na kansụl obodo Fishers ọbụna mgbe ọ kwapụrụ n'obodo, na maka ịtụ vootu na mpaghara ochie ya na Republican primary
Nnyocha e mere na mbụ gosiri na Osili nwetara Ike karia White na mpaghara Indianapolis n'ihi esemokwu ahụ
Otú ọ dị, n'ụbọchị ntuli aka, Osili nwetara naanị pasent iri atọ na asaa nke votu n'etiti nnukwu ebili mmiri Republican nke gafere Indiana

Ndị Democrats mechara gbaa akwụkwọ iji kagbuo mmeri White, na-ekwu na ebe ọ bụ na ndị odeakwụkwọ nke Steeti ga-abụ ndị debanyere aha ha, ha ga-edebanye aha n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro ya mere White erughị eru ịzọ ọkwa
Otú ọ dị, Kọmitii Recount nke steeti kagburu nkwupụta ndị Democrats
Ndị Democrats rịọrọ arịrịọ, na Eprel 7 onye ọka ikpe Marion County bụ Louis Rosenberg nyere iwu ka Recount Commission mee mkpebi banyere iwu nke ndebanye aha White
Kọmitii ahụ jiri otu olu mee ntuli aka iji kpochapụ White, na-anakwere nkwupụta ya na ọ bu n'obi iji ụlọ ochie ya dị ka adreesị ya na-adịgide adịgide
Ndị Democrats gwara Rosenburg ka ọ nyochaa mkpebi ahụ, nke o mere (n'oge White na-anọghị ya) na Nọvemba 23
A tụrụ anya na ọ ga-ekpe ikpe n'ime ụbọchị iri atọ
Na Disemba 22, 2011, Rosenberg kpebiri na White mebiri iwu ntuli aka n'ezie, nakwa na o rughị eru ịzọ ọkwa
Rosenberg nyere iwu ka Recount Commission wepụ White n'ọfịs ma kwupụta Osili dị ka onye mmeri na ndabara
White kwupụtara ozugbo na ọ ga-arịọ arịrịọ, ma gwa Rosenberg ka ọ kwụsị ikpe ya ruo mgbe ụlọ ikpe dị elu nwere ike ịnụrụ ikpe ahụ
N'echi ya, Rosenburg nyere nkwụsịtụ na mkpebi nke ya ruo Jenụwarị 3, 2012
Na Jenụwarị 4, Rosenburg kpebiri na White nwere ike ịnọ n'ọfịs mgbe arịrịọ ya na-arụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ikpe
Ọ bụrụ na Osili mechara bụrụ odeakwụkwọ nke Steeti, ọ ga-abụ onye Democrat mbụ jidere ọkwa ahụ kemgbe 1994

Dị ka Jim Shella, onye nta akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na WISH-TV na Indianapolis si kwuo, ọ bụrụ na Osili mechara bụrụ odeakwụkwọ nke Steeti, ndị Republican agaghị enweta votu ọ bụla n'ụzọ iwu kwadoro n'ọsọ odeakwụkwọ nke Steeti
Nke a ga-eme ka ha daa n'okpuru pasent iri a chọrọ iji nọgide na-enwe ọnọdụ ndị isi na steeti (ọ bụ nsonaazụ odeakwụkwọ nke Steeti kpebiri ọnọdụ ndị isi)

ASNa Febụwarị 4, 2012, a mara White ikpe maka mpụ isii metụtara omume ya na ntuli aka 2010, si otú a wepụ ya n'ọfịs ozugbo; Indiana, dị ka ọtụtụ steeti, anaghị ekwe ka ndị omekome a mara ikpe nọrọ n'ọkwa

White gbalịrị ime ka ebubo ndị ahụ bụrụ ihe na-ezighị ezi mgbe a na-ekpe ya ikpe, mana onye ọka ikpe nke Hamilton County Superior Court bụ Steven Nation jụrụ ime nke ahụ, si otú a kwụsị ohere ọ bụla nke White inwetaghachi ọfịs ọ bụrụgodị na mkpebi Rosenberg nyere Osilli ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gbanwere na mkpesa
Gọvanọ Mitch Daniels họpụtara osote White, Jerry Bonnet, dị ka onye odeakwụkwọ nke steeti
Otú ọ dị, Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Indiana tụfuru mkpebi Rosenburg, na-ekwusi ike na ndị Democrats gbara akwụkwọ ịma aka ha n'oge
Mkpebi ụlọ ikpe ahụ nyere Daniels ohere ịhọpụta onye ga-anọchi ya
Vũng Tàu bụ ama ukwu nor na étíti ala ana-kpo Ba Ria-Vung Tau, Vietnam
Vũng Tàu bu no na ala kpo kpo no bu ala no kpo kpu 'achicha'

Vusi Kunene (a mụrụ na 12 Eprel 1966) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka Jack Mabaso na Generations na ịga n'ihu ya, Generations The Legacy Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri iri abụọ na ise na ihe ngosi telivishọn kemgbe afọ 1993
N'afọ 2011, ọ natara Golden Horn Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma maka ihe nkiri Soul City

Vusi Thanda (a mụrụ na 12 Septemba 1963) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na SABC 1 Sitcom Emzini Wezinsizwa dị ka Tshawe
Vusi Thanda bụ onye Xhosa, a mụrụ ya na South Africa
A họpụtara Thanda na Wall of Fame n'afọ 2017
[nke?]
N'ọnwa Mee 2021, ọ banyere n'ọrụ na-eme ihe nkiri na Ikhaya Labadala na Netflix
Vusumuzi bụ aha Afrika nyere
Ndị ama ama nwere aha gụnyere
Vute bụ asụsụ Mambiloid nke Cameroon na Gabon, nwere otu puku ndị na-asụ ya na Naịjirịa
A kwadoro orthography na March 9, 1979
Ìgwè asụsụ ndị a ma ama bụ ndị ọwụwa anyanwụ, etiti, na Doume
Consonants dị na Vute dị ọtụtụ ma gụnye pulmonic na ikuku ikuku Labialization bụ ụda ụda n'ọtụtụ consonants, ụfọdụ n'ime ha bụ olumba

{{ Infobox person | name= Vuyelwa Booi | image= | alt= | birth_date= {{ birth date and age | df= yes | 1981 | 4 | 6 } } | birth_place= Soweto, South Africa | nationality= South African n | years_active= 1994–present | known_for= | spouse= | children= } }
Vuyelwa Booi (amụrụ na 6 Eprel 1981), bụ onye South Afrika na-eme ihe nkiri, onye n’eti egwu na onye na-egosi televishọn
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri Chappie, Swartwater ya na Sink
A mụrụ Booi na 6 Eprel 1981 na Soweto, Johannesburg, South Africa
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị na Dominican Convent na Belgravia, Johannesburg
Mgbe ahụ, ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya na Potchefstroom High School maka umunwaanyi ma gụọ akwụkwọ na 1998
N'oge ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, ọ malitere ịbụ abụ na ukwe ma mee ihe nkiri n'ụlọ akwụkwọ
O mechara nzere na Theatre Arts na Midrand University, nke a maara ugbu a dị ka Midrand Graduate Institute
N'afọ 2015, o kwupụtara na ọ dara mbà n'obi ruo ọtụtụ afọ
N'afọ 1997, a họpụtara ya na North West Youth Choir ma mee njem na Europe na July
N'oge njem a, o nwere ike ime ihe nkiri na mba ise, sonye na asọmpi yana ememme ukwe
N'afọ 2000, o nwetara ohere ịrụ ọrụ ndu na egwuregwu ụlọ ọrụ na Ahia Theatre
N'afọ 2001, ọ sonyeere ndị otu SABC2 soap opera 7de Laan Na soapie, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka 'Alyce Morapedi' ruo n'afọ 2004
N'afọ 2005, ọ kwagara New York ma mụtakwuo ihe nkiri mgbe ọ debanyere aha na New York Film Academy
Otú ọ dị, ọ pụghị imecha usoro ahụ
Mgbe ọ laghachiri South Africa na Disemba 2005, Vuyelwa sonyeere egwu egwu Drumstruck rụrụ na Broadway
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2006, o mere nkwado olu maka onye egwu Wyclef Jean maka remix nke 2006 FIFA World Cup theme song tinyere Shakira
Mgbe afọ abụọ gasịrị, ọ sonyeere ọzọ na soapie 7de Laan na Nọvemba 2006
Ka ọ na aga, ọ nwetara ọrụ ndu nke 'Pabi' nke ihe nkiri ndị ntorobịa SABC1 Soul Buddyz oge atọ
Mgbe ahụ, ọ pụtara dịka onye ọbịa na ihe ngosi egwuregwu egwu SABC2 Noot vir Noot
N'oge ahụ, a kpọrọ ya ka ọ na-akwado usoro magazin ndụ SABC2 Pasella
N'afọ 2010, ọ nọchiri Dosto Noge dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ihe ngosi ikike ndị ahịa SABC2 'Speak Out' maka oge nke anọ ya
N'afọ 2015, ọ nọchiri Anele Mdoda dị ka onye na-elekọta usoro ihe nkiri Dream School SA N'otu afọ ahụ, o mere ihe nkiri mbụ na Hollywood blockbuster Chappie ma mesịa rụọ ọrụ 'Maria' na ihe nkiri Sink
N'afọ 2017, ọ sonyeere ndị otu Swartwater ma rụọ ọrụ 'Portia Malefe'
Vuyiswa Precious Caluza bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị South Africa
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye otu KwaZulu-Natal Legislature kemgbe Mee, na afọ 2019
Caluza bụ onye otu African National Congress na osote onye isi nke pati ahụ
Caluza sonyere na African National Congress Youth League
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu KwaZulu-Natal mgbe ntuli aka mpaghara e mere na 8 Mee na afọ 2019
N'abalị iri abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Mee afọ 2019, ọ malitere ọrụ dịka onye otu
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi nke ndị otu kachasị
Vuyo Dabula (amụrụ na 11 Septemba 1976) bụ onye South Africa na-eme ihe nlereanya, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-ewu ahụ
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dị ka Shandu Magwaza na ihe nkiri mpụ Netflix, Queen Sono
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na PH Moeketsi Agricultural High ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'afọ 1995, Wits Technikon sochiri ya, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ mgbe otu afọ gachara n'afọ 1996
O kwuru na ihe ọ gụrụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ abụghị ihe ọ nwere mmasị ịrụ ọrụ ya maka ọdịnihu; kama ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri
Maka ikwado onwe ya maka ime ihe nkiri, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na AFDA Cape Town
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya nke Kumkani Phakade na ncha South Africa, Generations Vuyo pụtakwara na Avengers Age of Ultron (2015)

Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị mkpa na ihe nkiri 2017 Five Fingers for Marseilles Vuyo na-eme ihe nkiri ugbu a dị ka Shandu, onye nledo ghọrọ onye nnupụisi yana mmasị ịhụnanya na agwa Pearl Thusi na usoro mbụ nke Netflix, Queen Sono
N'ọnwa Eprel 2020, Netflix megharịrị usoro ahụ maka oge nke abụọ
Otú ọ dị, na Nọvemba 26, 2020, a kọrọ na Netflix akagbuola usoro ahụ n'ihi ihe ịma aka mmepụta nke ọrịa COVID-19 kpatara

Vuyo Mbuli (14 Mee afọ 1967 - 19 Mee afọ 2013) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri telivishọn na South Afrika na onye na-eweta akụkọ na Morning Live, Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka akụkọ na SABC na afọ 1993 ya na Tracy O'Brien wee rụọ ọrụ na ihe ngosi izizi Morning Live na afo 1999 ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Mbuli nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri anọ na isii mgbe ọ dara na Free State Stadium na Bloemfontein mgbe ọ na-ekiri egwuregwu rugby

Mbuli rụrụ ọrụ maka ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi steeti SABC ma mee ihe nkiri telivishọn mbụ ya na afọ 1993 maka TopSport Surplus (ịghọ SABC 3) dị ka onye na-egosi ihe ngosi na-aga n'ihu, ma rụọ ọrụ ya ruo n'ihe ngosi egwuregwu na akụkọ akụkọ
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Morning Live na SABC 2 kemgbe e bidoro ya na 1 Nọvemba afọ 1999
Mbuli nwụrụ n'ihi embolism akpa ume mgbe ọ na-ekiri egwuregwu rugby na Free State Stadium, mgbe ọ dị afọ 46
Ihe karịrị otu puku mmadụ gụnyere ndị isi na ndị ama ama gara ememe olili ozu ya

Vuyokazi Mahlati (nwụrụ n'abalị iri na abụọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2020) bụ onye ọchụnta ego na-elekọta mmadụ na South Africa, onye na-akwado nwoke na nwanyị na onye nduzi zuru ụwa ọnụ nke International Women's Forum Ọ bụ onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ nhazi ajị anụ nke mbụ n'Africa nke dị na Butterworth, na Eastern Cape
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke African Farmers Association of South Africa, yana onye isi oche nke Advisory Panel on Land Reform and Agriculture
Ọ na-eje ozi oge nke abụọ ya dị ka onye otu National Planning Commission nke South Africa
A zụrụ ya diị ka ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara amụma na London School of Economics na United Kingdom
O nwere nzere PhD sitere na Mahadum Stellenbosch
Na Septemba 2013, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ osote onye isi oche nke State Information Technology Agency
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ ugboro abụọ dị ka onye isi oche nke South African Post Office Board of Directors ebe ọ duziri atụmatụ ụlọ ọrụ site na ọdịnala gaa na azụmahịa dijitalụ na mail, logistics na ụlọ akụ
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ ugboro abụọ na Financial Markets Advisory Board ma bụrụ onye otu Financial Services Board Licensing Committee
Na mgbakwunye, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nke Alexkor Mining Board na onye njikwa ego nke Umbono Capital nke s na-akpọ One Stone ugbu a
Ọ bụ onye nchịkwa na-abụghị onye isi nke Lion of Africa Insurance Company, onye enyemaka nke Brimstone Investment Company, otu n'ime ụlọ ọrụ Johannesburg Stock Exchange
Ọ bụkwa onye isi ndụmọdụ na onye nwe otu African Financial Group
O hiwere ụlọ ọrụ nhazi ajị anụ mbụ nke Afrịka na Butterworth, na Eastern Cape, ebe ọ kụziiri ndị na-enweghị ọrụ otu esi eme uwe cashmere
Mahlati nwụrụ na 12 Ọktoba 2020
Vyan Sampson (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1996) bụ onye na-agba bọọlụ na Jamaica nke na-agbachitere Charlton Athletic na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke mba Jamaica
Sampson malitere ọrụ egwuregwu ya n'otu ndị ntorobịa na Charlton Athletic tupu ọ banye na FA WSL 1 club Arsenal na 2011
Na mbụ, ọ na-egwuri egwu n'otu ndị na-eto eto na otù ndị ọzọ, ebe ọ meriri iko mba na ọkwa ndị ọzọ na League Cup n'otu ndị nọ n'okpuru afọ irí asaa

Ọ nọgidere na ọkwa dị ala nke Arsenal ruo afọ atọ n'etiti afọ 2011 na 2014 tupu a kwalite ya n'ime ndị otu mbụ, asọmpi mbụ ya bịara na 12 Ọktoba 2014 na egwuregwu WSL ikpeazụ nke oge ahụ; mmeri 3 - 1 n'ụlọ megide Everton

N'afọ sochirinụ, n'afọ 2015, Sampson mere naanị otu mputa egwuregwu maka Arsenal mana ọ gbara bọọlụ ugboro anọ na FA WSL Cup nke Arsenal gara n'ihu merie mgbe ha meriri Notts County; e webatara Sampson na nkeji ole na ole nke ikpeazụ
Na mbido afọ 2016, Sampson bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ọhụrụ na Arsenal
Otú ọ dị, ọnwa atọ ka e mesịrị, o merụrụ ahụ n'ikpere nke mere ka ọ ghara ịgba bọọlụ ọnwa anọ
N'ọnwa Eprel 2018, Sampson malitere igbara West Ham United nke FA Women's Premier League Southern Division
Na 19 June, ka West Ham banyere na WSL maka 2018 - 19, Sampson bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta na klọb ahụ
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2019, Sampson sonyeere ndị otu Championship ọhụrụ e guzobere London City Lionesses na mgbazinye ego
Na Septemba 2020, Sampson sonyeere San Marino Academy na Serie A
A kpọrọ aha ya n'otu egwuregwu ụbọchị mana ọ pụtaghị
Na 28 Jenụwarị 2021, Sampson sonyeere Charlton Athletic na nkwekọrịta na-adịgide adịgide ruo na ngwụcha oge 2020 na 21
Sampson nọchitere anya England na Under-17 na Under-19 Oge izizi ya maka England U17s bịara na 13 Eprel 2012 na mmeri n'ụlọ na Iceland na 2012 UEFA Women's Under-17 Championship qualifier
Ọ pụtara ugboro anọ ọzọ n'afọ 2014 maka England U17s ma nyee otu goolu; megide Israel na iru eru maka 2013 UEFA Women's Under-17 Championship
N'afọ 2013, Sampson gara England U19s wee mee nke mbụ ya na 4 Eprel megide Serbia

Ọ pụtara ọzọ tupu England ahọrọ ya maka 2014 UEFA Women's Under-19 Championship, ọ gbara nkeji zuru ezu na egwuregwu abụọ mbụ nke mba ya tupu ọ hapụ egwuregwu nke atọ na nke ikpeazụ ka a kụrụ England n'ọkwa otu
N'ịgbaso asọmpi FIFA Women's World Cup nke ndị otu mba Jamaica, a kpọrọ Sampson ka ọ bịa na ndepụta nke ogige ọzụzụ ha na Jenụwarị 2019
William Christopher Winter (amụrụ na Disemba 27, 1972) bụ onye America na-eme nchọpụta n'ụra, onye na-ahụ maka akwara, onye edemede, na ikike gbasara ụra na arụmọrụ egwuregwu
A na-eto ya site n'ịmepụta okwu uru circadian mgbe ọ mụsịrị mmetụta nke njem na ndị otu Major League Baseball
Ọ mụrụ mmetụta nke oge ụra na-ahọrọ na arụmọrụ onye na-agba ọsọ na Major League Baseball, na arụmọrụ na-akụ
N'afọ 2013, nchọpụta ya jikọtara ụra nke onye ọkpụkpọ Major League Baseball na mbelata ogologo ndụ ọrụ
Ọrụ a dugara na nyocha banyere ụra dị ka ihe na-egosi uru NFL Draft nke a na-amụ ụra nke ndị egwuregwu bọọlụ 560 Atlantic Coast Conference (ACC) na ihe ịga nke ọma ha
Ruo ugbu a, ọ na-adụ ọtụtụ òtù ndị na-eme egwuregwu ọdụ, ọkachasị San Francisco Giants bụ ndị kwuru okwu n'ihu ọha banyere ọrụ ya na klọb ha na 2012 na 2014
N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, e jikọtara ọrụ Winter na Philadelphia Phillies na 2022 usoro ụwa
Oge oyi, nke a kọwara dị ka 'onye na-ehi ụra' bụ nke Arianna Huffington zoro aka na ya ugboro ugboro n'akwụkwọ ya nke afọ 2016 Mgbanwe Ụra Ịgbanwe Ndụ Gị, Otu abalị n'otu oge
Akwụkwọ izizi nke Winter,Ngwọta Ụra Ihe kpatara ụra ji agbaji na otu esi edozi ya, , bụ nke Penguin Random Ụlọ wepụtara na Eprel 4, 2017
Winter kwupụtara mbipụta na-abịanụ nke Akwụkwọ Nwa ahụ zuru ike Ihe kpatara na nwa gị ike gwụrụ, nke nwere waya, ma ọ bụ iwe nwere ike nwee nsogbu ụra - yana otu esi enyere aka
Penguin Random House wepụtara akwụkwọ ahụn' August 17, 2021
Winter na-enwekwa podcast akpọrọ Ụra Unplugged
The Sleep Solution Why Your Sleep Is Broken and How To Fix It bụ akwụkwọ sayensị banyere ụra nke dọkịta na-ahụ maka akwara W
Christopher Winter, onye ọkachamara na ụra na arụmọrụ
E wepụtara akwụkwọ ahụ na Eprel 4, 2017, na nyocha dị mma
Nnyocha na Refinery 29 kwuru, 'Akwụkwọ mbụ Dr
Winter, The Sleep Solution Why Your Sleep Is Broken And How To Fix It, a na-eto ya dị ka 'ngwọta' maka ehighị ụra
Ọ bụ ụzọ na-enweghị isi, nke na-ekwu okwu maka nsogbu ụra nke na-ezube ịgbanwe akụkọ gbasara ụra iji mee ka ọ dịkwuo mfe ịchịkwa
Kirkus Reviews dere, 'Akwụkwọ a na-adịghị ahụkebe nke nwere ike inyere ndị na-arịa ụra na-adịghị mma aka imeziwanye ogo izu ike ha site n'ịkọwa ihe gbara ụra dị mma ma nye usoro ziri ezi iji nweta ya

' Publishers Weekly dere, 'Dị ka dọkịta na-ahụ maka ọrịa akwara na-ahụkarị n'ihe gbasara ụra, Winter nwere ezigbo asambodo iji kwado nkwa ya nye ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ na ha ga-eji echiche ọhụrụ nke ihe ọ pụtara inwe ụra dị mma

Ndi akacha mara ama bụ ndi Agbaja na Ngwo bụ ndi mmadụ ndi no n’agbata oke ọhịa nke Awka (isi obodo Anambra ) rue ndagwurugwu okwute nke Enugu (isi obodo Enugu )
Agbaja mejuputara n' ime obodo ndi nọ ugbua na ụmụnna Ngwo, Udi, Ezeagu, Umulokpa, Igbo-Etiti, Oji-Riva, Awgu -ukwu, na okpuru ochịchị ndị dị na ọwụwa anyanwụ Enugu
Akụkụ ndị ọzọ amaara n'ụmụnna Waawa gunyere Nkanụ, Nsukka, Abia(nke di n'ime Waawa na abụrọ Abia nke Steeti), Nike na ime obodo ndị ọzọ dị na Enugu Steeti

Onyeama ka amụrụ ihe dịka na afọ 1870s, nwa nke ikpeazu n'ime ụmụ iri nke özö Omulu Onwusi, nwoke zuru onwe ya nwere ọtụtụ nwanyi , na naanị nwa nwọke nne ya - Chinazụngwa Ijeonyeabọ nke agbataobi ime obodo Ebe

Onye nwanne ya nwoke, Amadiezeoha Nwankwo-Onwusi wetara, Onyeama rụsiri ọrụ ike wee mee akara ya na azụmaahịa

Obinna Kelvin Anyanwụ (amụrụ ya na Port Harcourt, Rivers Steeti, Naịjirịa ), nke amara aha ya bụ Waconzy, bụ onye na-agụ egwu, onye na-edee egwu, onye na-edekọ egwu na onye na-enyere ndị mmadụ aka nwere mgbọrọgwụ ezinụlọ na Ụmụahịa, Abịa Steeti
Ọ bụ onye guzobere Dv8 Media na ntọala Waconzy
O bilitere n’ọkwa n’afọ 2010 site n’ egwu ya bụ “I Celebrate” nke pụtara na abọm ' I Celebrate
Abọm ya nke abụọ Money Back Guarantee pụtara na 2013
Ọ bịanyere aka na Dv8 Media ugbu a
A mụrụ Waconzy na 10 nke Ọgụstụ 1983 na Port Harcourt, nna na nne bụ ndị Port Harcourt ebe o tolitere
Waconzy gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị na Sekọndịrị na Port Harcourt

Na 1998, Waconzy dere egwu mbụ mgbe ọ ka nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndịrị Waconzy wepụtara egwu mbụ azụmahịa ya n'afọ 2000, Waconzy banyere n'ime 'Federal University of Technology Owerri' ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2005 na asambodo nke teknọlọjị na Prọjektị Manejimentị
Mgbe Waconzy mechara ọrụ NYSC ya na 2006, Waconzy sonyeere Prọjektị Manejimentị na Amerịka ebe a enyere ya asambodo Prọjektị Manejimentị (PMP) na 2008, o guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ya Dv8 Media
Na 2008 Waconzy wepụtara egwu 'I Celebrate '
vidio egwu a bụ Clarence Peters nke CAPital Dream Pictures na lagos Nigeria
Na 2011 mepụtara ya, Waconzy na Duncan Mighty rụkọtara egwu nke 'I Celebrate'
Ọ wepụtara abọm izizi ya 'I Celebrate' na 2010
Ndị kachasị egwu na abọm ahụ gụnyere 'i Celebrate', 'too much money', 'wedding day' na 'Chuku Chuku'
N'isochi abọm izizi ya, Waconzy wepụtara Money Back Guarantee na 2013 bụ nke gosipụtara egwu dịka 'Amosu', 'Club on fire' na 'Sweet like tombo'
Na 2015, o wepụtara egwu Waconzy nke gụnyere egwu dịka 'Na God', 'Balling like waconzy (Ekpoh)' na 'Ogbono'

Wadsworth Aikens Jarrell (amụrụ na Nọvemba 20, 1929) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe, ónyé na-ese ọkpụkpụ na onye na-ebi akwụkwọ
A mụrụ ya na Albany, Georgia, wee kwaga Chicago, Illinois, ebe ọ gàrà Art Institute of Chicago

Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ malitere itinye aka nke ukwuu n'ihe nkiri nka mpaghara ma site na ọrụ mbụ ya ọ nyochara ndụ ọrụ nke ndị Africa America na Chicago ma chọta mmetụta na anya na ụda nke egwu jazz
Na ngwụcha afọ 1960 ọ meghere WJ Studio na Gallery, ebe ya na nwunye ya, Jae, kwadoro ndị na-ese ihe na ndị na-eti egwu mpaghara
A mụrụ Jarrell na Albany, Georgia, na 1929 na Solomon Marcus na Tabitha Jarrell
A na-akpọ ya aha ónyé na-ede uri Henry Wadsworth Longfellow, ọ bụ nwa ikpeazụ n'ime ụmụ isii
Otu afọ mgbè amuchara Jarrell, ezinụlọ ahụ kwagara n'ugbo dị hekta iri abụọ na asatọ dị nso na Athens, Georgia, ebe ha na-akụ akwụkwọ nri na ogho
Nna Jarrell bụ ọkwá nkà na ónyé na-eme oche nke nwere azụmahịa nke ya, Ụlọ Ahịa Ngwongwo SM
Jarrell
Ụmụ nwoke atọ Jarrell rụrụ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ, otu n'ime ha na-amụta oche osisi
Ikike nka nke nna ha na nkà nke nne ha dị ka onye na-eme akwa nyere aka n'ịhụnanya ezinụlọ ahụ dum maka nka
Dị ka nwatakịrị, Jarrell gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ nwere otu ọnụ ụlọ ebe onye nkuzi ya, Jessie Lois Hall, gbara ya ume ịchọpụta akụkụ nka ya
Ọ gàrà ụlọ akwụkwọ Baptist nke onwe ya malite na klas nke asaa tupu ọ gaa Athens High na klas nke iri
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, nkà ya màkà nka pụtara ìhè ka ọ malitere ịmepụta ihe nkiri nke ya, ihe osise maka akwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ, na ihe osise iji mee ihe egwuregwu, n'ikpeazụ na-ese ihe osise mmanụ
Dị ka nwa okorobịa nwere mmasị na nka n'oge ngwụcha afọ 1930 na mmalite afọ 1940 ọ mụtara banyéré eserese na ihe osise site na magazin ndị dị ka Saturday Evening Post na Collier's
N'enweghị ike ịchọpụta ọdịiche dị n'etiti ihe osise na ihe osise, Jarrell chere na 'ndị na-ese ihe mechara baa ọgaranya mana ọ bụ ndị na-ese onyinyo na-eme nnukwu ego'
N'ịgbalịsi ike ịbanye na Howard, na-enweghị ike ịrụ ọrụ, yana nchegbu banyéré ọnụ ọgụgụ mpụ na-arịwanye elu na Washington, ezinụlọ ahụ kpebiri ịkwaga ọzọ na 1977, n'oge a na Athens, Georgia
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbè ọpụpụ ahụ gasịrị, Jarrell ghọrọ osote prọfesọ na Mahadum Georgia
Ya na nwunye ya malitere ụlọ ọrụ ihe eji egwuri egwu agụmakwụkwọ dị elu nke sitere n'ịhụnanya ụmụ ha nwèrè màkà ihe eji eg egwuri egwu yiri ya mgbe ha bi na Washington, DC
Ha meghere obere ụlọ ahịa a na-akpọ Tadpole Toys na Hobby Center na Athens màkà nnukwu nnabata
Otú ọ dị, n'ihi ahịa na-adịghị mma na Mee 1982, a manyere ha imechi ya
N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, Jarrell nwetara ọrụ na Mahadum ahụ
N'afọ 1988, ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọkwa ya na nkuzi n'ozuzu ya iji lekwasị anya n'ọrụ okike ya
Ka ọ na-erule afọ 1994, ụmụ atọ ahụ toro; ụmụ nwanyị abụọ ahụ gara Art Institute nke Chicago, Wadsworth Jr
ghọkwara onye ọrụ ụgbọ mmiri
N'afọ ahụ, Jae na nwa ya nwanyị Jennifer kwagara New York iji chọta ebe ha ga-ebi, biri na SoHo, ebe Jarrell sonyeere ha ọnwa ole na ole ka e mesịrị
Ugbu a, Jarrell na Jae bi ma na-arụ ọrụ na Cleveland, Ohio
Mgbè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Art Institute, Jarrell na-ebi ndụ site na ịkwụ ụgwọ ya site na ịgwakọta ihe osise ma kwalite nkà ya na ụlọ ọrụ ya ruo otu afọ
Ọ malitere itinye ọrụ ya na asọmpi, a nabatara ya na Chicago Show na Navy Pier na Union League Show
Jarrell mepụtara ihe osise sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ nke echiche ndị ọ mụtara n'ụlọ akwụkwọ na ihe nkírí nke ndụ kwa ụbọchị na Chicago ojii

N'inwe mmasị na ịgba ọsọ ịnyịnya, klọb jazz na ụlọ mmanya, ọ na-ejikarị sketchpad na nyocha ya, mechaa mepụta ihe osise dị ka Neon Row (1958), ihe nkírí n'okporo ámá, Shamrock Inn (1962), ihe nkiri ụlọ mmanya, na The Jockeys #1 (1962), site na nleta n'okporong ịnyịnya
Isiokwu ndị a ga-apụta ọzọ n'oge niile ọ na-arụ ọrụ
Ọrụ mbụ ya na-egosipụta 'echiche efu abụọ' ọ mụtara n'ụlọ akwụkwọ anya na geometric na ihe ndị na-ekpuchi ihe na-alaghachi na ebe na-apụ n'anya na mbara igwe

A na-eji agba egosi mmegharị na nkwụsi ike, ọdịiche a hụrụ na Shamrock Inn na The Jockeys #1, Otú ọ dị, palette Jarrell agbanweela n'ime ngwakọta agba na-egbuke egbuke ma dị ike, mgbé ụfọdụ na-adị iche na ogbugbu ikpeazụ ha
Mmetụta nke post-impressionism pụtara ìhè na ọrụ ndị a mbụ, n'ụzọ kwekọrọ na usoro agụmakwụkwọ nka n'oge ahụ

Stacy Morgan, prọfesọ na ngalaba nke American Studies na Mahadum Alabama, kọwara ọrụ Jarrell dị ka 'otu ihe dị ịrịba ama nke nkà dị egwu, nke na-emepụta ihe ọhụrụ na nke na-etinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị'
Based on a long period of research and analysis, the work of Wael Shawky solves the idea of nation, religion and art through film, performance and storytelling
Mixing fact and fiction, childlike wonder and spiritual teachings, Shawky has created a depiction of the ancient conflict between Muslims and Christians in his trilogy of puppets and marionettes
Basedhawky was born in Alexandria, Egypt in 1971 and spent his youth in Mecca, Saudia before returning to Egypt at the age of 13
(in en-US) He holds an MFA from the University of Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, USA, and a BFA from Alexandria University, Egypt
A mụrụ Shawky na Alexandria, Ijipt na 1971 ma nọrọ oge ntorobịa ya na Mecca, Saudia tupu ọ laghachi Ijipt mgbe ọ dị afọ 13
Shawky bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà a ma ama si Middle East bụ onye nwetara nkwado mba ụwa maka ọrụ ya nke na-achọpụta akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Crusades site na oghere Middle East
O nwere MFA site na Mahadum Pennsylvania, Philadelphia, USA, na BFA site na Маhadum Alexandria, Ijipt
5N'afọ 2017, Wael Shawky gosipụtara ọrụ ọhụrụ ya 'Song of Roland The Arabic Version' na mmeghe nke Theater der Welt 2017 na Hamburg, German
Nnukwu ihe nkiri na egwu egwu na-asụgharị amaokwu French 'La Chanson de Roland' n'asụsụ Arabic ma gosipụta ihe ngosi nke ndi egwu iri abụọ na ise na-agụ egwu fidjeri
Fidjeri bụ ụdị egwu nke ndị na-egwu pearl na-abụ site na steeti Gulf nke Persian, dịka akụkụ nke omenala nke malitere ihe karịrị afọ narị asatọ
N'afọ 2016, Shawky nwere ihe ngosi onwe ya na Kunsthaus Bregenz, Austria, The Fondazione Merz na Castello di Rivoli, ma na Turin, Ịtali
N'afọ 2014, Serpentine Galleries na London mere ihe ngosi nke ọrụ ya
Enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ Shawky n'ọtụtụ nchịkọta ọha na eze, ọkachasị Museum of Modern Art (MoMA), na New York City, US, National Gallery of Canada, na Ottawa, Canada, na Tate Collection, na London, UK
Ọ bụ Lisson Gallery na-anọchite anya ya
Shawky enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye na ihe nrite maka ọrụ ya
Ọ meriri Ernst Schering Foundation Art Award na 2011 ma bụrụ onye natara Mario Merz Prize mbụ (2015) maka trilogy ihe nkiri ya, Al Araba Al Madfuna
N'afọ 2015, Shawky nwere ihe ngosi akpọrọ 'Crusades and Other Stories' na Mathaf Arab Museum of Modern Art
N'ime ihe nkiri ya nwere oké ọchịchọ, Cabaret Crusades, Wael na-ewere dị ka isiokwu ya akụkọ ihe mere eme na akụkọ mmekọrịta ọha na eze na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị gbara Agha Ndị Kraịst gburugburu
Usoro ahụ malitere na 2010 ma mechaa mechaa mezue na Jenụwarị 2015, mgbe emere ya na MoMA PS1, New York
Cabaret Crusades nwere ihe nkiri atọ The Horror Show File, The Path to Cairo, na The Secrets of Karbala, nke onye edemede Lebanọn Amin Maalouf dere The Crusades Through Arab Eyes
Ndị niile nọ na fim atọ Shawky bụ ndị na-eme ihe nkiri ma gosipụta ọdịnala Arabic
Ihe omume nke abụọ, The Path to Cairo, gosipụtara ụmụ bebi e ji ụrọ mee - ihe e kwenyere na ọ bụ ihe e ji mee ụmụ mmadụ dịka Qu'ran si kwuo
N'afọ 2011, Shawky gosipụtara ọrụ ya na 12th Istanbul Biennial

N'afọ 2013, o mepụtara ihe ngosi maka Sharjah Biennial site na usoro 'Dictums' ya, ebe ndị ọrụ 30 (nke kachasị sitere na ndị Pakistan) na-abụ abụ na qawwali, ụdị egwu nsọpụrụ Sufi na okwu ndị e si na nkwupụta nke Biennial
Shawky gara n'ihu nata ihe nrite Sharjah Biennial maka ọrụ ahụ N'afọ 2010, Shawky malitere MASS Alexandria nke bụ mmemme mbụ nke onwe ya maka ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe na Alexandria, Egypt
Wafa Makhlouf (Arabic ) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tunisia, onye guzobere na onye otu kọmitii Nidaa Tounes kemgbe afọ puku abụọ na iri na abụọ na onye isi nchịkwa nke CEED Tunisia

Wagner (amụrụ n'afọ 1986) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto, bi na Bushwick, Brooklyn, New York
Foto ya n'okporo ámá ojii na nke ọcha na ụdị ihe nkiri ya na-egosi ndị Afrịka Amerịka bi na Brooklyn
A mụrụ Wagner na Omaha, Nebraska n'afọ 1986
O nwetara BA na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na Mahadum Buena Vista, Storm Lake, Iowa n'afọ 2010
N'afọ 2011, o si Omaha kwaga Bushwick, Brooklyn, New York iji gụọ akwụkwọ maka nzere masta na ọrụ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya

Ntụle nke Leah Ollman na Los Angeles Times kọwara Wagner dị ka onye na-eme 'ụdị mmadụ dị jụụ, nke na-atọ ụtọ nke na-apụta kpọmkwem na ọdịnala nke etiti narị afọ nke iri abụọ na-ese foto n'okporo ámá na akwụkwọ akụkọ mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
' Ọ na-ese foto ndị Afrịka Amerịka bi na Brooklyn, kamakwa n'ebe ndị ọzọ na New York City

Rosemary Wahu Kagwi, onye a maara nke ọma site na aha ya bụ Wahu, bụ onye Kenya na-agụ egwu, onye bụbu onye ejiji, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye ọchụnta ego
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1980 na Nairobi

Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ, o dere abụ mbụ ya
Wahu bụbu onye nlereanya na nwa akwụkwọ Mahadum nke Nairobi, na-agụsị akwụkwọ na nzere na Bachelor of Arts na mgbakọ na mwepụ na nkwukọrịta

O wepụtara egwu mbụ ya 'Niangalie' nke natara nnabata dị mma n'Afrịka niile na ụwa niile

Ndị Ogopa DJs mepụtara ụfọdụ egwu ya

A mụrụ Kiambuthi na Kenya

Waja (nke a makwara dị ka Waja Temuga) bụ obodo dị n'ebe ugwu Ethiopia

N'ịbụ nke dị na mpaghara Debubawi nke mpaghara Tigray, n'ebe ndịda obodo Alamata, Waja nwere latitude na longitude nke / 12283°N 39600°E / 12273; 39600Coordinates / 12283°N 39600°E / 12273; 39600 nwere ịdị elu nke mita 1471 n'elu oke osimiri

Dabere na ọnụ ọgụgụ sitere na Central Statistical Agency na 2005, Waja nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ e mere atụmatụ nke 11,020, nke 5,373 bụ ụmụ nwoke na 5,647 bụ ụmụ nwanyị
